name: plastic
trans: adj.可塑料的，可塑的，体态好的，n.塑料，(外科)整形的，信用卡

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

name: steal
trans: vt.偷，窍取，n.偷窃，便宜货，(欺诈的)政治交易

sentences.english: Boys broke into a shop and stole £45 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else
to be very cheap

name: preferable
trans: adj.更可取的，更好的，更合意的

sentences.english: Anything was preferable to the tense atmosphere at home.
sentences.chinese: 什么都比家里的紧张气氛好。

sentences.english: In warm weather, clothes made of natural fabrics are infinitely preferable (= much better ) .
sentences.chinese: 天气暖和的时候，穿天然织物的衣服要舒适得多。

detailed_translations.english: better or more suitable

name: summarize
trans: vt.概括，概述，总结，摘要而言

sentences.english: The authors summarize their views in the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 作者在序言里概述了他们的观点。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short statement giving only the main information and not the details of a plan, event, report etc

name: chart
trans: n.图，图表，海图，vt.制成图表

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: student
trans: n.学生，研究生，学者

sentences.english: The student trotted out his knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc

name: lip
trans: n.嘴唇

sentences.english: She had big eyes and full lips (= large and round lips ).
sentences.chinese: 她眼睛大大的，嘴唇很丰满。

sentences.english: Matt opened the door with a smile on his lips.
sentences.chinese: 马特开了门，嘴角挂着微笑。

sentences.english: Marty kissed me right on the lips!
sentences.chinese: 马蒂一下吻在我的嘴唇上！

sentences.english: Stephen pursed his lips with distaste (= brought them together tightly into a small circle ).
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬厌恶地噘起嘴唇。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two soft parts around your mouth where your skin is redder or darker

name: year
trans: n.年，年年，年度，年龄，学年

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

name: consistent
trans: adj.坚持的，一贯的，始终如一的，一致的

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

name: maintenance
trans: n.维持，保持，维修，生活费用，供给，抚养，主张

sentences.english: the cost of repairs and maintenance
sentences.chinese: 维修保养费

sentences.english: The theatres were closed on Saturday and Sunday for routine maintenance .
sentences.chinese: 戏院周六和周日关闭进行例行维护。

sentences.english: Engineers are carrying out essential maintenance work on the main line to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 机修工正在对通往剑桥的干线进行必要的养护。

sentences.english: an evening class in car maintenance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保养的夜校课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 维持； 保养； 抚养费
detailed_translations.english: the repairs, painting etc that are necessary to keep something in good condition

name: comrade
trans: n.同志，亲密的同伴

sentences.english: He misses his comrades from his days in the army.
sentences.chinese: 他想念在部队时候的战友。

sentences.english: Comrades, please support this motion.
sentences.chinese: 同志们，请支持这项动议。

detailed_translations.english: a friend, especially someone who shares difficult work or danger

name: approach
trans: n.接近，途径，方法，vt.向...靠近，靠近，接近，动手处理

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

name: phase
trans: n.阶段，时期，局面，方面，相位，vt.逐步执行，实行，按计划进行

sentences.english: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

name: moan
trans: n.呻吟声，悲叹声，抱怨声，vi.呻吟，v.抱怨，呻吟

sentences.english: ‘I feel seasick already,’ she moaned.
sentences.chinese: “我已经开始晕船了。”她抱怨道。

sentences.english: He moaned and groaned all the way there.
sentences.chinese: 他去的一路上抱怨个没完。

sentences.english: Tony moaned in his sleep and then turned over on his side.
sentences.chinese: 托尼在睡梦中呻吟了一下，然后转身侧躺。

detailed_translations.english: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 呻吟声， 呜咽声 A
detailed_translations.english: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure
If you moan, you make a low sound, usually because you are unhappy or in pain

name: American
trans: adj.美洲的，美国的，美式的，n.美国人，美式英语

sentences.english: Her mother is American.
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈是美国人。

sentences.english: a famous American writer
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的美国作家

detailed_translations.english: relating to the US or its people
someone from the US

name: approximate
trans: adj.近似的，大约的，vt.近似，接近，约等于

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: attend
trans: vt.出席，照顾，护理，照料，参加，注意，vi.专心，留意，待命

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

name: radiate
trans: vi.发射光线，辐射，散发，辐射

sentences.english: He radiated calm confidence.
sentences.chinese: 他身上散发着沉稳自信的气质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播
detailed_translations.english: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel

name: predict
trans: v.预言，预告，预测，预报

sentences.english: Sales were five percent lower than predicted.
sentences.chinese: 销售额比预期低5%。

sentences.english: As Liz had predicted , the rumours were soon forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 正如利兹所预料的，流言很快就被淡忘了。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something will happen, before it happens

name: harbour
trans: n.海港，港口，vt.庇护，停泊

sentences.english: I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.english: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.english: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀着（不好的想法、恐惧或希望）；包含，藏有；窝藏
detailed_translations.english: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

name: box
trans: n.箱，盒，包箱，专席，亭子，窘境，vt.，装...入盒中，限制住，调和改变形状，用拳击…，vi.参与拳击，拳击，打拳

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

name: type
trans: n.型，类型，种类，典型，铅字，vi.打字

sentences.english: I’ve already seen a few movies of this type.
sentences.chinese: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

detailed_translations.english: one member of a group of people or things that have similar features or qualities
to write something using a computer or a typewriter

name: bucket
trans: n.水桶，吊桶，铲斗，vt.装在桶里，vi.急急忙忙

sentences.english: He let down a bucket into the well to draw water.
sentences.chinese: 他把吊桶放进井里打水。

detailed_translations.english: an open container with a handle, used for carrying and holding things, especially liquids

name: evening
trans: n.傍晚，黄昏，晚上

sentences.english: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.english: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.english: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.english: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.english: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.english: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.chinese: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.english: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻广播

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

name: adjective
trans: n.形容词，adj.，形容词的，不独立的

sentences.english: In “the black cat” the adjective “black”modifies the noun “cat”.
sentences.chinese: 在“那只黑猫”中，形容词“黑的”修饰名词“猫”。

sentences.english: The "me" circuit hummed not only when they thought whether a particular adjective described themselves, but also when they considered whether it described their mother.
sentences.chinese: “我”神经回路不仅当他们想到一个特定形容词是否描述自我时接通，而且当他们思考该词是否形容自己母亲时也同样。

sentences.english: Using phrases like “Darwinian selection” or “Darwinian evolution” implies there must be another kind of evolution at work, a process that can be described with another adjective.
sentences.chinese: 使用“达尔文选择”或“达尔文进化论”这样的短语意味着工作中必须有另一种进化形式，一种可以用另一个形容词来描述的过程。

detailed_translations.english: a word that describes a noun or  pronoun  . In the phrase ‘black hat’, ‘black’ is an adjective and in the sentence ‘It makes her happy’, ‘happy’ is an adjective.

name: sweat
trans: n.，汗，汗水，(凝结在物体表面的)水珠，焦急，繁重工作，vi.，出汗，渗出，焦躁，辛苦工作，vt.，(使)出汗，使渗出，榨取，逼问，使焦虑

sentences.english: Ian came off the squash court dripping with sweat .
sentences.chinese: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

sentences.english: Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

detailed_translations.english: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise
to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise

name: exactly
trans: adv.确切地，恰恰正是

sentences.english: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.chinese: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.english: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.chinese: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

sentences.english: That’s exactly what we’ve been trying to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 那正是我们一直想告诉你的。

detailed_translations.english: used when emphasizing that something is no more and no less than a number or amount, or is completely correct in every detail

name: daily
trans: adj.每日的，按天计算的，日常的，adv.每日，天天，n.日报，(复)工作样片

sentences.english: daily flights to Miami
sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day
a newspaper that is printed and sold every day, or every day except Sunday

name: trim
trans: adj.整齐的，匀称的，vt.使整齐，使整洁，修除，削剪，装备，痛打击败，n.整齐，装饰，修剪下来的部分

sentences.english: Pete was trimming the lawn around the roses.
sentences.chinese: 皮特在修剪玫瑰丛周围的草坪。

sentences.english: I have my hair trimmed every six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我每六周剪一次头发。

detailed_translations.english: to make something look neater by cutting small pieces off it
when something is cut to make it look neater
neat and well cared for

name: nevertheless
trans: conj.然而，不过，adv.仍然，不过

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.english: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.chinese: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

detailed_translations.english: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

name: storage
trans: n.贮藏，贮藏量，存储，保管，保管费，仓库，[计]存储器

sentences.english: the storage of highly radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 高放射性材料的存放

sentences.english: storage costs
sentences.chinese: 保管费用

detailed_translations.english: the process of keeping or putting something in a special place while it is not being used

name: typist
trans: n.打字员

sentences.english: I’m a slow typist.
sentences.chinese: 我打字很慢。

detailed_translations.english: a secretary whose main job is to  type  letters

name: central
trans: adj.中心的，主要的，基本的，折中的，中枢的，n.电话交流，中央办公室，中心

sentences.english: He lives in central London.
sentences.chinese: 他住在伦敦市中心。

sentences.english: The roof is supported by a central column.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶由一根中心柱支撑着。

sentences.english: Owen played a central role in the negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 欧文在谈判中担任了重要角色。

detailed_translations.english: in the middle of an area or an object

name: entrance
trans: n.入口，门口，进入，登场，vt.使神志恍惚

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

name: sensible
trans: adj.感觉得到的，明智的，可察觉的，意识到的，实用的，n.可感知物

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

name: career
trans: n.生涯，职业，事业，经历，vi.猛冲，飞跑，vt.在...中急行

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

name: automobile
trans: n.汽车，机动车，adj.汽车的

sentences.english: the automobile industry
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业

detailed_translations.english: a car

name: P.M.
trans: n.下午，午后，abbr.下午(=post，meridiem，[mə'ridi:əm])

sentences.english: The spa is open from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. every day of the year.
sentences.chinese: 温泉区全年从早上7:00到晚上9:00开放。

detailed_translations.english: p.m. is used after a number to show that you are referring to a particular time between 12 noon and 12 midnight

name: professor
trans: n.教授，宣称者

sentences.english: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.chinese: 教授在课堂上即兴创作了一首诗。

sentences.english: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.chinese: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.english: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.chinese: 我们都在笑那个心不在焉的教授。

name: dumb
trans: adj.哑的，无言的，沉默的，愚蠢的vt.使人沉默

sentences.english: What a dumb question.
sentences.chinese: 多么愚蠢的问题。

sentences.english: a bunch of dumb kids
sentences.chinese: 一帮笨孩子

sentences.english: ‘What is it?’ I asked, playing dumb (= pretending to be stupid ) .
sentences.chinese: “那是什么？” 我装傻问道。

sentences.english: She’s no dumb blonde (= a pretty woman with blonde hair who seems stupid ) .
sentences.chinese: 她可不是那种没有头脑的金发女郎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 哑的；暂不说话的；愚笨的
detailed_translations.english: stupid

name: delay
trans: vt.推迟，耽搁，延误，vi.耽搁，n.耽搁，迟滞

sentences.english: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.chinese: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until a later time to do something

name: gloomy
trans: adj.黑暗的，阴暗的，令人沮丧的，抑沉的，忧闷的

sentences.english: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

roasted

the form of an adjective or adverb that shows an increase in size, degree etc when something is considered in relation to something else. For example, ‘bigger’ is the comparative of ‘big’, and ‘more slowly’ is the comparative of ‘slowly’

to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest

sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查发生在南威尔士的连环银行抢劫案。

sentences.english: He received a 10 year prison sentence for armed robbery (= robbery using a gun ) .
sentences.chinese: 他因持枪抢劫被判十年监禁。

information or facts

name: ought
trans: v.aux.应当，应该，conj.应该，大概

sentences.english: I realize I ought to have told you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到我本该告诉你这件事的。

detailed_translations.english: You use ought to have with a past participle to indicate that although it was best or correct for someone to do something in the past, they did not actually do it.

name: objection
trans: n.反对，异议，不喜欢

sentences.english: Her objection was that he was too young.
sentences.chinese: 她反对的理由是他太小。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 异议； 反对的理由
detailed_translations.english: a reason that you have for opposing or disapproving of something, or something you say that expresses this

name: doctor
trans: n.医生，医师，博士，vt.医治，篡改，对...做手脚，vi.用药

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: slide
trans: vi.滑，跌落，vt.使滑动，n.滑，幻灯片，雪崩，山崩，滑坡，滑梯

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

name: loan
trans: n.贷款，暂借，借出，债权人，vt.借出，借给，供应货款

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

name: applicable
trans: adj.能应用的，适当的，合适的

sentences.english: What is a reasonable standard for one family is not applicable for another.
sentences.chinese: 对一个家庭合理的标准对于另一个家庭并不适用。

detailed_translations.english: if something is applicable to a particular person, group, or situation, it affects them or is related to them

name: hate
trans: vt.恨，憎恨，不喜欢，不愿，vi.表示憎恨，n.憎恨，厌恶，厌恶的人或事

sentences.english: It’s the kind of movie you either love or hate.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种你要么喜欢要么讨厌的电影。

sentences.english: He hates his job.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike something very much

name: hostess
trans: n.女主人，空姐

sentences.english: The hostess introduced them.
sentences.chinese: 女主人介绍了他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东
detailed_translations.english: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

name: leap
trans: vi.跳，跃，跳跃，猛冲，vt.跃过，n.跳跃，剧增，急变

sentences.english: She leapt over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.english: He threw a stick into the river and the dog went after it in a flying leap.
sentences.chinese: 他把一根枝条扔到河里，那条狗一个飞跃就追了过去。

detailed_translations.english: to jump high into the air or to jump in order to land in a different place
a big jump

name: distance
trans: n.，距离，间距，远处，(人际关系的)，疏远，vt.，使疏远，把，(对手)，甩在后面，与...保持距离，adj.，(，通过电子手段，)，远程，(教育，)

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

name: pronounce
trans: vt.发...的音，宣布，断言，发表意见

sentences.english: The scheme was pronounced a failure.
sentences.chinese: 该方案宣告失败。

detailed_translations.english: to give a judgment or opinion
to officially state that something is true

name: oriental
trans: adj.东方(人)的，东方国家的，贵重的

sentences.english: a beautiful oriental rug
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的东方地毯

sentences.english: oriental art
sentences.chinese: 东方艺术

detailed_translations.english: relating to or from the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan
a word for someone from the eastern part of the world, especially China or Japan, now considered offensive

name: beat
trans: n.打，敲打声，拍子，独家报道，一会儿，vt.，&vi.打，敲，打败

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.english: Brazil were beaten 2–1.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.english: Labour easily beat the Conservatives in the last election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

name: affair
trans: n.，事情，事件，事务，绯闻

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

name: sponge
trans: n.海绵，海绵状的东西，vt.用海绵擦拭，吸收掉，抹掉

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface using a sponge
a piece of a soft natural or artificial substance full of small holes, which can suck up liquid and is used for washing

name: chief
trans: adj.主要的，首席的，n.首领

sentences.english: One of the chief causes of crime today is drugs.
sentences.chinese: 毒品是如今犯罪的主要诱因之一。

sentences.english: Safety is our chief concern .
sentences.chinese: 安全问题是我们的头等大事。

sentences.english: The chief reason for this is that people are living longer.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为人们更长寿了。

sentences.english: his chief rival for the job
sentences.chinese: 和他竞争这份工作的主要对手

sentences.english: the prosecution’s chief witness
sentences.chinese: 控方的主要证人

sentences.english: She had many reasons for taking the money, but chief among them was revenge.
sentences.chinese: 她拿这笔钱的原因有很多，但最主要的是为了报复。

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 首领， 长官； 酋长， 族长
detailed_translations.english: the ruler of a tribe

name: snake
trans: n.蛇，v.蜿蜒，扭曲

sentences.english: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

name: classroom
trans: n.教室，课堂

sentences.english: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩突然从教室里奔出去。

sentences.english: The students swarmed out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。

sentences.english: She fainted in the classroom and was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 她在教室中昏过去了，并被抬了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a room that you have lessons in at a school or college

name: signature
trans: n.署名，签字，签名，签署，书帖，有特征的符号

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

name: absolutely
trans: adv.，独立地，完全地，绝对地

sentences.english: ‘Do you let your kids travel alone at night?’ ‘Absolutely not!’
sentences.chinese: “你会让孩子们晚上单独外出吗？”“当然不行！”

detailed_translations.english: used when you strongly disagree with someone or when you do not want someone to do something

name: boundary
trans: n.分界线，边界

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

name: crawl
trans: vi.爬，爬行，n.爬行，匍匐而行

sentences.english: We crawled into bed at 2 am.
sentences.chinese: 我们凌晨两点爬上了床。

detailed_translations.english: to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
a way of swimming in which you lie on your stomach and move one arm, and then the other, over your head

name: sharpen
trans: vt.削尖，使敏锐，使...尖锐，变为锐利，加剧(苦痛等)

sentences.english: Her gaze sharpened, as if she had seen something unusual.
sentences.chinese: 她眼睛一亮，好像看到了不寻常的东西。

sentences.english: He will need to sharpen his diplomatic skills in order to work with Congress.
sentences.chinese: 他将需要增强外交技巧以与国会打交道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 削尖， 磨快； 使敏锐， 使敏捷
detailed_translations.english: If your senses, understanding, or skills sharpen or are sharpened, you become better at noticing things, thinking, or doing something

name: acid
trans: n.，酸，酸味物质，adj，.酸的，酸性的

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

name: complicated
trans: adj.复杂的，难懂的

sentences.english: a complicated pattern
sentences.chinese: 复杂的图案

sentences.english: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.chinese: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of many closely connected parts

name: missing
trans: a.缺掉的，失去的，失踪的

sentences.english: We found the missing piece of the jigsaw under the chair.
sentences.chinese: 我们在椅子下面找到了那块丢失的拼图。

sentences.english: The keys have been missing for ages.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙早已丢失了。

detailed_translations.english: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it

name: maths
trans: n.(英)数学，=mathematics(英)

sentences.english: the new maths teacher
sentences.chinese: 新来的数学老师

sentences.english: maths lessons
sentences.chinese: 数学课

sentences.english: She got top marks in maths and chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 她数学和化学得了最高分。

detailed_translations.english: mathematics

name: area
trans: n.面积，地区，区域，领域，方面

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

name: tuition
trans: n.教，教诲，教学，学费

sentences.english: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.chinese: 我不得不上数学补习课。

detailed_translations.english: teaching, especially in small groups

name: beard
trans: n.胡须，络腮胡子，vt.抓住胡须，公开反对

sentences.english: He's decided to grow a beard.
sentences.chinese: 他已经决定蓄胡须。

detailed_translations.english: hair that grows around a man’s chin and cheeks

name: fortunately
trans: adv.幸运地，幸亏

sentences.english: Fortunately, everything worked out all right in the end.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，最后一切顺利。

detailed_translations.english: happening because of good luck

name: o'clock
trans: ad.，=of，the，clock，...点钟

sentences.english: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.english: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间是10点钟。

detailed_translations.english: one of the times when the clock shows the exact hour as a number from 1 to 12

name: none
trans: pron.没有人，没有任何东西，adv.毫不，一点也不

sentences.english: I wish I could offer you some cake but there’s none left.
sentences.chinese: 我真想能请你吃些蛋糕，但一点也没剩的了。

sentences.english: Although these were good students, none had a score above 60.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这些都是好学生，但是没有一个考到60分以上。

sentences.english: She waited for a reply, but none came.
sentences.chinese: 她等着答复，可是什么也没等到。

sentences.english: Even an old car is better than none.
sentences.chinese: 有一辆旧车也比没有车强。

sentences.english: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.chinese: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

detailed_translations.english: not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things
not at all

name: reader
trans: n.读者，读物，读本

sentences.english: The book will appeal to young readers.
sentences.chinese: 这本书会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.english: I’ve always been an avid reader (= someone who reads a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 我向来是一个嗜书如命的人。

sentences.english: a series of graded English readers
sentences.chinese: 一系列分级英语读物

detailed_translations.english: someone who reads books, or who reads in a particular way

name: bar
trans: n.酒吧间，条，杆，栅，条，棒，横木，vt.禁止，阻挠

sentences.english: The public bar was crowded.
sentences.chinese: 大众酒吧间里人很多。

sentences.english: a candy bar
sentences.chinese: 一根糖果棒

sentences.english: houses with bars across the windows
sentences.chinese: 窗户上钉有铁条的房屋

detailed_translations.english: one of the rooms inside a pub

name: farmer
trans: n.农民，农夫，农场主

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

name: entertain
trans: vt.，&，vi.使欢乐，招待，怀抱

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure

name: nor
trans: conj.，&，adv.也不，也没有，不，[计算机]，'或非'，'非或'，abbr.诺曼人(=Norman)，abbr.北方(=North)，abbr.挪威(=，Norway)，abbr.挪威人(=Norwegian)

sentences.english: He can neither read nor write (= he cannot read or write ).
sentences.chinese: 他既不会读也不会写。

sentences.english: Hilary was neither shocked nor surprised by the news.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里对这个消息既没有感到震惊，也没有觉得意外。

sentences.english: Neither Matt nor Julie said anything.
sentences.chinese: 马特和朱莉都没有说什么。

sentences.english: ‘I don’t want to go.’ ‘Nor do I.’
sentences.chinese: “我不想去。”“我也不想去。”

detailed_translations.english: used when mentioning two things that are not true or do not happen

name: world
trans: n.世界，世人，世间，地球，领域，adj.世界的

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

name: capable
trans: adj.有能力的，有才能的，足以胜任的，有...倾向的

sentences.english: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.english: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.english: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

detailed_translations.english: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

name: mercy
trans: n.仁慈，慈悲，恩惠，怜悯，宽恕，幸运，adj.仁慈的，宽恕的

sentences.english: He showed no mercy to his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他对敌人毫不仁慈。

sentences.english: God have mercy on his soul.
sentences.chinese: 愿上帝宽恕他的灵魂。

detailed_translations.english: if someone shows mercy, they choose to forgive or to be kind to someone who they have the power to hurt or punish

name: refreshment
trans: n.恢复，精神爽快，提神之事物，(复数)茶点，点心，便餐

sentences.english: Refreshments will be served after the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 会后有茶点招待。

detailed_translations.chinese: 点心；起提神作用的东西；精力恢复
detailed_translations.english: small amounts of food and drink that are provided at a meeting, sports event etc

name: staircase
trans: n.楼梯，楼梯间

sentences.english: They walked down the staircase together.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起沿楼梯通道往下走。

detailed_translations.english: a set of stairs inside a building with its supports and the side parts that you hold on to

name: capital
trans: n.资本，资金，首都，大写字母，adj.大写的，资本的，首要的

sentences.english: capital investments
sentences.chinese: 资本投资

detailed_translations.english: relating to money that you use to start a business or to make more money

name: sadly
trans: adv.悲痛地，悲哀地，悲惨地，悲伤地

name: stumble
trans: vi.绊倒，犯错，失策，踌躇，无意中发现，vt.绊倒，困惑，n.绊倒失策

sentences.english: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

name: finally
trans: adv.最后，最终，不可更改的

sentences.english: After several delays we finally took off at six o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 几经耽搁后，我们终于在六点起飞了。

sentences.english: Finally, Karpov cracked under the pressure.
sentences.chinese: 最后，卡尔波夫承受不住压力崩溃了。

detailed_translations.english: after a long time

name: suffer
trans: vt.遭受，忍受，容许，允vi.受苦，患病，受损失

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

name: instant
trans: n.瞬间，立即，adj.立即的，即时的

sentences.english: an instant success
sentences.chinese: 马到成功

sentences.english: a system that provides instant access to client information
sentences.chinese: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.english: The women took an instant dislike to one another.
sentences.chinese: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.english: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.chinese: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.english: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.chinese: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的
detailed_translations.english: happening or produced immediately
An instant is an extremely short period of time

name: miner
trans: n.矿工

sentences.english: Therefore, we should be more like a miner to stand in reality, excavate off wastes, and get gold mines.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们更应该像一个矿工一样为执著于现实，挖开渣滓，淘出金矿。

sentences.english: From the standpoint of know-how the only difference between the miner of graphite in Ceylon and the logger in Oregon is in the type of know-how.
sentences.chinese: 从知道者的立场来看所谓的知道之间的不同不过是锡兰的矿工之于石墨和俄勒冈的伐木工人之间在某一类别的知道而已。

sentences.english: A miner bought food from a makeshift shop set up in the trunk of a car near a roadblock by striking miners.
sentences.chinese: 一位矿工从搭建在车厢中的临时食品店中购买食物，附近的道路都被罢工的矿工们设置了路障。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works under the ground in a mine to remove coal, gold etc

name: quote
trans: vt.引用，引证，报价，举证，n.引用

sentences.english: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.english: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.chinese: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

sentences.english: They quoted a price of £15,000.
sentences.chinese: 他们报价1.5万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written

name: meadow
trans: n.草地，牧场，牧草地

sentences.english: The meadow has been ploughed up.
sentences.chinese: 那片草地已用犁翻过。

sentences.english: The colt bounded through the meadow.
sentences.chinese: 那匹马驹跳着跑过牧场。

sentences.english: There are many lambs capering in the meadow.
sentences.chinese: 很多小羊在草地上蹦蹦跳跳。

detailed_translations.english: a field with wild grass and flowers

name: understand
trans: vt.获悉，理解，听说，将...理解为，认为，vi.懂得，理解，获悉

sentences.english: She doesn’t understand English.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to know the meaning of what someone is telling you, or the language that they speak

name: disclose
trans: vt.揭开，揭发，透露

sentences.english: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.english: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

detailed_translations.english: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret

name: acceptance
trans: n.，接受（礼物、邀请、建议等），同意，认可，验收，承认

sentences.english: He wrote a letter of acceptance (=  a letter in which you agree to accept a job, university place etc  ) to the university.
sentences.chinese: 他给那所大学写了一封接受函。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接受， 承认； 容忍
detailed_translations.english: when you officially agree to take something that you have been offered

name: substance
trans: n.物质，实质，本旨，内容，重要性，财产

sentences.english: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.english: The substance of his argument was that people on welfare should work.
sentences.chinese: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas

name: whitewash
trans: vt.粉刷，涂白，用白色涂料粉刷，掩盖或粉饰，n.白色涂料，粉饰

sentences.english: Investigators are accused of whitewashing the governor’s record.
sentences.chinese: 调查者被指责粉饰州长的政绩。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid mixture used especially for painting walls
to hide the true facts about a serious accident or illegal action

name: ridiculous
trans: adj荒谬的，可笑的

sentences.english: That’s a ridiculous idea!
sentences.chinese: 那主意很荒唐！

sentences.english: Don’t be ridiculous!
sentences.chinese: 别傻了！

sentences.english: I’d look ridiculous in a dress like that.
sentences.chinese: 我穿那样的裙子会显得很可笑。

detailed_translations.english: very silly or unreasonable

name: desk
trans: n.书桌，办公桌

sentences.english: Marie was sitting at her desk.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽正坐在书桌前。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture like a table, usually with drawers in it, that you sit at to write and work

name: opportunity
trans: n.机会，时机，良机

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: draw
trans: vt.(drew，drawn)，拉，拖，挨近，提取，画，绘制，划，拨出，n.平局抽签，拉，拽，吸引人的事物

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

name: lead
trans: vt.为...带路，领导，引导，带领，以铅接合，过...(的生活)，n.铅铅制品，领引，榜样

sentences.english: drinking water supplied by old-fashioned lead pipes
sentences.chinese: 由老式铅管输送的饮用水

detailed_translations.english: a chemical element. Lead is a heavy soft grey metal, used especially in the past for water pipes or to cover roofs.

name: track
trans: n.行踪，踪迹，路径，轨道，小路，跑道，惯例

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

name: B.C.
trans: (缩)公元前

name: sake
trans: n.缘故，理由，利益，好处

sentences.english: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.chinese: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.english: I only went for Kay’s sake.
sentences.chinese: 我是为了凯才去的。

sentences.english: I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

detailed_translations.english: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something

name: building
trans: n.建筑物，大楼，建筑

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

name: metre
trans: n.米，公尺，计量器，(诗的)韵律，格律，=meter(美)

sentences.english: She's running the 1,500 metres here.
sentences.chinese: 她正在这儿跑1500米。

sentences.english: A man came to read the electricity metre .
sentences.chinese: 有个男的来抄电表。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring length in the  metric system

name: overhead
trans: adj.在头顶上的，架空的，高架的，n.经常开支，普通用费，adv.在头顶上，在空中，在高处，[计算机]，总开销

sentences.english: Bullets whizzed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 子弹嗖嗖地掠过头顶。

sentences.english: A plane flew overhead.
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机从头顶飞过。

sentences.english: She turned on the overhead light and looked around the little room.
sentences.chinese: 她打开顶灯，环视这间小屋。

detailed_translations.english: above your head or in the sky
You use overhead to indicate that something is above you or above the place that you are talking about

detailed_translations.chinese: 经常费用， 管理费用
detailed_translations.english: money spent regularly on rent, insurance, electricity, and other things that are needed to keep a business operating

name: kneel
trans: vi.跪，跪下，跪着

sentences.english: Tom knelt down and patted the dog.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆跪下来轻轻拍了拍那只狗。

detailed_translations.english: to be in or move into a position where your body is resting on your knees

name: jump
trans: vi.，&，vt.跳，跳过，跳越，惊跳，暴涨，突升，n.跳跃，跳动，上涨

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

name: spread
trans: vt.伸开，伸展，展开，传播，散布，铺开，涂撒，n.传播，伸展，铺开幅度，范围，盛宴，差额

sentences.english: The cancer had spread to her liver.
sentences.chinese: 癌已经扩散到她的肝脏。

sentences.english: The news spread like wildfire.
sentences.chinese: 消息如野火般迅速传开。

detailed_translations.english: if something spreads or is spread, it becomes larger or moves so that it affects more people or a larger area

name: right
trans: adj.，正确的，正直的，合适的，垂直的，右面的，正常的，正面的，adv.，对，正好，恰当，径直地，正确地，立即，非常，向右边，n.，权利右，正义，实况，vt.，纠正，扶直，公正对待，伸冤，vi.，复正

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

name: insufficient
trans: adj.不足的，不适当的

sentences.english: Insufficient resources have been devoted to the health service.
sentences.chinese: 用于医疗保健服务的资源不足。

detailed_translations.english: not enough, or not great enough

name: gross
trans: adj.总的，粗鲁的，严重的，过胖的，n.总量，vt.总共赚得

sentences.english: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.chinese: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone's speech or behaviour is gross, you think it is very coarse, vulgar, or unacceptable

name: desire
trans: vt.要求，向往，请求，渴望，n.愿望，欲望，情欲

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

name: piano
trans: n.钢琴，adj.，&，adv.轻柔

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

name: medium
trans: n.媒质，方法，媒介，中间，adj.中等的，适中的

sentences.english: Advertising is a powerful medium.
sentences.chinese: 广告是具有强大影响力的传播媒介。

sentences.english: hair of medium length
sentences.chinese: 中等长短的头发

detailed_translations.english: a way of communicating information and news to people, such as newspapers, television etc
of middle size, level, or amount

name: make
trans: vt.使，做，制造，vi.表现，前往，生产，n.牌子，型号，性格，生产

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

name: minimum
trans: n.最小量，最低限度adj.最低的，最小的

sentences.english: This will take a minimum of one hour.
sentences.chinese: 这最少要用一个小时。

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary
the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed

name: lucky
trans: adj.幸运的，带来好运的，吉祥的

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess.
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

sentences.english: a lucky charm
sentences.chinese: 吉祥符

detailed_translations.english: having good luck

name: shopkeeper
trans: n.店主，零售商人

sentences.english: The girl had only worked for the shopkeeper for three days when she packed him in.
sentences.chinese: 这姑娘替那店主只干了三天， 就辞职不干了。

sentences.english: In Jermyn Street in London, a shopkeeper anxiously asked who the next president would be.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的杰明街，一个店主焦急地问道，谁将是（美国）下一任总统。

sentences.english: I was an unknown foreigner, and could have easily evaded payment with impunity, yet no London shopkeeper ever mistrusted me.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个没人知道的异乡人，本可以大胆地轻易逃避付款，但是从来没有一个伦敦的店主不信任我。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or is in charge of a small shop

name: rice
trans: n.稻，米，饭

sentences.english: a tasty sauce served with rice or pasta
sentences.chinese: 配米饭或意面的美味酱汁

sentences.english: a plate of brown rice
sentences.chinese: 一盘糙米饭

sentences.english: Serve with plain boiled rice .
sentences.chinese: 配白米饭一起上桌。

sentences.english: a few grains of rice
sentences.chinese: 几粒大米

detailed_translations.english: a food that consists of small white or brown grains that you boil in water until they become soft enough to eat

name: origin
trans: n.起源，由来，出身

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

name: stir
trans: vt.动，拨动，激动，惹起，搅和，vi.挪动，活动，离开，搅拌，激动，n.感动(激动，愤怒或震动),，搅拌，骚乱

sentences.english: Give that pan a stir , will you?
sentences.chinese: 把那锅东西搅一搅，好吗？

detailed_translations.english: an act of stirring something
to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

name: nowadays
trans: adv.现今，现在

sentences.english: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.english: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

name: aircraft
trans: n.，飞机，飞行器

sentences.english: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的返回航程被推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: a plane or other vehicle that can fly

name: outdoors
trans: adv.在户外，在野外，n.露天，野外，名词outdoor的复数形式

sentences.english: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.english: He likes to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在户外工作。

detailed_translations.english: outside, not in a building
the countryside far away from buildings and cities

name: helmet
trans: n.头盔，钢盔，遮阳帽，甲

sentences.english: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.chinese: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.english: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.chinese: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.english: Without Christ we are defenseless against the Devil, but with "the helmet of salvation" our minds are protected by God.
sentences.chinese: 没有基督，我们无力防御魔鬼的攻击；但有救恩的头盔，我们的心思便有神的保护。

detailed_translations.english: a strong hard hat that soldiers,  motorcycle  riders, the police etc wear to protect their heads

name: dial
trans: n.钟面，拨号盘，刻度盘，针面，转盘，vt.拨，用仪表测量，操作仪表，vi.拨号，用仪表测量，[计算机]，拨号

sentences.english: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.english: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 我想我拨错号码了。

detailed_translations.english: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call

name: enthusiasm
trans: n.热情，热心，热忱，热衷的事物

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
