sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

name: in
trans: prep.在...里，在，穿着，(表示状态或状况)，参与，在...方面，adv.进，入

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

name: fundamental
trans: adj.基础的，基本的，根本的，重要的，n.基本原理，基础

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

name: scatter
trans: vt.使消散，撒，散播，驱散，vi.分散，消散，n.散布，零星少量

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

name: several
trans: adj.几个，数个，各自的，pron.若干

sentences.english: I have several suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.english: I have several methods.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.english: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

name: flag
trans: n.旗，旗帜，旗标，信号旗，旗舰旗，vt.打旗号，vi.无力地下垂，减退

sentences.english: Children waving flags greeted the Russian leader.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们挥舞着旗帜，欢迎俄罗斯领导人。

sentences.english: the flag of Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚国旗

sentences.english: the Spanish flag
sentences.chinese: 西班牙国旗

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth with a coloured pattern or picture on it that represents a country or organization

name: earth
trans: n.地球，陆地，地面，泥土，世间，大地，地球人，vt.赶入洞中，提取土壤，vi.躲入洞穴

sentences.english: the planet Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球

sentences.english: The earth shook.
sentences.chinese: 大地晃动了。

detailed_translations.english: the planet that we live on

name: evidence
trans: n.根据，证据，证人，vt.，&，vi.证实，证明

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

name: whilst
trans: conj.，&，n.当...的时候，可是，虽然，只要

sentences.english: As you lower your pen whilst continuing the motion, you should notice the resulting shape is more regular than it otherwise would have been.
sentences.chinese: 随着你降低你的笔，同时保持圆周运动，你应该会注意到画出的形状比起不这样做画出的形状要规范的多。

sentences.english: Indeed, it is important to keep fit and healthy, whilst we all aspire to improve the way we look and feel in order to make good first and lasting impressions.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，为了得到一个良好的初次印象和持续印象，在保持体形和健康的同时，我们也渴望提高自己看待和感受他人的方式。

sentences.english: Modules participate in a dynamic life cycle which includes the ability to add, update and remove modules at runtime, whilst preserving the state in the system.
sentences.chinese: 模块参与到动态的生命周期里，这个动态的生命周期能够在运行时添加、更新、删除模块，同时保留系统中的状态。

name: drain
trans: vt.排去，放水，耗尽，排出，排干，喝光，vi.变干，排出，排水，n.下水道，排水沟，消耗，耗竭

sentences.english: He flushed the drain.
sentences.chinese: 他用水冲排水沟。

sentences.english: The boat drifted helplessly along the drain until some people saw him.
sentences.chinese: 船儿无助地顺着排水沟漂流直到有人看见他。

detailed_translations.english: something that continuously uses a lot of time, money etc

name: mayor
trans: n.市长

sentences.english: the election of the London mayor
sentences.chinese: 选举伦敦市长

detailed_translations.english: the person who has been elected to lead the government of a town or city

name: anxiety
trans: n.焦虑，忧虑，渴望，担心

sentences.english: his feelings of anxiety
sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.english: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.english: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.chinese: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being very worried about something

name: barn
trans: n.谷仓，牲口棚

sentences.english: The barn was heaped with grain.
sentences.chinese: 谷仓里堆满了粮食。

sentences.english: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.english: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.chinese: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

detailed_translations.english: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in

name: lessen
trans: vt.减少，减轻，缩小，变小

sentences.english: Gradually her anxiety lessened.
sentences.chinese: 她的焦虑慢慢减轻了。

detailed_translations.english: to become smaller in size, importance, or value, or make something do this

name: tutor
trans: n.家庭教师，导师，v.当家庭教师，当导师，指导

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

name: airport
trans: n.，机场，航空站

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

name: marriage
trans: n.结婚，婚姻，婚礼

sentences.english: She has three daughters from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她前一次婚姻生了三个女儿。

sentences.english: The marriage took place at St Bartholomew’s Church.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是在圣巴托罗缪教堂举行的。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship between two people who are married, or the state of being married

name: quicken
trans: vt.，使加快，使...有生气，鼓舞，使(曲线)更弯，使(斜坡)更陡vi.，加快，变快，苏醒，(孕妇)，进入胎动期，变明亮，变活跃

sentences.english: Ray glanced at his watch and quickened his pace (= began to walk faster ).
sentences.chinese: 雷瞥了一眼手表，加快了步伐。

sentences.english: Companies are finding it hard to cope with the quickening pace of technological change.
sentences.chinese: 各家公司都发现科技的日新月异让他们难以应付。

detailed_translations.english: to become quicker or make something quicker

name: everyone
trans: pron.每人，人人，n.每个人

sentences.english: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.chinese: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.english: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.chinese: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.english: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.chinese: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！

sentences.english: Not everyone enjoys sport.
sentences.chinese: 并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。

detailed_translations.english: every person

name: cushion
trans: n.垫子，坐垫，橡皮软垫，缓冲，vt.加垫褥，放在垫子上，保护，减缓，为...装垫子

sentences.english: a velvet cushion
sentences.chinese: 天鹅绒垫子

sentences.english: a cushion cover
sentences.chinese: 垫子套

detailed_translations.chinese: 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄
detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击
detailed_translations.english: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way

name: delicious
trans: adj.美味的，可口的，怡人的

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
sentences.chinese: 新修剪的草坪的芳香

detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

name: price
trans: n.价格，价钱，代价，vt.定格，标价，比较价格

sentences.english: The price of fuel keeps going up.
sentences.chinese: 燃料价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: They may pay a high price for their few years of glory.
sentences.chinese: 为了短短几年的辉煌，他们也许要付出高昂的代价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money you have to pay for something

name: especially
trans: adv.特别，尤其，格外

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

name: late
trans: adj.迟的，晚的，已故的，adv.迟，很迟，晚，最近地

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

name: skillful
trans: adj.灵巧的，娴熟的

sentences.english: With a skillful movement he rounded the small fishing-boat.
sentences.chinese: 他以灵巧的动作使小渔船调过头来。

sentences.english: I like making things by hand because my mother is very skillful, and I liked staying with her when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢亲手作一些东西，这是因为我母亲的手非常巧，而且我小的时候喜欢同她在一起。

sentences.english: They understand that development is a difficult social activity that can be conquered not by a silver bullet, but rather by dedicated, skillful practitioners who know and leverage proven techniques.
sentences.chinese: 开发是一项有难度的社会活动，不仅不能够通过银弹来征服，而是由理解并实施可靠技术的那些专注且熟练的人们来解决。

name: bat
trans: n.球拍，短棍，棒，击打，蝙蝠，v.用棒击打，[计算机]，DOS文件名：批文件

sentences.english: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

name: blackboard
trans: n.黑板

sentences.english: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.english: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.chinese: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.english: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.chinese: 老师敲了敲黑板以引起我们的注意。

detailed_translations.english: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk

name: accord
trans: vt.，使一致，调解，赠予，给予，n.，一致，调和，协议，自愿，vi.，(与)一致

sentences.english: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
detailed_translations.english: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

name: limitation
trans: n.限制，限度，局限

sentences.english: a nuclear limitation treaty
sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 限度； 局限
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of controlling or reducing something

name: pulse
trans: n.脉搏，脉冲，脉动，v.跳动，脉跳

sentences.english: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak .
sentences.chinese: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.english: She felt his neck. There was no pulse.
sentences.chinese: 她摸了摸他的颈部，没有脉搏。

sentences.english: Her pulse raced (= beat very quickly ) with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她激动得脉搏急速跳动。

detailed_translations.english: the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound

name: upper
trans: adj.上面的，地位较高的，上部的，较高的，n.鞋帮，上铺，n.兴奋剂，令人兴奋的经历

sentences.english: the upper lip
sentences.chinese: 上唇

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

name: bound
trans: n.跳跃，界限，范围，adj.一定的，必定的，有义务的，受约束的，装订的，vt.跳跃前进，形成界限

sentences.english: Don’t lie to her. She’s bound to find out.
sentences.chinese: 别骗她，她肯定会发现的。

sentences.english: When you are dealing with so many patients, mistakes are bound to happen.
sentences.chinese: 你要照顾这么多病人，失误在所难免。

detailed_translations.english: to be very likely to do or feel a particular thing

name: sink
trans: vi.下沉，下垂，降低，下落，陷于，倾斜，恶化，渗透，vt.下沉，陷于倾斜，减少，n.接收端，沟渠，污水槽，散热器

sentences.english: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.chinese: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.english: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.english: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下沉，沉没；降低，下落；陷入；衰退，恶化
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使下沉，使沉没；降低；掘，挖，凿
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽， 水池， 洗涤槽
detailed_translations.english: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

name: hold
trans: vt.拿住，掌握，拥有，持有，举行，n.把握，控制，支撑点，延误，n.船舱

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

name: confuse
trans: vt.使混乱，混淆，狼狈，困惑

sentences.english: People might well confuse the two products.
sentences.chinese: 人们很容易混淆这两种产品。

detailed_translations.english: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else

name: forbid
trans: vt.禁止，不许，阻止，妨碍

sentences.english: He was forbidden to leave the house, as a punishment.
sentences.chinese: 作为惩罚，他被禁止离开家。

sentences.english: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.chinese: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed

name: goods
trans: n.货物，商品

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc

name: infer
trans: vt.推论，推断，猜想，暗示，vi.推论

sentences.english: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

name: trouble
trans: n.烦恼，困难，烦恼，vi.烦恼，麻烦，苦恼，费神

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

name: mould
trans: n.模子(样板，形状，霉菌，土，类型)，模型，vt.浇铸，模压(铸造发霉，形成，轮廓相符合)，vi.发霉

sentences.english: Clothes mould in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.english: Such oil can contain carcinogens and toxic mould.
sentences.chinese: 这种油可能包含致癌物和有毒的霉。

detailed_translations.english: to become or cause to become covered with this growth
a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container

name: rotation
trans: n.旋转，转动，循环

sentences.english: The rotation of flagella pushes the bacteria through the water.
sentences.chinese: 鞭毛的旋转可以推动细菌在水中行进。

sentences.english: Sets this matrix to a translation, rotation and scaling matrix.
sentences.chinese: 设置这个矩阵为一个平移、旋转和缩放矩阵。

detailed_translations.english: when something turns with a circular movement around a central point

name: absolute
trans: adj.，绝对的，纯粹的，完全的，无限制的，独立的，专制的，n.，绝对的事物

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

name: cunning
trans: adj.狡猾的，狡诈的，有眼光的，精巧的，可爱的，n.狡诈，灵巧

sentences.english: a cunning opponent
sentences.chinese: 狡猾的对手

detailed_translations.english: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way

name: stroke
trans: n.打，击，鸣声，中风，笔画，连续的动作，心跳，抚，摩，捋，vt.奉承轻抚，摩，捋，vi.击打，心跳...

sentences.english: She died following a massive stroke.
sentences.chinese: 她重度中风后去世了。

sentences.english: a stroke patient
sentences.chinese: 中风患者

sentences.english: His punishment was six strokes of the cane.
sentences.chinese: 给他的惩罚是挨六教鞭。

sentences.english: At the first stroke it will be 9 o'clock exactly.
sentences.chinese: 等到钟敲第一下时就是9点整。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden serious illness when a blood vessel in the brain bursts or is blocked, which can cause death or the loss of the ability to move or to speak clearly

name: blame
trans: n.过失，责备，vt.责备，把...归咎于

sentences.english: Don’t blame me – it’s not my fault.
sentences.chinese: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.english: I blame his mother. She does everything for him.
sentences.chinese: 怪他母亲不好，她什么事都要为他做。

detailed_translations.english: to say or think that someone or something is responsible for something bad

name: heat
trans: n.热，炎热，热度，高潮，激动，激烈程度，辛辣，警察，vi.变热，变暖，因热变质，vt.使...变热

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

name: stocking
trans: n.长(统)袜

sentences.english: I want you stuffed in my stocking.
sentences.chinese: 我只要你塞在我的袜子里。

sentences.english: The Christmas stocking bulged with goodies.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节袜子里塞满了好吃的东西。

sentences.english: She ran her silk stocking on a nail last night.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天夜晚丝袜被钉子钩住，抽了丝。

detailed_translations.english: a thin close-fitting piece of clothing that covers a woman’s leg and foot

name: violin
trans: n.小提琴

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

name: derive
trans: vt.取得，得自，起源，引申于，vi.起源

sentences.english: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.chinese: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

detailed_translations.english: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
to develop or come from something else

name: preposition
trans: n.前置词，介词

sentences.english: There is nothing in the rules of grammar to suggest that ending a sentence with a preposition is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 在语法规则中没有哪一条表明以介词结束一个句子是错误的。

detailed_translations.english: a word that is used before a noun,  pronoun  , or  gerund  to show place, time, direction etc. In the phrase ‘the trees in the park’, ‘in’ is a preposition.

name: file
trans: n.档案，公文箱，锉刀，[计算机]，文件，vt.把...归档，列队行进申请

sentences.english: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.english: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

name: sock
trans: n.短袜，vt.，给...穿短袜，v.狠揍，痛打，n.重击，犁头，犁刃，轻软鞋，喜剧

sentences.english: a pair of socks
sentences.chinese: 一双短袜

sentences.english: white ankle socks
sentences.chinese: 白色的齐踝短袜

sentences.english: Once, after a boy made a comment, she socked him.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，一个男孩子发表了一点意见，她就挥拳猛击他。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing made of soft material that you wear on your foot inside your shoe
If you sock someone or something, you hit them hard

name: recall
trans: vt.回想，叫回，收回，召回，与...相似，恢复，n.回忆，召回，取消

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.english: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.chinese: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.english: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.chinese: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

name: composition
trans: n.构成，作品，写作，作文，著作，组织，合成物，成份

sentences.english: Some minerals have complex chemical compositions.
sentences.chinese: 有些矿物的化学构成很复杂。

sentences.english: a composition by jazzman Dave Brubeck, called ‘Chromatic Fantasy’
sentences.chinese: 爵士音乐家戴夫•布鲁贝克的作品《半音阶幻想曲》

sentences.english: The Journals contain accounts of literary composition.
sentences.chinese: 《期刊》中有关于文学创作的报道。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is made up of different parts, things, or members

name: sympathy
trans: n.同情，同情心，一致，同感，赞同，慰问

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

name: electricity
trans: n.电，电学，电流

sentences.english: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

name: birthday
trans: n.生日，诞生的日期

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

name: weapon
trans: n.武器，兵器，vt.武装

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

name: tub
trans: n.桶，盆，浴缸，浴盆，v.装入桶，洗澡

sentences.english: I had a long soak in the tub.
sentences.chinese: 我在浴缸里泡了很久。

detailed_translations.english: a large container in which you sit to wash yourself

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗

name: within
trans: prep.在...里面，adv.在内，n.里面，adj.在里面的

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

name: enough
trans: adj.足够的，adv.足够地，完全地，pron.足够，受够

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

name: fever
trans: n.发热，发烧，狂热，vt.激怒，vi.发烧

sentences.english: Andy has a fever and won’t be coming into work today.
sentences.chinese: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning with a fever and an upset stomach.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上醒来时我发烧了，胃也不舒服。

sentences.english: She’s running a fever (= has a fever ) .
sentences.chinese: 她在发烧。

detailed_translations.english: an illness or a medical condition in which you have a very high temperature

detailed_translations.chinese: 使发烧；使狂热；使患热病

name: vessel
trans: n.容器，器皿，船，飞船，管，脉管，血管，[植]导管

sentences.english: a fishing vessel
sentences.chinese: 渔船

sentences.english: a burst blood vessel
sentences.chinese: 破裂的血管

sentences.english: a Bronze Age drinking vessel
sentences.chinese: 青铜器时代的饮具

detailed_translations.english: a ship or large boat

name: dot
trans: n.点，圆点，少量，小东西，vt.作小点记号，点缀，vi.作小点记号，[计算机]，点

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

name: commission
trans: n.委任(状)，任官令，委员会，佣金，犯罪行为，vt.委任，委托，使服役

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: familiar
trans: adj.熟悉的，熟知的，不拘礼节的，冒昧的，n.熟人，熟悉某种事物的人

sentences.english: a familiar tune
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.english: It was a relief to be back in familiar surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: This kind of situation was all too familiar (= very familiar ) to John.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形对约翰来说太熟悉了。

sentences.english: Her face seems vaguely familiar , but I can’t quite place her.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来有点面熟，但我还是认不出她来。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is familiar is well-known to you and easy to recognize

name: expand
trans: vt.扩大，增加，详述，扩展，使膨胀，vi.扩展，增加，详述

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

detailed_translations.english: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger

name: conquer
trans: vt.征服，战胜，克服，破除，vi.得胜

sentences.english: The Normans conquered England in 1066.
sentences.chinese: 诺曼人于 1066 年征服英格兰。

sentences.english: Egypt was conquered by the Persian king Kambyses.
sentences.chinese: 埃及被波斯国王冈比西斯征服。

detailed_translations.english: to get control of a country by fighting

name: instruction
trans: n.命令，指令，教学，教训，说明，须知

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

name: busy
trans: adj.忙的，繁忙的，杂乱的，vt.使忙于，vi.忙

sentences.english: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.chinese: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.english: a busy mother of four
sentences.chinese: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.english: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.chinese: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.english: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

detailed_translations.english: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do

name: tolerance
trans: n.忍受，容忍，忍耐力，宽容，公差

sentences.english: ...his tolerance and understanding of diverse human nature.
sentences.chinese: …他对各种人性的宽容和理解。

detailed_translations.english: willingness to allow people to do, say, or believe what they want without criticizing or punishing them

name: revolt
trans: n.叛乱，反抗，造反，反感，vi.叛乱，反抗，造反，起反感，vt.使...恶心

sentences.english: The prime minister is now facing a revolt by members of his own party.
sentences.chinese: 首相现在面临着党内倒戈。

sentences.english: the Polish revolt of 1863
sentences.chinese: 1863年的波兰起义

sentences.english: Some members of the government may revolt against this proposed legislation.3
sentences.chinese: 一些政府成员可能会反对这项拟议中的法规。

sentences.english: The peasants threatened to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 农民威胁说要造反。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws
to refuse to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws

name: circumstance
trans: n.情况，条件，境遇，环境，(复数)境况，事件，详情

sentences.english: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.english: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

sentences.english: Grants are awarded according to your financial circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 补助金根据经济状况发给。

detailed_translations.english: the conditions that affect a situation, action, event etc

name: forty
trans: num.，&，adj.四十，第四十，pron.四十(个，只...)

sentences.english: The place was built as a casino in the forties.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方建于20世纪40年代，起初是一座赌场。

detailed_translations.english: the number 40

name: salute
trans: n.招呼，行礼，vi.行礼，致意，问候

sentences.english: The two soldiers saluted Lieutenant Cecil.
sentences.chinese: 那两名士兵向塞西尔中尉行了礼。

sentences.english: The men jumped to their feet and saluted.
sentences.chinese: 这些人赶紧起立敬礼。

detailed_translations.english: to move your right hand to your head, especially in order to show respect to an officer in the army, navy etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…敬礼，向…致意；赞扬，颂扬
detailed_translations.english: to move your right hand to your head, especially in order to show respect to an officer in the army, navy etc
an act of raising your right hand to your head as a sign of respect, usually done by a soldier to an officer

name: storey
trans: n.(层)楼，=story(美)

sentences.english: A staircase leads to the upper storey .
sentences.chinese: 有一段楼梯通往上面一层。

detailed_translations.english: a floor or level of a building

name: cube
trans: n.立方体，立方，vt.求...的立方，adj.立方的

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

name: nuclear
trans: adj.原子核的，原子能的，核心的

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: a nuclear-powered submarine
sentences.chinese: 核动力潜艇

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the nucleus of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

name: abundant
trans: adj.丰富的，充裕的，大量的

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

name: term
trans: n.期，学期，条件，词，术语，名词，期限，条款，vt.把...称为

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

name: complain
trans: vi.抱怨，拆苦，悲叹，控告，控诉

sentences.english: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.english: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.english: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone

name: typewriter
trans: n.打字机，打字员

sentences.english: She tapped out a letter on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她用打字机打出了一封信。

sentences.english: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 他用打字机打出了一篇文章。

sentences.english: The secretary transcribed those letters on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 秘书用打字机打出了那些信。

detailed_translations.english: a machine with keys that you press in order to print letters of the alphabet onto paper

name: reference
trans: n.参考，出处，提及，参照，推荐人，推荐函，vt.提供参考

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

name: crisis
trans: n.危机，存亡之际

sentences.english: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.english: the current debt crisis
sentences.chinese: 当前的债务危机

sentences.english: a major political crisis
sentences.chinese: 重大的政治危机

sentences.english: I was relieved that we had averted yet another financial crisis .
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.english: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.english: The car industry is now in crisis .

sentences.chinese: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

name: general
trans: adj.总的，一般的，普遍的，全体的，n.将军，一般，大体

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things

name: musician
trans: n.音乐家，作曲家

sentences.english: a talented young musician
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的年轻音乐家

detailed_translations.english: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job

name: realize
trans: vt.实现，认识到，了解，意识到，净得

sentences.chinese: 我们过了一段时间才意识到这场悲剧有多严重。

sentences.english: It was only later that I realized my mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我到后来才认识到自己的错误。

sentences.english: She never realized her ambition of winning an Olympic gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句:她一直未能实现赢取奥运会金牌的抱负。

detailed_translations.english: to know and understand something, or suddenly begin to understand it

name: silly
trans: adj.傻的，愚蠢的，淳朴的，晕的

sentences.english: Stop asking silly questions.
sentences.chinese: 别再问傻问题了。

sentences.english: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.chinese: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.english: I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.english: ‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘ Don’t be silly , it’s dark.’
sentences.chinese: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

detailed_translations.english: not sensible, or showing bad judgment

name: liberty
trans: n.自由，释放，许可

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

name: overnight
trans: adv.一夜，昨晚一晚上，突然，adj.通宵的，晚上的，前夜的，n.前晚

sentences.chinese: 他一夜之间就成了百万富翁。

detailed_translations.english: suddenly or surprisingly quickly

name: tend
trans: vt.照管，照料，护理，趋向，易于，走向，倾向

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

name: readily
trans: adv.乐意地，无困难地，不迟疑地，迅速地，轻易地

sentences.english: Boats are readily available to visitors.
sentences.chinese: 游客可以很方便地租到船只。

sentences.english: The information is readily accessible on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 这些信息在因特网上一查就能找到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即
detailed_translations.english: quickly and easily

name: dissatisfy
trans: vi.使不满，使不平

sentences.english: More or other, they still dissatisfy.
sentences.chinese: 更多或另外一些，它们仍然不满足。

sentences.english: American's unilateralism act in fighting terrorism and its expansion tendency dissatisfy American's allied countries.
sentences.chinese: 第三，美国反恐中的“单边主义”行为和扩大化倾向令盟国极为不满。

sentences.english: Are your dissatisfy actions related to the content of your work your company culture or the people with whom you work?
sentences.chinese: 你不满意的是你工作的内容，公司文化，还是公司同事呢？

detailed_translations.english: to fail to satisfy; disappoint

name: front
trans: adj.前面的，n.前部，前面，开头，前线，vt.面对，朝向，对付，vi.面朝，做掩护

sentences.english: Two of his front teeth had been knocked out.
sentences.chinese: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.chinese: 《Hello!》杂志的封面

sentences.english: the front wheel of his bicycle
sentences.chinese: 他自行车的前轮

sentences.english: the dog’s front legs

sentences.chinese: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

detailed_translations.english: at, on, or in the front of something
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

name: harden
trans: vt.使变硬，(使)坚强，vi.变硬

sentences.english: It will take about 24 hours for the glue to harden.
sentences.chinese: 胶水干透大约需要24小时。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷
detailed_translations.english: to become firm or stiff, or to make something firm or stiff

detailed_translations.chinese: (Harden)人名；(英、德、罗、瑞典)哈登；(法)阿尔当

name: deep
trans: adj.深的，有...深的，深奥的，纵深的adv.深深地，晚地，n.深处

sentences.english: a deep narrow valley
sentences.chinese: 又深又窄的山谷

sentences.english: a deep wound
sentences.chinese: 很深的伤口

sentences.english: She was sitting in a deep leather chair.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

name: full
trans: adj.，满的，完全的，充满的，丰富的，adv.，完全地，整整，vt.使...充满，通过缩水、捶打或熨烫增加(布料的)重量和厚度，vi.增厚，n.，全部，十分，极点，鼎盛

sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

name: canoe
trans: n.独木舟，皮艇，划子，轻舟，v.乘独木舟

sentences.english: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们谨慎地把独木舟向上游划去。

sentences.english: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.chinese: 那年我在公园里做暑期兼职，我把独木舟翻转个身，然后我们一起合力将它推到岸边，这样我们就可以划船了。

sentences.english: I remember the first time I visited a village in Vietnam, in 1995: we endured hours and hours of rutty roads or long hours in a canoe to reach project sites.
sentences.chinese: 我记得1995年第一次访问越南一个村落，我们捱过很多小时的路途颠簸、坐了很多小时的独木舟，才到达项目的所在地。

detailed_translations.english: to travel by canoe
a long light boat that is pointed at both ends and which you move along using a  paddle

name: steward
trans: n.乘务员，服务员，v.做乘务员，管理

sentences.english: race stewards
sentences.chinese: 比赛组织者

detailed_translations.chinese: 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事
detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship

name: minister
trans: n.部长，大臣，公使，vi.照顾，给予帮助

sentences.english: a senior Cabinet minister
sentences.chinese: 资深的内阁部长

sentences.english: He concluded a deal with the Danish minister in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 他在华盛顿与丹麦公使达成了一项协议。

detailed_translations.english: a politician who is in charge of a government depart-ment, in Britain and some other countries

name: aloud
trans: adv.，出声地，大声地

sentences.english: When we were children, our father read aloud to us.
sentences.chinese: 当我们是孩子时，我们的父亲大声地朗读给我们听。

detailed_translations.english: if you read, laugh, say something etc aloud, you read etc so that people can hear you

name: auto
trans: n.(口语)汽车autos=automobile，自动汽车，pref.自动的，自己的

sentences.english: imported autos
sentences.chinese: 进口汽车

sentences.english: the auto industry
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业

sentences.english: auto insurance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险

detailed_translations.english: a car

name: moisture
trans: n.潮湿，湿气，温度

sentences.chinese: 皮肤的水分含量随着天气状况而变化。

sentences.chinese: 一个伦敦郊区

name: monument
trans: n.纪念碑，纪念馆，历史遗迹

sentences.chinese: 他在女儿遇难的地方立了块纪念碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品

name: lid
trans: n.盖子，盖，囊盖

sentences.chinese: 控制通货膨胀

detailed_translations.english: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container

name: decent
trans: adj.正派的，体面的，有分寸的，得体的，相当好的

sentences.chinese: 得体的葬礼

sentences.english: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.english: The chairman did the decent thing (= did what people thought he ought to ) and resigned.
sentences.chinese: 主席体面地辞去了职务。

name: sixteen
trans: num.十六，十六个

sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

name: listener
trans: n.听者，听众之一

sentences.chinese: 针对年轻听众的新节目

sentences.english: Dr. Brian was a good listener.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩医生是一位不错的倾听者。

sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是联合各反对党挫败总统。

detailed_translations.english: if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something
if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something

sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

name: aviation
trans: n.航空，航空学，飞机制造业

sentences.chinese: …航空工业。

detailed_translations.english: the science or practice of flying in aircraft

name: subtract
trans: vt.减，减去，去掉，扣掉，vi.减少

sentences.english: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

trans: adv.因此，所以

sentences.chinese: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

name: poem
trans: n.诗，韵文，诗体文

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

trans: n.(美)汽油

sentences.chinese: 他们的汽油不够了。

sentences.english: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.chinese: “咦~~~~”难闻死了，像是汽油和花香混在一起。

sentences.english: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.chinese: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

name: railroad

sentences.english: The supplies were sent on the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 补给经由铁路运送。

sentences.english: a railroad station
sentences.chinese: 火车站

detailed_translations.english: a railway or the railway

name: honey
trans: n.蜜，(复数)蜂蜜，甜，甜蜜，宝贝，爱人，adj.，蜂蜜似的，深爱的，vt.加蜜使甜，对...说甜言蜜语，vi.说甜言蜜语，奉承

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

name: variety
trans: n.多样化，种类，变种，杂耍

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

name: represent
trans: vt.描绘，代表，象征，表现，表示，说明，阐明，vi.提出异议

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

name: next
trans: adj.紧接的，贴近的，下一个的，adv.其次，n.下一个，prep.靠近

sentences.english: The next six months will be the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的六个月将是最难熬的。

sentences.english: The man in the next chair was asleep.
sentences.chinese: 邻座的男子睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: coming straight after sb/sth in time, order or space

name: argument
trans: n.争论，辩论，理由，论点(据)

sentences.english: She had a big argument with her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她和丈夫大吵了一架。

sentences.english: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.chinese: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people disagree, often angrily

name: turbine
trans: n.叶轮机，汽轮机，涡轮

sentences.english: The new ship will be powered by two gas turbines and four diesel engines.
sentences.chinese: 那艘新轮船将由2台燃气涡轮机和4台柴油机驱动。

detailed_translations.english: an engine or motor in which the pressure of a liquid or gas moves a special wheel around

name: finding
trans: n.，发现，发现物，调查(或研究)的结果，[律]，裁判，裁决，(复，数）findings：(珠宝商等使用的)零碎的工具或材料，find的现在分词

sentences.english: Surveys conducted in other countries reported similar findings.
sentences.chinese: 在其他国家进行的调查也报告说有类似的结果。

detailed_translations.english: the information that someone has discovered as a result of their study, work etc

name: them
trans: pron.(宾格)他(她、它)们

sentences.english: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.english: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.chinese: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.english: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
sentences.chinese: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

name: fare
trans: n.车费，船费，票价，费用，食物，vi.进展，进食

sentences.english: It is unlikely that the marine industry will fare any better in September.
sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something fares well or badly, you are referring to the degree of success they achieve in a particular situation or activity
the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

name: embrace

sentences.english: We hope these regions will embrace democratic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

name: curious

sentences.english: Puppies are naturally curious.
sentences.chinese: 小狗天生好奇。

sentences.english: He felt a curious mixture of excitement and panic.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种既兴奋又惊慌的奇怪感觉。

name: butcher
trans: n.屠夫，屠杀者，刽子手，肉商，小贩，vt.屠宰，滥杀，将某事弄得一团糟

sentences.english: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 猪被宰杀了，火腿吊在屋顶下风干。

detailed_translations.english: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
A butcher is a shopkeeper who cuts up and sells meat. Some butchers also kill animals for meat and make foods such as sausages and meat pies.

name: ampere
trans: n.安培

sentences.english: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.chinese: 我还想要一个铝制的安培表，虽然它与另一个类似。

sentences.english: A static magnetic field is measured in units of ampere per metre, (A/m) but is usually expressed in terms of the corresponding magnetic induction measured in units of tesla, (T) or millitesla (mT).
sentences.chinese: 静电磁场以每米具有的安培单位衡量(A/m)，但是通常以相应的电磁感应单位特斯拉(T)或毫伏特斯拉(mT)表示。

sentences.english: Five nanogenerators working together produced about 1 micro ampere output current at 3 volts about the same voltage generated by two regular AA batteries.
sentences.chinese: 5个纳米发电机同时工作可以产生1微安培3伏特的输出电流，与2节普通的5号电池所产生的电压差不多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安培（计算电流强度的标准单位）

name: zero
trans: n.，零，零点，零度，最低点，完全没有，无足轻重的人或物，adj.零的，无价值的，零视度的，v.，把...调零，瞄准，集中注意，迫近

sentences.english: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.chinese: 设x大于或等于零。

detailed_translations.english: the number 0
the number 0

name: shut
trans: vt.关上，闭上，关闭，防止进入，禁闭，合上，停止或中止，vi.关闭停止或中止，n.关闭，adj.关闭的，合拢的，围绕的

sentences.english: Shut the window, Ellen!
sentences.chinese: 埃伦，把窗关上！

sentences.english: I heard his bedroom door shut.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.english: She lay down on her bed and shut her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: He shut the drawer and turned the key.
sentences.chinese: 他关上抽屉，转动了钥匙。

detailed_translations.english: to close something, or to become closed
not open

name: enforce
trans: vt.实施，执行，强制，强迫，加强

sentences.english: Parking restrictions will be strictly enforced.
sentences.chinese: 停车限制将会严格执行。

sentences.english: It is unlikely that a record company would enforce its views on an established artist.
sentences.chinese: 唱片公司未必能强迫一位已出名的艺人接受他们的意见。

detailed_translations.english: to make people obey a rule or law

name: socialism
trans: n.社会主义

sentences.english: They declared for socialism.
sentences.chinese: 他们表示拥护社会主义。

sentences.english: We should rally under the banner of socialism.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当在社会主义的旗帜下团结起来。

sentences.english: From the Left: Yes! Yes, exactly what socialism is.
sentences.chinese: 从左边的回答：是的，这就是社会主义。

detailed_translations.english: an economic and political system in which large industries are owned by the government, and taxes are used to take some wealth away from richer citizens and give it to poorer citizens

name: southwest
trans: n.西南，西南风，西南地区，adj.西南的，来自西南方的，adv.往西南，来自西南

sentences.english: ...some 500 kilometres to the southwest of Johannesburg.
sentences.chinese: …约翰内斯堡西南约五百公里。

sentences.english: We took a plane southwest across the Anatolian plateau to Cappadocia.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘飞机朝西南方,越过安纳托利亚高原,飞往卡帕多细亚。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is exactly between south and west
a southwest wind comes from the southwest
If you go southwest, you travel toward the southwest

name: queen
trans: n.王后，女王，最重要的女子或事物，女冠军，女王蜂，vi.立...为女王，当女王，vt.成为女王或王后，以女王的身份统治，vt.使卒子达底线变为王后取得纵，横，斜自由行走的资格

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

name: chocolate
trans: n.巧克力，巧克力糖，巧克力饮品，adj.巧克力的，有巧克力糖衣的，巧克力色的

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

name: hopeless
trans: adj.没有希望的，绝望的，无可救药的

sentences.english: We tried to stop the flames from spreading, but we knew it was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 我们试图阻止火势蔓延，但我们知道这是不可能的。

sentences.english: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task.
sentences.chinese: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.english: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

sentences.english: I began to feel lonely and hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 我开始感到寂寞绝望。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you try to do is hopeless, there is no possibility of it being successful

name: empire
trans: n.帝国

sentences.english: the Roman empire
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国

detailed_translations.english: a group of countries that are all controlled by one ruler or government

name: suggestion
trans: n.建议，意见，暗示，迹象，联想

sentences.english: Any suggestions would be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何建议都欢迎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建议， 意见； 细微的迹象； 暗示
detailed_translations.english: an idea, plan, or possibility that someone mentions, or the act of mentioning it

name: wrap
trans: vt.裹，包，捆，覆盖，包围，n.披肩，围巾，包装材料

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

name: swing
trans: vi.摇摆，回转，旋转，动摇，n.摇摆，改变，冲力

sentences.english: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 边走边摆动双臂。

sentences.english: a sign swinging in the wind
sentences.chinese: 在风中摇摆的指示牌

sentences.english: He was swinging his bag back and forth .
sentences.chinese: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 她左右晃动着两条腿。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 他对准球猛地挥拍一击。

detailed_translations.english: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
a swinging movement or rhythm

name: animal
trans: n.动物，兽，兽性，与众不同的人，adj.动物的，野兽的，动物性的

sentences.english: furry little animals
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.english: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

name: enclose
trans: vt.围住，圈起，附上，放入封套，[计算机]，括入

sentences.english: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
sentences.chinese: 请随订单附上支票。

sentences.english: The pool area is enclosed by a six-foot wall.
sentences.chinese: 游泳区用六英尺高的高墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

name: kind
trans: n.种类，本质，adj.仁慈的，友好的，和蔼的

sentences.english: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

name: nuisance
trans: n.讨厌的东西，讨厌的人，伤害

sentences.english: He could be a bit of a nuisance when he was drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他喝醉时会是一个有点令人讨厌的人。

detailed_translations.english: a person, thing, or situation that annoys you or causes problems

name: optical
trans: adj.眼的，眼睛的，视觉的，光学的

sentences.english: microscopes and other optical instruments
sentences.chinese: 显微镜和其他光学仪器

detailed_translations.english: relating to machines or processes which are concerned with light, images, or the way we see things

name: influence
trans: n.影响，影响力，势力，权势，有影响的人(或事物)，vt.影响，感化

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

name: competition
trans: n.竞争，比

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

name: thrill
trans: n.一阵激动，震颤，激动，v.(使)震颤，兴奋，激动

sentences.english: Winning first place must have been quite a thrill.
sentences.chinese: 赢得第一名肯定让人非常激动。

sentences.english: Even though I’ve been acting for years, I still get a thrill out of going on stage.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我演了多年戏，走上舞台我仍然感到十分激动。

sentences.english: It gave Pat a thrill to finally see the group perform live.
sentences.chinese: 帕特终于看到这个乐队现场表演，感到十分激动。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling of excitement and pleasure, or the thing that makes you feel this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…颤动；使…紧张；使…感到兴奋或激动
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel excited and happy

name: niece
trans: n.侄女，外甥女，教士的私生女

sentences.english: his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister
sentences.chinese: 他的外甥女，他大姐的女儿

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your brother or sister, or the daughter of your wife’s or husband’s brother or sister

name: gallon
trans: n.加仑(容量单位)

sentences.english: a 20 gallon fish tank
sentences.chinese: 一个20加仑的鱼缸

sentences.english: The car does about 50 miles per gallon.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车每加仑油能开50英里左右。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring liquids, equal to eight pints. In Britain this is 4.55 litres, and in the US it is 3.79 litres.

name: seller
trans: n.卖者，售货者，行销货，畅销品

sentences.english: ...a flower seller.
sentences.chinese: …一个卖花的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who sells something

name: dismiss
trans: vt.不再考虑，解雇，解散，开除，逃避，(法律)驳回

sentences.english: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.english: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

name: fertile
trans: adj.肥沃的，多产的，能繁殖的、

sentences.english: the product of a fertile imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力丰富的产物

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

name: soon
trans: adv.不久，很快，早，快

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

name: breast
trans: n.乳房，胸脯，胸膛，vt.面对，以胸对着

sentences.english: These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
sentences.chinese: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.english: breast milk
sentences.chinese: 母乳

sentences.english: breast cancer
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌

sentences.english: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
sentences.chinese: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two round raised parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk when she has a baby

name: forehead
trans: n.额头，前部

sentences.english: the lines on her forehead
sentences.chinese: 她前额上的皱纹

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair

name: hurry
trans: vi.赶紧，快速移动，vt.，，促，加快，迅速处理，n.骚乱，匆忙，急需

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

name: probably
trans: adv.或许，大概

sentences.english: It'll probably be OK.
sentences.chinese: 这大概没有问题。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that sth is likely to happen or to be true

name: cloud
trans: n.云，云状物，云状的烟，阴影，vt.使…模糊，以云遮敝，笼罩，使…混淆，毁坏，vi.脸色显得阴沉

sentences.english: Dark clouds floated across the moon.
sentences.chinese: 乌云飘过月亮。

sentences.english: A cloud of steam rose into the air.
sentences.chinese: 一团水蒸气升到空中。

sentences.english: Fears of renewed terrorist attacks cast a cloud over the event (= spoilt the happy situation ) .
sentences.chinese: 对恐怖分子再次发动袭击的担心给这次活动蒙上了一层阴影。

detailed_translations.english: a white or grey mass in the sky that forms from very small drops of water

name: relate
trans: vt.叙述，使联系，vi.追溯到，有关联，建立关系，了解

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: timetable
trans: n.时间表，时刻表，课程表

sentences.english: The timetable was hopelessly optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 这个时间表过于乐观。

detailed_translations.english: a list of the times at which buses, trains, planes etc arrive and leave

name: famous
trans: adj.著名的，出名的，一流的

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

name: dog
trans: n.狗，犬，犬科动物，卑鄙的人，vt.尾随，跟踪

sentences.english: I could hear a dog barking .
sentences.chinese: 我听到了狗吠声。

sentences.english: He’s taken the dog for a walk .
sentences.chinese: 他去遛狗了。

sentences.english: We used to have a dog when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候我们养过狗。

sentences.english: the most popular breed of dog
sentences.chinese: 最受人喜欢的犬种

detailed_translations.english: a common animal with four legs, fur, and a tail. Dogs are kept as pets or trained to guard places, find drugs etc.

name: brow
trans: n.额，眉，眉毛

sentences.english: He wiped his brow with the back of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他用手背擦了擦额头。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair

name: even
trans: adv.甚至，甚至更，还，恰好，正当，adj.平坦的，偶数的，相等的均匀的，v.使平坦，相等

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

name: title
trans: n.标题，题目，称号，头衔，称号，vt.予称号，加标题于，adj.标题的

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

name: obviously
trans: adv.明显地，显然地

sentences.english: We’re obviously going to need more help.
sentences.chinese: 显然我们将需要更多的帮助。

sentences.english: Your research has obviously been very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 你的研究工作显然做得很透彻。

sentences.english: Obviously, this is going to take some time.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，这要花点时间。

sentences.english: Cost is obviously important.
sentences.chinese: 费用当然很重要。

sentences.english: She frowned and was obviously puzzled.
sentences.chinese: 她皱起眉头，显然感到不解。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean that a fact can easily be noticed or understood

name: monitor
trans: n.班长，监视器，监听员，[计算机]显示器，监视器，v.监视，监听监督

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

name: robe
trans: n.长袍，长衣，浴衣，v.(使)穿上长袍等

sentences.english: a priest’s robes
sentences.chinese: 牧师的长袍

detailed_translations.english: a long loose piece of clothing, especially one worn for official ceremonies

name: impossible
trans: adj.不可能的，办不到的

sentences.english: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.english: It’s impossible to be accurate about these things.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情不可能准确无误 。

sentences.english: The noise made sleep impossible.
sentences.chinese: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.english: It is difficult to find work these days, but for blind people it is virtually impossible.
sentences.chinese: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.english: He was faced with a seemingly impossible task.
sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.english: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.chinese: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.english: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.english: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.
sentences.chinese: 即使有可能，要改变这样的心态也是很难的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impossible cannot happen or be done

name: oral
trans: adj.口头的，口的，n.口试

sentences.english: oral history
sentences.chinese: 口述的历史

sentences.english: an oral agreement
sentences.chinese: 口头协议

detailed_translations.english: spoken, not written
a spoken test, especially in a foreign language

name: butter
trans: n.黄油，阿谀奉承，vt.涂黄油

sentences.english: Can I have some bread and butter?
sentences.chinese: 能给我一些面包和黄油吗?。

sentences.english: Do you like butter?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢黄油吗？

sentences.english: We never use cheese, butter or something like that to cook it.
sentences.chinese: 我们从未使用乳酪，黄油或者类如此物来烹调食品。

to spread butter on something

name: former
trans: adj.在前的，以前的，前任的，n.前者，形成的原因

sentences.chinese: 前苏联

sentences.english: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.chinese: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.english: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned

name: this
trans: adj.这，今，pron.这，这个，adv.这么，这样

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

name: count
trans: vt.计算，视为，依赖，vi.数，计数，n.计数

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

name: tribe
trans: n.部落，宗族，种族，一伙人

sentences.english: a tribe of Aborigines known as the Dolphin People
sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

detailed_translations.english: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader

name: cheerful
trans: adj.快乐的，愉快的

sentences.english: a bright cheerful Italian restaurant
sentences.chinese: 一家明亮宜人的意大利餐馆

sentences.english: There was a cheerful picture on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 墙上有一张赏心悦目的画。

sentences.english: The house has a cheerful atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子有一种令人愉快的气氛。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cheerful makes you feel happy because it is so bright or pleasant

name: art
trans: adj.美术(品)的，艺术(品)的，n.艺术，美术，技术，阴谋

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art in New York
sentences.chinese: 纽约现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: an example of early Indian art
sentences.chinese: 印度早期艺术的范例

sentences.english: Television is ruining the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 电视在糟蹋会话艺术。

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

name: politics
trans: n.政治，政治学，政纲，政策，政治活动，政见

sentences.chinese: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s political beliefs and opinions

name: sigh
trans: n.呼吸，叹息(带有情感)，vi.发出叹息的声音，感叹，vt.叹息

sentences.english: ‘Well, there’s nothing we can do about it now,’ she sighed.
sentences.chinese: “唉，我们现在对此无能为力。”她叹口气说。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe in and out making a long sound, especially because you are bored, disappointed, tired etc
an act or sound of sighing

name: expose
trans: vt.使暴露，揭露，揭穿，使遭受(危险或不快)

sentences.english: He lifted his T-shirt to expose a jagged scar across his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他撩起T恤衫，露出横贯胸部的锯齿状伤疤。

detailed_translations.english: to show something that is usually covered or hidden

name: sleeve
trans: n.袖子，袖套，套管

sentences.english: a dress with long sleeves
sentences.chinese: 长袖连衣裙

detailed_translations.chinese: [机] 套筒，[机] 套管；袖子，[服装] 袖套
detailed_translations.english: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm

name: courage
trans: n.勇气，胆量，胆识

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

name: sex
trans: n.性别，性，性欲，vt.区别...性别，引起...性欲

sentences.chinese: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.english: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.chinese: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.english: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.chinese: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

sentences.english: the dangers of casual sex
sentences.chinese: 性关系随便的危险性

detailed_translations.english: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别

name: stoop
trans: vi.俯身，弯下，弯下上身，屈服，n.弯腰，佝偻，屈服

sentences.chinese: 我们得弯腰通过那低矮的入口。

sentences.english: Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫俯身系鞋带。

if sb has a stoop , their shoulders are always bent forward

name: organization
trans: n.组织，团体，机构，adj.有组织的

sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

name: confine
trans: vt.限制，禁闭，n.边界，约束，范围，限制

sentences.chinese: 我们把研究限定在十个案例以内。

sentences.english: Any soldier who leaves his post will be confined to barracks (= made to stay in the barracks ) .
sentences.chinese: 任何擅离职守的士兵都要受到在营房里关禁闭的处罚。

sentences.english: within the confines of the prison
sentences.chinese: 在监狱范围内

limits or borders

name: cheese
trans: n.乳，干，要求照相的人说的口形词，vt.停止

sentences.english: half a kilo of cheese
sentences.chinese: 半公斤干酪

sentences.english: a cheese sandwich
sentences.chinese: 干酪三明治

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the grated cheese.
sentences.chinese: 撒上磨碎的干酪。

sentences.english: a selection of English cheeses
sentences.chinese: 精选英国干酪

detailed_translations.english: a solid food made from milk, which is usually yellow or white in colour, and can be soft or hard

name: problem
trans: n.问题，习题，adj.成问题的，难对付的

sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

name: rusty
trans: adj.生锈的，变迟钝的

sentences.english: a rusty nail
sentences.chinese: 生锈的铁钉

sentences.english: a new metal that will never go rusty
sentences.chinese: 一种永不生锈的新金属

detailed_translations.chinese: 生锈的，腐蚀的；铁锈色的，锈色的；迟钝的
detailed_translations.english: metal that is rusty is covered in  rust

name: devise
trans: vt.设计，发明，遗赠，n.遗赠(的财产)

sentences.chinese: 她想出一种加快办公室之间通信联络的方法。

name: some
trans: adj.一些，若干，adv.大约，在某种程度上，pron.一些(人，物)，若干

sentences.chinese: 我刚煮了一壶咖啡，你想喝点吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人
detailed_translations.english: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something

name: reporter
trans: n.记者，通讯员

sentences.english: a news reporter
sentences.chinese: 新闻记者

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio

trans: n.返回，归还，报答，报告，vi.返回，归还，回来，adj.返回的

sentences.chinese: 过了45分钟她才回来。

sentences.chinese: 艾利森决定回家。

sentences.english: He left his country, never to return.
sentences.chinese: 他离开了祖国，一去不复返。

name: fridge
trans: n.电冰箱

sentences.chinese: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.english: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.english: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

name: director
trans: n.指导者，理事，董事，经理，主管，导演

sentences.english: The company is run by a board of directors (= a group of directors ) .
sentences.chinese: 这家公司由董事会管理。

sentences.english: the director of education

detailed_translations.chinese: 理事；导演；指导者；负责人

name: slogan
trans: n.标语，口号

sentences.chinese: 一句广告口号

sentences.english: demonstrators shouting political slogans
sentences.chinese: 高喊政治口号的示威者

sentences.english: the Democrats’ campaign slogan
sentences.chinese: 民主党的竞选口号

sentences.chinese: 她仅仅以20票之差落选。

sentences.chinese: 我不能让土地闲置。

sentences.chinese: 整队人干站着等技工来。

sentences.english: The workers have been idle for the last six months.
sentences.chinese: 最近六个月工人们都很闲。

trans: n.自我，自己，本身

sentences.chinese: 儿童逐渐形成的自我意识

detailed_translations.chinese: 使自花授精；使近亲繁殖

name: indifferent
trans: adj.冷漠的，不积极的，漠不关心的，无重要性的，中立的

sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

trans: n.，音，腔调，声调，音调，语气，品质，色调，vt.，使更健壮，装腔作势地说，定调，调色，vi.调和(颜色)，呈现悦目色调

sentences.chinese: 她很气愤，语气尖刻。

sentences.chinese: 从她的语气明显听得出来她不喜欢我。

trans: n.总数，数量，总额，和，vi.总计，等于

sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

detailed_translations.english: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

name: continent

sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

name: Asian
trans: adj.亚洲的，n.亚洲人

sentences.chinese: 这次金融危机使亚洲国家的经济大伤元气。

sentences.english: The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府宣布市场不景气是由于亚洲金融危机而引起的。

detailed_translations.english: from or relating to Asia, especially India or Pakistan
someone from Asia, or whose family originally came from Asia, especially India or Pakistan

name: aboard
trans: adv.，在船(车)上，在火车上，在飞机上，prep.，上船，上飞机，上车

sentences.chinese: 飞机失事，机上200人全部遇难。

sentences.english: The boat swayed as he stepped aboard.
sentences.chinese: 他上船时，船晃了起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在飞机上；[船] 在船上；在火车上
detailed_translations.english: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
on or onto a ship, plane, or train

name: claw
trans: n.爪，钳，脚爪，螯，爪状物，vt.，&，vi.抓，撕

sentences.english: The cat dug his claws into my leg.
sentences.chinese: 猫的爪子抓进了我的腿中。

sentences.english: lobster claws
sentences.chinese: 龙虾的螯

detailed_translations.english: a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects
