name: whirl
trans: vt.，&，vi.使...旋转，急转，回旋，迅速移动，n.回旋，旋转，繁忙混乱，尝试

sentences.english: the social whirl of New York publishing
sentences.chinese: 纽约出版界纷繁的社交活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转，回旋；昏乱；一连串的事；短暂的旅行
detailed_translations.english: a spinning movement or the shape of something that is spinning

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转，回旋；急走；头晕眼花
detailed_translations.english: to turn or spin around very quickly, or to make someone or something do this

name: liberal
trans: adj.心胸宽大的，慷慨的，无偏见的，不拘泥的，宽大的，开明的n.自由主义者，宽容大度的人，(Liberal)自由党人

sentences.english: I had quite liberal parents.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母思想很开明。

sentences.english: a liberal supply of drinks
sentences.chinese: 饮料的充足供应

detailed_translations.english: willing to understand and respect other people’s ideas, opinions, and feelings

name: medal
trans: n.奖章，勋章，纪念章，vi.获得奖章

sentences.english: She won a gold medal at the last Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 她在上届奥运会上赢得一枚金牌。

sentences.english: The two boys were awarded medals for their bravery.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男孩因勇敢而获得勋章。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of metal, usually shaped like a coin, that is given to someone who has won a competition or who has done something brave

name: child
trans: n.小孩，儿童，儿子，产物

sentences.english: The hotel is ideal for families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆对带小孩的家庭再合适不过。

sentences.english: The film is not suitable for children under 12.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片不适合12岁以下的儿童观看。

sentences.english: I was very happy as a child (= when I was a child ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候很幸福。

sentences.english: a famous writer of children’s books
sentences.chinese: 著名的儿童文学作家

sentences.english: child victims of war
sentences.chinese: 战争受难儿童

sentences.chinese: 我有五个孩子，他们的婚姻都很幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is not yet an adult

name: hair

sentences.chinese: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.english: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.chinese: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

trans: n.财富，财产，丰富，大量

sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun first appears in the morning

trans: vt.照亮，使明亮，点亮，变亮，减轻

sentences.english: She took one of the parcels from her father to lighten his load.
sentences.chinese: 她从父亲那儿拿过一个包以减轻他的负担。

sentences.english: This will lighten your spirit and give you strength and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 这样会减轻你的精神压力并会给你能力和动力。

sentences.english: I told you at the beginning of this article that I needed to lighten up my bike without sacrificing my suspension.
sentences.chinese: 在本文开始的部分，我告诉您我需要在不牺牲自行车避震系统的前提下，减轻自行车的重量。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce the amount of work, worry, debt etc that someone has

name: false
trans: adj.不真实的，伪造的，人造的，假的，错误的，虚伪的，adv.不真诚地，虚伪地

sentences.english: I don’t want to give you any false hopes .
sentences.chinese: 我不想让你有任何虚假的希望。

sentences.english: The statement gives us a false impression that we understand something when we do not.
sentences.chinese: 这句话使我们产生错觉，以为自己懂了，但其实并没懂。

sentences.english: false assumptions about people of other cultures
sentences.chinese: 对来自其他文化的人的错误假设

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["a feeling of being safe when you are not really safe"],"COLLOINEXA":["a false sense of security"]}
sentences.chinese: 虚假的安全感

detailed_translations.english: based on incorrect information or ideas

name: ache
trans: vi.，痛，想念，渴望，n.，疼痛

sentences.english: His feet were aching from standing so long.
sentences.chinese: 他站了那么久，双脚隐隐作痛。

detailed_translations.english: if part of your body aches, you feel a continuous, but not very sharp pain there
a continuous pain that is not sharp or very strong

name: mouthful
trans: n.满口，一口，少量

sentences.english: She took a mouthful of water.
sentences.chinese: 她喝了一大口水。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of food or drink that you put into your mouth at one time

name: cancel
trans: n.取消，撤消，vt.取消，撤消，删去，约分，vi.抵消

sentences.english: Our flight was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.english: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.chinese: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

detailed_translations.english: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen

name: hall
trans: n.门厅，过道，会堂，礼堂

sentences.english: a huge tiled entrance hall
sentences.chinese: 铺着地砖的大门厅

sentences.english: Each floor had ten rooms on both sides of the hall.
sentences.chinese: 每一层在走廊的两边都各有十个房间。

detailed_translations.english: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

name: leader
trans: n.领袖，领导人，首领

sentences.english: the largest ever gathering of world leaders
sentences.chinese: 全世界领导人史无前例的大聚会

detailed_translations.english: the person who directs or controls a group, organization, country etc

name: mill
trans: n.磨坊，制造厂，磨粉机，密尔：一种货币单位，使陷于困境，vt.磨细，vi.乱转，磨细

sentences.english: All our flours are milled using traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有的面粉全是用传统方法碾磨的。

sentences.english: Add some freshly milled black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加一些现磨的黑胡椒粉。

detailed_translations.english: to crush grain, pepper etc in a mill

detailed_translations.chinese: 磨坊；碾磨机；制造厂，工厂
detailed_translations.english: a building containing a large machine for crushing grain into flour

name: assign
trans: vt.指派，分配，指定，转让，n.受让人

sentences.english: How much time have you assigned for the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 你给这个会议定了多长时间？

detailed_translations.chinese: 指派， 分配； 布置； 指定
detailed_translations.english: to give someone a particular job or make them responsible for a particular person or thing

name: sort
trans: n.种类，类别，特征，方法，vt.分类，整理，使明确，vi.交往，协调

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

name: miracle
trans: n.奇迹，令人惊奇的人

sentences.english: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
sentences.chinese: 你没有死真是奇迹！

sentences.english: By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们奇迹般地赶上了飞机。

sentences.english: the economic miracle of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济奇迹

sentences.english: She’s our miracle baby.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们的奇迹宝宝。

detailed_translations.english: something very lucky or very good that happens which you did not expect to happen or did not think was possible

name: eliminate
trans: vt.消灭，消除，排除，除去，剔除，忽略

sentences.english: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.chinese: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

name: bird
trans: n.鸟，家禽，陶土飞靶，伙伴，vi.观察或辨认鸟

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

name: France
trans: n.法国，法兰西

name: orbit
trans: n.运行轨道，势力范围，眼眶，轨迹，vt.环绕，绕轨道而行，进入轨道，vi.盘旋

sentences.english: Mars and Earth have orbits which change with time.
sentences.chinese: 火星和地球的轨道随着时间而发生改变。

detailed_translations.english: the curved path travelled by an object which is moving around another much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc
to travel in a curved path around a much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc

name: mute
trans: adj.缄默的，哑的，无声的，n.哑巴，默音字母，弱音器，vt.减音减弱，vi.(鸟)排泄

sentences.english: Billy continued to stand there, mute and defiant.
sentences.chinese: 比利还是站在那儿一声不吭，一副不服气的样子。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is mute does not speak, or refuses to speak
to make the sound of something quieter, or make it disappear completely
a small piece of metal, rubber etc that you place over or into a musical instrument to make it sound softer

name: purity
trans: n.纯净，纯洁，纯度，纯正，纯粹

sentences.english: the purity of tap water
sentences.chinese: 自来水的纯净度

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["spiritual purity"]}
sentences.chinese: 心灵的纯洁

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being pure

name: despise
trans: vt.鄙视，蔑视

sentences.english: She despised her neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 她看不起她的邻居。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something

name: military
trans: adj.军事的，军人的，n.军队

sentences.english: a military helicopter
sentences.chinese: 军用直升机

sentences.english: military equipment
sentences.chinese: 军事设备

sentences.english: The government has threatened to take military action if the rebels do not withdraw from the area.
sentences.chinese: 政府警告说，如果叛乱分子不从该地区撤出，就要采取军事行动。

sentences.english: The United States is prepared to use military force to achieve its aims.
sentences.chinese: 美国准备动用武力达成目的。

sentences.english: a raid by European military forces
sentences.chinese: 欧洲军事力量发动的袭击

detailed_translations.english: used by, involving, or relating to the army, navy, or airforce
the military forces of a country

name: refusal
trans: n.拒绝，回绝

sentences.english: Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

detailed_translations.english: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

name: provision
trans: n.供应(品)，预备，存粮，规定，条款，(pl.)食物，vt.向...供应食物

sentences.english: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.english: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

detailed_translations.english: a condition in an agreement or law

name: rub
trans: vt.摩擦，擦，搓，涂抹上，使不愉快，vi.摩擦，n.摩擦，困难，障碍

sentences.english: You’ll have to rub harder if you want to get it clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想把它弄干净，就得更使劲地擦。

sentences.english: I hurriedly rubbed myself dry.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧把自己擦干。

detailed_translations.english: to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly

name: racket
trans: n.球拍，喧闹纷乱

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise

name: awfully
trans: adv.令人畏惧的，很，可怕地，非常地，极端地

sentences.english: It’s awfully cold in here. Is the heater on?
sentences.chinese: 这儿非常冷，取暖器开了吗？

detailed_translations.english: very

name: counter
trans: n.柜台，计数器，计算者，[计算机]，计数器，adj.相反的，adv.与…相反地，vt.反对，反击，vi.反对，反击

sentences.english: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.chinese: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

name: hence
trans: ad.因此，从此，所以，今后

sentences.english: The cost of transport is a major expense for an industry. Hence factory location is an important consideration.
sentences.chinese: 运输成本是企业的一大支出，因此工厂选址是重要的考虑因素。

detailed_translations.english: for this reason

name: pride
trans: n.骄傲，自豪，自尊，一群狮子，vt.自夸，以...自豪

sentences.english: He wore his medals with pride.
sentences.chinese: 他自豪地戴着奖章。

sentences.english: The people have a sense of pride in their community.
sentences.chinese: 人们对自己的社区有一种自豪感。

sentences.english: His heart swelled with pride when his daughter came in.
sentences.chinese: 女儿进来时他的内心充满了自豪感。

sentences.english: She felt a glow of pride when her name was announced for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 宣布她获奖时她感到非常自豪。

sentences.english: Success in sport is a source of national pride .
sentences.chinese: 体育方面的成就可以激发民族自豪感。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you are proud of something that you or someone connected with you has achieved

name: marry
trans: vt.娶，嫁，vi.结婚，结合

sentences.english: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.chinese: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.english: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.english: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.chinese: 她结婚早。

sentences.english: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.chinese: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.english: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

detailed_translations.english: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

name: be
trans: aux.v.，&vi.是，在，做，有

sentences.chinese: 我工作的时候不要打扰我。

sentences.english: Gemma was reading.
sentences.chinese: 吉玛正在看书。

sentences.english: They’ve been asking a lot of questions.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经问了许多问题。

sentences.english: That guy’s always causing trouble.
sentences.chinese: 那家伙总是惹麻烦。

sentences.english: We’ll be starting in about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们过一小时左右开始。

sentences.english: He isn’t leaving, is he?
sentences.chinese: 他不会走吧？

detailed_translations.english: used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs

name: marble
trans: n.大理石，vt.使有大理石的花纹

sentences.english: The columns were of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 柱子是白色的大理石。

sentences.english: a marble statue
sentences.chinese: 大理石雕像

detailed_translations.chinese: 大理石；大理石制品；弹珠
detailed_translations.english: a type of hard rock that becomes smooth when it is polished, and is used for making buildings,  statue s  etc

name: complaint
trans: n.抱怨，怨言，控告

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

name: few
trans: adj.很少的，少数的，pron.少数，n.少量

sentences.english: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

detailed_translations.english: not many or hardly any people or things

name: above
trans: prep.，在...上面，超过，高于，adj.，上面的，adv.，在上面，超过n.，上面的东西

sentences.english: He lived in a flat above the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他住在那商店上面的一套房间里。

sentences.english: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 大型客机在云层上面飞行。

sentences.english: The salaries we offer are well above (= much higher than ) average.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的薪资远高于平均水平。

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

name: sacrifice
trans: n.牺牲，供俸，祭品，vt.牺牲，祭祀，贱卖，vi.献祭，(棒球)作牺牲一击

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

name: upstairs
trans: adv.在楼上，往楼上，高水平地，上层地，头脑上地，adj.楼上的，n.楼上

sentences.english: I went upstairs and had a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我上楼冲了个澡。

sentences.english: She’s upstairs in bed feeling ill.
sentences.chinese: 她身体不舒服，在楼上躺着。

sentences.english: Marsani moved into the upstairs apartment.
sentences.chinese: 玛萨妮搬进了楼上的公寓。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上
detailed_translations.english: towards or on an upper floor in a building
An upstairs room or object is situated on a floor of a building that is higher than the ground floor
one or all of the upper floors in a building

name: lightning
trans: n.闪电，闪电放电，adj.闪电般的，快速的，vi.打闪

sentences.english: a lightning attack
sentences.chinese: 闪电式突袭

detailed_translations.english: very fast, and often without warning
a powerful flash of light in the sky caused by electricity and usually followed by thunder

name: endure
trans: vt.忍受，容忍，vi.持久，持续

sentences.english: It seemed impossible that anyone could endure such pain.
sentences.chinese: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining

name: later
trans: adv.后来，过一会儿，稍后，后来，迟到地，adj.更迟的，后面的

sentences.english: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
sentences.chinese: 我出去一会儿——回头见。

detailed_translations.english: after the time you are talking about or after the present time

name: nearby
trans: adj.附近的，adv.在附近，prep.在...附近

sentences.english: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.chinese: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.english: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

detailed_translations.english: not far away
a short distance from sb/sth; not far away

name: greatly
trans: adv.大大地，非常，很

sentences.english: All offers of help will be greatly appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 如蒙帮助，感激不尽。

sentences.english: The quality of health care varies greatly .
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务质量差别很大。

detailed_translations.english: extremely or very much

name: eighth
trans: num.第八，n.八分之一

sentences.english: Until then, students could leave after the eighth grade, and a lot of them did.
sentences.chinese: 那时，学生上完八年级就可以辍学，许多学生的确这样做了。

sentences.english: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

sentences.english: And this whole note obviously can be subdivided into two half notes and each of the half notes into two quarter notes each of these quarter notes into two eighth notes, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 这个全音符,很明显,可以再分为两个半音符,每个半音符又可以再细分为两个四分之一音符,每个四分之一音符可以再分为两个八分之一音符,等等

detailed_translations.english: one of eight equal parts of something
one of eight equal parts of something

name: bring
trans: vt.带来，引出，促使，劝诱，vi.产生

sentences.english: Did you bring an umbrella?
sentences.chinese: 你带伞了吗？

sentences.english: The senator’s speech brought an angry response from Civil Rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 那名参议员的话引起了一些民权组织的愤怒。

sentences.english: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
sentences.chinese: 黄金的发现把成千上万的人引到了德兰士瓦。

detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone with you to the place where you are now, or to the place you are talking about

name: compete
trans: vi.比，竞争，对抗

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: ring
trans: n.环形物(如圈、环等)，戒指，圈，铃声，vt.包围，挂铃铛，vi.鸣响，回响，在空气中螺旋上扬，形成圈，按铃

detailed_translations.english: a small square area surrounded by ropes, where people  box  or  wrestle

name: twinkle
trans: vi.闪烁，闪耀，使...闪耀，眨眼，迅速移动，n.闪烁，闪耀，眨眼瞬息

sentences.english: stars twinkling in the sky
sentences.chinese: 天空中闪烁的星星

sentences.english: I saw lights twinkling in the little town below us.
sentences.chinese: 我看到我们下面的小镇灯火闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: if a star or light twinkles, it shines in the dark with an unsteady light
an expression in your eyes that shows you are happy or amused

name: refute
trans: vt.驳斥，反驳，驳倒，证明

name: swarm
trans: n.一大群，蜂窝，vi.密集，云集，充满

sentences.chinese: 几分钟之内这个地方挤满了警官，他们开始搜查附近的一片树林。

a large group of insects, especially  bee s  ,moving together

name: conjunction
trans: n.接合，连接，连接词，关联，(事件等的)同时发生

sentences.english: The conjunction of low inflation and low unemployment came as a very pleasant surprise.
sentences.chinese: 低通货膨胀与低失业的同时出现是一大惊喜。

sentences.english: The two clauses are joined by a conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 这两个分句由一个连词连在一起.

detailed_translations.english: a combination of events, etc., that causes a particular result

name: vest
trans: n.汗衫，背心，马甲，内衣，vt.授予，给予，使穿衣，vi.(权力、财产等)归于，穿衣服

sentences.english: a bulletproof vest
sentences.chinese: 防弹背心

detailed_translations.english: a piece of underwear without sleeves that you wear on the top half of your body

name: stimulate
trans: vt.刺激，激励，激发，鼓舞vi.起刺激作用

sentences.english: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

name: boat
trans: n.小船，艇，渔船，船型物体，vt.放于船上，vi.划船

sentences.english: a fishing boat
sentences.chinese: 渔船

sentences.english: The boat capsized (=  turned over  ) in heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 船在波涛汹涌的大海上倾覆了。

sentences.english: a boat trip around the islands
sentences.chinese: 乘船环岛旅行

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that travels across water

name: squeeze
trans: vt.，&，vi.榨，挤，压榨，挤压，塞进，n.压榨，勒索，榨取

sentences.english: She smiled as he squeezed her hand.
sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

detailed_translations.english: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 挤； 握手； 拮据， 紧缺
detailed_translations.english: an act of pressing something firmly with your fingers or hand

name: beyond
trans: adv.在更远处，另外，n.远处，来世，prep.在...的那边，超出，越过，另外

sentences.english: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.english: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.english: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.chinese: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

name: proud
trans: adj.骄傲的，自豪的，壮观的

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骄傲的；自负的〔含贬义〕；自豪的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

name: fan
trans: n.(运动等)狂热爱好者，风扇，扇形物，vt.风选，煽，吹，煽动，向扇子一样展开，vi.像扇子一样行动，鱼贯而出

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

name: navy
trans: n.海军，船队，深蓝色

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

name: difficulty
trans: n.困难，争议，反对，麻烦，难事，困境

sentences.english: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.english: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

detailed_translations.english: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do

name: temple
trans: n.圣堂，神殿，庙宇，寺院

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: award
trans: n.奖，奖品，判定，vi.授予，给予，vt.授予

sentences.english: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The movie has won a number of awards.
sentences.chinese: 该片获得了多个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done

name: country
trans: n.国家，国土，农村，adj.国家(的)，农村(的)

sentences.english: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.english: developing countries
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家

sentences.english: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.chinese: 到国外旅行

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to live in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想住在乡下。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

name: play
trans: vi.玩，游戏，演奏，进行比，播放，捉弄，假装，n.游戏，游玩，剧本，比，比，，中的动作，影响

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: cat
trans: n.猫，猫科，猫皮，邪恶的女人，吊锚机，单帆小船，vt.吊锚，vi.寻找性交伴侣，(CAT)电子计算机横断层扫描

sentences.english: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.
sentences.chinese: 警方跟他玩了一场精心布局的猫捉老鼠游戏，诱他落网。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with four legs that people often keep as a pet

name: vacant
trans: adj.空的，空虚的，木然的，未被占用的

sentences.english: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.chinese: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.english: There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.chinese: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

detailed_translations.english: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use

name: issue
trans: n.问题，争论点，发行，发行物，期刊号，vi.，&，vt.发行，流出，造成...结果

sentences.english: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.english: a warning issued by the Surgeon General
sentences.chinese: （美国）卫生局局长发出的警告

detailed_translations.chinese: 发行； 分发， 发出
detailed_translations.english: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people

name: use
trans: vt.用，使用，利用，耗费，对待，v.<口>吸(烟)，服用(毒品)，n.用运用，用法，使用权，价值

sentences.english: Can I use your phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.english: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.chinese: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.english: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.english: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.chinese: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.english: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.chinese: 她用化名预订了航班。

detailed_translations.english: if you use a particular tool, method, service, ability etc, you do something with that tool, by means of that method etc, for a particular purpose

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用， 应用； 用途， 效用
detailed_translations.english: the action or fact of using something

name: undoubtedly
trans: adv.无容置疑，肯定地

sentences.chinese: 这无疑是重要的。

sentences.english: While such ways of traveling certainly have their benefits, there are also undoubtedly some disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 这种旅行方式当然有它们的长处所在，但毫无疑问也有一些缺憾。

trans: adj.给予帮助的，有用的，有益的

sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

trans: adv.共同，一起，adj.妥当的，镇定的

sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

name: naughty
trans: adj.顽皮的，淘气的，粗俗的

sentences.english: You’re a very naughty boy! Look what you’ve done!
sentences.chinese: 你真是个淘气鬼！瞧你干了些什么！

detailed_translations.english: a naughty child does not obey adults and behaves badly

name: automatic
trans: adj.自动的，机械的，半自动化的，n.自动装置，半自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的； 必然发生的； 无意识的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process

name: radio
trans: n.无线电，收音机，v.用无线电通讯

sentences.chinese: 我们和这架飞机失去了无线电联络。

sentences.english: I sat down and turned on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来打开收音机。

detailed_translations.english: when messages are sent or received in this way

name: organ
trans: n.器官，机构，管风琴，机关报刊

sentences.english: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.chinese: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.english: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.chinese: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.english: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.english: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.chinese: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

detailed_translations.english: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose

name: pole
trans: n.杆，柱，极(点)，磁极，电极，vt.跳，支撑，vi.用篙撑船

sentences.english: a telephone pole
sentences.chinese: 电话线杆

detailed_translations.english: a long stick or post usually made of wood or metal, often set upright in the ground to support something
to push a boat along in the water using a pole

name: contribute
trans: vt.捐献，捐助，投稿，vi.投稿，贡献，是原因之一

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

name: relation
trans: n.关系，联系，家属，亲戚，参考，陈述，故事

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

name: dead
trans: adj.死的，无生命的，萧条的，精疲力竭的，用完的，无趣的，adv.完全地，突然地，直接地，n.死者，死

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.english: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.chinese: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

sentences.english: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.chinese: 她父母早就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer alive

name: unsatisfactory
trans: adj.不能令人满意的

sentences.english: an unsatisfactory situation
sentences.chinese: 让人不满意的状况

detailed_translations.chinese: 不令人满意的；不满足的；不符合要求的
detailed_translations.english: not good enough or not acceptable

name: kiss
trans: vt.吻，轻触，vi.接吻，轻触，n.吻，蛋白小饼干，小糖果

sentences.english: Maggie leaned forward and kissed her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉俯身吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.english: Georgina took him in her arms and kissed him on the lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔治娜抱住他，吻他的嘴唇。

sentences.english: Jim and Mary kissed (= they kissed each other ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和玛丽接了吻。

detailed_translations.english: to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
an act of kissing

name: away
trans: adv.离开，远离，出去，连续的，遥远地，...去，adj.远离

sentences.english: Go away!
sentences.chinese: 走开！

sentences.english: Dinah was crying as she drove slowly away.
sentences.chinese: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone leaves a place or person, or stays some distance from a place or person

name: Russian
trans: adj.，俄国的，俄罗斯的，n.俄国人，俄语

sentences.english: ...the Russian parliament.
sentences.chinese: ...俄罗斯国会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Russia, its people, or its language
someone from Russia

name: teach
trans: vt.讲，教育，教，教书，教导，教训，vi.给予指导

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

name: snowstorm
trans: n.雪暴，暴风雪

sentences.english: The snowstorm added to our difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雪增加了我们的困难。

sentences.english: From beneath, it was at times like gazing into a snowstorm. It was hard not to think of souls.
sentences.chinese: 从下面往上看时，就像在暴风雪中抬头看到的一样，让人不禁想起了逝去的那些亡灵。

sentences.english: I step outside the house and nothing can stop me—the late season snowstorm, the puddle of standing water at the bottom of my porch steps that will never evaporate, the mud and muck this season brings.
sentences.chinese: 我踏出家门，没有任何事情能阻挡我——深冬季节的暴风雪、我家门廊台阶上那永远挥散不去的雨水坑，还有这个季节带来的烂泥和污秽。

detailed_translations.english: a storm with strong winds and a lot of snow

name: pistol
trans: n.手枪，vt.用手枪射击

sentences.english: He threatened to pistol me.
sentences.chinese: 他威胁要用手枪向我射击。

sentences.english: He stowed a small pistol in her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 他在她的手袋里藏了一把小手枪。

sentences.english: He hopped back up the stairs and took his pistol.
sentences.chinese: 他赶紧返回到楼上，拿上了他的手枪。

detailed_translations.english: a small gun you can use with one hand

name: tall
trans: adj.高的，身材高的，难以置信的，难以办成的，夸大的，adv.夸大地

sentences.english: He was young and tall.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，身材高大。

sentences.english: a house surrounded by tall trees
sentences.chinese: 大树环绕的房子

sentences.english: This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的
detailed_translations.english: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

name: nephew
trans: n.侄子，外甥

sentences.english: I am planning a 25th birthday party for my nephew.
sentences.chinese: 我正在为侄子筹划他25岁的生日聚会。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your brother or sister, or the son of your husband’s or wife’s brother or sister

name: oneself
trans: pron.自己，亲自

sentences.english: One likes to do it oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人都喜欢亲自去做。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize one

name: racial
trans: adj.种族的，人种的

sentences.english: a victim of racial discrimination
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的受害者

sentences.english: This part of the community needs to be protected from racial prejudice .
sentences.chinese: 需保护社区里的这一部分人，使其免受种族偏见的伤害。

sentences.english: evidence of racial harassment
sentences.chinese: 种族骚扰的证据

sentences.english: the campaign for racial equality
sentences.chinese: 争取种族平等的运动

sentences.english: the need for tolerance and racial harmony
sentences.chinese: 包容与种族融洽的必要性

detailed_translations.english: relating to the relationships between different races of people who now live in the same country or area

name: imitate
trans: vt.模仿，仿效，仿制

sentences.english: She was a splendid mimic and loved to imitate Winston Churchill.

name: bush
trans: n.灌木，灌木丛，矮树，荒野，狐狸尾巴，vt.，用灌木保护或支撑加衬套于，vi.成灌木形，丛生，adj.长得低矮的，二流的

sentences.english: a rose bush
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰丛

如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

trans: 动词bear的过去分词，adj.天生的，出生的，与生俱来的

trans: n.基础，根据，建立，地基，基金

sentences.english: the British Heart Foundation
sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

name: shore
trans: n.滨，岸，国家，陆地，斜撑柱，vt.(up)支撑，支持

sentences.chinese: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.english: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.chinese: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.english: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.chinese: 她开始朝岸边游去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住

the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake

name: hers
trans: pron.她的(所有物)

sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.english: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.english: The idea was hers.

trans: n.(集体)宿舍

sentences.chinese: 但是我在宿舍没有东西可吃，所以我只能去餐厅了。

sentences.chinese: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.english: If you have a phone in your dorm or apartment, a cell phone, and any other phone numbers, consolidate them into one number with Google Voice.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有宿舍或公寓的号码、手机号码，还有其他什么电话号码，可以通过谷歌声音把它们集成为一个号码。

detailed_translations.english: a  dormitory

trans: n.谋杀，凶杀，危险物，vt.谋杀，凶杀，折磨，损坏，vi.谋杀，凶杀

sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder.
sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.chinese: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.english: Police are searching for the murder weapon.
sentences.chinese: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.english: He was convicted of murdering a policeman.

detailed_translations.english: the crime of deliberately killing someone
to kill someone deliberately and illegally

name: campaign
trans: n.战役，运动，活动，vt.参加竞，vi.(从事、组织)活动

sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.english: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement

name: illegal
trans: adj.不合法的，非法的，n.非法移民

sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

name: recommend
trans: vt.推荐，介绍，劝告，建议，使成为可取，使受欢迎

sentences.chinese: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

trans: pron.无论什么，adj.不管怎样的，adv.无论如何，不管怎样

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

trans: adj.大气的，大气层的，制造气氛的

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth’s atmosphere

name: sideways
trans: adv.斜着，斜向一边地，向傍边，斜地里，向侧面地，adj.傍边的向侧面的

sentences.chinese: 有轨电车的脚步声淹没了带有香波的火腿汉堡。

sentences.chinese: 来自有轨电车的流浪者用洗发水淹没火腿汉堡。

sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

sentences.chinese: 她给出了这个单词的法语发音。

name: wicked
trans: adj.坏的，令人厌恶的，邪恶的，缺德的，adv.极端地，非常地，vt.吸收

sentences.chinese: 《糖果屋》中那个恶毒的继母

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is morally wrong

sentences.chinese: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.chinese: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

detailed_translations.english: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features

sentences.chinese: 晚上我们被雷声惊醒。

detailed_translations.english: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning

sentences.chinese: 她用吸管吸着柠檬水。

name: equipment

sentences.chinese: 出售露营装备的商店

sentences.chinese: 一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.english: a very useful piece of equipment
sentences.chinese: 一件非常有用的设备

sentences.english: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新医院的装备花费巨大。

detailed_translations.english: the tools, machines etc that you need to do a particular job or activity

name: strengthen
trans: vt.加强，变坚固，巩固

sentences.english: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
sentences.chinese: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.english: Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.english: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger or make something stronger

name: madam

sentences.chinese: 有人接待您吗，夫人？

detailed_translations.english: used to address a woman in a polite way, especially a customer in a shop

name: helpless
trans: adj.无助的，无能的，无依靠的

sentences.chinese: 他开始觉得沮丧、无助。

sentences.english: a vicious attack on a helpless victim
sentences.chinese: 对无助受害者的残暴攻击

sentences.chinese: 纽曼伸出手做了个无助的手势。

detailed_translations.english: unable to look after yourself or to do anything to help yourself

name: lab

sentences.english: the school science lab
sentences.chinese: 学校的科学实验室

detailed_translations.english: a laboratory

name: reproduce
trans: vt.，&，vi.繁殖，生殖，再生，复制

sentences.english: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的书里翻印了克里木特的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: to make a photograph or printed copy of something

name: steam
trans: n.蒸汽，水蒸气，vi.蒸发，蒸，冒热气，vt.蒸

sentences.chinese: 水蒸气从热腾腾的浴缸里升起。

if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

name: camera

sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

name: acute

sentences.chinese: 幼儿的嗅觉特别灵敏。

detailed_translations.english: acute senses such as hearing, taste, touch etc are very good and sensitive

name: get

sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.english: It would be a good idea to get professional advice.
sentences.chinese: 征求专业人士的意见，这个主意很好。

sentences.english: You may be able to get a grant from the local authority.
sentences.chinese: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.english: He cleared his throat to get our attention.
sentences.chinese: 他清清嗓子来引起我们的注意。

sentences.english: What time will we get there?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候可以到那里？

sentences.english: We got to Paris that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我们到了巴黎。

sentences.english: She soon got bored with the job.
sentences.chinese: 她不久就厌倦了这份工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 获得，得到；到达；变成，成为
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it

name: importance
trans: n.重要，重要性

sentences.english: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being important

name: oil
trans: n.油，石油，油画颜料，奉承话，vt.加油于，涂油，溶化

sentences.english: a rise in the price of oil
sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.english: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.chinese: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.english: an oil refinery
sentences.chinese: 炼油厂

sentences.english: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced
to put oil onto part of a machine or part of something that moves, to help it to move or work more smoothly

name: Indian
trans: adj.印度的，印度人的，印第安人的，n.印度人，印第安人

sentences.english: the Indian government
sentences.chinese: 印度政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to India or its people
someone from India

name: expert
trans: n.专家，能手，adj.熟练的，内行的，vi.当专家

sentences.english: ...a yoga expert.
sentences.chinese: …一位瑜伽专家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a special skill or special knowledge of a subject, gained as a result of training or experience

name: sober
trans: adj.清醒的，适度的，沉着冷静的，稳重的，颜色暗淡的，vt.使清醒，使沉着，vi.清醒，冷静下来

sentences.english: He’s a nice guy when he’s sober.
sentences.chinese: 他没喝醉时是个不错的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: not drunk

name: sometimes
trans: adv.不时，有时，间或

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

name: outskirt
trans: n.外边，郊区

sentences.english: The hotel is situated in the outskirt of the city.
sentences.chinese: 这个酒店位于城市的郊区,是全城最好的酒店之一。

detailed_translations.english: a part of the city far removed from the center

name: opinion
trans: n.意见，看法，主张，判断

sentences.english: What’s your opinion of Cathy?
sentences.chinese: 你对凯茜的看法如何？

detailed_translations.english: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

name: plentiful
trans: adj.丰富的，富裕的，多的

sentences.english: a plentiful supply of food
sentences.chinese: 食物的大量供应

detailed_translations.english: more than enough in quantity

name: cement
trans: n.水泥，胶泥，纽带，接合剂，牙骨质，补牙物，基石，vt.粘结，接合用水泥涂，vi.接合起来

sentences.english: a bag of cement
sentences.chinese: 一袋水泥

sentences.english: Most artificial joints are cemented into place.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分人造关节是被黏结复位的。

detailed_translations.english: a grey powder made from  lime  and clay that becomes hard when it is mixed with water and allowed to dry, and that is used in building
to join two things together using cement , glue, etc.

name: tenant
trans: n.承担人，房客，佃户，占用者，vt.租借，租赁

sentences.english: The desk was left by the previous tenant.
sentences.chinese: 书桌是上一个房客留下来的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives in a house, room etc and pays rent to the person who owns it

name: aural
trans: adj.耳的，听觉的

sentences.english: an aural stimulus
sentences.chinese: 听觉刺激

detailed_translations.chinese: 听觉的；耳的；气味的；先兆的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sense of hearing, or someone’s ability to understand sounds

name: stress
trans: n.压力，紧张，重音，负载，vt.着重，强调，vi.强调，着重

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

name: aunt
trans: n.伯母，婶母，姑母，姨

sentences.english: Aunt Mary
sentences.chinese: 玛丽姑妈

detailed_translations.english: the sister of your father or mother, or the wife of your father’s or mother’s brother

name: joyful
trans: adj.十分喜悦的，快乐的

sentences.english: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是令人喜悦的爱情庆典。

detailed_translations.english: very happy, or likely to make people very happy

name: but
trans: adv.仅仅，只，conj.但是，可是，prep.除...以外，pron.只有

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

name: jew
trans: n.犹太人

name: yell
trans: vi.叫喊，n.大喊

sentences.english: ‘Help me!’ she yelled hysterically.
sentences.chinese: “救救我！”她歇斯底里地大叫。

sentences.english: I yelled out, ‘Here I am!’
sentences.chinese: 我大声喊道:“我在这儿！”

sentences.english: The crowd are on their feet yelling.
sentences.chinese: 观众站着高声呐喊。

sentences.english: He could hear Pete yelling at the top of his voice (= very loudly ).
sentences.chinese: 他听到皮特声嘶力竭地在喊叫。

detailed_translations.english: to shout or say something very loudly, especially because you are frightened, angry, or excited
a loud shout

name: bureau
trans: n.局，司，处，社，所，办公处

sentences.english: an employment bureau
sentences.chinese: 职业介绍所

sentences.english: the Citizens Advice Bureau
sentences.chinese: 公民咨询局

detailed_translations.english: an office or organization that collects or provides information

name: anyway
trans: adv.无论如何，不管怎样

sentences.english: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement

name: furnace
trans: n.炉子，熔炉，鼓风炉，闷热地带，严峻考验

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.english: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.
sentences.chinese: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流。

sentences.english: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.chinese: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal

name: destruction
trans: n.破坏，毁灭，消灭，破坏者

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["weapons of mass destruction"]}
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

sentences.english: The floods brought death and destruction to the area.
sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of destroying something or of being destroyed

name: distant
trans: adj.在远处的，疏远的，疏远的，远房的，陌生的，远行的

sentences.english: the sound of distant gunfire
sentences.chinese: 远处的炮火声

sentences.english: Her honeymoon seemed a distant memory.
sentences.chinese: 她的蜜月似乎成了遥远的记忆。

sentences.english: That affair was in the dim and distant past (= a long time ago ) .
sentences.chinese: 那件事已成为遥远的过去了。

sentences.english: The President hopes to visit Ireland in the not too distant future (= quite soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 总统希望在不久的将来访问爱尔兰。

sentences.english: After the quarrel Sue remained cold and distant.
sentences.chinese: 那次争吵之后，休一直冷淡疏远。

detailed_translations.english: far away in space or time

name: kindness
trans: n.仁慈，好意

sentences.english: I can’t thank you enough for your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 你的好意我感激不尽。

detailed_translations.english: kind behaviour towards someone

name: or
trans: conj.或，或者，即，还是，否则

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

name: hope
trans: n.，&vt.，&vi.希望，abbr.=Health，Opportunity，for，People，Everywhere世界健康基金会

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

name: cancer
trans: n.癌，癌症，肿瘤，巨蟹座

sentences.english: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.english: She was told last year that she had cancer .
sentences.chinese: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.english: He died of cancer last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月他死于癌症。

sentences.english: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 一种能有效杀死癌细胞的新疗法

detailed_translations.english: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal

name: frame
trans: n.框架，框子，构架

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

name: lack
trans: vi.，&，vi.，&n.缺乏，不足，无

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

name: weld
trans: vt.焊接，熔接，使结合，n.焊接，焊缝

sentences.english: The new handle will have to be welded on.
sentences.chinese: 新的把手得焊上去。

detailed_translations.english: to join metals by melting their edges and pressing them together when they are hot
a joint that is made by welding two pieces of metal together

name: action
trans: n.，起诉，行动，作用，功能，情节，活动

sentences.english: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

detailed_translations.english: the process of doing something, especially in order to achieve a particular thing

name: however
trans: adv.然而，不管怎样conj.然而，可是，不过

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

name: police
trans: n.警察，警察当局，警方，vt.管辖，维持治安

sentences.english: Police surrounded the courthouse.
sentences.chinese: 警察围在法院大楼四周。

sentences.english: Quick! Call the police!
sentences.chinese: 快报警！

detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an official organization whose job is to catch criminals and make sure that people obey the law

name: basin
trans: n.盆，洗脸盆，盆地，流域，水池

sentences.english: a wash basin
sentences.chinese: 洗脸盆

sentences.english: Fill the basin with the cake mixture.
sentences.chinese: 在盆里装入蛋糕拌料。

sentences.english: countries around the Pacific Basin
sentences.chinese: 太平洋盆地周围的国家

detailed_translations.english: a round container attached to the wall in a bathroom, where you wash your hands and face

name: tremble
trans: vi.发抖，哆嗦，摇动，战悚，忧虑，微动，n.战悚，颤抖

sentences.english: His lip started to tremble and then he started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴唇开始颤抖，接着就哭了起来。

sentences.english: I will never forget the look on the patient's face, the tremble in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 我将永远不会忘记那病人脸上的表情和他颤抖的手。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened
Tremble is also a noun

name: tight
trans: adj.紧的，紧身的，严厉的，密集的，拮据的，adv.紧紧地，牢固地迅速地

sentences.english: tight jeans
sentences.chinese: 紧身牛仔裤

sentences.english: My shoes were so tight that I could hardly walk.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子很紧，我几乎不能走路。

sentences.english: The jacket is rather a tight fit (= it fits too tightly ) .
sentences.chinese: 这件夹克衫太紧了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的
detailed_translations.english: tight clothes fit your body very closely, especially in a way that is uncomfortable
very firmly or closely

name: will
trans: aux.v.将要，会，愿，必须，n.意志，决心，愿望，遗嘱，vt.决心，想要(某事发生)，将(财产)遗赠，规定，vi.，行使意志力，选择

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

name: balance
trans: vt.使平衡，称，称重量，权衡，抵消，vi.建立平衡，均衡，n.天平平衡，差额，平静，调和，制衡

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: worker
trans: n.工人，工作者，人员

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class

name: fellow
trans: n.人，家伙，伙伴，朋友，同类，校董，研究生，adj.同类的，同事的同伴的

sentences.english: Paul’s an easy-going sort of fellow.
sentences.chinese: 保罗人很随和。

detailed_translations.english: a man

name: simplicity
trans: n.简单，简易，朴素，单纯，简朴

sentences.english: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
sentences.chinese: 莫娜的文笔朴实优美。

sentences.english: For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.chinese: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.english: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being simple and not complicated, especially when this is attractive or useful

name: breed
trans: n.品种，族类，vt.使繁殖，养育，繁殖，引起，vi.繁殖

sentences.english: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.english: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate in order to have babies

name: clap
trans: vi.拍手，砰的一声，突然离开，vt.拍，轻拍，轻敲，鼓掌，击掌，急速放置，n.拍手，拍手声，一阵强风

sentences.english: One man began to clap, and others joined in.
sentences.chinese: 一个人鼓起了掌，其他人也跟着鼓掌。

sentences.english: The couple were cheered and clapped on their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抵达时人群为他们欢呼鼓掌。

sentences.english: The audience clapped politely but without much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 观众礼貌地鼓了掌，但并不热烈。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your hands against each other many times to make a sound that shows your approval, agreement, or enjoyment
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

name: sir
trans: n.先生，阁下，...爵士

sentences.english: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.english: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.chinese: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.english: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.chinese: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect

name: ready
trans: adj.准备好的，愿意的，情愿的，现成的，vt.做好...的准备

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?

trans: vt.使旋转，疾驰，纺织，结网，眩晕，n.旋转，纺织，眩晕，疾驰

sentences.chinese: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

sentences.chinese: 她坐在窗前纺线。

trans: adv.机械地

sentences.english: Start your creative engine mechanically - One of the biggest misconceptions about creative work is that it can only be done when inspiration strikes.
sentences.chinese: 机械地启动你的创造引擎—— 最大的错误观念之一就是创造性的工作只能在灵感闪现的时候进行。

name: lift
trans: vt.提起，提高，升高，举起，还清，取消，偷窃，运送，vi.，提升，n.电梯，举起，帮助，提升，电梯，载货量，扒窃，搭便车

sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

sentences.english: They took the lift down to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯去楼下的酒吧。

sentences.english: It’s on the 3rd floor. Let’s use the lift.

detailed_translations.english: to move something or someone upwards into the air
a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

name: dusk
trans: n.薄暮，黄昏，幽暗，vi.(天)变黑，变暗，vt.把…变黑变暗，adj.颜色暗沉的，昏暗的

sentences.chinese: 街灯在黄昏时亮起来。

trans: n.化学，化学性质，相互作用

detailed_translations.english: the science that is concerned with studying the structure of substances and the way that they change or combine with each other

name: discharge
trans: vt.，vi.释放，排出，放出，解雇，解除，放电，清偿债务，n.释放，卸货，放电，一股，一阵，开火，发射，准许离开

sentences.english: Sewage is discharged directly into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 污水被直接排放到海里。

sentences.english: the discharge of toxic waste into the sea

trans: adj.足够的，充分的

sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

trans: n.星期三

sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

trans: vt.建议，暗示，启发，要求

sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

name: vapour
trans: n.汽，蒸气，雾气，v.蒸发，吹嘘，=vapor(英)

detailed_translations.english: a mass of very small drops of a liquid which float in the air, for example because the liquid has been heated

trans: adj.神圣的，圣洁的，令人敬仰的

sentences.chinese: 圣城瓦拉纳西

detailed_translations.english: connected with God and religion

name: lower
trans: adj.，较低的，低的，下级的，下层的，vt.，放下，降低，跌落，减弱贬低，vi.，皱眉，降低，阴沉，变少，n.，皱眉，下级，阴沉的样子，前兆

sentences.chinese: 周末气温会下降。

sentences.english: She lowered her newspaper and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她放低报纸往四下看了看。

detailed_translations.english: smaller in number or amount
to let or make sth/sb go down

name: theatre
trans: n.戏院，戏剧，教室，=theater

sentences.english: an open-air theatre (= a theatre that is outside )

sentences.english: the Mercury Theater
sentences.chinese: 水星剧院

detailed_translations.english: a building or place with a stage where plays and shows are performed

name: bay
trans: adj.，红棕色，n.，湾，海湾，山脉中的凹处，红棕色，隔间，配电间犬吠，围困，月桂树，名望，vi.，嗥叫，vt.，吼叫着追赶或进攻，哀号把...围困住

sentences.chinese: 能看到海湾全景的一幢房子

sentences.english: Montego Bay

trans: adv.，早已，已经

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people

trans: adj.强烈的，紧张的，剧烈的，热情的，激烈的

sentences.chinese: 酒架

sentences.english: a magazine rack

sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

trans: n.(突然)巨响，枪声，猛击，重击，刘海，vt.重击，大声敲，剪成刘海，vi.大声敲击，发出巨响，adv.正好地，准确地

sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦提出了相对论的新学说。

sentences.chinese: 每个人都在谈论相对论，不仅仅是科学家，甚至哲学家和报纸的专栏作者也是如此。

sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

name: literary

name: proportion

sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

name: unlike
trans: adj.不同的，不相似的，prep.不象...，和...不同

sentences.chinese: 他们两位都是教师；除此之外他们迥然不同。

sentences.english: Music is quite unlike any other art form.
sentences.chinese: 音乐与其他艺术形式迥然不同。

detailed_translations.english: not alike
completely different from a particular person or thing

name: baggage
trans: n.行李

sentences.english: Check your baggage in at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 在服务台托运行李。

detailed_translations.english: the cases, bags, boxes etc carried by someone who is travelling

name: transformation
trans: n.变化，改造，转变，转型，转化

sentences.english: In recent years, the movie industry has undergone a dramatic transformation .
sentences.chinese: 近些年，电影业经历了巨大的变革。

detailed_translations.english: a complete change in someone or something

name: difficult
trans: adj.困难的，难对付的，(人)难取悦的，难相处的

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

name: alive
trans: adj.，活着的，有活力，活跃的

sentences.chinese: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.english: My grandparents are still alive .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母和外祖父母都还健在。

sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃浆果活命。

sentences.chinese: 他靠生命维持装置活着。

sentences.chinese: 看来他还健在，住在巴西。
