name: crop
trans: n.农作物，庄稼，收成，一熟，一群，平头，vt.割掉，修剪，剪短，收割，使谷物生长，vi.啃青草，种植谷物

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.english: crops grown for market
sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.english: Fruit growers are gathering in a bumper crop (= a very large amount of something produced in season ) .
sentences.chinese: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农作物，庄稼；一熟：一季的收成
detailed_translations.english: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

name: shine
trans: vi.照耀，发光，表现出众，闪耀着，vt.使发光，照射在...上，擦亮，n.光，光泽，阳光，光辉，喜欢

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

name: ignorant
trans: adj.不知道的，无知的，愚昧的

sentences.english: an ignorant and uneducated man
sentences.chinese: 不学无术的人

detailed_translations.english: not knowing facts or information that you ought to know

name: speed
trans: n.快，速率，速度，迅速，vi.快行，加速，急行

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

name: terror
trans: n.恐怖，惊骇，<口>令人惧怕或讨厌的人或事物

sentences.english: There was a look of sheer terror (= complete terror ) on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上的表情异常惊恐。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of extreme fear

name: imaginary
trans: adj.想象中的，假想的，虚构的

sentences.english: As she listened, she played an imaginary piano on her knees.
sentences.chinese: 她边听边在膝盖上作弹钢琴状。

sentences.english: We must protect older people from harm, whether it is real or imaginary.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须保护老人免受伤害，无论这伤害是真实的还是假想的。

detailed_translations.english: not real, but produced from pictures or ideas in your mind

name: do
trans: aux.v.vt.，&，vi.做，干，办

sentences.english: ‘Will Kay come?’ ‘She may do.’
sentences.chinese: “凯来吗？” “或许吧。”

sentences.english: So now you know as much as I do.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在你知道的和我一样多了。

sentences.english: ‘You forgot all about it.’ ‘No, I didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你把这事忘记得一干二净。” “没有，我没忘记。”

sentences.english: ‘I want to go home.’ ‘So do I.’
sentences.chinese: “我想回家。” “我也是。”

sentences.english: I didn’t believe the story and neither did he.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信这个故事，他也不信。

detailed_translations.english: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used
used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used

name: four
trans: num.四，四个，第四，fourteen，num.十四，第十四

sentences.english: She is married with four children.
sentences.chinese: 她已婚，有四个孩子。

sentences.english: They arrived just after four (= four o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

sentences.english: Luke will soon be four (= four years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢克很快就要四岁了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 4

name: receive
trans: vt.收到，得到，接待，接受，迎接，容纳，遭受，相信，vi.接到，获得

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.english: If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.chinese: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.english: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.chinese: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

detailed_translations.english: to be given something

name: daring
trans: adj.大胆的，勇敢的，n.冒险精神

sentences.english: a daring rescue attempt
sentences.chinese: 大胆的营救行动

detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of risk or danger, or brave enough to do risky things
courage that makes you willing to take risks

name: queue
trans: n.行列，长队，vi.排队等候

sentences.english: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.chinese: 你得排队。

sentences.english: Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.chinese: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

detailed_translations.english: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere

name: assure
trans: vt.使确信，向...保证，保险，保证，确信，担保

sentences.english: The document is genuine, I can assure you .
sentences.chinese: 我能向你保证，这文件是真的。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried

name: voice
trans: n.说话声，声音，嗓音，意见，[语]语态，意见，发言权，vt.表达，发音，调整声音

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

name: crane
trans: n.起重机，摄影升降机，鹤，v.引颈，伸长(脖子)，vt.伸长(脖子等)

sentences.english: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.chinese: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.english: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.english: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

detailed_translations.english: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better

name: trust
trans: n.信任，信托，vt.相信，委托，vi.信任

sentences.english: At first there was a lack of trust between them.
sentences.chinese: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.english: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.chinese: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.english: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.chinese: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.english: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

detailed_translations.english: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

name: enjoy
trans: vt.，&，vi.享受，欣赏，喜爱

sentences.english: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.english: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

detailed_translations.english: to get pleasure from something

name: grandson
trans: n.孙子，外孙子

sentences.english: My grandson's birthday was on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 我孙子的生日是星期二。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your son or daughter

name: resist
trans: vt.，&，vi.抵抗，抵制，耐得住，压制，n.保护膜

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept sth and try to stop it from happening

name: stream
trans: n.河，(人，车，气)流，水流，组，vi.，&，vt.流，流出，飘动，接踵而来

sentences.english: Tears streamed down their faces.
sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts
a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

name: dry
trans: adj.干的，干燥的，干旱的，不行于色的，枯燥无味的，无酒的，口渴的，vt.把...弄干，vi.(使)变干

sentences.english: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.english: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.chinese: 这条小道很干燥。

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

name: important
trans: adj.重要的，影响很大的，有势力的

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.chinese: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.english: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.english: a very important customer
sentences.chinese: 一位大客户

detailed_translations.english: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future

name: slipper
trans: n.拖鞋，便鞋

sentences.english: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 不应在实验室穿著拖鞋。

sentences.english: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.chinese: 那个男孩不管她怎么哀求，还是拿着那只大拖鞋跑开了。

sentences.english: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚很疼，不过我很小心地把它伸进一只大拖鞋里。

detailed_translations.english: a light soft shoe that you wear at home

name: size
trans: n.大小，体积，尺码，尺寸，vt.按大小排列(或分类)，用...，填充(某物)，adj.一定大小的

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

name: bacteria
trans: n.(复数)细菌

sentences.english: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.english: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

sentences.english: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.chinese: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

detailed_translations.english: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease

name: weekly
trans: adj.每周的，一周一次的，周刊的，adv.每周，一周一次，n.周刊周报

sentences.english: The group meets weekly.
sentences.chinese: 小组每周见面一次。

detailed_translations.english: Weekly is also an adverb
happening or done every week

name: drawer
trans: n.抽屉

sentences.english: She took a file from her desk drawer .
sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

name: prohibit
trans: vt.禁止，阻止，妨碍

sentences.english: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
sentences.chinese: 厂区严禁吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed

name: assemble
trans: vt.集合，召集，装配，vi.集合，聚集

sentences.english: A large crowd had assembled outside the American embassy.
sentences.chinese: 一大群人聚集在美国大使馆外。

sentences.english: He looked around at the assembled company (=  all the people who had come there  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他环顾四周聚集的人群。

sentences.english: She had assembled a collection of her favourite songs.
sentences.chinese: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢听的歌。

sentences.english: The aircraft will continue to be assembled in France.
sentences.chinese: 飞机将继续在法国组装。

detailed_translations.english: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose

name: rod
trans: n.杆，竿，棒，戒鞭，测量杆，视网膜，杆状菌

sentences.english: a measuring rod
sentences.chinese: 测量杆

detailed_translations.english: a long thin pole or bar

name: tenth
trans: num.第十，十分之一，n.第十，十分之一

sentences.english: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚发表了他的第十本小说。

sentences.english: Not because she lost, in fact she just won her last election to her tenth term by a landslide.
sentences.chinese: 不只因为她的失败，事实上她只是由于占绝对优势的选举赢得第十期最后的选举。

sentences.english: Many already go for the second option: one-tenth of remittances to Africa come from within the continent.
sentences.chinese: 很多人已经选择第二个选择了：十分之一汇向非洲国家的汇款来自欧洲国家。

detailed_translations.english: one of ten equal parts of something
one of ten equal parts of something

name: then
trans: adv.当时，然后，那么，而且，adj.当时的，n.当时

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

name: contemporary
trans: adj.当代的，同时代的，同时的，现代的，n.同时代的人

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

name: load
trans: vt.装，装满，装载，装填，担负，给(枪)装子弹，[计算机]，装入，n.负载，负荷，重担，装载量

sentences.english: Have you finished loading up?
sentences.chinese: 你装完货了吗？

sentences.english: It took an hour to load the van.
sentences.chinese: 给小型货车装货花了一小时。

sentences.english: Will you help me load the dishwasher?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把碗碟放进洗碗机好吗？

sentences.english: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机载满燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container
a large quantity of something that is carried by a vehicle, person etc

name: care
trans: n.小心，照料，忧虑，慎思，焦虑因素，vi.关心，介意，照顾，喜爱，vt.介意，希望，abbr.=Cooperative，for，American，Remittances，to，Europe，汇款到欧洲合作社

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: broadcast
trans: n.广播，广播节目，播音，adj.广播的，vt.，&，vi.广播，adv.经广播，四散地

sentences.english: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

detailed_translations.chinese: 播送，播放；（无线电或电视）广播；播撒（种子）
detailed_translations.english: to send out radio or television programmes
a programme on the radio or on television

name: regular
trans: adj.规则的，有规律的，整齐的，正规的

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

name: conquest
trans: n.攻取，征服，克服

sentences.english: the Norman Conquest (= the conquest of England by the Normans )
sentences.chinese: 诺曼征服

detailed_translations.english: the act of getting control of a country by fighting

name: goal
trans: n.球门，得分，目的，终点

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

name: due
trans: adj.预期的，应给的，到期的，应有的，预定的，n.应得物

sentences.english: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.chinese: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

name: meal
trans: n.膳食，一餐，谷物粗粉，vi.进餐

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

name: thirsty
trans: adj.口渴的，渴望的

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的
detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want or need a drink

name: national
trans: adj.民族的，国家的，n.国民

sentences.english: Religion matters very much at a national level.
sentences.chinese: 宗教事务在全国都非常重要。

sentences.english: Between 1929 and 1933 America’s national income fell by more than half.
sentences.chinese: 1929至1933年间，美国的国民收入下降过半。

sentences.english: There are strong indications that the Prime Minister will call national elections in May.
sentences.chinese: 有明显迹象预示首相将于5月召集全国大选。

detailed_translations.english: related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts

name: hammer

sentences.english: She lived in a college dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一幢大学宿舍楼里。

detailed_translations.english: a large building at a college or university where students live

name: colony
trans: n.侨民，殖民地，侨居地，聚居(地)

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: advertisement
trans: n.，广告，公告，登广告

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.english: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.english: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

detailed_translations.english: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

name: contest
trans: vt.争夺，争取，辩驳，竞，vi.奋斗，n.竞，比

sentences.english: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.chinese: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.english: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.english: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.chinese: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.english: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

detailed_translations.english: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
detailed_translations.english: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it

name: dive
trans: vi.跳水，潜水，俯冲，vt.跳水，俯冲，vi.把...伸入

sentences.english: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

sentences.english: The first time you dive on a coral reef is an experience you will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 第一次在珊瑚礁潜水是毕生难忘的经历。

sentences.english: The submarine began to dive.
sentences.chinese: 潜水艇开始下潜。

sentences.english: Thankfully, the pilot managed to pull out of the dive and regain control.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏驾驶员设法将俯冲的飞机拉起，恢复了对飞机的控制。

detailed_translations.english: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳水（的动作）；潜水（的动作）；俯冲
detailed_translations.english: a jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

name: somewhat
trans: pron.一点儿，一些，某物，adv.有点，多少，几分

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

name: secondly
trans: adv.第二(点)，其次

sentences.english: Firstly, they are not efficient, and secondly, they are expensive to make.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它们效率不高，其次，它们的制作成本很高。

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to give a second point or fact, or give a second reason for something

name: joke
trans: n.笑话，玩笑，vi.说笑话，开玩笑

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick
to say things that are intended to be funny and that you do not really mean

name: aggressive
trans: adj.，侵略的，好斗的，攻击性的，有进取心的，强烈的，迅速生长的

sentences.english: Jim’s voice became aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆的声音凶了起来。

sentences.english: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.chinese: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.english: A successful businessman has to be aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 成功的实业家必须得有股冲劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑衅的，好斗的；有上进心的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone

name: veteran
trans: n.老兵，老手，adj.老练的

sentences.english: He is a veteran of the last revolution in medical technology, gene therapy, which, after some hyped expectations in the 1990s, fell into disfavor after some unsuccessful trials.
sentences.chinese: 他是基因治疗这项最新医学技术的老手，经过了1990年代的兴奋期和之后几次失败的实验后，基因治疗技术已经失宠了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been a soldier, sailor etc in a war

name: hawk
trans: n.鹰，隼，掠夺别人的人，鹰派人物，清嗓，v.用训好的鹰捕猎，像鹰一般地袭击，鹰啸，清嗓，沿街叫卖

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals
to try to sell goods, usually by going from place to place and trying to persuade people to buy them

name: mercury
trans: n.水银，汞，(Mercury)水星

sentences.english: He said that all metals were composed of mercury and sulphur in different proportions .
sentences.chinese: 他说一切金属都是由水银和硫黄按不同比例构成的。

sentences.english: Here they endure long hours at dangerous jobs, wringing flecks of gold from the dirt with mercury.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天在这种危险的环境下工作很长时间，从带有水银的泥沙中淘出金沙。

sentences.english: Because glass mercury thermometers harm both humans and the environment, they have been phased out and are no longer recommended.
sentences.chinese: 因为玻璃水银温度计对于人类和环境都有害处，现在已经逐步被淘汰不再建议使用了。

detailed_translations.english: Mercury is a silver-coloured liquid metal that is used especially in thermometers and barometers

name: thick
trans: adj.厚的，粗的，密的，浓，adv.厚，浓，密，n.密集处，最厚处

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

name: abuse
trans: vt.，滥用，辱骂，虐待，n.，滥用，恶习

sentences.english: several cases of child abuse
sentences.chinese: 数宗虐待儿童案

sentences.english: An independent committee will look into alleged human rights abuses.
sentences.chinese: 一个独立委员会将对涉嫌践踏人权的行为进行调查。

detailed_translations.english: cruel or violent treatment of someone
to deliberately use something for the wrong purpose or for your own advantage

name: operator
trans: n.操作人员，接线员，管理者，技工，报务员

sentences.english: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.english: someone who works on a telephone switchboard, who you can call for help

name: sight
trans: n.视力，见，情景，景观，眼界，vt.看见，观看，vi.瞄准

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

name: steer
trans: vt.&vi.驾驶，掌舵，引导，操纵n.(食用的)公牛暗示

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

name: mess
trans: n.混乱，混杂，肮脏，乱七八糟，一堆食物，集体用膳人员，大量，v.供给食物，把...弄乱

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

name: appreciate
trans: vt.欣赏，感激，赏识，领会，充分意识，感谢，vi.增值

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

name: lime
trans: n.石灰，酸橙，酸橙树，粘鸟胶，钙，vt.施石灰，涂上粘性物质，沾上粘鸟胶，adj.与石灰或石灰石相关的

sentences.english: The lime has turned to powder.
sentences.chinese: 石灰已经粉了。

sentences.english: The wall was first pricked up with a coat lime.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁先抹上一层石灰打底子。

detailed_translations.english: a white substance obtained by burning limestone, used for making cement, marking sports fields etc

name: tough
trans: adj.坚韧的，健壮的，强硬的，艰苦的，棘手的，严厉的，adv.以强硬的态度，n.暴徒，恶棍

sentences.english: It was a tough race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛打得很艰难。

sentences.english: She’s had a tough life.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活十分艰辛。

sentences.english: The company admitted that it had been a tough year.
sentences.chinese: 公司承认那是艰难的一年。

sentences.english: Tough decisions will have to be made.
sentences.chinese: 必须作出艰难的决定。

sentences.english: The reporters were asking a lot of tough questions .
sentences.chinese: 记者们问了很多难以回答的问题。

sentences.english: (= a difficult decision ) , but we had to cancel the game because of the weather.
sentences.chinese: 尽管是一个艰难的决定，但由于天气不好我们只得取消比赛。

sentences.english: I find his books pretty tough going (= difficult to read ) .
sentences.chinese: 我发现他的书很难读。

sentences.english: Gage predicted the president’s proposal would be a tough sell (= something that is difficult to persuade someone about ) before Congress.
sentences.chinese: 盖奇预言总统的提议在国会很难通过。

detailed_translations.english: difficult to do or deal with

name: unlikely
trans: adj.未必的，未必可能的

sentences.english: Donna might be able to come tomorrow, but it’s very unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜明天也许能来，不过这可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: not likely to happen

name: fluent
trans: adj.流利的，流畅的

sentences.english: She was fluent in English, French, and German.
sentences.chinese: 她的英语、法语和德语都很流利。

detailed_translations.english: able to speak a language very well

name: candidate
trans: n.候选人，投考者，求职者

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

name: university
trans: n.大学，综合性大学

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

name: highly
trans: adv.高度地，很，非常

sentences.english: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的母亲对学校的处理方法持强烈的批评态度。

sentences.english: highly competitive industries
sentences.chinese: 竞争非常激烈的行业

sentences.english: a highly desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 宜居的街区

sentences.english: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’ T.S.
sentences.chinese: 艾略特极有影响力的诗作《荒原》

sentences.english: a highly developed economy
sentences.chinese: 高度发达的经济

detailed_translations.english: very

name: sunshine
trans: n.(直射)日光，阳光

sentences.english: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

name: argue
trans: vt.争论，辩论，争吵，劝说，表明，vi.提出理由，争论，争辩，辩论

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way
to persuade someone to do or not do something

name: lumber
trans: n.木材，木料，制材，v.伐木，vi.缓慢地移动，vt.拖累

sentences.english: A blue bus lumbered past.
sentences.chinese: 一辆蓝色公共汽车慢吞吞地驶过。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动
detailed_translations.english: to move in a slow awkward way

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
detailed_translations.english: pieces of wood used for building, that have been cut to specific lengths and widths

name: ship
trans: n.(大)船，海船，舰，船员，飞船，vt.以船运送，乘船，运送，进水在船上工作，vi.上船，坐船，运送，在船上工作

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

name: these
trans: adj.，&，pron.这些

sentences.english: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.chinese: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.english: Are these all yours?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是你的吗?

sentences.english: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.chinese: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。

name: by
trans: prep.在...旁，被，由，经由，在...之前，根据，adv.靠近，经过，放在一旁地，adj.在旁边的，附带的，n.次要的事件

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

sentences.english: I was attacked by a dog.
sentences.chinese: 我被一条狗袭击。

sentences.english: a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

name: practice
trans: n.实践，练习，业务，实行，习惯，vt.，&，vi.练习，实习，开业

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

name: whistle
trans: n.口哨，汽笛，厂笛，啸啸声，用于召唤或发布命令的哨声，吹口哨vi.，吹口哨，鸣汽笛，呼啸，吹口哨召唤，vt.，以吹口哨的方式发出吹口哨发出信号或指引...

sentences.english: The lifeguard blew his whistle.
sentences.chinese: 救生员吹响哨子。

sentences.english: Adam whistled happily on his way to work.
sentences.chinese: 亚当在上班路上愉快地吹着口哨。

detailed_translations.english: a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it
to make a high or musical sound by blowing air out through your lips

name: keen
trans: adj.热心的，激烈的，敏锐的，强烈的，精明的，热忠于

sentences.english: keen students
sentences.chinese: 求知若渴的学生

sentences.english: The kids in my class are all very keen.
sentences.chinese: 我班上的学生都很好学。

sentences.english: She was new in the job and keen as mustard (= very keen ).
sentences.chinese: 她刚开始做这工作，热情很高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热心的； 激烈的； 敏锐的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is keen is eager to work or learn, and enjoys doing it

name: radar
trans: n.雷达，无线电探测器

sentences.english: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.chinese: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.english: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that uses radio waves to find the position of things and watch their movement

name: journal
trans: n.日报，期刊，杂志，日志

sentences.english: the British Medical Journal
sentences.chinese: 《英国医学杂志》

sentences.english: He decided to keep a journal.
sentences.chinese: 他决定记日记。

detailed_translations.english: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

name: Italy
trans: n.意大利

sentences.english: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.english: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.english: All the newspapers reported on the football match of France versus Italy.
sentences.chinese: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

name: it
trans: pron.这，那，它

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: tonight
trans: adv.在今夜，n.今夜

sentences.english: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.english: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

detailed_translations.english: during the night of this day
the night of this day

name: constant
trans: adj.经常的，永恒的，不变的n.常数，恒量

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

name: ounce
trans: n.盎司，英两

sentences.english: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.chinese: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.english: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

sentences.english: The 9” long, 9 ounce device works when you are in motion—just plug in your mobile device, place the nPower PEG vertically in your bag or on your hip and go for a walk or run.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备长9英寸，重9盎司，可在你运动过程中发电——只需把移动设备插到摇摇发电机上，并把发电机垂直地放在包�或挂在臀部，然后走动或跑动即可。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.

name: politician
trans: n.政治家，政客

sentences.english: politicians who are trying to get the minority vote
sentences.chinese: 努力争取少数族群选票的政治家

sentences.english: a British Labour politician
sentences.chinese: 英国工党政治家

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in politics, especially an elected member of the government

name: ore
trans: n.矿，矿石，矿砂

sentences.english: iron ore
sentences.chinese: 铁矿石

sentences.english: veins of rich ore
sentences.chinese: 富矿脉

detailed_translations.english: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained

name: molecule
trans: n.分子，克分子

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

name: waist
trans: n.腰，腰部

sentences.english: The skirt was too big around the waist.
sentences.chinese: 那条裙子腰围太大。

detailed_translations.english: the narrow part in the middle of the human body

name: gratitude
trans: adj.感激，感谢，感恩，n.感恩之心

sentences.english: He smiled at them with gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 他向他们笑了笑表示谢意。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being grateful and wanting to express your thanks

name: kilometer
trans: n.千米，公里，=kilometre(略作km)

sentences.english: She had to battle snowstorms, landslides, snakes and loneliness on her 350 kilometer journey.
sentences.chinese: 在350公里的行程中，她要克服暴风雪、滑坡、蛇和孤独寂寞。

sentences.english: But it says food grown and harvested in the 30-kilometer exclusion zone after the emergency might be contaminated and should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 但是，该组织说，事故发生后，在30公里禁区内种植和收获的食物可能受到污染，应该避免食用。

sentences.english: For example, the researchers last week said they had managed to gather enough energy from a TV station a half-kilometer away to power a small temperature sensor.
sentences.chinese: 例如，研究人员上周说，他们已经设法从半公里远的一座电视发射台收集了足够了能量给一个小型温度传感器供电。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre）

name: conduct
trans: n.举止，行为，品行，指导，vi.引导，指挥，管理，vt.导电，传热

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

name: magazine
trans: n.杂志，期刊

sentences.english: a magazine article
sentences.chinese: 杂志中的文章

sentences.english: She glanced over the magazine racks.
sentences.chinese: 她扫了一眼杂志架。

detailed_translations.english: a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs etc, and is sold weekly or monthly

name: surgeon
trans: n.外科医师，军医

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

name: northeast
trans: n.东北，adj.位于东北的，东北的，向东北的，来自东北的，adv.向东北，来自东北

sentences.english: The land to the north-east fell away into meadows.
sentences.chinese: 陆地向东北方向倾斜延伸成了牧场。

sentences.english: These islands of the north-east coast can only be reached in small boats.
sentences.chinese: 东北部沿海的这些岛屿只有坐小船才能抵达。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is exactly between north and east
The northeast edge, corner, or part of a place is the part which is toward the northeast

name: Soviet
trans: n.苏维埃，adj.苏维埃的，苏联的

name: clothe
trans: vt.给...穿衣服，穿上，覆上，授以，赋予，表达

sentences.english: The King was clothed in a purple gown.
sentences.chinese: 国王身穿紫袍。

detailed_translations.english: to put clothes on your body

name: mad
trans: adj.发疯的，恼火的，狂热的，着迷的，生气的，v.发怒，n.发怒

sentences.english: He can’t possibly get that finished in time. He must be mad !
sentences.chinese: 他不可能按时完成的。他一定是疯了！

sentences.english: I’d go mad (= start to feel crazy ) if I was stuck at home all day.
sentences.chinese: 如果我整天困在家里我会发疯的。

sentences.english: He’s been driving me mad !
sentences.chinese: 他真让我受不了！

sentences.english: You’ve agreed to marry him! Are you mad?
sentences.chinese: 你已经同意跟他结婚了！你疯了吗？

sentences.english: Surely no one would be mad enough to fly in this weather?
sentences.chinese: 肯定没有人会傻到在这样的天气条件下飞行吧？

sentences.english: My friends all think I’m stark raving mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

sentences.english: It’s enough to send you barking mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.chinese: 这足以让你发狂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疯狂的；发疯的；愚蠢的；着迷的
detailed_translations.english: crazy or very silly

name: settle
trans: vt.安排，安放，安顿，调停，解决，决定，付清(欠款)，vi.定居，降落，n.有背的长凳

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

name: reduction
trans: n.减少，减小，缩减，(化学)还原反应，(数学)约分

sentences.english: strategies for noise reduction
sentences.chinese: 减少噪音的对策

sentences.english: The company promised they would make no staff reductions for at least two years.
sentences.chinese: 公司承诺至少两年不裁员。

detailed_translations.english: a decrease in the size, price, or amount of something, or the act of decreasing something

name: democracy
trans: n.民主，民主制，民主国家

sentences.english: a return to democracy after 16 years of military rule
sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

detailed_translations.english: a system of government in which every citizen in the country can vote to elect its government officials

name: curve
trans: n.曲线，弯，弯曲，曲球，vt.弄弯，使...弯曲，vi.弯曲

sentences.english: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.chinese: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.english: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

detailed_translations.english: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this

name: final
trans: adj.最后的，决定性的，n.决，期末考试

sentences.english: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.chinese: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.english: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.chinese: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.english: Stone is filming the final instalment of his Vietnam trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.english: the final stages in their relationship
sentences.chinese: 他们之间关系的最后阶段

sentences.english: They scored in the final minutes of the game.
sentences.chinese: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.english: We can advise the client, but in the end it is he who has the final say.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以提出建议，但是最终的决定权还是在客户自己手里。

detailed_translations.english: last in a series of actions, events, parts of a story etc

name: senate
trans: n.参议院，上院

sentences.english: The Senate approved the bill.
sentences.chinese: 参议院批准了这项议案。

detailed_translations.english: the smaller and more important of the two parts of the government with the power to make laws, in countries such as the US, Australia, and France

name: internal
trans: adj.内的，国内的，内在的，身体内部的

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

name: nobody
trans: pron.谁也不，无人，没有人，n.无足轻重的人，小人物

sentences.english: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我敲了敲门，但没人应门。

detailed_translations.english: no one

name: depend
trans: vi.依靠，依赖，相信，指望

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

name: defeat
trans: vt.战胜，击败，挫败，n.败北，失败

sentences.english: They hoped to defeat the enemy at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望在海上击败敌人。

sentences.english: She was a woman who hated to admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

detailed_translations.english: to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc
failure to win or succeed

name: diverse
trans: adj.不一样的，相异的，不同的，多种多样的

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

name: triumph
trans: n.凯旋，胜利，欢欣，vi.成功，得胜，庆功

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something triumphs, they gain complete success, control, or victory, often after a long or difficult struggle
an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

name: efficient
trans: adj.效率高的，有能力的，胜任的

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

name: postpone
trans: vt.延迟，推迟，延缓

sentences.english: The match had to be postponed until next week.
sentences.chinese: 比赛不得不推迟到下周举行。

sentences.english: His trial has been postponed indefinitely (= no one knows when it will happen ) .
sentences.chinese: 对他的审判被无限期推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: to change the date or time of a planned event or action to a later one

name: understanding
trans: n.理解，理解力，协定，了解，个人见解，非正式协议，谅解，同情心洞察力，adj.有同情心的

sentences.english: Luckily, I have a very under­standing boss.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，我有一个非常通情达理的上司。

detailed_translations.chinese: 体谅的， 宽容的， 通情达理的
detailed_translations.english: sympathetic and kind about other people’s problems

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽
detailed_translations.english: an unofficial or informal agreement

name: stern
trans: adj.严厉的，坚定的，坚决的，苛刻的，n.尾部，船尾

sentences.english: It is placed in the stern of a boat.
sentences.chinese: 它被放在船尾。

detailed_translations.english: the back of a ship
serious and strict, and showing strong disapproval of someone’s behaviour

name: scold
trans: vi.责骂，vt.申斥，n.老爱责骂的人，训斥

sentences.english: Do not scold the puppy, but simply and firmly say ‘no’.
sentences.chinese: 不要责骂小狗，但要干脆利落地说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: to angrily criticize someone, especially a child, about something they have done

name: major
trans: adj.较大的，主要的，较多的，大部份的，n.专业，主修，成年人，陆军少校，巨头，vi.主修

sentences.english: There are two major political parties in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国有两大政党。

sentences.english: The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.english: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.english: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.english: He’s majoring in Political Science.
sentences.chinese: 他主修政治学。

detailed_translations.english: very large or important, when compared to other things or people of a similar kind
to study something as your main subject at college or university

name: schedule
trans: n.时间表，计划表，一览表，计划，vt.安排，计划，预定，编制目录

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: cellar
trans: n.地窑，地下室，vt.把...藏入地窑(或酒窑)

sentences.english: a coal cellar
sentences.chinese: 煤窖

detailed_translations.english: a room under a house or other building, often used for storing things

name: import
trans: vt.，&，vi.，&，n.输入，进口

sentences.english: a ban on beef imports
sentences.chinese: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口

detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

name: duck
trans: n.，鸭，雌鸭，鸭肉，板球零分，vt.，把…按入水中，低头弯身(以免被打中或看见)，躲避，vi.，迅速行进，飞快行走(以免被看见)，推委责任

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

name: tour
trans: n.，&，vi.旅行，游历，旅游，周游，观光，巡回

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

name: arrow
trans: n.箭，箭头，箭状物，vi.快且笔直的前进有如穿梭的箭

sentences.english: Follow the arrows to the X-ray department.
sentences.chinese: 顺着箭头指示的方向去X光科。

detailed_translations.chinese: 箭，箭头；箭状物；箭头记号
detailed_translations.english: a weapon usually made from a thin straight piece of wood with a sharp point at one end, that you shoot with a  bow

detailed_translations.chinese: 以箭头指示；箭一般地飞向

name: confident
trans: adj.确信的，自信的

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

name: gunpowder
trans: n.黑色火药，有烟火药

sentences.english: Damp gunpowder will not fire.
sentences.chinese: 潮湿的火药不会起火。

detailed_translations.english: an explosive substance used in bombs and  fireworks

name: awake
trans: adj.醒着的，警惕的，vt.唤醒，唤起，激发，vi.醒来，恢复意识

sentences.english: I hope he’s awake now.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他现在醒着。

sentences.english: She was still only half awake when I brought her a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.english: How do you stay awake during boring lectures?
sentences.chinese: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.english: Emma lay awake half the night, worrying.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.english: The noise brought him wide awake (=  completely awake  ) .
sentences.chinese: 那声音使他睡意全无。

sentences.english: It was midday when she awoke.
sentences.chinese: 她醒来时已是中午。

detailed_translations.english: not sleeping
to wake up, or to make someone wake up

name: rural
trans: adj.农村的，田园的

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city

name: nation
trans: n.民族，国家

sentences.english: the President’s radio broadcast to the nation
sentences.chinese: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.english: an independent nation
sentences.chinese: 独立的国家

sentences.english: the world’s leading industrial nations
sentences.chinese: 世界上的主要工业国

sentences.english: the Cherokee nation
sentences.chinese: 切罗基族

detailed_translations.english: a country, considered especially in relation to its people and its social or economic structure

name: nod
trans: vt.点(头)，点头表示，打盹，摆动，v.点头，打盹，使...摆动

sentences.english: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人向我们点点头打招呼。

sentences.chinese: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.chinese: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

detailed_translations.chinese: [劳经] 加班时间；延长时间；加时赛
detailed_translations.english: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours

name: semiconductor
trans: n.半导体

sentences.english: In semiconductor receivers transistors take the place of vacuum tubes.
sentences.chinese: 在半导体收音机中晶体管代替了真空管。

sentences.english: What was happening was this: in its pure state of repeating units of one titanium and two oxygen atoms, titanium dioxide is a semiconductor.
sentences.chinese: 发生的事是这样的：在纯净的一个钛和两个氧原子组成的重复单位下，二氧化钛是一种半导体。

sentences.english: They can then be printed onto a roll of metal foil that becomes a continuous semiconductor.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们可以把这种墨水印刷在一卷金属箔上，从而制成连续的半导体。

detailed_translations.english: a substance, such as  silicon  , that allows some electric currents to pass through it, and is used in electronic equipment

name: limited
trans: adj.有限的，被限制住的，缺乏创新性的

sentences.english: My knowledge of the business is limited.
sentences.chinese: 我对这一行了解有限。

sentences.english: The organization has very limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 这家机构资源非常有限。

sentences.english: So far, the education reforms have had only limited success.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，教育改革只取得了有限的成效。

detailed_translations.english: not very great in amount, number, ability etc

name: entire
trans: adj.全部的，整个的，完整的，同性质的，纯正的，全面的

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

name: accidental
trans: a.，意外的，偶然的，附属的，非本质的，n.，偶然，不重要的东西，<音>变调的临时符号

sentences.english: an accidental discharge of toxic waste
sentences.chinese: 有毒废料的意外排放

sentences.english: Buy an insurance policy that covers accidental damage .
sentences.chinese: 购买一份意外损害保单。

detailed_translations.chinese: 意外的；偶然的；附属的；临时记号的
detailed_translations.english: happening without being planned or intended

detailed_translations.chinese: 次要方面；非主要的特性；临时记号

name: set
trans: vt.放，安置，设定，vi.(太阳)落下去，n.组合，集合，设定，一套一副，一局比

sentences.english: The set (x, y) has two members.
sentences.chinese: （x, y）这个集里有两个项。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers, shapes etc in mathematics

name: time
trans: n.时间，时机，次数，回，倍，vt.为...安排时间，计时，定时，乘，v.，[计算机]DOS命令，显示并允许改变系统时间，adj.根据时间的，时间上的

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

name: shiver
trans: vi.颤抖，哆嗦，vt.颤动(碎裂)，n.冷颤(碎块)

sentences.english: Jake stood shivering in the cold air.
sentences.chinese: 大冷天里，杰克站着冻得瑟瑟发抖。

sentences.english: A shiver ran through (= went through ) me.
sentences.chinese: 我浑身一阵颤抖。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly because you are cold or frightened
a slight shaking movement of your body caused by cold or fear

name: presently
trans: adv.一会儿，目前，不久，现在，<古>，当即，立刻

sentences.english: The doctor will be here presently.
sentences.chinese: 医生一会儿就到。

sentences.english: Presently, I fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿我就睡着了。

sentences.english: The range of courses presently available has grown.
sentences.chinese: 目前可选择的课程范围已经扩大了。

detailed_translations.english: in a short time

name: meaning
trans: n.意义，意思，含义，意图，adj.意味深长的

sentences.english: What’s the meaning of this? I asked you to be here an hour ago!
sentences.chinese: 这是什么意思？我让你一小时之前就要到的！

detailed_translations.english: the thing or idea that a word, expression, or sign represents

name: stretch
trans: vt.伸展，张开，vi.伸，延伸，n.伸展，张开，adj.可伸缩的

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.english: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间； 一段距离；延伸， 连绵； 连绵的一片
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

name: tank
trans: n.坦克，大容器，槽，箱，罐，贮水池，vt.把...储于槽中

sentences.english: The water tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 水箱在漏水。

sentences.english: Somehow the chemical got from a storage tank into water supplies.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎么的，这种化学物从储存箱进入了供水系统。

sentences.english: the plane’s fuel tank
sentences.chinese: 飞机的油箱

detailed_translations.english: a large container for storing liquid or gas

name: ourselves
trans: pron.我们自己

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

name: game
trans: n.游戏，比，猎物，行业，非法手段，策略，野味，戏弄，vi.赌博，vt.欺骗，adj.乐意做的，勇敢的，跛的

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

name: astonish
trans: vt.使惊讶，使吃惊

sentences.english: Her reply astonished me.
sentences.chinese: 她的回答让我大吃一惊。

sentences.english: It astonished him that she had changed so little.
sentences.chinese: 他很惊讶，她几乎没怎么变。

sentences.english: What astonishes me most is his complete lack of fear.
sentences.chinese: 最令我吃惊的是，他什么都不怕。

detailed_translations.english: to surprise someone very much

name: advise
trans: vt，.，劝告，建议，通知，警告，vi.，劝告，与...商量

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.english: Keep us advised of (= continue to tell us about ) any new developments.
sentences.chinese: 请随时告诉我们任何新的进展情况。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

name: abstract
trans: adj.，抽象的，理论的，n.，摘要，抽象的东西，vt.，移除，摘要，偷vi.，做摘要

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

name: well-known
trans: adj.众所周知的，出名的

sentences.english: This is probably their best-known song.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。

sentences.english: a well-known TV presenter
sentences.chinese: 著名的电视节目主持人

detailed_translations.chinese: 众所周知的， 著名的
detailed_translations.english: known by a lot of people

name: unstable
trans: adj.不稳固的，不稳定的，易变的

sentences.english: The political situation is still very unstable.
sentences.chinese: 政局依然非常动荡。

sentences.english: an unstable relationship
sentences.chinese: 不稳定的关系

detailed_translations.english: likely to change sud­denly and become worse

name: your
trans: pron.你的，你们的，yours，[jɔ:z]，pron.你们的(东西)

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

name: fund
trans: n.资金，基金，存款，储备，vt.为...提供资金

sentences.english: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc

name: cry
trans: vi.哭，哭泣，叫喊，强烈要求，vt.大声叫喊，宣传，哭得...，n.叫哭，喊，口号，叫卖声，普遍意见

sentences.english: Don’t cry, Laura. It’ll be OK.
sentences.chinese: 不要哭，劳拉，没事的。

sentences.english: Upstairs, a baby began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有个婴儿开始哭起来。

sentences.english: Jamie looked like he’d been crying.
sentences.chinese: 杰米看上去好像哭过了。

sentences.english: I just couldn’t stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 我就是哭个不停。

sentences.english: That film always makes me cry .
sentences.chinese: 那部影片总是让我落泪。

sentences.english: Oliver, alone, began to cry bitterly (= cry a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗独自一人，开始伤心地哭了。

sentences.english: ‘Stop!’ she cried.
sentences.chinese: “停下！”她喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to produce tears from your eyes, usually because you are unhappy or hurt

name: crime
trans: n.罪，罪行，犯罪，羞耻

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

name: lunch
trans: n.午餐，(美)便餐，vi.吃午餐，vt.请客吃午餐

sentences.english: What’s for lunch?
sentences.chinese: 午饭吃什么？

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the middle of the day

name: verify
trans: vt.证实，查证，证明，核实

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

name: timid
trans: adj.胆怯的，羞怯的

sentences.english: I was a timid child.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是个胆小的孩子。

sentences.english: a policy that is both timid and inadequate
sentences.chinese: 一项既无胆识又不完善的政策

detailed_translations.english: not having courage or confidence

name: wealthy
trans: adj.富的，富裕的，n.富人

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

name: glow
trans: n.白热光，赤热，光辉，热情，vi.发白热光，发红光，红光焕发

sentences.english: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.chinese: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.english: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.english: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

sentences.english: The moisturizer gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.chinese: 这种润肤霜给我脸上带来了持续整天的一种健康的红光。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or  reflect  a soft steady light
A glow is a pink colour on a person's face, usually because they are healthy or have been exercising

name: microscope
trans: n.显微镜

sentences.english: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.english: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。

sentences.english: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜可以观察到微小的物体。

detailed_translations.english: a scientific instrument that makes extremely small things look larger

name: slip
trans: vi.，滑跤，滑落，溜，滑行，下跌，脱落，犯错，vt.，使滑动，偷偷，迅速塞(给)，匆忙穿或脱，摆脱，忽略，使脱臼，n.，滑，疏漏，小错误下跌，船台，码头，衬裙，枕头套

sentences.english: Ben slipped quietly out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.english: One man managed to slip from the club as police arrived.
sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: We must be well prepared, there must be no slips.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须好好准备，一定不要有差错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere, without attracting other people’s attention
A slip is a small or unimportant mistake

name: write
trans: vt.书写，写，vi.写

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

name: resignation
trans: n.放弃，辞职，辞呈，顺从

sentences.english: She gave a sigh of resignation.
sentences.chinese: 她无奈地叹了一口气。

sentences.english: He accepted her decision with resignation.
sentences.chinese: 他无可奈何地接受了她的决定。

detailed_translations.english: when someone calmly accepts a situation that cannot be changed, even though it is bad

name: equation
trans: n.方程(式)，等式，均衡，相等

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

name: fate
trans: n.命运，天数，天意，vt.注定

sentences.english: I wouldn’t wish such a fate on my worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 就算是我不共戴天的仇敌，我也不希望他遭遇这样的命运。

detailed_translations.english: the things that happen to someone or something, especially unpleasant things that end their existence or end a particular period

name: obtain
trans: vt.获得，得到，买到，vi.通用，流行，存在

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

name: avoid
trans: vt.避免，躲开，逃避，撤消

sentences.english: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.english: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.chinese: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.english: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦险出事故。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad from happening

name: know
trans: vt.知道，认识，通晓，n.知识，了解

sentences.english: Who knows the answer?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道答案？

sentences.english: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.english: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.english: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.chinese: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.english: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.english: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.english: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.chinese: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.english: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

detailed_translations.english: to have information about something

name: moral
trans: adj.道德(上)的，合乎道德的n.品行，寓意，道德

sentences.english: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.
sentences.chinese: 对于判谋杀犯死刑这种涉及伦理道德的问题，有个观点并非难事。

sentences.english: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.english: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.chinese: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the principles of what is right and wrong behaviour, and with the difference between good and evil

detailed_translations.chinese: 品行， 道德规范； 寓意
detailed_translations.english: principles or standards of good behaviour, especially in matters of sex

name: utter
trans: adj.完全的，彻底的，全然的，绝对，vt.发出，作声，发表，说，讲

sentences.english: That’s utter nonsense!
sentences.chinese: 真是一派胡言！

sentences.english: This company treats its employees with utter contempt.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司对其员工不屑一顾。

sentences.english: I watched in complete and utter horror as he pulled out a gun.
sentences.chinese: 我惊恐万分地看着他拔出枪来。

sentences.english: fifteen years of utter confusion
sentences.chinese: 15年的大混乱

detailed_translations.english: complete – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
to make a sound with your voice, especially with difficulty

name: neat
trans: adj.整洁的，熟练的，巧妙的，端正的，极好的，纯的，adv.整齐地

sentences.english: neat handwriting
sentences.chinese: 工整的笔迹

sentences.english: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.english: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.chinese: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.english: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.chinese: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

detailed_translations.english: tidy and carefully arranged

name: story
trans: n.故事，小说，传说，叙述，新闻报道，楼层(=storey)，vt.以历史事件为图案装饰

sentences.english: a book of short stories
sentences.chinese: 短篇小说集

sentences.english: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.english: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
detailed_translations.english: a description of how something happened, that is intended to entertain people, and may be true or imaginary
to decorate (a pot, wall, etc) with scenes from history or legends

name: handkerchief
trans: n.手帕，方头巾，围巾

sentences.english: He flicked at spot with handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻地用手帕拂拭污点。

sentences.english: She waved away his offer of the handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 她挥手拒绝了他递过来的手帕。

sentences.english: Before sweeping the house she bound up her hair in a large handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 打扫房屋前， 她把头发用一块大手帕扎起来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your nose or eyes

name: mysterious
trans: adj.神秘的，难以理解的，不可思议的

sentences.english: The police are investigating the mysterious deaths of children at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这家医院的儿童神秘死亡事件。

sentences.english: Benson later disappeared in mysterious circumstances .
sentences.chinese: 本森后来就神秘地失踪了。

sentences.english: There’s something mysterious going on.
sentences.chinese: 出了件怪事。

detailed_translations.english: mysterious events or situations are difficult to explain or understand

name: raw
trans: adj.未煮过的，生的，未加工的，原始的，不熟练的，寒冷的，n.触到某人的痛处

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

trans: n.蠢人，傻子，受骗者，vt.欺骗，愚弄，vi.干傻事，开玩笑，adj.愚蠢的

sentences.english: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.chinese: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.english: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.english: You silly old fool !
sentences.chinese: 你这个大傻瓜！

sentences.english: Even art experts were fooled.
sentences.chinese: 连艺术品专家也被骗了。

detailed_translations.english: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
to trick someone into believing something that is not true

name: model
trans: n.模型，模式，模特儿，模范

sentences.english: a working model (= one with parts which move ) of a steam engine
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机车的活动模型

sentences.english: a top fashion model
sentences.chinese: 顶级时装模特

detailed_translations.english: a small copy of a building, vehicle, machine etc, especially one that can be put together from separate parts

name: wreath
trans: n.花环，花圈，花冠

sentences.chinese: 首相向战争纪念碑献了花圈。

detailed_translations.english: a circle made from leaves or flowers that you put on the place where a person is buried

name: tiny
trans: adj.微小的，极小的

sentences.english: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.chinese: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.english: The earrings were tiny.

sentences.english: a tiny little baby

sentences.chinese: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.chinese: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.english: tiny pieces of paper
