name: instantly
trans: adv.立即，即刻

sentences.english: All four victims died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 四名受害人全部当即死亡。

sentences.english: The information was instantly available.
sentences.chinese: 信息即时可得。

detailed_translations.english: immediately

name: ancient
trans: adj.古代的，古老的，n.古人，古货币

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

name: brown
trans: (姓)布朗，adj.褐色的，棕色的，n.褐色，棕色

sentences.english: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.chinese: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.english: the browns and greens of the landscape
sentences.chinese: 棕绿相映的风景

detailed_translations.english: the colour of earth, wood, or coffee

name: thousand
trans: num.千，千个，n.无数，千，(复)thousands：成千上万，许许多多

sentences.english: a journey of almost a thousand miles
sentences.chinese: 将近1,000英里的旅程

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000

name: observer
trans: n.观察员，观测者

sentences.english: political observers
sentences.chinese: 政治观察员

sentences.english: Observers are predicting a fall in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 观察员预测利率会下降。

detailed_translations.english: someone who regularly watches or pays attention to particular things, events, situations etc

name: end
trans: n.末端，目标，结束，终点，vt.，&，vi.结束，终结，adj.最终的

sentences.english: He wore spectacles perched on the very end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.english: The end of the pencil snapped.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔的笔尖啪的一声断了。

sentences.english: Jo joined the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 乔排到了队尾。

sentences.english: She’ll do anything to achieve her own ends.
sentences.chinese: 她为了实现自己的目标，什么都会去做。

sentences.english: The road ends here.
sentences.chinese: 这条路到此为止。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a place or object that is furthest from its beginning or centre
to finish; to make sth finish

name: slowly
trans: adv.慢慢地

sentences.english: He shook his head slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地摇了摇头。

sentences.english: ‘That’s true,’ said Joe slowly.
sentences.chinese: “没错。”乔慢吞吞地说道。

detailed_translations.english: at a slow speed

name: submit
trans: vt.使服从，屈服，呈送，递交，主张，vi.服从，屈从，忍受

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从； 忍受； 甘心
detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: worm
trans: n.虫，蠕虫，可鄙之人，[计]蠕虫病毒，螺纹，v.蠕动，驱虫，慢慢探听出

sentences.english: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物
detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil

detailed_translations.chinese: 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

name: submarine
trans: adj.水下的，海底的，n.潜水艇，vt.用潜艇袭击，vi.滑入...底下

sentences.english: submarine plant life
sentences.chinese: 海生植物

detailed_translations.english: growing or used under the sea
a ship, especially a military one, that can stay under water

name: frequent
trans: adj.时常发生的，经常的，频繁的，vt.常到，常去

sentences.english: Trains rushed past at frequent intervals .
sentences.chinese: 火车频频驶过。

sentences.english: She was a frequent visitor to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她是家里的常客。

detailed_translations.english: happening or doing something often
to go to a particular place often

name: proof
trans: n.证据，证明，校样，adj.防...的，耐...的，能防护，vt.检验给...做防护措施

sentences.english: Their defences are proof against most weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们的防卫工事可以抵挡大多数武器的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: facts, information, documents etc that prove something is true

name: brighten
trans: vt.使发光，使快活，使变亮，使生辉，vi.发光，发亮

sentences.english: Use blonde highlights to brighten your hair.
sentences.chinese: 用点金色的挑染，让你的发色明亮起来。

sentences.english: The morning sunshine brightened up the room.
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光照亮了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 明亮；变亮；活跃；快乐高兴
detailed_translations.english: to make something lighter or brighter

name: robber
trans: n.强盗，盗贼

name: manner
trans: n.方式，态度，礼貌，举止，习俗

sentences.english: He felt some guilt over the manner of her death.
sentences.chinese: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.english: The issue will be resolved in a manner that is fair to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.english: criticism of the manner in which the bishop was appointed
sentences.chinese: 对主教任命方式的批评

sentences.english: She has a calm relaxed manner.
sentences.chinese: 她举止镇定而从容。

sentences.english: Her children all had such good manners.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子都很有礼貌。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is done or happens

name: X-ray
trans: n.X射线，X光，X光机，X光照片，vt.用X射线检查

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

name: straight
trans: adj.，直的，正直的，准的，坦率的，连续的，异性恋的，adv.，直，直接，笔直地，平正了，坦率的，连续不断地，n.，直的东西，传统的人

sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.english: Always lift with a straight back.
sentences.chinese: 提东西的时候，一定要把背挺直。

sentences.english: her long, straight black hair
sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.english: They sat down in a straight line .
sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.english: The road was dead straight (= completely straight ) .
sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.chinese: 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
detailed_translations.english: the straight part of a  racetrack

name: twin
trans: adj.孪生的，n.孪生儿，双胞胎之一

sentences.chinese: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: The twin brothers were removed from our class.

sentences.english: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲， 死而无憾。

name: to
trans: prep.(表示方向)到，向，达到，(表示间接关系)给，离，对于，为了，adv.(表示方向)去，(门)关上

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

name: consequence
trans: n.结果，后果

sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

name: procession
trans: n.队伍，行列，v.列队行进

sentences.chinese: 他们列队向国会大厦行进。

name: yard

sentences.chinese: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

name: circumference
trans: n.圆周，周长，周围，圆周线，胸围

sentences.chinese: …一位正在计算地球周长的科学家。

detailed_translations.english: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape

name: spontaneous
trans: adj.自发的，自然产生的，本能的

sentences.english: The crowd gave a spontaneous cheer.
sentences.chinese: 人群自发地欢呼起来。

sentences.english: My spontaneous reaction was to run away.
sentences.chinese: 我的本能反应就是逃跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自发的， 无意识的； 自然的， 天真率直的

name: softly

detailed_translations.chinese: 温柔地；柔和地；柔软地；静静地

name: different
trans: adj.差异的，各种的，不同的，与众不同的

sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

name: condemn
trans: vt.谴责，指责，判刑，官方宣称(某事物)有缺陷或不宜使用

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and condemned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被裁定有罪，判了死刑。

name: player

sentences.english: a game for four players
sentences.chinese: 四人玩的游戏

sentences.english: a tennis/rugby/chess, etc. player
sentences.chinese: 网球、橄榄球、国际象棋等选手

detailed_translations.english: a person who takes part in a game or sport

name: always
trans: adv.总是，一直，永远

sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

name: dip
trans: vt.浸，蘸，给...洗药浴，vi.浸一浸，下降，向下倾斜，翻阅，提取，(款项)，n.游，下降，减少，低洼处，调味酱，药浴液

sentences.english: Dip each apple in the syrup until thickly coated.
sentences.chinese: 把每个苹果在糖浆里蘸一下，直到被厚厚地裹上糖浆。

detailed_translations.english: to put something into a liquid and lift it out again
to put something into a liquid and lift it out again

name: professional
trans: adj.职业的，专业的，n.专业人员

sentences.english: What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.chinese: 他有哪些专业资格？

sentences.english: You may need to seek professional help.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要寻求专业帮助。

sentences.english: the terms that doctors and other health professionals use
sentences.chinese: 医师和其他保健专业人员使用的术语

detailed_translations.english: relating to a job that needs special education and training
someone who works in a job that needs special education and training, such as a doctor, lawyer, or architect

name: independence
trans: n.独立，自主，自立

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

name: shout
trans: n.呼喊，突发的大叫，vt.高声呼喊，呼叫，vi.呼叫，突然喊叫

sentences.english: There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.english: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly
a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc

name: universal
trans: adj.宇宙的，普遍的，通用的，全体的，全世界的，n.通用

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

name: read
trans: vt.阅读，看懂，理解，识别，vi.读，读起来，研究，adj.博学的，n.阅读

sentences.english: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.english: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.english: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.english: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean
to look at written words and understand what they mean

name: undo
trans: vt.解开，打开，松开，取消

sentences.english: The screws can be undone by hand.
sentences.chinese: 这些螺丝可以用手拧开。

sentences.english: I undid the package carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我小心地打开包裹。

sentences.english: He undid most of the good work of the previous manager.
sentences.chinese: 他把前任经理的大部分功绩都毁掉了。

detailed_translations.english: to open something that is tied, fastened or wrapped

name: whether
trans: conj.是否，无论，不管

sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

name: Monday
trans: n.星期一

sentences.english: The president announced Monday that he would cancel the debt.
sentences.chinese: 总统周一宣布他会取消这笔债务。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Sunday and Tuesday

name: pillow
trans: n.枕头，vt.枕，搁，垫

sentences.english: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping
to rest your head somewhere

name: enormous
trans: adj.巨大的，庞大的

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

name: idea
trans: n.想法，思想，意见，观念

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

name: banner
trans: n.旗，旗帜，横幅，大标题，adj.特别好的，杰出的，vt.用横幅装饰以大标题报道

sentences.english: The onlookers were shouting, cheering, and waving banners.
sentences.chinese: 观众挥动着横幅，又是叫喊又是欢呼。

sentences.english: She’d never felt the need to carry the banner of feminism.
sentences.chinese: 她从来都不觉得有必要打出女权主义的旗号。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of cloth on which something is written, often carried between two poles

name: union
trans: n.联合，团结，协会，结合，政党，工会，连接轴，adj.联邦政府的工会的

sentences.english: Are you planning to join the union?
sentences.chinese: 你打算加入工会吗？

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["union members"]}
sentences.chinese: 工会会员

detailed_translations.english: an organization formed by workers to protect their rights

name: resource
trans: n.资源，物力，办法，谋略，消遣

sentences.english: Canada’s vast mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 加拿大丰富的矿产资源

sentences.english: a country rich in natural resources
sentences.chinese: 自然资源丰富的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 资源； 财力； 应付办法， 谋略
detailed_translations.english: something such as useful land, or minerals such as oil or coal, that exists in a country and can be used to increase its wealth

name: besides
trans: adv.而且，也，此外，prep.除...之外，adj.别的

sentences.english: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.chinese: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.english: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.chinese: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

detailed_translations.english: used when adding another reason

name: confirm
trans: vt.证实，肯定，批准，确定

sentences.english: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.chinese: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.english: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.chinese: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.english: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.chinese: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.english: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

detailed_translations.english: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

name: sob
trans: vi.啜泣，呜咽，n.空间轨道的轰炸机，呜咽，哭泣

sentences.english: He began sobbing uncontrollably .
sentences.chinese: 他不由自主地抽噎起来。

sentences.english: Her sobs grew louder.
sentences.chinese: 她的呜咽声变得更大了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 啜泣，呜咽；（风等）发出呜咽声
detailed_translations.english: to cry noisily while breathing in short sudden bursts
A sob is one of the noises that you make when you are crying

name: shelter
trans: n.隐蔽处，掩蔽，庇护，庇护所，避难所，v.庇护，保护，隐匿

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: include
trans: vt.包括，包含

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

name: crust
trans: n.面包皮，硬外皮，外壳，坚硬的外壳，vt.盖以硬皮，vi.结硬皮

sentences.english: sandwiches with the crusts cut off
sentences.chinese: 切去边皮的三明治

detailed_translations.chinese: 地壳；外壳；面包皮；坚硬外皮
detailed_translations.english: the hard brown outer surface of bread

name: irregular
trans: adj.不规则的，不整齐的，不合法的，n.不合规格之物

sentences.english: a jagged, irregular coastline
sentences.chinese: 锯齿状不规则的海岸线

sentences.english: It has a highly irregular shape, covered in bumps and indentations.
sentences.chinese: 它的外形极不规则，满是凸起和凹陷的地方。

detailed_translations.english: having a shape, surface, pattern etc that is not even, smooth, or balanced

name: abandon
trans: vt.，丢弃，放弃，抛弃，n.，放纵

sentences.english: How could she abandon her own child?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能抛弃自己的孩子呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 离弃， 丢弃； 遗弃； 抛弃； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to leave someone, especially someone you are responsible for

name: accuse
trans: vt.，指责，责备，控告，归咎于

sentences.english: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授被指控剽窃学生的观点拿去发表。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you believe someone is guilty of a crime or of doing something bad

name: brother
trans: n.兄弟，同事，同胞，教友

sentences.english: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.english: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥一直照顾我。

sentences.english: my twin brother
sentences.chinese: 我的双胞胎兄弟

sentences.english: We must work together, brothers!
sentences.chinese: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

detailed_translations.english: a male who has the same parents as you

name: humour
trans: n.幽默，诙谐，幽默感，体液，vi.纵容，迁就，=humor(美)

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset

name: maintain
trans: vt.维持，赡养，维修，保养，坚持，断言

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

name: climb
trans: vt.，&，vi.攀登，爬，上升，n.攀登(处)

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

name: neighbourhood
trans: n.邻居关系，邻近

sentences.english: Be quiet! You’ll wake up the whole neighbourhood!
sentences.chinese: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

sentences.english: She grew up in a quiet neighborhood of Boston.
sentences.chinese: 她是在波士顿一个清静的街区里长大的。

detailed_translations.english: the area around you or around a particular place, or the people who live there

name: widespread
trans: adj.分布(或散布)广的，普遍的

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

name: extension
trans: n.延长部分，伸展，扩充，范围，分机号码

sentences.english: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of many telephone lines connected to a central system in a large building, which all have different numbers

name: audience
trans: n.听众，观众，读者，拥护者，倾听，正式会见

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

name: serious
trans: adj.严肃的，认真的，庄重的，严重的，危急的

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

name: interrupt
trans: vt.打断，打扰，中止，妨碍，vi.插嘴，n.中断，[计算机]，中断

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

name: easy
trans: adj.容易的，安逸的，不费力的，adv.慢慢地，当心地

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.english: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

name: sunny
trans: adj.阳光充足的，睛朗的，明媚的，快活的

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.english: a sunny morning
sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.english: a nice sunny room
sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.english: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

name: soup
trans: n.汤，羹，n.困境

sentences.english: homemade tomato soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的番茄汤

detailed_translations.english: cooked liquid food, often containing small pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables

name: sketch
trans: n.略图，速写，素描，概略，概述，草图，小品，vt.描绘略图，vi.写生

sentences.english: So if we just sketch that.
sentences.chinese: 那么如果我们把那画个草图。

sentences.english: He squiggled a sketch on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他在地上胡乱地画了个草图。

detailed_translations.english: a simple, quickly made drawing that does not show much detail
a short humorous scene on a television programme, in a theatre etc, that is part of a larger show

name: tedious
trans: adj.冗长乏味的，单调乏味的，沉闷的

sentences.english: The audience coughed down the tedious speaker.
sentences.chinese: 听众用咳嗽声阻挠演讲人的沉闷发言。

sentences.english: There's no point in labouring at a tedious task.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦地干单调乏味的工作没有意义。

name: northwest
trans: n.西北，西北方，adj.位于西北的，西北的，在西北的，来自西北的，adv.向西北

sentences.english: four miles to the northwest
sentences.chinese: 西北方向4英里

sentences.english: the northwest suburbs of the city
sentences.chinese: 城市西北部的郊区

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is exactly between north and west
in the northwest of a place

name: grandmother
trans: n.祖母，外祖母

sentences.english: My grandmothers are both widows.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖母和外祖母都是寡妇。

detailed_translations.english: the mother of your mother or father

name: unexpected
trans: adj.想不到的，意外的

sentences.english: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.english: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it

name: spade
trans: n.铲，铁锹，在扑克牌中指黑桃，v.铲，vt.(用铲子)铲

sentences.english: ...a garden spade.
sentences.chinese: …一把花园里使用的锹。

detailed_translations.english: a tool for digging that has a long handle and a broad metal blade that you push into the ground

name: tailor
trans: n.裁缝，vt.裁制衣服，剪裁，vi.做裁缝

sentences.english: In his youth his father bound him out to a tailor.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻时他父亲叫他去给一个裁缝当学徒。

sentences.english: Treatment is tailored to the needs of each patient.
sentences.chinese: 治疗方案是针对各个病人的需要而制订的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make men’s clothes, that are measured to fit each customer perfectly
to make something so that it is exactly right for someone’s particular needs or for a particular purpose

name: treaty
trans: n.条约，协议，协定

sentences.english: Both sides have agreed to sign the treaty .
sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.chinese: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 条约， 协议， 协定
detailed_translations.english: a formal written agreement between two or more countries or governments

name: blood
trans: n.血，血液，血统，仇恨，vt.流血

sentences.english: Her body was found in a pool of blood.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体被发现倒在血泊之中。

sentences.english: Blood oozed from a cut on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 血从他额头的伤口里渗了出来。

sentences.english: There’s Irish blood on his mother’s side.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲有爱尔兰血统。

detailed_translations.english: the red liquid that your heart pumps around your body

name: trend
trans: vi.伸向，倾向，转向，n.趋势，倾向，方位

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

name: tray
trans: n.(浅)盘，托盘，碟

sentences.english: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
sentences.chinese: 服务员用托盘端来饮料。

sentences.english: a cat litter tray
sentences.chinese: 猫砂盘

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc

name: structure
trans: n.结构，构造，建筑物，vt.建造，构造

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

name: justice
trans: n.正义，公正，司法，上诉法庭的法官

sentences.english: Children have a strong sense of justice.
sentences.chinese: 儿童有很强的正义感。

sentences.english: His people came to him demanding justice.
sentences.chinese: 他的手下来找他，寻求公正。

detailed_translations.english: fairness in the way people are treated

name: financial
trans: adj.财政的，金融的

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

sentences.chinese: 摩纳哥的兰尼埃亲王

detailed_translations.english: the son of a king, queen, or prince

name: brand
trans: n.燃烧的木条，剑，商品，商标，牌子，烙印，类型，vt.铭刻，打烙印污蔑

sentences.english: products which lack a strong brand image
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鲜明品牌形象的产品

sentences.chinese: 主人懒得给这牛打上烙印。

detailed_translations.english: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin

name: captain
trans: n.陆军上尉，队长，船长，首领，vt.率领，指挥

sentences.english: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
sentences.chinese: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

trans: n.收受者，收件人，接收器，收款员，接待者，听筒

sentences.english: She picked up the receiver and dialled his number.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起听筒，拨了他的电话号码。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电话听筒；接收器；〔破产企业或公司的〕管理人，接管人
detailed_translations.english: the part of a telephone that you hold next to your mouth and ear

name: describe
trans: vt.形容，描写，描绘，描述，画(尤指几何图形)

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出

name: apologize
trans: vi.道歉，谢罪，认错

sentences.english: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

name: machine

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: elevator
trans: n.电梯，升降机，飞机升降舵，斗式皮带输送机

sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

name: transformer
trans: n.变压器，转换器

sentences.chinese: 通过运用一个变压器，他将密码翻译成他读得懂的译文。

sentences.chinese: 实际上高输入阻抗的变压器，它们的效率和频带宽度都会下降。

sentences.english: There is a transformer in there.

name: task
trans: n.任务，工作，作业，vt.交给某人(任务)

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .

name: tire
trans: vi.疲劳，累，厌倦，vt.使疲倦，厌烦n.轮胎，金属圈

detailed_translations.english: to start to feel tired, or make someone feel tired

name: connect
trans: vt.连接，连结，联通，联系，使有联系

sentences.chinese: 我们想要两个有门相通的房间。

sentences.english: I didn’t connect the two events in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我心里没把这两件事联系起来。

detailed_translations.english: to join two or more things together

name: engineering
trans: n.工程，工程学

sentences.english: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.english: a degree in engineering
sentences.chinese: 工程学学位

detailed_translations.english: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.

name: alloy
trans: n.，合金，(金属的)成色，vt.，使...成合金，搀以劣质，减低成色影响或贬损，vi.，有合金能力

sentences.english: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。

detailed_translations.english: to mix one metal with another
a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together

trans: n.，一致，和谐，授予，符合，同意

sentences.chinese: 在这件事情上我同他是一致的。

sentences.chinese: 如果您想谋求个人事业、理想与公司的事业和理想高度一致，如果您追求的是志同道合的工作愉悦，请加入我们！

name: rigid
trans: adj.刚硬的，僵硬的，刻板的，严格的

sentences.chinese: 硬塑料

name: static
trans: adj.静的，静态的，静力的，静止的，静电的，n.静电，静电干扰，(猛烈的)反对或抨击

sentences.chinese: 获得各种资格证书的年轻人的数量一直保持不变或者已经减少。

noise caused by electricity in the air that blocks or spoils the sound from radio or TV

name: economic
trans: adj.经济的，经济学的，有利可图的，n.，[-s]经济学(状况等)

sentences.english: Economic growth is slow.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长缓慢。

sentences.english: the government’s economic policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策

sentences.english: Economic reform is needed.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革势在必行。

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

name: pinch

sentences.chinese: 我们不能让她再掐她小弟弟了。

sentences.chinese: 他捏了一下她的脸颊。

sentences.chinese: 将所有的配料，连同一撮盐，放进食品加工机里。

name: dozen
trans: n.一打，十二个，adj.一打的，十二个的

sentences.chinese: 克里斯、海伦和其他六个人一起去度假了。

sentences.english: (= about 12 ) cars were parked near the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 入口附近停了大约十二辆汽车。

name: dispose
trans: vi.去掉，丢掉，销毁，vt.倾向于，处置

name: wherever
trans: adv.究竟在哪里，无论什么地方，在...的各个地方，conj.无论在哪里

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里
detailed_translations.english: to or at any place, position, or situation

trans: n.猴子，猿，v.胡闹，乱弄

trans: n.(自然)科学家

sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

sentences.chinese: 他们的到来使原本沉闷的午后活跃起来了。

sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

name: ancestor

sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

name: additional
trans: adj.，附加的，追加的，另外的

sentences.chinese: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: more than what was agreed or expected

trans: vt.收集，推论，接走，vi.收款，聚集，积累，adj.，&，adv.对方付费，(的)

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

name: zeal
trans: n.热心，热情，热忱

sentences.english: ...his zeal for teaching.
sentences.chinese: …他对教学的热衷。

detailed_translations.english: eagerness to do something, especially to achieve a particular religious or political aim

name: social
trans: adj.社会的，社交的，群居的，社团的

sentences.english: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.chinese: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.english: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.chinese: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.english: a challenge to the social order
sentences.chinese: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

detailed_translations.chinese: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的
detailed_translations.english: relating to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives

name: bark

sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

name: efficiency
trans: n.效率，功效，效能

sentences.english: considerable advancements in energy efficiency
sentences.chinese: 能源效率的显著提高

detailed_translations.chinese: 效率； 功效， 效能
detailed_translations.english: the quality of doing something well and effectively, without wasting time, money, or energy

name: northern
trans: adj.北方的，北部的

sentences.english: a man with a northern accent
sentences.chinese: 带有北方口音的男子

sentences.english: Northern Europe
sentences.chinese: 北欧

detailed_translations.english: in or from the north of a country or area

name: fence
trans: n.栅栏，围墙，击剑术，买卖赃物的人，v.用篱笆围住，练习剑术防护，买卖赃物

sentences.english: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land

detailed_translations.chinese: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术
detailed_translations.english: to fight with a long thin sword as a sport

name: kite
trans: n.风筝，v.用空头支票骗人，使上升

sentences.english: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.chinese: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。

sentences.english: The child tailed his kite.
sentences.chinese: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.english: He tried to fly his kite.
sentences.chinese: 他试图放飞他的风筝。

detailed_translations.english: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

name: granddaughter
trans: n.孙女，外孙女

sentences.english: a drawing of my granddaughter Amelia
sentences.chinese: 一幅我孙女阿梅莉亚的画像

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your son or daughter

name: reverse
trans: vt.颠倒，翻转，逆转，倒退，n.背面，相反，失败，挫折，adj.反面的相反的，颠倒的

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.english: if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards

detailed_translations.chinese: 反向的； 相反的； 颠倒的
detailed_translations.english: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described

detailed_translations.chinese: 撤销，废除；使完全相反，彻底转变；使反转，使次序颠倒
detailed_translations.english: to change something, such as a decision, judgment, or process so that it is the opposite of what it was before

detailed_translations.chinese: 相反情况，对立面；反面，背面，后面；损失，倒退
detailed_translations.english: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

name: each
trans: pron.各，各自，adj.每个，每，每一，adv.每个，int.每个，个人，个自

sentences.english: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

name: inspection
trans: n.检查，审查，检阅，视察

sentences.english: An inspection was carried out at the school.
sentences.chinese: 有人来学校视察了一遍。

sentences.english: However, on closer inspection, a number of problems emerged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经进一步检查，很多问题冒了出来。

detailed_translations.english: an official visit to a building or organization to check that everything is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: wonder
trans: n.惊异，惊奇，奇迹，惊谔，v.惊奇，想知道，怀疑，adj.奇妙的，非凡的

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

name: bee
trans: n.蜂，密蜂，忙碌的人

sentences.chinese: 一群蜜蜂

sentences.english: a bee sting

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

name: twice
trans: adv.两次，两倍

sentences.english: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.english: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.chinese: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

detailed_translations.english: two times

name: contrast
trans: n.对比，对照，悬殊，差别，v.对比，成对照，[计算机]，反差

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

name: ankle
trans: n.踝，踝关节

sentences.english: slender ankles
sentences.chinese: 纤细的脚踝

detailed_translations.english: the joint between your foot and your leg

name: locate
trans: vt.探明，找出，查出，设于，位于，建立，vi.建立，住下来

sentences.english: The business is located right in the center of town.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店就在市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or place

name: purchase
trans: n.买，购买，购买的物品，支点，紧握，抓紧，vt.买，购买，赢得，(用设备)举起，移动

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

name: exciting
trans: adj.令人兴奋的

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

name: mud
trans: n.软泥，泥浆，恶意诽谤和攻击，vt.弄脏，污蔑

sentences.english: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

name: special
trans: adj.特殊的，特别的，专门的，n.特别的东西，特价，特刊，特色菜

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

name: native
trans: adj.本土的，本国的，出生地的，天生的，n.本地人，土著人

sentences.english: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

detailed_translations.english: growing, living, produced etc in one particular place
someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time

name: editor
trans: n.编辑，编者，校订者

sentences.english: the editor of the Daily Telegraph
sentences.chinese: 《每日电讯报》的主编

detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

name: me
trans: pron.(宾格)我

sentences.english: Stop, you’re hurting me.
sentences.chinese: 住手，你弄疼我了。

sentences.english: He bought me a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他给我买了一杯酒。

sentences.english: Give that book to me.
sentences.chinese: 把那本书给我。

sentences.english: She’s two years older than me.
sentences.chinese: 她比我大两岁。

sentences.english: That’s me, standing on the left.
sentences.chinese: 那是我，站在左边的那一个。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

name: westward
trans: adj.向西的，西方的，adv.向西，n.西方，西部

sentences.english: ...the one-hour westward flight over the Andes to Lima.
sentences.chinese: …越过安第斯山脉到利马一小时的向西飞行。

detailed_translations.english: Westward is also an adjective
towards the west

name: communication
trans: n.通讯，传达，交通，信息，[计算机]通信

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

name: army
trans: n.军队，陆军，大群

sentences.english: The army are helping to clear up after the floods.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队正协助洪灾后的清理工作。

sentences.english: an army officer
sentences.chinese: 陆军军官

sentences.english: Army units launched attacks on bases near Jounieh port.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队对朱尼耶港附近的基地发动了进攻。

sentences.english: He joined the army when he was 17.
sentences.chinese: 他17岁参加了陆军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war

name: lemon
trans: n.柠檬，柠檬树

sentences.english: A lemon is an acid fruit.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬是一种酸味水果。

sentences.english: Add in the lemon after mixing the flour and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在面粉和糖混合之后倒入柠檬汁。

sentences.english: Or get together the eggs and lemon juice and make them, but you get the idea.
sentences.chinese: （就像将鸡蛋和柠檬原汁混合在一起并制作它们，但您得有想法）。

detailed_translations.english: pale yellow in colour
a fruit with a hard yellow skin and sour juice

name: son
trans: n.儿子，孩子(长者对后辈的称呼)

sentences.english: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 她的儿子肖恩出生于 1983 年。

sentences.english: They have three sons and a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有三个儿子和一个女儿。

sentences.english: In those days, the property went to the oldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，财产由长子继承。

sentences.english: their youngest son, George
sentences.chinese: 他们最小的儿子乔治

detailed_translations.chinese: 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔
detailed_translations.english: someone’s male child

name: condense
trans: vt.压缩，使缩短，浓缩，摘要

sentences.english: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 这一整章可以压缩成几个段落。

detailed_translations.english: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information

name: toward
trans: prep.向，对于，接近，关于，将近，朝，adj.有希望的，有利的，逼近的

name: tie
trans: n.领带，结，束缚，不分胜负，联系，vt.系，约束，捆绑，vi.打结，连结

sentences.english: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.chinese: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

detailed_translations.english: if two players, teams etc tie or are tied in a game or competition, they finish it with an equal number of points

detailed_translations.chinese: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

name: liberation
trans: n.解放，解放运动(为获得平等权利和地位的行为)

sentences.english: They pant after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 他们渴望解放。

sentences.english: All his life was submerged in the liberation of the people.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生全部献身于人民的解放事业。

sentences.english: They consecrated their lives to the liberation of their motherland.
sentences.chinese: 他们把生命献给了祖国的解放事业。

name: trace
trans: n.痕迹，踪迹，微量，丝毫，vt.跟踪，追踪，找出根源，描绘，vi.追踪

sentences.english: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.english: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.english: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.chinese: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

sentences.english: I saw the faintest trace of a smile cross Sandra’s face.
sentences.chinese: 我看到桑德拉的脸上闪过一丝微笑。

sentences.english: We finally traced him to an address in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于追查到他在芝加哥的一个地址。

detailed_translations.english: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed
to find or discover sb/sth by looking carefully for them/it

name: scheme
trans: n.计划，规划，方案，诡计，阴谋，v.计画，设计，体系，结构，图谋

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

name: knock
trans: vi.，&，vt.敲，击，打，互撞，攻击，n.敲，敲打，敲门

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

name: arrival
trans: n.到达，到来，到达者

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

name: reveal
trans: vt.展现，揭示，显示，揭露，透露，n.(外墙与门或窗之间的)窗侧门侧，(汽车的)窗框

sentences.english: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.english: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.chinese: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

detailed_translations.english: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

name: error
trans: n.错误，谬误，差错

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: achievement
trans: n.，完成，成就，成绩，达到

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。

detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

name: Britain
trans: n.不列颠，英国

sentences.english: This is the stud  naturalized from Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这是从不列颠引进的种马。

detailed_translations.english: the island containing England, Scotland and Wales, Great Britain

name: boss
trans: n.老板，上司，vt.指挥，控制

sentences.english: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
sentences.chinese: 我得向老板请一天假。

sentences.english: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.chinese: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.english: Five-year-old girls love to boss people around.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的女孩就爱支使别人。

detailed_translations.english: the person who employs you or who is in charge of you at work
to tell people to do things, give them orders etc, especially when you have no authority to do it

name: scar
trans: n.伤疤，伤痕，创伤，断崖，v.结疤，使...有伤痕，痊愈

sentences.english: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.english: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.chinese: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

detailed_translations.english: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

name: memorial
trans: adj.纪念的，追悼的，记忆的，n.纪念碑(堂)，纪念仪式

sentences.english: A memorial service is being held for her at St. Paul's Church.
sentences.chinese: 一场为她举行的纪念仪式正在圣保罗教堂举行。

sentences.english: The hospital was built as a memorial to King Edward VII.
sentences.chinese: 该医院是为了纪念国王爱德华七世而建的。

detailed_translations.english: done or made in order to remind people of someone who has died
something, especially a stone with writing on it, that reminds people of someone who has died

name: leadership
trans: n.领导，领导才干

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.english: the Conservative leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.english: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

name: march
trans: n.(March)三月，示威游行，vt.使前进，使行军，vi.行军，进军，游行示威

sentences.english: On 29 August the royal army marched into Inverness.
sentences.chinese: 8月29日皇家军队开进因弗内斯。

sentences.english: The police decided not to ban the march.
sentences.chinese: 警方决定不禁止这次示威游行。

detailed_translations.english: if soldiers or other people march somewhere, they walk there quickly with firm regular steps
an organized event in which many people walk together to express their ideas or protest about something

name: China
trans: n.中国

detailed_translations.english: the People's Republic of China

name: forbid
trans: adj.被禁止的

sentences.english: He was forbidden to leave the house, as a punishment.
sentences.chinese: 作为惩罚，他被禁止离开家。

sentences.english: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.chinese: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed

name: dialect
trans: n.方言，土语，地方话

sentences.english: the local dialect
sentences.chinese: 当地方言

detailed_translations.chinese: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征
detailed_translations.english: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

name: score
trans: n.得分，比数，成绩，刻痕，二十，乐谱，vt.记分，刻划，划线，得分批评，给...谱曲，vi.得分，记分，得胜

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

name: annual
trans: adj.每年的，年度的，一年生的，n.年报，年刊，年鉴，一年生植物

sentences.english: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.chinese: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

detailed_translations.english: happening once a year

detailed_translations.chinese: 年报， 年鉴； 一年生的植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that lives for one year or season

name: opposite
trans: adj.对面的，相对的，相反的，n.对立物，对立者，对手，adv.在对面地，处于相反位置地，prep.在...对面

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

name: match
trans: n.比，竞，对手，火柴，般配的人，配偶，v.使...相配，与...竞争，相配

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

name: kill
trans: vi.杀死，扼杀，消磨，消减，破坏，n.杀，杀戮

sentences.english: Why did she kill her husband?
sentences.chinese: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.english: Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.english: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.chinese: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.english: Bleach kills household germs.
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.english: Smoking kills.

sentences.chinese: 我露营了一个星期，实在得洗个澡了。

sentences.chinese: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.chinese: 你知道我的眼镜在哪儿吗？

name: knife

sentences.chinese: 一副刀叉

sentences.english: Some young people are carrying knives to defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 一些年轻人带着刀子防身。

sentences.english: a kitchen knife
sentences.chinese: 厨房用刀

sentences.chinese: 用快刀把瓜切成块。

name: ashamed
trans: adj.惭愧(的)，羞耻(的)，感到惭愧，感到害臊，因为羞耻或勉强作某事

sentences.chinese: 每个人都会有哭的时候——没什么好难为情的。

name: precious

sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

name: zoo

sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.

sentences.chinese: 他给她倒了一杯，然后将自己的杯子斟满。

detailed_translations.english: if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full

name: him
trans: pron.(宾格)他

sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

trans: adj.理性的，合理的，出于理性的，能推理的，n.有理数

sentences.english: Parents need to be fully informed so they can make a rational decision.
sentences.chinese: 父母需要充分了解情况，这样才可以作出合理的决定。

sentences.english: I’m sure there’s a rational explanation for all this.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这一切都有合理的解释。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to have a rational conversation with him.
sentences.chinese: 不可能和他进行理性的谈话。

detailed_translations.english: based on reason rather than emotions

name: calculator
trans: n.计算器，计算者

sentences.chinese: 一个袖珍计算器

detailed_translations.english: a small electronic machine that can add, multiply etc

name: scholarship
trans: n.学业成绩，奖学金，学问，学识

sentences.chinese: 她获得了艾奥瓦州立大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 她最新出版的作品是一部优秀的学术著作。

trans: adj.所谓的，号称的

a long steady look

name: slice
trans: n.薄片，切片，薄的切片，部分，锅铲，vt.切成薄片，大幅降低

sentences.chinese: 比萨块

sentences.english: Cut the tomatoes into slices .
sentences.chinese: 把番茄切成片。

detailed_translations.english: a thin flat piece of food cut from a larger piece

trans: n.舌，舌头，舌状物，语言，口才，v.舔，用舌吹奏管乐器，发音

sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

trans: n.千克，公斤

sentences.chinese: 相比之下，生产一公斤的番茄需要160升水。

sentences.chinese: 例如，千克尺度允许您给一个物体分配数字，根据测量仪器的标准化的偏移量指示该物体的重量。

name: swim
trans: vi.游，游泳，眼花，n.游泳

sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.chinese: 学习仰泳的孩子们

sentences.english: She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

detailed_translations.english: to move yourself through water using your arms and legs

sentences.chinese: 一处有意思的古老废墟

sentences.english: the ruins of a bombed-out office block
sentences.chinese: 被炸毁的办公楼的废墟

sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊因为那场官司倾家荡产。

name: twenty
trans: num.二十，二十个

sentences.chinese: 距内罗毕20英里的一个小村庄

sentences.english: I’m nearly twenty (= 20 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我快20岁了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 20

trans: vt.使具有资格，取得资格，有资格，限定，描述，vi.取得资格，有资格

sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

trans: n.，目录，目录册，大学概况手册，商品型录，vt.，做目录，分类说明，名入列表，vi.，研究(手册或目录)，(商品)在型录中明码标价

sentences.english: Can you catalog all these books?
sentences.chinese: 你能给所有这些书编目录吗？

sentences.chinese: 嗯，这是我们最新的产品目录。 。

sentences.english: Can you send me a catalog?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我寄一份商品目录吗？

name: seaport

sentences.chinese: ...波罗的海沿岸的海港城市罗斯托克。

detailed_translations.english: a large town on or near a coast, with a harbour that big ships can use

name: those
trans: pron.那些，adj.那些

sentences.chinese: 他匆匆记下了那些注解。

sentences.english: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.chinese: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

sentences.chinese: 我是意大利人。

name: cease

sentences.chinese: 导弹袭击

sentences.chinese: 云鼠标是微软研究员理查德哈珀和他的合作者在微软亚洲研究院的一个项目 。

sentences.chinese: 执政党工党的代表大会

sentences.chinese: 世界语在社会主义者中一直很受欢迎。

sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

sentences.chinese: 一批邮票收藏品

sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.chinese: 为保卫祖国而献身的战士

sentences.chinese: 港口的海防工事状况很差。

sentences.chinese: 他想自己为自己辩护。

sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

sentences.chinese: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

sentences.chinese: 他头上不得不缝了十针。

sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

name: fiction
trans: n.小说，虚构，杜撰

sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

sentences.english: For years he managed to keep up the fiction that he was not married.
sentences.chinese: 多年来他设法一直给人一种未婚的假象。

detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

name: locomotive
trans: n.火车头，机车，adj.运转的，火车头的，移动的

sentences.english: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.chinese: 那个机车能拉多少节客车?。

sentences.english: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.chinese: 火箱，燃烧室一种燃料在里面燃烧的内室，例如蒸汽机车的燃烧室。

sentences.english: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.chinese: 展示了他的一些多才多艺，在这里伊克巴尔显示，一何电力机车，轨道和信号，他所作的。

name: October
trans: n.十月

detailed_translations.english: the tenth month of the year, between September and November

sentences.chinese: 这家制鞋厂是本地区最大的雇主。

sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
