detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

name: jail
trans: n.监狱，监狱，拘留所，vi.监禁，vt.监禁，下狱

sentences.english: He’s been in jail for three months already.
sentences.chinese: 他已经入狱三个月。

detailed_translations.english: a place where criminals are kept as part of their punishment, or where people who have been charged with a crime are kept before they are judged in a law court

name: poor
trans: adj.贫穷的，贫乏的，可怜的，缺乏的，拙劣的

sentences.english: Her family were so poor they couldn’t afford to buy her new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.english: an area where poor people lived
sentences.chinese: 穷人居住区

sentences.english: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.english: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.english: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.english: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

name: secretary
trans: n.秘书，书记，大臣，部长，写字台

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

name: liable
trans: adj.易于...的，可能的，有义务的，应负责的，有，...倾向

sentences.english: The car is liable to overheat on long trips.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车跑长途容易过热。

detailed_translations.english: likely to be affected by a particular kind of problem, illness etc

name: tolerate
trans: vt.忍受，容忍，宽恕

sentences.english: We simply will not tolerate vigilante groups on our streets.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不容许有自行惩办犯罪的组织出现在我们的街头。

sentences.english: This sort of behaviour will not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 这种行为是不能容许的。

detailed_translations.english: to allow people to do, say, or believe something without criticizing or punishing them

name: mainland
trans: n.大陆，本土

sentences.english: flights between a Greek island and the mainland
sentences.chinese: 希腊一海岛和本土之间的航班

detailed_translations.english: the main area of land that forms a country, as compared to islands near it that are also part of that country

name: soak
trans: vt.，浸，泡，使...湿透，浸泡在液体中，浸洗，吸入，使某人喝醉向某人敲竹杠，vi.，浸泡，浸入液体，渗透，感化(某人)，无节制地喝酒，n.浸，湿透，喝醉

sentences.english: Soak the clothes in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 把衣服浸泡在冷水里。

sentences.english: Let the pans soak; I’ll wash them later.
sentences.chinese: 把锅泡着吧，我过一会儿再洗。

detailed_translations.english: if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean
if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean

name: moment
trans: n.片刻，瞬间，时刻，准确时刻，非常重要的时机，力矩

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: south
trans: n.南，南方，adj.南方的，adv.在南方，向南方，自南方

sentences.english: Which way is south?
sentences.chinese: 哪面是南？

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
towards the south
in the south, or facing the south

name: silent
trans: adj.沉默的，寂静无声的，安静的，不吵闹的，无言的，n.(复数)默剧

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

name: superficial
trans: adj.表面的，肤浅的

sentences.english: Despite their superficial similarities, the two novels are, in fact, very different.
sentences.chinese: 这两本小说尽管表面上有相似之处，但实际上大不一样。

sentences.english: They only have the most superficial understanding of prison life.
sentences.chinese: 他们对监狱生活只有最粗浅的了解。

detailed_translations.english: seeming to have a particular quality, although this is not true or real

name: sentence
trans: n.判决，句子，意见，宣判，刑罚，命题，vt.宣判，判决，使遭受

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

name: bet
trans: n.打赌，赌注，最大的可能，vi.下注，vt.打赌

sentences.english: How much do you want to bet?
sentences.chinese: 你想赌多少钱？

sentences.english: a £50 bet
sentences.chinese: 50英镑的赌注

detailed_translations.english: to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event
an agreement to risk money on the result of a race, game etc or on something happening, or the money that you risk

name: span
trans: n.跨距，跨度，间距，一段时间，vt.横跨，贯穿，估量，动词spin的过去式形式，n.共轭动物

sentences.english: I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.chinese: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
sentences.chinese: 河上的桥为单跨桥。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that sth lasts or is able to continue

name: hunger
trans: n.饿，饥饿，渴望，v.饿，渴望，使...饥饿

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

name: mug
trans: n.大杯，脸，一杯的量，恶棍，vi.扮鬼脸，vt.攻击，打劫

sentences.english: Something scared him. Probably your ugly mug !
sentences.chinese: 什么东西吓着他了，很可能是你这张丑八怪的脸！

detailed_translations.english: a face
to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play

name: somehow
trans: adv.由于某种原因，不知怎么地，以某种方式

sentences.english: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我们总会把那些钱拿回来的。

sentences.english: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
sentences.chinese: 我不知怎的竟然把钥匙弄丢了。

sentences.english: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other .
sentences.chinese: 也许我们可以想什么办法把它粘起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式
detailed_translations.english: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how

name: grandfather
trans: n.祖父，外祖父

sentences.english: His grandfather was a professor.
sentences.chinese: 他爷爷曾是位教授。

detailed_translations.english: the father of your father or mother

name: clever
trans: adj.聪明的，机敏的

sentences.english: a clever man
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人

detailed_translations.english: able to learn and understand things quickly

name: dust
trans: n.尘土，灰尘，无价值之物，屈辱状态，vt.拂去灰尘，撒上粉状物体，大胜，vi.擦拭灰尘

sentences.english: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.chinese: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.english: a thick layer of dust
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.english: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.english: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

detailed_translations.english: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean

name: drawing
trans: n.图画，素描，绘图，绘图技巧

sentences.english: a drawing of Canterbury Cathedral
sentences.chinese: 一幅坎特伯雷大教堂的素描画

sentences.english: I’ve never been very good at drawing.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不擅长画图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

name: sure
trans: adj.确信的，确实的，肯定的，adv.当然，确实地，无疑地

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct
used to say ‘yes’ to someone

name: autumn
trans: n.秋，秋季，秋天

sentences.english: autumn mists
sentences.chinese: 秋天的雾霭

detailed_translations.english: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler

name: decade
trans: n.十年，十年期

sentences.english: ...the last decade of the nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: …19世纪的最后10年。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 10 years

name: trial
trans: n.试，试验，试用，审判，讯问，审讯，尝试，努力，讨厌的事，人，adj.尝试性的，审讯的

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

name: market
trans: n.市场，集市，销路，交易，推销地区，vt.在市场上交易，使...上市，vi.在市场上买卖

sentences.english: I usually buy all my vegetables at the market.
sentences.chinese: 我通常都是在菜市场里购买蔬菜。

sentences.english: Our main overseas market is Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要海外市场是日本。

detailed_translations.english: a time when people buy and sell goods, food etc, or the place, usually outside or in a large building, where this happens

name: concert
trans: n.音乐会，演奏会，一致，和谐，vt.制定计划，通过协商达成一致，vi.合作

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

name: beach
trans: n.海滩，湖滩，河滩，vt.拖(船)上岸

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: mislead
trans: vt.使误入岐途，误导，使产生错误印象，欺骗

sentences.english: Don’t be misled by appearances, he’s a good worker.
sentences.chinese: 不要被表象迷惑，他工作干得挺不错的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true by giving them information that is false or not complete

name: harvest
trans: n.收获(期)，成果，收获物，收成，vt.，&，vi.收割，收获

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.english: Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

name: woman
trans: n.妇女，女人，女性，adj.女人的

sentences.english: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.chinese: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.english: married women
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女

sentences.english: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.english: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.chinese: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female person

name: elaborate
trans: adj.复杂的，精心制作的，精细的，详尽的，精心的，v.详细地说明用心地作，推敲

sentences.english: pure silks embroidered with elaborate patterns
sentences.chinese: 绣有精美图案的真丝衣服

sentences.english: A spokesman declined to elaborate on a statement released late yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 发言人拒绝对昨天晚些时候发表的一份声明作出更多说明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 复杂的； 精心制作的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of small parts or details put together in a complicated way
If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details

name: expense
trans: n.花费，消费，费用，代价

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

name: emotion
trans: n.情感，感情，情绪，激动

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.english: Kim received the news without showing any visible sign of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 金接到消息时丝毫不露声色。

detailed_translations.english: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

name: conscious
trans: adj.意识到的，神志清醒的，意识到的，自觉的，有意的，n.意识

sentences.english: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.chinese: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.english: a conscious act of cruelty
sentences.chinese: 有意而为的残暴行径

detailed_translations.english: noticing or realizing something

name: shock
trans: n.冲击，震惊，冲突，震惊，休克，vi.震动，冲突，使...受电击

sentences.english: The hatred in her voice shocked him.
sentences.chinese: 她语气中的仇恨让他震惊。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very surprised and upset, and unable to believe what has happened

name: illustrate
trans: vt.(用图等)说明，举例说明，作图解，vi.举例

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

name: accept
trans: vt.，接受，同意，承担(责任等)，vi.，接受

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

name: construct
trans: vt.建造，建设，构筑，绘制，想出，n.构想，建造物

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

name: embarrass
trans: vt.使窘迫，使为难，阻碍，vi.变得困窘

sentences.english: He didn’t want to embarrass her by asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 他不想提问让她尴尬。

sentences.english: The revelations in the press have embarrassed the government.
sentences.chinese: 报纸披露的事实让政府很难堪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使困窘,使局促不安；阻碍,麻烦
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people

name: premier
trans: n.总理，首相，adj.第一的，首位的，最初的

sentences.english: one of Dublin’s premier hotels
sentences.chinese: 都柏林最好的酒店之一

detailed_translations.english: best or most important
a  prime minister  – used in news reports

name: clean
trans: adj.清洁的，干净的，纯洁的，正当的，完全的，精准的，空的，adv.完全地，n.清洁，vt.，&，vi.打扫，清扫

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

name: month
trans: n.月，月份

sentences.english: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.english: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ).
sentences.chinese: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.english: We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into

name: horn
trans: n.号角，警报器，角，动物角，喇叭，触角，角状物，力量源泉

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

name: recorder

sentences.chinese: 陡坡

sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other

trans: n.牛，牲口，家畜，畜牲(复数)

sentences.chinese: 成群的牛

sentences.english: a cattle rancher
sentences.chinese: 牧牛场场主

detailed_translations.english: cows and  bulls  kept on a farm for their meat or milk

trans: vt.使成熟，vi.成熟

trans: adj.忠诚的，如实的

sentences.chinese: 忠诚的朋友

sentences.chinese: 为公司多年忠诚的服务

sentences.english: our faithful family dog, Bogey
sentences.chinese: 我家的忠犬博吉

sentences.english: a faithful member of the church
sentences.chinese: 教会的忠实信徒

sentences.chinese: 对所发生之事的如实报道

trans: n.仆人，佣人，雇工

trans: n.连续，继续，次序，序列，一系列，顺序，一组镜头，vt.安排顺序

sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

detailed_translations.english: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

trans: n.澳大利亚

sentences.chinese: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.chinese: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.chinese: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.english: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .
sentences.chinese: 放松，深呼吸。

detailed_translations.english: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
to take air into your lungs and send it out again

trans: a.机械的，力学的，呆板的，n.(供制版用的)样书，版面设计

sentences.english: The flight has been cancelled due to mechanical failure.
sentences.chinese: 因机械故障航班被取消了。

sentences.english: The plane had to make an emergency landing because of mechanical problems.
sentences.chinese: 飞机因机械故障不得不紧急降落。

sentences.english: the mechanical properties of solids
sentences.chinese: 固体的力学性能

detailed_translations.english: affecting or involving a machine

name: manufacturer
trans: n.制造商，制造厂

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer’s instructions before using your new dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 使用新洗碗机之前，请先阅读厂家的说明书。

sentences.english: The fridge was sent back to the manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 那台冰箱被退还给厂家了。

detailed_translations.english: a company that makes large quantities of goods

trans: adj.不必要的，多余的

detailed_translations.chinese: 不必要的；多余的，无用的
detailed_translations.english: not needed, or more than is needed

name: turning
trans: n.旋转，回转，转向，变向，转弯处

detailed_translations.english: If you take a particular turning, you go along a road which leads away from the side of another road

trans: adv.非常，很，adj.许多的，pron.，&，n.许多

sentences.chinese: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.english: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.chinese: 我身上没带很多钱。

trans: n.地位，身分，情形，状况

sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

trans: vt.，担负得起(后果，损失等)，提供，给予

sentences.chinese: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

sentences.chinese: 猎人打伤了鹿。

sentences.chinese: 猎狗找到了那头鹿躲藏过的地方。

sentences.chinese: 这个地方的狮子捕食鹿和其他野生动物。

name: rapid
trans: adj.快的，迅速的，急促的，n.急流

sentences.chinese: 病人迅速康复。

sentences.english: a period of rapid decline
sentences.chinese: 迅速衰退期

trans: adv.，又一次，而且，又，再，另一方面

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

trans: n.咽喉，喉咙，嗓音，vt.低语，压着嗓子说(唱)

sentences.chinese: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

trans: n.周日，工作日

sentences.chinese: 如果你想避开人流，最好在工作日来。

trans: adj.左边的，ad.在左边，n.左边，p.p.of，leave

trans: n.解释，口译，翻译，演出

sentences.chinese: 一种可能的解释是，他们想要你辞职。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (= explain ) the survey results.
sentences.chinese: 对调查结果难以作出确切的解释。

name: whip
trans: vt.，鞭笞，抽打，鞭策，快速移动，搅拌，搅打，煽动，锁边，n.，鞭子鞭打，鞭状物，蛋奶水果甜点心，搅拌器，政党的组织秘书

sentences.chinese: 他抽了一下鞭子，马儿就小跑起来。

sentences.chinese: 他们的脸突然变得严肃起来。

sentences.english: a solemn procession of mourners

sentences.english: solemn ritual/ceremony

trans: n.质量，品质，特质，特性，才能，adj.高品质的

sentences.chinese: 你在外面等好吗？

name: eleventh
trans: num.第十一(个)

sentences.english: her eleventh birthday

name: merry
trans: adj.欢乐的，愉快的，敏捷的

sentences.chinese: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

trans: n.雄心，抱负，野心，精力，vt.有..野心，追求

sentences.chinese: 他年轻，而且雄心勃勃。

name: gown

sentences.chinese: 那件新款长礼服非常成功。

detailed_translations.english: a long loose piece of clothing worn for special ceremonies by judges, teachers, lawyers, and members of universities

trans: n.童年，幼年，早期

sentences.english: I had a very happy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 我的童年很快乐。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time when you are a child

name: progressive
trans: adj.进步的，向前进的，渐进的，n.进步人士

sentences.english: a progressive administration
sentences.chinese: 进步的政府

sentences.english: progressive and forward-looking policies
sentences.chinese: 有前瞻性的进步政策

sentences.chinese: 共和党进步派和保守派之间分歧很大。

detailed_translations.english: supporting new or modern ideas and methods, especially in politics and education

sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

sentences.chinese: 一辆状况极好的旧车

sentences.chinese: 那听起来棒极了。

sentences.english: What a super idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意太妙了！

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

name: sticky
trans: adj.粘性的，胶粘的，闷热的，困难的，令人不满意的

sentences.english: There’s some sticky stuff in your hair.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: a sticky floor
sentences.chinese: 黏糊糊的地板

detailed_translations.english: made of or covered with a substance that sticks to surfaces

name: airplane
trans: n.，飞机=aeroplane(英）

sentences.english: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.english: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.chinese: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.english: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.chinese: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines

name: loudspeaker

sentences.chinese: 扩音器不响了。

sentences.english: BERLIN (Reuters) -- Before leaving on vacation, a German couple set up a loudspeaker and timer rigged to blast their neighbors with the sound of a crowing cock every morning.
sentences.chinese: 柏林(路透社)：一对德国夫妇在外出度假前安装好了扩音器和定时装置,使其在每天凌晨用刺耳的公鸡啼叫声骚扰邻居。

name: wash
trans: vt.洗，冲出，vi.洗涤，洗清，n.洗，洗濯，(美国西部)干河床

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

name: thereby
trans: adv.因此，从而，由此

sentences.english: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。

detailed_translations.english: with the result that something else happens

name: favourable
trans: adj.有利的，有用的，良好的，赞成的

sentences.english: favourable film reviews
sentences.chinese: 正面的影评

sentences.english: The response has been overwhelmingly favorable.
sentences.chinese: 回应是一边倒的肯定。

sentences.english: The disease spreads quickly under favourable conditions.
sentences.chinese: 这种病在合适的条件下会传播得很快。

detailed_translations.english: a favourable report, opinion, or reaction shows that you think that someone or something is good or that you agree with them

name: mother
trans: n.母亲，妈妈，adj.母亲的，母体的，vt.生育，像母亲一样关爱

sentences.english: His mother and father are both doctors.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母都是医生。

sentences.english: the relationship between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的关系

sentences.english: Goodnight, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 晚安，妈妈。

sentences.english: Mother said they’d met at university.
sentences.chinese: 母亲说他们是在大学里认识的。

sentences.english: If food is scarce, the mother will feed the smaller, weaker chicks.
sentences.chinese: 如果食物稀少，母禽就喂较小、较弱的幼禽。

detailed_translations.english: a female parent of a child or animal

name: rain
trans: n.雨，雨水，(复数)雨季，vi.下雨，vt.使大量落下

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

name: motion
trans: n.运动，打手势，提议，示意，移动，动作，大便，v.运动，向...打手势，示意

sentences.english: She motioned for the locked front doors to be opened.
sentences.chinese: 她打手势示意把锁着的前门打开。

sentences.english: He stood aside and motioned Don to the door.
sentences.chinese: 他站在一边，示意唐到门口。

detailed_translations.english: If you motion to someone, you move your hand or head as a way of telling them to do something or telling them where to go

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；手势，眼色，动作；提议
detailed_translations.english: the process of moving or the way that someone or something moves

name: yellow
trans: adj.黄(色)的，n.黄(色)，蛋黄，黄种人，v.(使)变黄

sentences.english: yellow flowers
sentences.chinese: 黄花

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
to become yellow or make something become yellow

name: rid
trans: vt.使摆脱，使去掉，免除，清除，使...获自由

sentences.english: a promise to rid the country of nuclear weapons
sentences.chinese: 销毁本国核武器的承诺

detailed_translations.english: to take action so that a person, place etc is no longer affected by something bad or no longer has it

name: surname
trans: n.姓，vt.冠姓

sentences.english: What is your surname?
sentences.chinese: 你姓什么?

sentences.english: Your surname may be derived from a place, such as Lancaster, for example, or an occupation, such as Weaver, but this is not necessarily of relevance to your family history.
sentences.chinese: 或许，你的姓氏来源于一个地方名，例如兰开斯特，或者来源于职业，例如编织工。 但是，这并不能中肯地说出你家族的历史。

name: sign
trans: n.符号，招牌，正负号，手势，迹象，签名，v.签，做手势，做标记

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: feather
trans: n.羽毛，翎毛，羽状物，心情，种类，服饰，vt.用羽毛装饰，vi.长出羽毛

sentences.english: an ostrich feather
sentences.chinese: 一根鸵鸟羽毛

detailed_translations.english: one of the light soft things that cover a bird’s body

name: account
trans: n.，记述，解释，根据，理由，帐目，报告，估计，利益，好处，vi.，报账，解释，导致，vt.，把...视为，归咎(于)

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: bristle
trans: n.短而硬的毛，鬃毛

sentences.english: His chin was covered with bristles.
sentences.chinese: 他满下巴都是胡茬。

detailed_translations.english: a short stiff hair, wire etc that forms part of a brush
to behave in a way that shows you are very angry or annoyed

trans: adv.稍微，些微地，有点，苗条地

sentences.english: His family then moved to a slightly larger house.
sentences.chinese: 他的家后来搬到了一间稍微大一点儿的房子。

sentences.english: Each person learns in a slightly different way.
sentences.chinese: 每个人学习的方式都略有不同。

detailed_translations.english: Slightly means to some degree but not to a very large degree

name: AI
trans: abbr.，人工智能=，(，Artificial，Intelligence，)

name: television
trans: n.电视，电视机，电视节目，电视行业

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

name: hay
trans: n.干草

sentences.english: bales of hay.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 一捆捆的干草。

detailed_translations.english: long grass that has been cut and dried, used as food for cattle

name: seriously
trans: adv.严肃地，认真地，严重地

sentences.english: Something was seriously wrong .
sentences.chinese: 出大问题了。

sentences.english: It’s time we talked seriously about our relationship.
sentences.chinese: 我们该认真谈一谈我们的关系了。

detailed_translations.english: very much or to a great degree

name: valuable
trans: adj.值钱的，有价值的，n.(pl.)贵重物品

name: excess
trans: n.超越，过量，过度，adj.过量的，额外的

sentences.english: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.chinese: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.english: the worst excesses of journalism
sentences.chinese: 新闻工作中那些最糟糕的越轨行为

detailed_translations.english: harmful actions that are socially or morally unacceptable

name: tumble
trans: vi.摔倒，跌倒，打滚，下跌，倒塌，翻跟斗，偶然发现，理解，vt.使摔倒，使混乱，翻滚，n.跌倒，混乱

sentences.english: Oil prices have tumbled.
sentences.chinese: 石油价格猛跌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌倒，摔下，滚下；翻滚；暴跌；不由自主地卷入
detailed_translations.english: to fall down quickly and suddenly, especially with a rolling movement
a fall, especially from a high place or level

name: research
trans: n.，&，vi.调查，探究，研究

sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.english: Gould was helped in his researches by local naturalists.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德在研究过程中得到了当地博物学家的帮助。

sentences.english: He’s been researching material for a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of finding information about something that you are interested in or need to know about
to study a subject in detail, especially in order to discover new facts or test new ideas

name: evolution
trans: n.进化，演化，发展

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

name: correct
trans: adj.正确的，vt.，&，vi.改正，纠正

sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

name: examine
trans: vt.检查，仔细观察，调查，考试，vi.调查，[计算机]，检测

sentences.english: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.chinese: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.english: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

name: intention
trans: n.意图，意向，目的

sentences.english: They went into town with the intention of visiting the library.
sentences.chinese: 他们进了城，打算参观图书馆。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or desire to do something

name: ago
trans: adv.，以前

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

name: Friday
trans: n.星期五

sentences.english: Diane won’t be here Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五黛安娜不来这里。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Thursday and Saturday

name: vitamin
trans: n.维生素，维他命

sentences.english: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
sentences.chinese: 尽量吃富含维生素和矿物质的食物。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health

name: radish
trans: n.小萝卜

sentences.english: She carved a flower out of a radish.
sentences.chinese: 她把萝卜刻成一朵花。

sentences.english: There are many different kinds of kimchi - some made with cabbage, others made with cucumber or radish.
sentences.chinese: 泡菜有非常多不同的种类，一些是由白菜做成的，一些是由黄瓜或者萝卜做成的。

detailed_translations.english: a small vegetable whose red or white root is eaten raw and has a strong spicy taste

name: ordinary
trans: adj.平常的，平凡的，普通的

sentences.english: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.chinese: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.english: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.english: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.chinese: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

detailed_translations.english: average, common, or usual, not different or special

name: hesitate
trans: vi.犹豫，踌躇，含糊，停顿，口吃，迟疑，vt.用犹疑的态度表示

sentences.english: I hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

detailed_translations.english: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

name: system
trans: n.系统，体系，制度

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

name: stony
trans: adj.多石的，石头的，石质的，冷酷的，铁石心肠的，<古>石造的

sentences.english: stony soil
sentences.chinese: 石质土

detailed_translations.english: covered by stones or containing stones

name: voluntary
trans: adj.自愿的，志愿的，n.(教堂礼拜仪式前后或进行期间的)乐器独奏

sentences.english: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 工人被鼓励主动离职。

detailed_translations.english: done willingly and without being forced

name: video
trans: adj.电视的，视频的，录像的n.电视，视频，录像

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

name: agree
trans: vt.，同意，赞成，承认，vi，.同意，持相同意见，一致，符合

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

name: sore
trans: adj.痛的，痛心的，恼火的，n.疮，痛处，adv.疼痛地

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

name: criticize
trans: vt.批评，评论，非难，吹毛求疵，vi.批评

sentences.chinese: 罗恩什么也不干，只是一味指责和抱怨。

sentences.english: The new law has been widely criticized .
sentences.chinese: 这项新法律受到了广泛的批评。

sentences.english: We look at each other’s work and criticize it.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换作品，互相提出批评意见。

name: protective
trans: adj.保护的，防护的

sentences.english: protective clothing
sentences.chinese: 防护服

sentences.english: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜提供了一层抵挡阳光中有害光线的防护层。

detailed_translations.english: used or intended for protection

trans: n.夏，夏季，adj.夏季的，v.度过夏天

sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

trans: n.改革，改正，感化，vt.改革，改正，使悔改，vi.改良，悔改

sentences.english: plans to radically reform the tax system
sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 改革， 改良， 改造； 改正， 改过自新

trans: adv.真正地，实在，事实上

sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.english: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真正地， 实际上； 很， 十分， 全然

sentences.english: red velvet curtains
sentences.chinese: 红色的丝绒窗帘

sentences.chinese: 幕拉起之前，舞蹈演员都在舞台上站好了位置。

sentences.english: a stack of dirty dishes in the sink
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.english: How did you get so dirty?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.english: kids telling dirty jokes
sentences.chinese: 讲着下流笑话的年轻人

sentences.english: a dirty magazine
sentences.chinese: 色情杂志

detailed_translations.english: covered in or marked by an unwanted substance

name: glue
trans: n.胶，胶水，粘性之物，vt.胶合，粘，紧附于...

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together

name: follow

sentences.english: Are those men following us?
sentences.chinese: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.english: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.chinese: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.chinese: 根据这些调研得出的结论是，旧城区学校的资金投入需要增加，而不是减少。

detailed_translations.english: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else

name: agency
trans: n.，经办，代理，代理处，政府机构

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.english: the Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.chinese: 环保局

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

name: build
trans: vt.，&，vi.建筑，建立，创立，建造，创建，开发，逐渐增强，n.体格身材

sentences.english: The purpose is to build new houses for local people.
sentences.chinese: 目的是要为当地居民建造新的住宅。

sentences.english: The road took many years to build.
sentences.chinese: 这条路修了好几年。

sentences.english: They needed $3 million to build the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要300万美元来修建这座桥。

sentences.english: It is the female birds that build the nests.
sentences.chinese: 筑巢的是雌鸟。

sentences.english: She had built a reputation as a criminal lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 她已经树立起了刑事诉讼律师的声望。

sentences.english: She’s been busy building her career.
sentences.chinese: 她忙于创建自己的事业。

detailed_translations.english: to make something, especially a building or something large

name: berry
trans: n.浆果(如草莓等)

sentences.english: Whether the legend is true or not, the discovery of coffee dates back to 800 A.D. when Africans created a coffee-berry pulp.
sentences.chinese: 不论这个传说是真是假，咖啡的发现要回溯到公元800年，那时非洲人制造出了一种咖啡浆果浆。

detailed_translations.english: a small soft fruit with small seeds

name: cliff
trans: n.悬崖，峭壁

sentences.english: The car rolled over the edge of a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 汽车翻下了悬崖边。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of rock or a mountain with a very steep side, often at the edge of the sea or a river

name: exclude
trans: vt.把...排除在外，拒绝，[计算机]，排除

sentences.english: a special diet that excludes dairy products
sentences.chinese: 不包含奶制品的特别食谱

sentences.english: The judges decided to exclude evidence which had been unfairly attained.
sentences.chinese: 法官裁决不接纳以不正当手段获取的证据。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately not include something

name: conventional
trans: adj.普通的，习惯的，传统的，惯例的，常规的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

name: pink
trans: n.粉红色，石竹花，典范，adj.粉红色的，激进的，vt.刺

sentences.english: Her room was decorated in bright pinks and purples.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间装饰成明亮的粉红色和紫色。

sentences.english: She had arrived dressed in pink.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着粉色的衣服来了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红色；化身，典范；石竹花；头面人物
detailed_translations.english: a pale red colour

detailed_translations.chinese: 扎，刺，戳；使…变粉红色；使…面红耳赤
detailed_translations.english: to prick lightly with a sword or rapier

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的
detailed_translations.english: pale red

name: catch
trans: n.捕捉，陷阱，捕获物，接(球等)，扣栓物，隐患，vt.，捉住，赶上领会，了解，感染，被钩住，击中，察觉，vi.，抓住，燃着

sentences.english: Did you catch any fish?
sentences.chinese: 你捕到鱼了吗？

sentences.english: Early settlers caught rabbits and squirrels and even rats in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 早期移民为了生存而捕食野兔、松鼠，甚至老鼠。

sentences.english: I caught the 7.15 train to London.
sentences.chinese: 我赶上了7点15分的火车去伦敦。

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn't quite catch what you said.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我没听清楚你的话。

detailed_translations.english: to trap an animal or fish by using a trap, net, or hook, or by hunting it

name: often
trans: adv.经常，常常

sentences.english: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.english: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.chinese: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.english: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.english: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.chinese: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times

name: delegation
trans: n.代表团，委派

sentences.english: A trade delegation will visit Kuwait.
sentences.chinese: 一个贸易代表团将访问科威特。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who represent a company, organization etc

name: policeman
trans: n.警察

sentences.english: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.chinese: 他设法用金钱向警察行贿。

sentences.english: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 小偷在警察的逼视下显得惶恐不安。

sentences.english: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.chinese: 我想他肯定是警察，他不断地转弯抹角地打听消息。

detailed_translations.english: A policeman is a man who is a member of the police force

name: spark

a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

trans: pron.(主格)他(她)们

sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

trans: vt.问，询问，要求，邀请，请求，开价，vi.询问，恳求

sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

trans: n.草，牧草，草地，vt.以牧草喂养，覆盖着草

sentences.chinese: 我走在草地上。

sentences.chinese: 公司要关闭其中的两家工厂，这将造成430人失业。

sentences.chinese: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.chinese: 一年级学生可选修法语、西班牙语或德语。

sentences.chinese: 希腊式酸奶

name: coast

sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.chinese: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.english: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.chinese: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

detailed_translations.english: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose

name: spaceship

sentences.english: ...an alien spaceship.
sentences.chinese: …一艘外星人的宇宙飞船。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle for carrying people through space

name: president

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人

name: brave

sentences.chinese: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

name: best

sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

name: shake
trans: vt.，摇，使震动，挥拳，摇晃，去除，动摇，排掉(灰尘)，握手，vi.摇晃，颤抖，跌跌撞撞，握手，发颤音，n，摇动，摇晃，震动，地震，颤抖(音)，奶昔，短时间

sentences.english: She shook him to wake him up.
sentences.chinese: 她摇摇他，想把他叫醒。

sentences.english: Shake the bottle before you open it.
sentences.chinese: 打开瓶子之前先摇一摇。

sentences.english: The whole house started to shake.
sentences.chinese: 整幢房子摇晃起来。

sentences.english: The car shook as it went over a bump.
sentences.chinese: 汽车驶过一个隆起的地方时颠了一下。

sentences.english: The little boy’s hand was shaking.
sentences.chinese: 这小男孩的手在发抖。

sentences.english: Give the bottle a good shake before use.
sentences.chinese: 使用前要用力摇晃瓶子

sentences.english: His confidence was badly shaken.
sentences.chinese: 他的自信心受到很大的打击。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this
if you give something a shake, you move it up and down or from side to side

name: teacher
trans: n.教师，老师，先生

sentences.english: a primary school teacher
sentences.chinese: 小学教师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

name: atomic
trans: adj.原子的，原子能的

sentences.english: atomic structure
sentences.chinese: 原子结构

sentences.english: atomic energy/power
sentences.chinese: 原子能 / 动力

sentences.english: the atomic bomb
sentences.chinese: 原子弹

detailed_translations.english: connected with atoms or an atom

name: surprising
trans: adj.惊人的，出人意外的，令人惊讶的，动词surprise的现在分词

sentences.english: She told me a surprising thing.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我一件令人吃惊的事。

sentences.english: A surprising number of his paintings have survived.
sentences.chinese: 他的存世画作多得出奇。

sentences.english: It is hardly surprising that new mothers often suffer from depression.
sentences.chinese: 初为人母者常患上抑郁症是不足为奇的。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or unexpected

detailed_translations.chinese: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）

name: feature
trans: n.特征，特色，面貌，vt.以...为特色，vi.起重要作用

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

name: require
trans: vt.需要，要求，命令

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

name: hole
trans: n.洞，孔眼，裂开处，穴，vt.，&，vi.挖洞，掘坑，进洞

sentences.english: I began digging a hole for the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我开始挖洞种那棵植物。

detailed_translations.english: an empty space in something solid
to hit the ball into a hole in golf

name: sack
trans: n.袋，麻袋，开除，劫掠，vt.解雇，劫掠，把...装入袋子

sentences.english: They’ve never actually given anyone the sack .
sentences.chinese: 他们从未真的辞退过什么人。

sentences.english: He got the sack for stealing.
sentences.chinese: 他因偷东西而被解雇。

sentences.english: She claimed she’d been threatened with the sack.
sentences.chinese: 她称自己受到过解雇的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is dismissed from their job
to dismiss someone from their job

name: boast
trans: n.吹牛，vi.吹牛，自夸，vt.吹牛，吹嘘

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.english: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.chinese: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

detailed_translations.english: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

detailed_translations.chinese: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
detailed_translations.english: to talk too proudly about your abilities, achievements, or possessions

detailed_translations.chinese: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
detailed_translations.english: Boast is also a noun

name: value
trans: n.价值，重要性，价格，(pl)价值观，vt.评价，估价，重视

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

name: go
trans: vi.去，走，变为，进行，放，通往，消失，vt.走过，称重，[计算机]执行

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

name: feast
trans: n.盛宴，宴会，酒席，筵席，节日，节会，vt.，&，vi.款宴，享乐，请客

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

name: vibration
trans: n.颤动，振动，摆动

sentences.english: the vibrations from the earthquake
sentences.chinese: 地震引起的震动

sentences.english: The microscope must be free from vibration.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜一定要避免震动。

detailed_translations.english: a continuous slight shaking movement

name: priest
trans: n.教士，牧师，神父

sentences.english: He had trained to be a Catholic priest.
sentences.chinese: 他接受培训成了一名天主教神父。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is specially trained to perform religious duties and ceremonies in the Christian church

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司

name: wave
trans: n.波，波涛，波浪，波纹，vi.波动，挥动，飘动

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

name: remains
trans: n.残余(余物，遗物，化石)，余额，废墟

sentences.english: extensive Roman remains (= of ancient buildings ) at Arles
sentences.chinese: 阿尔勒的一大片古罗马遗迹

detailed_translations.english: the parts of something that are left after the rest has been destroyed or has disappeared

name: electron
trans: n.电子

sentences.english: Most things are balanced - with equal numbers of electrons and protons.
sentences.chinese: 大部分物体都是电荷平衡的——含等量的电子和质子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of matter with a negative electrical charge that moves around the nucleus of an atom

name: impression
trans: n.印，印象，印记，效果

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

name: charge
trans: vt.，&，vi.索价，控告，加罪于，要价，赊帐，充电，管理，n.电荷，指控，费用，照顾，责任

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

name: money
trans: n.货币，金钱，财富

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

name: directly
trans: adv.直接地，立即，完全

sentences.english: The new property tax law won’t directly affect us.
sentences.chinese: 新的财产税法不会直接影响到我们。

sentences.english: We hope to bring together the countries directly involved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望让直接卷入冲突的各国重归于好。

sentences.english: Most guests left directly after the wake.
sentences.chinese: 守灵仪式一结束，大部分客人就立刻走了。

detailed_translations.english: with no other person, action, process etc between

name: menu
trans: n.菜单，饭菜，菜肴

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

name: incline
trans: n.倾斜，斜坡，斜面，vt.使倾斜，使，...倾向，爱好，易于

sentences.english: a steep incline
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

detailed_translations.english: a slope
if a situation, fact etc inclines you to do or think something, it influences you towards a particular action or opinion

name: critic
trans: n.批评家，评论家，爱挑剔的人

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

name: illustration
trans: n.说明，图解，插图，例证

sentences.english: The book contains 62 pages of illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有62页插图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture in a book, article etc, especially one that helps you to understand it

name: accustomed
trans: adj.，惯常的，习惯的

sentences.english: The pans were in their accustomed places.
sentences.chinese: 那些锅在老地方。

detailed_translations.english: usual

name: annoy
trans: vt.使恼怒，使生气，打搅，骚扰，使...苦恼

sentences.english: He is not doing this to annoy you.
sentences.chinese: 他做这件事并非是要惹你烦恼。

sentences.english: I am convinced that some people complain just to annoy me, for something to do, or they simply enjoy complaining.
sentences.chinese: 我以为身边的人抱怨是为了令我烦恼、是为了解决某些事、又或者他们就是喜欢抱怨。

name: stand
trans: vi.站，坐落，位于，停滞，忍受，n.架，台，站立，停顿，楼台，货摊

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

name: cucumber
trans: n.黄瓜

sentences.english: I like to eat cucumber sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。

sentences.english: Have some cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 吃点黄瓜吧。

sentences.english: The "gurkophone" is one of their classics, made from a hollowed cucumber , a pepper and a carrot.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜管“是他们的经典乐器之一，那是用掏空的黄瓜、辣椒和胡萝卜做的。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin round vegetable with a dark green skin and a light green inside, usually eaten raw

name: approximately
trans: adv.近似地，大约

sentences.english: The journey took approximately seven hours.
sentences.chinese: 旅程大约花了七个小时。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that sth is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct

name: shame
trans: n.羞耻，羞愧，羞辱，遗憾的事，vt.使羞愧

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

name: numerous
trans: adj.为数众多的，许多

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

name: kettle
trans: n.水壶，水锅，坑穴

sentences.english: She filled the kettle and switched it on.
sentences.chinese: 她把水壶灌满，打开了开关。

sentences.english: The kettle’s boiling (= the water in it is boiling ).
sentences.chinese: 水壶里的水开了。

sentences.english: (= start boiling water in a kettle ), will you?
sentences.chinese: 烧壶水，好吗？

sentences.english: Put the meat into a small kettle.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放进一个小锅里。

detailed_translations.english: a container with a lid, a handle, and a spout,used for boiling and pouring water

name: iron
trans: n.铁，烙铁，熨斗，坚强，(复数)铁制物，vt.烫(衣)，用铁装备，vi.熨烫(平)，adj.刚强的

sentences.english: the iron and steel industry
sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.english: a driveway with large iron gates
sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.english: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.english: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

detailed_translations.english: a common hard metal that is used to make steel, is  magnetic  , and is found in very small quantities in food and blood. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Fe
to make clothes smooth using an iron
You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

name: management
trans: n.管理(层)，经营，处理

sentences.english: a lack of management skills
sentences.chinese: 缺乏管理技巧

sentences.english: a management consultant
sentences.chinese: 一个管理顾问

sentences.english: management training courses
sentences.chinese: 管理培训课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理； 处理； 管理部门， 管理人员
detailed_translations.english: the activity of controlling and organizing the work that a company or organization does

name: himself
trans: pron.他自己，他亲自

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

name: sprinkle
trans: n.洒，撒，散置，小雨

sentences.english: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 给肉撒点盐，然后放进平锅里。

detailed_translations.english: to scatter small drops of liquid or small pieces of something
a small amount of something, especially scattered on top of something

name: establishment
trans: n.建立，设立，确立，设施，机构，权威

sentences.english: the establishment of NATO in 1949
sentences.chinese: 1949年北约组织的建立

detailed_translations.english: the act of starting an organization, relationship, or system

name: moon
trans: n.月球，月亮，卫星

sentences.english: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.chinese: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.english: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.english: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.english: The moon rose into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月亮升上天空。

sentences.english: The moon was shining in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月儿当空照。

sentences.english: the moons of Saturn
sentences.chinese: 土星的卫星

detailed_translations.english: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days

name: holiday
trans: n.假日，节日，假期，vi.度假

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

name: shilling
trans: n.先令(货币单位)

sentences.english: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.chinese: 那种著名的硬币名叫先令,并且它是一种银质的硬币。

sentences.english: We wanted this to be a twenty shilling coin but now in the market it's trading at twenty-one.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望它是一个值二十先令的硬币,但现在它在市场上以二十一个先令的价值来交换。

sentences.english: Walter Scott wanted to give him a six penny piece to reward him for this service; but not finding any in his purse he presented him with a shilling saying, "You will owe me six pence, my good fellow.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特•司各脱想奖赏给他一枚六便士的硬币,但他在钱包里找不到便士,于是他给了他一个先令,说:"你将欠我六便士,我亲爱的朋友.

detailed_translations.english: an old British coin or unit of money. There were 20 shillings in one pound.

name: jar
trans: n.罐子，坛子，广口瓶，不和谐，刺耳声，震动，震惊，vi.发刺耳声不协调，震动，vt.扰乱，使不稳定

sentences.english: a jam jar
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

sentences.english: half a jar of peanut butter
sentences.chinese: 半瓶花生酱

sentences.english: The ship jarred a little.
sentences.chinese: 船轻微震了一下。

sentences.english: The sudden movement jarred the box and it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: a glass container with a wide top and a lid, used for storing food such as jam or honey, or the amount it contains

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声
detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

name: lose
trans: vt.失去，遗失，迷失，输掉，失败，损失，摆脱，vi.丢失，失败，[计算机]，失去

sentences.english: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.english: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

name: tramp
trans: n.流浪者，游民，重步声，v.践踏，重步行走

sentences.english: I met a tramp and gave him some money on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.english: Five minutes inside the soup-kitchen in Hackney, east London, and I immediately understand what Orwell meant - that the "typical tramp" does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦东面哈克尼的汤棚里呆了五分钟，我立刻明白了奥威尔那句“‘典型的流浪汉’不存在”是什么意思。

sentences.english: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has no home or job and moves from place to place, often asking for food or money

name: violence
trans: n.猛烈，激烈，暴力，强暴，暴行

sentences.english: There is too much sex and violence on TV these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今电视上性爱和暴力场面太多。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is intended to hurt other people physically

name: imprison
trans: vt.关押，监禁，限制，束缚

sentences.english: The government imprisoned all opposition leaders.
sentences.chinese: 政府把反对派领导人全部监禁起来。

sentences.english: She was imprisoned within his strong arms.
sentences.chinese: 她被他强壮的手臂搂着。

sentences.english: Many elderly people feel imprisoned in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人感到待在自己家里跟坐牢一样。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone in prison or to keep them somewhere and prevent them from leaving

name: republican
trans: adj.共和国的，n.拥护共和政体的人，Republican:共和党人，共和党的

sentences.english: Lower taxes made Republican voters happier with their party.
sentences.chinese: 更低的税率使共和党选民对该党更加满意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 共和国的；共和政体的；共和主义的；拥护共和政体的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or supporting a system of government that is not led by a king or queen
someone who believes in government by elected representatives only, with no king or queen

name: extend
trans: vt.延长，延伸，伸展，扩大，扩充，扩展，致

sentences.english: Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

detailed_translations.english: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer

trans: n.沼泽，沼泽地，湿地，v.淹没，陷于沼泽

sentences.chinese: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。

sentences.english: Their electronic navigation failed and a rogue wave swamped the boat.
sentences.chinese: 他们的电子导航装置失灵了，一个巨浪吞没了那只船。

detailed_translations.english: land that is always very wet or covered with a layer of water

detailed_translations.chinese: 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
detailed_translations.english: If something swamps a place or object, it fills it with water

name: supreme
trans: adj.最高的，最大的，至上的，极度的

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

name: bus
trans: n.公共汽车

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

name: emit
trans: vt.散发，发射，发表，发出，放射，吐露

sentences.chinese: 水壶发出了刺耳的鸣笛声。

detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc

trans: n.薪金，薪水，vt.给...薪水

sentences.english: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

detailed_translations.english: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

name: arrange
trans: vt.筹备，整理，调解，安排，计划，改编(乐曲)，vi.协商，计划

sentences.english: Contact your local branch to arrange an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 请联络当地分部安排预约。

sentences.english: I’d like to arrange a business loan.
sentences.chinese: 我想办理一笔商业贷款。

sentences.english: Matthew arrived at 2 o'clock as arranged.
sentences.chinese: 马修两点钟依约而至。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 准备； 整理

name: shoulder
trans: n.肩，肩膀，挑起，角度，交接处

sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

name: rob
trans: vt.，&，vi.抢劫，劫掠

sentences.chinese: 他们抢劫一家银行的时候杀了4名警察。

sentences.english: A 77-year-old woman was robbed at knifepoint.
sentences.chinese: 一名77岁老妪遭到持刀抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: to steal money or property from a person, bank etc

trans: vt.劈开，分离，分开，vi.被劈开，adj.分散的，n.劈开，裂片，裂口

sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

name: pig
trans: n.猪，小猪，野猪

sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

name: mathematical
trans: adj.数学的，数学上的，精确的，可能性极小的

sentences.english: mathematical analysis
sentences.chinese: 数学分析

sentences.english: the development of mathematical skills
sentences.chinese: 数学技能的发展

sentences.english: a mathematical genius
sentences.chinese: 数学天才

detailed_translations.english: relating to or using mathematics

name: basically
trans: adv.基本上，主要地

sentences.english: Basically, I’m just lazy.
sentences.chinese: 说穿了，我就是懒。

sentences.english: Well, basically, it’s a matter of filling in a few forms.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，其实也就是填几张表的事。

sentences.english: I used to see him every night, basically.

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize the most important reason or fact about something, or a simple explanation of something

trans: n.所有(权)，所有制

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of owning something

name: master
trans: n.主人，能手，硕士，专家，adj.主人的，主要的，精通的，vt.征服控制，精通

sentences.english: a work of art by a true master
sentences.chinese: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.chinese: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

name: flock

sentences.chinese: 看展览的人络绎不绝。

detailed_translations.english: to go or gather together somewhere in large numbers

name: voyage
trans: n.，&，vi.航海，航空，航行，旅行，旅程

sentences.chinese: 过去从英格兰到印度要航行六个月。

sentences.english: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.chinese: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.english: I don’t want to make the voyage single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 我不想独自航行。

sentences.english: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是“企业”号星舰几次航行的经历。

detailed_translations.english: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft

name: arise
trans: vi.出现，由...引起，上升

sentences.chinese: 外交部出现了危机。

sentences.english: More problems like those at the nuclear power plant are certain to arise.
sentences.chinese: 核电厂肯定还会出现那样的问题。

detailed_translations.english: if a problem or difficult situation arises, it begins to happen

sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯埋头工作，试图忘记汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself very busy doing something, especially in order to forget about something else
to go under the surface of the water and be completely covered by it

name: ray
trans: n.光线，射线，辐射线，雷(男子名)

sentences.english: The room darkened as a cloud hid the sun’s rays.
sentences.chinese: 一朵云挡住了阳光，房间暗了下来。

name: device
trans: n.器械，装置，设备，设计，策略

sentences.english: modern labour-saving devices
sentences.chinese: 省力的现代设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械， 装置； 设计； 手段， 策略
detailed_translations.english: a machine or tool that does a special job

name: intermediate
trans: adj.中间的，中级的，n.中间体，媒介物，调解人，vi.调解，干涉

sentences.english: an intermediate coursebook
sentences.chinese: 中级课本

sentences.english: an intermediate stage/step in a process
sentences.chinese: 中间阶段 / 步骤

detailed_translations.english: having more than a basic knowledge of sth but not yet advanced

name: morning
trans: n.早晨，上午，开端

sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

trans: prep.，&，conj.直到...为止，vt.耕作，n.放钱的抽屉，冰碛

sentences.english: You keep as much money as you need in the till to run your operations.
sentences.chinese: 你做业务要储备足够的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: [地理][水文] 冰碛；放钱的抽屉；备用现金
detailed_translations.english: money in the till is money that a company or organization has
until
to prepare land for growing crops

name: collar
trans: n.衣领，项圈，vt.抓住，为...戴上项圈

sentences.chinese: 他抓住我的衣领。

sentences.english: He loosened his collar and tie .
sentences.chinese: 他松开了领子和领带。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a shirt, coat etc that fits around your neck, and is usually folded over

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓住；给…上领子；给…套上颈圈
detailed_translations.english: to catch someone and hold them so that they cannot escape

name: outward
trans: adj.外面的，向外的，表面的，外部的，adv.向外，在外，表面

sentences.english: The economy and outward appearance of the area have changed considerably.
sentences.chinese: 该地区的经济和面貌发生了很大的变化。

sentences.english: His clenched fist was the only outward sign of his anger.
sentences.chinese: 他那紧握的拳头是他内心愤怒的唯一外在表现。

sentences.english: Other poor countries looked outward, strengthening their ties to the economic superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 其他的穷国向外看，加强它们和经济大国的联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的
detailed_translations.english: relating to how a person or situation seems to be, rather than how it really is

detailed_translations.chinese: 向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地

name: envy
