sentences.english: I really envy you and Ian, you seem so happy together.
sentences.chinese: 我真是羡慕你和伊恩，你俩在一起看起来多幸福。

sentences.english: She has a lifestyle which most people would envy.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活方式会令大多数人感到羡慕。

sentences.english: She could see that all the other girls were green with envy(= feeling a lot of envy ).
sentences.chinese: 她看得出其他女孩都很眼红。

detailed_translations.english: to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
the feeling of wanting something that someone else has

name: fatigue
trans: n.疲劳，劳累，累活，adj.疲劳的，vt.使...疲劳，使...心智衰弱vi.疲劳

sentences.english: She hoped to sleep off her fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 她希望睡一觉之后会消除疲劳。

sentences.english: I have got over my weakness and fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了。

sentences.english: Everyone has analogy fatigue at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，人人都有类比疲劳。

detailed_translations.english: very great tiredness

name: realm
trans: n.王国，国土，领域

sentences.english: the spiritual realm
sentences.chinese: 精神领域

detailed_translations.english: a general area of knowledge, activity, or thought

name: eye
trans: n.眼睛，眼力，鉴赏力，v.看，注视

sentences.english: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.chinese: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.english: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.chinese: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with

name: plug
trans: n.塞子，插头，消防拴，电插头，vt.塞，射杀，宣传，vi.射杀，持续的工作

sentences.english: the bath plug
sentences.chinese: 浴缸塞子

sentences.english: an electric plug
sentences.chinese: 电源插头

sentences.english: We used mud to plug up the holes in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我们用泥堵住了房顶上的漏洞

detailed_translations.english: a round flat piece of rubber used for stopping the water flowing out of a bath or  sink
to fill or block a small hole

name: approve
trans: vt.赞成，称许，批准，核准，证实，vi.赞同

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

name: individual
trans: adj.个别的，独特的，n.个人，个体

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

name: below
trans: adv.在下面，向下，下级，prep.在...下面(以下)，(级别、重要性)低于，adj.在...下面，n.下面的东西

sentences.english: an animal that lives below ground
sentences.chinese: 生活在地下的动物

sentences.english: Water was dripping onto the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 水滴到下面的地板上。

sentences.english: I could hear voices in the courtyard below my window.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到院子里有人在我的窗下说话。

sentences.english: They camped a few hundred feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 他们在山峰下面几百英尺的地方扎了营。

sentences.english: Down below, people were talking and laughing.
sentences.chinese: 下面，人们谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Somewhere far below, a door slammed.
sentences.chinese: 下面远远的什么地方有一扇门砰地关上了。

sentences.english: The kitchen is directly below her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 厨房就在她卧室的正下方。

sentences.english: Captain Parker went below (=  to the lower level of the ship  ) , leaving Clooney in charge.
sentences.chinese: 帕克船长下去了，让克卢尼掌舵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面
detailed_translations.english: in a lower place or position, or on a lower level

name: hardly
trans: ad.几乎不，简直不

sentences.english: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.english: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.chinese: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.english: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.english: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.english: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.chinese: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.english: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.chinese: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

name: organize
trans: vt.组织，编组，vi.组织起来

sentences.english: The course was organized by a training company.
sentences.chinese: 这一课程是由一家培训公司组织的。

sentences.english: Students need to learn how to organize their work.
sentences.chinese: 学生要学会如何安排好自己的学习。

sentences.english: We are learning about how genes are organized.
sentences.chinese: 我们在了解基因是如何排列的。

sentences.chinese: 把肉切成片。

trans: adj.新近的，最近的

sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.chinese: 用胶布贴在墙上的照片

sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.chinese: 墙上留下了潮湿的痕迹。

sentences.chinese: 该组织内部的改革派和保守派之争

name: sword

sentences.chinese: 他佩带上他的剑。

name: garden

sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.

sentences.chinese: 儿童在二年级学习乘法。

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

name: discovery
trans: n.发现，被发现的事物

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

name: occurrence
trans: n.发生，出现，事件

sentences.english: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病的最高发病率在65岁以上的人群中。

sentences.english: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 投诉似乎成了天天发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of something happening

name: decrease
trans: vi.，&n.减少，减少

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

name: cabin
trans: n.小木屋，船舱，机舱，vt.抑制，vi.住在小屋

sentences.english: a log cabin
sentences.chinese: 原木小屋

sentences.english: 英文例句He showed her to a small cabin.
sentences.chinese: 他把她带到一间小房舱。

sentences.english: He sat quietly in the first class cabin of the flight looking tired.
sentences.chinese: 他静静地坐在班机的头等舱内，看上去有些疲惫。

detailed_translations.english: a small house, especially one built of wood in an area of forest or mountains

name: chase
trans: n.追逐，追赶，追求，狩猎，争取，vt.追捕，狩猎

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

name: meet
trans: vt.遇见，引见，经历，结识，对付，满足，支付，vi.相遇，集合，交锋相交，n.集会，比，运动会，adj.适宜的，合适的

sentences.english: You’ll never guess who I met in town.
sentences.chinese: 你绝对猜不出我在镇上碰到谁了。

sentences.english: I was worried I might meet Henry on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我担心可能会在公共汽车上遇到亨利。

detailed_translations.english: to see someone by chance and talk to them
to see someone by chance and talk to them

name: nowhere
trans: adv.任何地方都不，n.不知道的地方，无处

sentences.english: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

detailed_translations.english: not in any place or to any place

name: preparation
trans: n.准备，预备，制备

sentences.english: This dish is good for dinner parties because much of the preparation can be done ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜适合宴会，因为很多准备工作可以事先做好。

sentences.english: Plans for the new school are now in preparation .
sentences.chinese: 新学校的设计图正在绘制中。

sentences.english: a course in food service and food preparation
sentences.chinese: 餐饮服务和备菜课程

detailed_translations.english: the process of preparing something or preparing for something

name: share
trans: n.份，份额，股份，部份，分担，犁头，vt.分享，共有，分配，vi.分享

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

name: evaporate
trans: vt.使蒸发，vi.蒸发，失去水分，消失

sentences.english: Most of the water had evaporated.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的水都蒸发了。

sentences.english: The sun evaporates moisture on the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太阳会蒸发叶子上的水分。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas
if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas

name: excuse
trans: vt.原谅，免除，辩解，准许离开，同意赦免，n.借口，理由，低劣的样品，假条

sentences.english: I’ll excuse you this time, but don’t be late again.
sentences.chinese: 这次我原谅你，但别再迟到了。

sentences.english: Please excuse my bad handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 请原谅，我的字写得不好。

sentences.english: Can I be excused from swimming today? I have a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我今天能不游泳吗？我感冒了。

detailed_translations.english: to forgive someone for doing something that is not seriously wrong, such as being rude or careless
a reason that you invent to explain an action and to hide your real intentions

name: ruler
trans: n.统治者，尺，直尺

sentences.english: a 12-inch ruler
sentences.chinese: 一把12英寸的尺子

detailed_translations.chinese: 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人
detailed_translations.english: someone such as a king or queen who has official power over a country or area

name: copper
trans: n.铜，铜币，铜制器，有紫铜色翅膀的小蝴蝶，警官，vt.镀铜

sentences.english: He offered to do the job for a few coppers.
sentences.chinese: 他说他来做这份工作，给他几个铜板就行。

sentences.english: His hair has reverted back to its original copper hue.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发恢复到了原来的铜色。

detailed_translations.english: a soft reddish-brown metal that allows electricity and heat to pass through it easily, and is used to make electrical wires, water pipes etc. It is a chemical element: symbol Cu
Copper is sometimes used to describe things that are reddish-brown in colour

name: severe
trans: adj.严格的，严厉的，剧烈的，严重的，严峻的

sentences.english: His injuries were quite severe.
sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.english: She’s suffering from severe depression.
sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.english: The US faces severe economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.english: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的
detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

name: since
trans: conj.从...以来，因为，既然，自从，adv.后来，prep.自从

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

name: precise
trans: adj.精确的，准确的，认真的

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: proclaim
trans: vt.宣告，宣布，表明，公布，赞扬，显示出

sentences.english: The President proclaimed the republic’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 总统宣布共和国独立。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣告，公布；声明；表明；赞扬
detailed_translations.english: to say publicly or officially that something important is true or exists

name: their
trans: pron.他(她、它)们的，adj.他们的，她们的，它们的

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
sentences.chinese: 他们有他们的报酬。

sentences.english: My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

trans: adj.显而易见的，重要的

sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体有明显的影响。

sentences.chinese: 显而易见，他们中的许多人对这个问题都避而不答。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

name: clue
trans: n.线索，暗示，提示，vt.提示

sentences.english: Police have found a vital clue .
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了至关重要的线索。

sentences.english: Archaeological evidence will provide clues about what the building was used for.
sentences.chinese: 考古证据将为这幢建筑的用途提供线索。

sentences.english: a desperate search for clues
sentences.chinese: 拼命寻找线索

detailed_translations.english: an object or piece of information that helps someone solve a crime or mystery

name: lane
trans: n.(乡间)小路，小巷，行车道，跑道

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

name: daughter
trans: n.女儿，adj.与女儿有关的，女性直系后代的

sentences.english: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.chinese: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.english: our eldest daughter
sentences.chinese: 我们的长女

detailed_translations.english: someone’s female child

name: deserve
trans: vt.应受，值得，vi.应该得到

sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

name: site
trans: n.地点，地基，场所，位置，现场，vt.使...位于

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

name: oppose
trans: vt.反对，反抗，以...对抗，抗争

sentences.english: Congress is continuing to oppose the President’s health care budget.
sentences.chinese: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something such as a plan or idea and try to prevent it from happening or succeeding

trans: adj.枯燥的，不鲜明的，呆滞的，迟钝的，无趣的，钝的，暗的，vt.使变钝，vi.变钝

sentences.chinese: 有伊丽莎白在这里生活绝不会无聊。

sentences.english: a dull movie
sentences.chinese: 一部沉闷的电影

sentences.chinese: 在我听来，这很无聊。

sentences.english: The weekly meeting tends to be deadly dull (= very dull ) .
sentences.chinese: 每周一次的会议总是十分无聊。

sentences.english: The bird is dull brown and gray in colour.
sentences.chinese: 这只鸟是暗淡的棕灰色。

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting

name: canon
trans: n.，教会法规，标准、准则，正典，正式名单，教堂里的教士，佳能，(财富500强公司之一，总部所在地日本，主要经营办公设备)

sentences.english: the Shakespearean canon
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚真作集

detailed_translations.english: a list of books or pieces of music that are officially recognized as being the work of a certain writer

name: motivate
trans: vt.促动，激励，激发(兴趣或欲望)，给与动机

sentences.english: A good teacher has to be able to motivate her students.
sentences.chinese: 好教师必须能够激发学生的积极性。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to achieve something and make them willing to work hard in order to do this

name: midnight
trans: n.午夜，子夜，夜半，漆黑

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

name: development
trans: n.发展，开发，生长，显影，开发区

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

name: further
trans: adv.更远地，此外，进一步地，adj.更远的，v.促进，推动，vt.促进

sentences.english: They walked a little further.
sentences.chinese: 他们又往前走了一点。

sentences.english: His hands moved further down her back.
sentences.chinese: 他的手在她背上继续往下滑。

sentences.english: They’ve never been further south than San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 他们从没有到过比圣迭戈更往南的地方。

detailed_translations.english: a greater distance, or beyond a particular place
more or additional

name: transfer
trans: vt.，&，vi.转移，调动，调转，调任，n.迁移，移动，换车

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

name: liberate
trans: vt.解放，释放，使获自由，v.解放，使获得自由，释出，放出

sentences.english: A few days later, our armies liberated the city.
sentences.chinese: 几天以后，我军解放了这座城市。

detailed_translations.english: to free prisoners, a city, a country etc from someone’s control

name: compose
trans: vt.组成，构成，创作，写作，作曲，使镇静，vi.创作

sentences.english: Barrington has composed the music for a new production of ‘A Midsummer Night’s Dream’.
sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水由氢和氧组成。

detailed_translations.english: to write a piece of music

name: big
trans: adj.大的，巨大的，重要的，adv.以郑重的方式，大数量，n.杰出的组织和个人

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: cottage
trans: n.村舍，小屋

sentences.english: a country cottage
sentences.chinese: 乡间小屋

sentences.english: We’re staying in a holiday cottage in Dorset.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在多塞特的一个度假小别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅
detailed_translations.english: a small house in the country

name: ambulance
trans: n.救护车，野战医院

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 救护车服务

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我们需要叫救护车吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: [车辆][医] 救护车；战时流动医院
detailed_translations.english: a special vehicle that is used to take people who are ill or injured to hospital

name: soccer
trans: n.英式足球

sentences.english: I never play soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.english: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.chinese: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.english: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.chinese: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal

name: goose
trans: n.鹅，雌鹅，鹅肉，vt.推动

sentences.english: ...roast goose.
sentences.chinese: …烤鹅。

detailed_translations.english: the cooked meat of this bird

name: industry
trans: n.工业，产业，勤劳

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

name: subject
trans: n.，题目，学科，[语]主语，主题，话题，题材，主观，(君主国)国民实验对象，adj.，服从的，易患的vt.，使隶属，使服从，使遭遇

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: cruel
trans: adj.残忍的，残酷的，引起痛苦的

sentences.english: His death was a cruel blow .
sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.english: Sometimes life seems unbearably cruel.
sentences.chinese: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

detailed_translations.chinese: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的
detailed_translations.english: making someone suffer or feel unhappy

name: genius
trans: n.天才，天赋，天资，高智力

sentences.english: The film reveals Fellini’s genius.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius
sentences.chinese: 天才之作

detailed_translations.english: a very high level of intelligence, mental skill, or ability, which only a few people have

name: visitor
trans: n.访问者，游客，参观者

sentences.english: Times Square attracts more than 30 million visitors annually.
sentences.chinese: 时代广场每年吸引三千多万游客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
detailed_translations.english: someone who comes to visit a place or a person

name: court
trans: n.法院，法庭，庭院，奉承，球场，v.献殷勤，追求，招致危险

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

name: suck
trans: vt.吸，吮，啜，吸收，吸入，vi.吸，吸收，奉承，<俚>烂，令人讨厌n.吸吮，吸力

sentences.english: They waited in silence and sucked their sweets.
sentences.chinese: 他们静静地等着，吮着糖果。

detailed_translations.english: to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in
an act of sucking

name: helicopter
trans: n.直升机

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

name: side
trans: n.边，旁边，一方，侧，方面，adj.旁的，侧的，vt.支持，同意，vi.支持

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.english: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.chinese: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.english: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
in or on the side of something

name: exception
trans: n.例外，除外

sentences.english: It’s been cold, but today’s an exception.
sentences.chinese: 天气一直寒冷，但今天是个例外。

sentences.english: The law applies to all EU countries; Britain is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律适用于所有欧盟国家，英国也不例外。

sentences.english: We don’t usually accept checks, but for you we’ll make an exception (= not include you in this rule ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一般不接受支票，但对你我们就破个例。

sentences.english: The spelling of this word is an interesting exception to the rule.
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的拼法是该规则一个有趣的例外。

sentences.english: Successful two-career couples are still the exception, not the rule (= used to emphasize that something is unusual ).
sentences.chinese: 夫妇俩都事业有成的仍不常见。

detailed_translations.english: something or someone that is not included in a general statement or does not follow a rule or pattern

name: hour
trans: n.小时，时间，时刻，钟点

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

name: erect
trans: vt.建造，建立，使竖立，adj.直立的，竖立的，笔直的

sentences.english: an imposing town hall, erected in 1892
sentences.chinese: 一座气势宏伟的市政厅，建于1892年

sentences.english: Police have erected barriers across the main roads into the town.
sentences.chinese: 警察在进城的主要道路上设立了路障。

sentences.english: It took a couple of hours to erect the tent.
sentences.chinese: 搭帐篷花了几个小时。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a building or wall

name: forth
trans: adv.向前，向外，往外，露出

sentences.english: The house was still burning, pouring forth thick black smoke.
sentences.chinese: 房子仍在燃烧，冒出浓浓的黑烟。

detailed_translations.english: going out from a place or point, and moving forwards or outwards

name: rabbit
trans: n.兔子，野兔，vi.猎兔，vt.让...见鬼去吧，该死

sentences.english: The rabbit disappeared in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.english: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.chinese: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.english: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.chinese: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground

name: destination
trans: n.目的地，终点，目标，景点

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

name: dynamic
trans: adj.有活力的，动态的，(有)动力的，(有)力的，n.动力，力学

sentences.english: a dynamic and unstable process
sentences.chinese: 不断变化的、不稳定的过程

detailed_translations.chinese: 有活力的；动力的；不断变化的
detailed_translations.english: continuously moving or changing
something that causes action or change

name: warmth
trans: n.暖和，温暖，热烈，热情，热心

sentences.english: the warmth of the summer sun
sentences.chinese: 夏天太阳的暖意

sentences.english: the warmth of her smile
sentences.chinese: 她微笑中的热情

detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

name: cow
trans: n.母牛，奶牛，母兽

sentences.english: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.chinese: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.english: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.english: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛早产了。

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

name: seed
trans: n.种(子)，籽，萌芽，vi.(植物)结实，播种，vt.播种

sentences.english: He’s been top seed for the past two years.
sentences.chinese: 他在过去两年中一直是头号种子选手。

detailed_translations.chinese: 种子；根据；精液；萌芽；子孙；原由
detailed_translations.english: a player or team in a competition that is given a particular position, according to how likely they are to win
to remove seeds from fruit or vegetables

name: relief
trans: n.减轻，救济(品)，援救，解除，安慰，浮雕，对比，adj.提供救济的文本的

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

name: soluble
trans: adj.可溶的，可以解决的

sentences.english: soluble aspirin
sentences.chinese: 可溶性阿司匹林

detailed_translations.english: a soluble substance can be  dissolved  in a liquid

name: triangle
trans: n.三角(形)

sentences.english: Yes, it is like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

name: land
trans: n.陆地，国土，土地，vi.上岸，使靠岸，卸货，得到，登陆

sentences.english: They own a lot of land.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有许多土地。

sentences.english: He bought a piece of land.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一块地。

sentences.english: After 21 days at sea, we sighted land.
sentences.chinese: 经过21天的海上航行，我们见到了陆地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of ground, especially when used for farming or building

name: freely
trans: adv.自由地，免费地，直率地，大量地

sentences.english: the country’s first freely elected president
sentences.chinese: 该国首位自由选举产生的总统

sentences.english: EU members are allowed to travel freely between member states.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟成员国国民可以在成员国之间自由旅行。

sentences.english: They freely admitted using the drug.
sentences.chinese: 他们坦率地承认吸毒。

detailed_translations.english: without anyone stopping or limiting something

name: furthermore
trans: adv.而且，此外

sentences.english: He is old and unpopular. Furthermore, he has at best only two years of political life ahead of him.
sentences.chinese: 他年纪已老，又不得人心，而且他最多也只有两年的政治生命了。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to what has already been said

name: seventh
trans: num.第七，七分之一，n.第七，七分之一，adj.第七的，adv.第七

sentences.english: On the seventh day of Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节的第七天。

sentences.english: Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.chinese: 圣灰星期三，大斋首日：复活节前第七个星期三和大斋期的第一天，在这一天很多基督教都用灰在前额画一标记以作忏悔和必死的标志。

sentences.english: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

detailed_translations.english: one of seven equal parts of something
one of seven equal parts of something

name: visit
trans: vt.，&，n.访问，参观，拜访，探访

sentences.english: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

detailed_translations.english: to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest

name: rest
trans: n.休息，安静，静止，其余的部分，其余的人，adj.其余的，vi.搁，(在)，休息，信任，vt.使休息，依赖，基于某事

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

name: clock
trans: n.钟，时钟，计时器，仪表

sentences.english: I heard the clock strike six (= make six loud sounds ) .
sentences.chinese: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.english: The station clock was ten minutes slow (= showed a time ten minutes earlier than the real time ) .
sentences.chinese: 车站的钟慢了十分钟。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building

name: fog
trans: n.雾，烟雾，尘雾，朦胧，喷雾，迷惑，vt.，&，vi.以雾笼罩，使模糊迷惑

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
detailed_translations.english: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

name: anchor
trans: n.铁锚，vi.抛锚，停泊，用锚系住，担任（广播，电视新闻节目）的主持人

sentences.english: We dropped anchor a few yards offshore.
sentences.chinese: 我们在离岸几码远的地方抛锚停航。

sentences.english: The next morning, they weighed anchor (=  lifted the anchor  ) and began to move south again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上他们起锚，又开始向南航行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播
detailed_translations.english: a piece of heavy metal that is lowered to the bottom of the sea, a lake etc to prevent a ship or boat moving
to fasten something firmly so that it cannot move

name: cafe
trans: n.咖啡馆，小餐厅

sentences.english: We went to a cafe and lazed the whole afternoon away there.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了一间咖啡馆，在那儿消磨了整个下午。

sentences.english: Marshal turned to watch her as she walked through the cafe, then he turned to us.
sentences.chinese: 元帅转向看她，她走过的咖啡馆，然后他转过身来给我们。

sentences.english: At a cat “cafe,” the emphasis is not on food and beverages but relaxing in the company of cats.
sentences.chinese: 在猫咪咖啡馆，重点不在于食物和饮料，而在于有猫咪陪伴的那份轻松愉快。

name: gesture
trans: n.姿势，手势，姿态，vt.，&，vi.作手势表达

sentences.english: Jim raised his hands in a despairing gesture.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆举起双手，做出绝望的手势。

sentences.english: The Queen has now made a gesture towards public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 女王现在摆出了尊重民意的姿态。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

name: industrial
trans: adj.工业的，产业的，n.工业公司

sentences.english: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to industry or the people working in it

name: acquaintance
trans: n.，认识，了解，熟人

sentences.english: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.english: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们在因特网上相识。

sentences.english: The practice of a lawyer requires acquaintance with court procedures.
sentences.chinese: 当律师要熟悉法庭程序。

detailed_translations.english: someone you know, but who is not a close friend

name: corn
trans: n.谷物，谷粒，陈词滥调，鸡眼，(英)小麦，vt.使成颗粒状，用盐水腌制，用谷物喂，vi.变成颗粒

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

name: torch
trans: n.火炬，火把，手电筒，纵火犯，v.用火炬点燃

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: reach
trans: vt.抵达，到达，伸出，延伸，取得联系，vi.达到，延伸，n.延伸，范围，河段

sentences.english: We reached London late at night.
sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.english: She reached into her bag and produced a business card.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.english: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

detailed_translations.english: to arrive at a place

name: learn
trans: vi.学，学习，了解，习得，vt.学，学习，获悉

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

name: mass
trans: n.众多，团，群众，块，大量，adj.群众的，大规模的，v.集中，(Mass)，n.弥撒，弥撒曲，pl.群

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

name: wrist
trans: n.腕，腕关节，手腕，护腕

sentences.english: He broke his wrist climbing rocks for a cigarette ad.
sentences.chinese: 他为了一个香烟广告攀岩折断了手腕。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body where your hand joins your arm

name: duty
trans: n.职责，责任，义务，税，adj.值班的，作为一种义务的

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

name: green

sentences.chinese: 漂亮的碧眼

sentences.chinese: 整个公园环境都给垃圾破坏了。

sentences.english: I don’t want to spoil your fun.

sentences.chinese: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

sentences.english: a dozen red roses
sentences.chinese: 一打红玫瑰

sentences.chinese: 一大束玫瑰送到了她的桌子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 玫瑰；粉红色；蔷薇（花）；粉红色的葡萄酒

detailed_translations.chinese: 玫瑰花的；玫瑰色的；粉红色的；带有玫瑰香味的

sentences.english: artificial fertilizers

trans: n.盐，盐类，刺激，adj.，含盐的，辛辣的，vt.加盐于，用盐腌，abbr.，(=Strategic，Arms，Limitation，Talks)，限制战略武器会谈

sentences.chinese: 这里面也许要加点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.chinese: 递一下盐好吗？

sentences.chinese: 用中火把调味汁煮到变稠，同时烧水准备煮意大利面。

sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.chinese: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.chinese: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.chinese: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

name: satellite

sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

sentences.chinese: 弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

name: adult
trans: n.，成年人adj.成年的，成人的，成熟的

sentences.english: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子觉得与大人很难谈得来。

sentences.english: an adult lion
sentences.chinese: 一头成年的狮子

name: roll

sentences.english: The ball rolled into the street.
sentences.chinese: 球滚到了街上。

sentences.chinese: 摄影机开始转动，大家安静了下来。

name: purpose

sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

name: diary

sentences.english: Inge kept a diary (= wrote in a diary ) during the war years.
sentences.chinese: 英奇在战争年代里一直写日记。

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

name: trick

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.english: The trick is to bend your knees as you catch the ball.
sentences.chinese: 诀窍是接球时要屈膝。

sentences.english: She knew she’d been tricked, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己被骗了，但为时已晚。

name: sit
trans: vi.坐，就坐，孵，vt.使坐，担任，开会，孵，n.坐

sentences.english: The parliament building sits in a large square.
sentences.chinese: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.english: He’s got a computer sitting on his desk, but he doesn’t use it.
sentences.chinese: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.english: My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

sentences.english: The house has sat empty for two years.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子已经空置两年了。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or condition

detailed_translations.chinese: (Sit)人名；(东南亚国家华语)硕；(罗)西特

name: attention
trans: n.注意(力)，留心，关心，立正

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: grieve
trans: vt.使悲痛，vi.悲痛

sentences.english: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
sentences.chinese: 人们在所爱之人去世后会有一段悲伤期。

sentences.english: She grieved the loss of her only son.
sentences.chinese: 她因为失去唯一的儿子而悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy

name: toss
trans: vt.，&，vi.扔，抛，掷，投掷，摇荡，辗转，n.投掷，震荡

sentences.english: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.chinese: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
detailed_translations.english: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
detailed_translations.english: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game

name: happy
trans: adj.快乐的，幸福的，乐于做某事

sentences.english: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.english: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.english: the happy faces of the children
sentences.chinese: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.english: This has been the happiest day of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

detailed_translations.english: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life

name: festival
trans: n.节日，音乐节，庆祝及祭祀，欢宴，adj.节日的，喜庆的

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

name: pop
trans: n.，流行音乐，流行歌曲，流行文化艺术，取出，砰的一声，爆破声，(尤用作称呼)爸，adj.，流行的，热门的，通俗的，vt.，取出，发出爆裂声，突然伸出，击打，开火，vi.，发出砰的一声，(因激动、惊奇)张大，adv.，突然间地，暴发地，POP，abbr.=point，of，purchase，POP，abbr.=population，人口

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

name: note
trans: n.笔记，便条，注释，备忘录，音符，音调，票据，纸币，vt.记录，注解，注意

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

name: sad
trans: adj.悲哀的，令人悲痛的，伤心的，不能令人满意的

sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.english: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

detailed_translations.english: If you are sad, you feel unhappy, usually because something has happened that you do not like

name: desperate
trans: adj.拼死的，绝望的，不顾一切的，极想得到的

sentences.chinese: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.english: Time was running out and we were getting desperate .
sentences.chinese: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

sentences.english: the missing teenager’s desperate parents
sentences.chinese: 失踪少年绝望的父母

detailed_translations.english: willing to do anything to change a very bad situation, and not caring about danger

name: possess
trans: vt.占用，拥有(财产)，持有，支配

sentences.english: Different workers possess different skills.
sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.english: He no longer possessed the power to frighten her.
sentences.chinese: 他再也吓不倒她了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular quality or ability

name: rainy
trans: adj.下雨的，多雨的

sentences.english: a cold rainy day in October
sentences.chinese: 十月里一个寒冷的雨天

sentences.english: I hate rainy weather .
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌雨天。

sentences.english: the rainy season
sentences.chinese: 雨季

detailed_translations.english: a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot

name: prompt
trans: adj.，及时的，迅速的，敏捷的，立刻的，vt.，敦促，激起，促进，推动，提示，vi.，提示，n.，提示，提示的内容，[商]，付款期限

sentences.english: Prompt action must be taken.
sentences.chinese: 必须立即采取行动。

sentences.english: Prompt payment is requested.
sentences.chinese: 请立即付款。

sentences.english: a prompt response
sentences.chinese: 迅速的答复

sentences.english: What prompted you to buy that suit?
sentences.chinese: 什么原因让你买下了那套西装？

detailed_translations.english: done quickly, immediately, or at the right time
to make someone decide to do something

name: young
trans: adj.年轻的，没有经验的，初期的，n.青年人，幼崽

sentences.english: a young child
sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.english: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的

young people

name: prosperity
trans: n.繁荣，昌盛，兴旺

sentences.english: a time of economic prosperity
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣时期

detailed_translations.english: when people have money and everything that is needed for a good life

name: unload
trans: vt.卸(货)，卸下，摆脱...之负担，(大量)倾销，vi.卸货，摆脱负担，退出(弹药，胶片等)

sentences.english: Unload everything from the boat and clean it thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 从小船上卸下所有的货物并彻底地清洗。

detailed_translations.english: to remove a load from a vehicle, ship etc
to remove a load from a vehicle, ship etc

name: luggage
trans: n.行李，皮箱，皮包

sentences.chinese: 他们搜查他的行李看是否藏有毒品。

detailed_translations.english: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling

name: margin
trans: n.页边的空白，边缘，差额，利润，vt.使围绕于，加边缘

sentences.chinese: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.english: Use double spacing and wide margins to leave room for comments.
sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.chinese: 非洲南部的西隅

detailed_translations.english: the empty space at the side of a page

name: author
trans: n.作者，作家，创造者，vt.创造，写作

sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: control
trans: vt.控制，克制，掌管，支配，n.克制，控制，管制，操作装置

sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

name: stove
trans: n.炉子，火炉，电炉，火炉窑，烘房【主英】温室

sentences.english: a pot of soup simmering on the stove
sentences.chinese: 在炉灶上煨着的一锅汤

sentences.english: a wood-burning stove
sentences.chinese: 烧木柴的火炉

detailed_translations.english: a piece of kitchen equipment on which you cook food in pots and pans, and that contains an oven

name: spray
trans: n.浪花，喷雾，水沫，喷雾器，vt.喷，喷雾，扫射，喷射

sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

name: province
trans: n.省，范围，领域，部门

sentences.chinese: 计算机一度为科学家和数学家专用。

detailed_translations.english: a subject that someone knows a lot about or something that only they are responsible for

trans: adj.执行的，行政的，决策的，经营的，[计算机]，执行指令，n.执行者，主管，行政部门

sentences.chinese: 有执行权的委员会

trans: n.蜡烛，烛形物，烛光

sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

name: fluid
trans: n.流体，液体，adj.流畅优美的，流体的，流动的，不稳定的

sentences.chinese: 他还不能吃固体食物，只能进流食。

sentences.chinese: 一种强力清洁液

detailed_translations.english: a liquid
fluid movements are smooth, relaxed, and graceful

trans: n.座，座部，位子，所在地，中心，vt.使坐下，可容纳，vi.坐

sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

trans: adj.宗教的，虔诚的，细心的，n.修道院成员，僧侣

sentences.chinese: 她的宗教信仰和我的不同。

sentences.english: a religious school
sentences.chinese: 宗教学校

sentences.english: the dates of major religious observances such as Easter or Christmas
sentences.chinese: 复活节和圣诞节等重要宗教节日的日期

detailed_translations.chinese: 宗教的； 笃信宗教的， 虔诚的
detailed_translations.english: relating to religion in general or to a particular religion

sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

name: gentleman
trans: n.绅士，先生，有教养的人

sentences.chinese: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.chinese: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know

trans: adv.重复地，再三地，一再

sentences.chinese: 格雷厄姆一再被提醒工作不要这么拼命。

detailed_translations.english: many times

trans: adj.诚实的，可敬的，正直的，adv.老实说

sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

name: round

sentences.chinese: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.english: Gather round! I have an important announcement to make.
sentences.chinese: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.english: He put his arm gently round her waist.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻地搂着她的腰。

sentences.english: I kept the key on a chain round my neck.
sentences.chinese: 我给钥匙穿了根链子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: The ballroom’s huge, with windows all the way round .
sentences.chinese: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.english: There was a lovely courtyard with tables all round .
sentences.chinese: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

detailed_translations.english: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone

on the other side of something, or to the other side of it without going through it or over it

name: cure
trans: vt.医治，消除，vt.，&vi.治疗，治愈，改正，n.治疗，治愈，治疗法

sentences.english: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness

name: flavour
trans: n.味，味道，风味，香味，vt给...加味

sentences.english: Which flavour do you want - chocolate or vanilla?
sentences.chinese: 你要哪种味道的，巧克力还是香草？

detailed_translations.english: the particular taste of a food or drink

name: rider
trans: n.骑马的人，乘车的人，骑士，附件，扶手

sentences.english: a horse and rider
sentences.chinese: 马匹和骑师

detailed_translations.english: an extra or more detailed piece of information that is added to an official document and changes it slightly

name: debt
trans: n.债，债务，欠债，负债状态，义务，罪，过失

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

name: pressure
trans: n.压力，压强，压迫，压，按

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: taxi
trans: n.出租汽车，v.用出租车运送，乘计程车，(飞机)滑行

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

detailed_translations.english: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

name: pill
trans: n.药丸，丸剂，无法逃避的讨厌事，屈辱事，vt.服用药丸，把...制成药丸，被抢劫，vi.起球粒，成丸状，阶段性完成

sentences.english: He has to take pills to control his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他必须服药控制血压。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["sleeping pills"]}
sentences.chinese: 安眠药

sentences.english: a bottle of vitamin pills
sentences.chinese: 一瓶维生素片

detailed_translations.chinese: 药丸；弹丸，子弹；口服避孕药
detailed_translations.english: a small solid piece of medicine that you swallow whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

name: fashion
trans: n.样子，方式，风尚，流行，时装vt.形成，适合

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

name: surprisingly
trans: adv.惊人地(意外地)

name: result
trans: n.成果，结果，成绩，答案，vi.发生，结果，产生，致使

sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it

name: struggle
trans: n.，&，vi.斗争，挣扎，竞争，奋斗

trans: n.，酒精，酒，醇，乙醇

sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: alcohol abuse

sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

trans: prep.，横过，穿过，在...对面，adv.，横过，使...被理解(或接受)

sentences.english: There's a bank right across the street.
sentences.chinese: 街对面就有一家银行。

trans: n.一月

trans: adj.小的，少的，小型的，adv.些许地n.狭小部分

sentences.english: a small town

detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

trans: n.走廊，回廊，通路

trans: n.哲学，哲理，人生观

trans: n.沙，沙子，沙滩，v.撒沙，以沙掩盖

name: team

sentences.chinese: 她写给我的第一封信不到一页，第二封信也一样简短。

sentences.chinese: 吃穿的费用近年来下降了。 同样地，燃料价格也有大幅 回落。

trans: n.被单，床单，纸张，薄板，张，片，vt.盖上被单，遍布，使成片状，vi.成片落下或流动，adj.片状的

sentences.chinese: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.english: white cotton sheets
sentences.chinese: 白色的棉布床单

sentences.english: a sheet of glass

name: consequently

sentences.chinese: 大多数的电脑使用者都没有经过正规的键盘操作训练，因此他们的键盘技巧不够熟练。

sentences.chinese: 这些分子被吸收到血液里，从而影响到器官。

name: meat
trans: n.肉，主要或重要部分

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

name: drown

sentences.chinese: 船翻后许多人淹死了。

sentences.chinese: 简在那条河里溺水身亡。

detailed_translations.english: to die from being under water for too long, or to kill someone in this way

name: transform

sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: ink
trans: n.墨水，油墨

sentences.english: Please write in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing or drawing

name: teenager

sentences.chinese: 一部针对青少年的性教育电视系列片

name: mode

sentences.chinese: 最高效的运输方式

sentences.chinese: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

name: asleep

sentences.chinese: 安静！ 宝宝在睡觉。

detailed_translations.english: sleeping

sentences.chinese: 你帮个忙告诉凯莉说我来不了好吗？

sentences.chinese: 科技及其对现代社会的影响

sentences.chinese: 儿童是最脆弱的社会成员。

trans: n.事情，物质，原因，vi.要紧，有关系

sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

trans: adv.突然地

sentences.chinese: 汇集了来自南美，欧洲，亚洲，大洋洲和埃及的一系列干尸和艺术品将举办全球巡回展览。

sentences.chinese: 他们已经结婚八年了。

sentences.chinese: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

sentences.chinese: 主席是大家一致推选出来的。

sentences.chinese: 她父亲勉强答应了这桩婚事。

sentences.chinese: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.chinese: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.chinese: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.chinese: 我们好几个星期没有她的音信了。

sentences.chinese: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.chinese: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

name: stain

name: nest

sentences.chinese: 鸟窝

sentences.english: In May the females build a nest and lay their eggs.
sentences.chinese: 雌鸟在5月份筑巢产蛋。

name: transmit

sentences.chinese: 美国公开赛将通过卫星现场直播。

sentences.english: The system transmits information over digital phone lines.
sentences.chinese: 这一系统通过数字电话线路传输信息。

name: awkward

sentences.english: I hoped he would stop asking awkward questions .
sentences.chinese: 我希望他不要再问令人难堪的问题。

sentences.chinese: 她不知道是该跟他握手还是亲他的脸颊，一时很尴尬。
