sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

name: academy
trans: n.，私立中学，专科院校，学院，学术，学会

sentences.english: the American Academy of Arts and Letters
sentences.chinese: 美国艺术和文学学会

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校
detailed_translations.english: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

name: materialism
trans: n.唯物主义，唯物论，实利主义

sentences.english: Scientific materialism thus triumphed over ignorance and superstition.
sentences.chinese: 科学唯物主义就这样战胜了无知和迷信。

detailed_translations.english: the belief that only physical things really exist

name: hedge
trans: n.，篱笆，树篱，障碍物，防止财产损失的方法，vt.，包围，限制vi.，种树篱，拐弯抹角，保护自己不受财产损失adj.，树篱的，篱笆边的

sentences.english: You’re hedging again - have you got the money or haven’t you?
sentences.chinese: 你又在闪烁其词了，你究竟有没有钱？

sentences.english: ‘That depends on my partner,’ she hedged.
sentences.chinese: “那取决于我的合伙人。”她避重就轻地答道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 避免直接回答；   套头交易； 以套期保值避免损失
detailed_translations.english: to avoid giving a direct answer to a question

detailed_translations.chinese: 保值措施；套期保值；树篱；防备；障碍物；套头，两面下注以避免损失
detailed_translations.english: a row of small bushes or trees growing close together, usually dividing one field or garden from another

name: freedom
trans: n.自由，自主

sentences.english: People here like their freedom and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人喜欢他们所拥有的自由与隐私权。

sentences.english: the rights and freedoms of citizens
sentences.chinese: 公民的权利与自由

sentences.english: the freedom to vote
sentences.chinese: 选举自由

sentences.english: He thinks children have too much freedom these days.
sentences.chinese: 他认为如今的孩子太自由了。

detailed_translations.english: the right to do what you want without being controlled or restricted by anyone

name: splash
trans: n.飞溅的水，污点，卖弄vt.溅湿，溅开，泼，飞溅

sentences.english: Water splashed onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 水哗的一声泼洒在地板上。

sentences.english: He splashed cold water on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把冷水往脸上泼。

sentences.english: We heard the splash when she fell into the pool.
sentences.chinese: 她掉进游泳池时我们听见扑通的一声。

detailed_translations.english: (of liquid) to fall noisily onto a surface
the sound of sth hitting liquid or of liquid hitting sth

name: investigate
trans: vt.，&，vi.调查，研究，[计算机]，研究

sentences.english: The state police are investigating the incident.
sentences.chinese: 州警察正调查此事。

sentences.english: The study investigates the impact of violent TV programming on children.
sentences.chinese: 该研究调查暴力电视节目对儿童的影响。

sentences.english: I heard a noise and went downstairs to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 我听见响声，就下楼去看个究竟。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find out the truth about something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

name: stewardess
trans: n.空中小姐，女乘务员，女管家

sentences.english: When I asked the solitary stewardess if she could clean the floor so I could place my purse on it, she said flippantly, “Oh, I’m not going to clean it, what can I tell you, it’s a plane.
sentences.chinese: 当我问及那个仅有的服务员，是否可以把地板擦一擦好让我能发一下包时。 她毫不礼貌的说：“嗷，我不打算那么做，我得告诉你这是在飞机上。

detailed_translations.english: a woman whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship

name: amplify
trans: vt.放大，增强，扩大，详述，使...增幅

sentences.english: an amplified guitar
sentences.chinese: 带有扩音设备的电吉他

detailed_translations.chinese: 放大， 增强； 扩大； 详述， 进一步阐述
detailed_translations.english: to make sound louder, especially musical sound

name: knot
trans: n.(绳的)结，(树的)节，难题，一小群，vi.打结，vt.把...打成结系牢，捆扎

sentences.english: A pretty scarf was loosely knotted around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的脖子上松松地系着一条漂亮的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc
a hard round place in a piece of wood where a branch once joined the tree
to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc

name: furnish
trans: vt.供应，提供，装备，布置

sentences.english: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.english: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.chinese: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备，布置 （房间、建筑物）；供应，提供
detailed_translations.english: to put furniture and other things into a house or room

name: like
trans: vt.，喜欢，喜爱，希望，愿意，想，adj.，相似的，同样的，prep.，像如同，像要，n.，爱好，类似的人(或物)，adv.，大概，和...一样conj.，如同

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.english: Would you like a drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

name: combination
trans: n.结合，联合，化合，联合体

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

name: banana
trans: n.香蕉，芭蕉属植物

sentences.english: The area is under banana cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区种植香蕉。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉一年收两喷。

sentences.english: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

detailed_translations.english: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin

name: wood
trans: n.树林，森林，木头，木材，v.提供、装载(木材)，(以树木)覆盖adj.木制的

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

name: greet
trans: vt.问候，招呼，反应，致敬，欢迎，映入眼帘

sentences.english: Belinda greeted her warmly.
sentences.chinese: 贝琳达热情地招呼她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

name: anybody
trans: n.重要人物，pron.任何人

sentences.english: She swore me not to tell anybody about my secret.
sentences.chinese: 她向我发誓不把我的秘密告诉任何人。

sentences.english: I think we should be open to negotiate with anybody.
sentences.chinese: 他说：“我认为，我们应该同任何人进行谈判。

sentences.english: If using window is not appropriate than can anybody help me with dialog?
sentences.chinese: 如果使用窗口不适当的比任何人可以帮助我与对话？

name: Negro
trans: n.(含歧视意味)黑人，adj.黑人的

sentences.english: "I do not accept the Negro as my equal, " Douglas said. "And I deny that he is my brother.
sentences.chinese: “我不会接受黑人与我平等的思想，”道格拉斯说，“而且我拒绝把黑人当成我的兄弟。

sentences.english: It meant that I, a humble Negro girl, had just as much chance as anybody in the sight and love of God.
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着，我这样一个卑微的黑人女孩，也可以像其他人一样有很多机会受到上帝的关注和爱。

detailed_translations.english: a word for a black person, usually considered offensive
relating to or characteristic of Negroes

name: leisure
trans: n.空闲时间，悠闲，闲暇，休闲

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

name: investigation
trans: n.调查，调查研究

sentences.english: The investigation continued for nearly three years.
sentences.chinese: 调查持续了近三年。

sentences.english: a criminal investigation
sentences.chinese: 刑事调查

sentences.english: A private detective was hired to conduct the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 雇了一名私人侦探进行调查。

detailed_translations.english: an official attempt to find out the truth about or the cause of something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

name: comprehensive
trans: adj.广泛的，理解的，综合的

sentences.english: We offer our customers a comprehensive range of financial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们为客户提供全面的金融产品。

sentences.english: a comprehensive guide to British hotels and restaurants
sentences.chinese: 一本介绍英国酒店和餐厅的详尽指南

sentences.english: The following guidelines do not aim to be totally comprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 以下指导原则并非想要面面俱到。

detailed_translations.english: including all the necessary facts, details, or problems that need to be dealt with

name: rust
trans: n.锈，锈，vi.生锈，氧化，变成红棕色，vt.使...生锈，损害

sentences.english: There were large patches of rust on the car.
sentences.chinese: 车上有大片锈斑。

sentences.english: The metal had begun to rust.
sentences.chinese: 金属开始生锈。

detailed_translations.english: the reddish-brown substance that forms on iron or steel when it gets wet
to become covered with rust, or to make something become covered in rust

name: document
trans: n.公文，文件，证件，[计算机]，文档，vt.记载，用文件等证明

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it

name: salad
trans: n.色拉，凉拌生菜，杂烩，莴苣，生菜

sentences.english: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
sentences.chinese: 你的意大利面要配些色拉吗？

sentences.english: a spinach salad
sentences.chinese: 菠菜色拉

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially  lettuce  ,  cucumber  , and tomato

name: layer
trans: n.层，层次，铺设者，vi.分层，vt.将某物堆积成层，n.产卵鸡，[园艺]压条，vt.，[园艺]用压条法使(嫩枝)生根

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

name: bowl
trans: n.碗，钵，碗状物，物体的碗状部分，季后，圆形露天剧场，vi.打保龄球，快速移动，vt.投球，投球得分

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

name: alone
trans: adj.，单独的，仅仅，独自一人，adv.，单独地，只有，独一无二地

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.english: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people

name: July
trans: n.七月

sentences.english: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

name: advice
trans: n.，劝告，忠告，意见，建议

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

name: simply
trans: adv.简单地，朴素地，仅仅，完全地

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

name: coal
trans: n.煤，煤块，木炭，运煤工，vt.烧成炭，供应煤，vi.装煤，加煤

sentences.english: Put some coal on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火里加点煤。

sentences.english: the coal mining industry
sentences.chinese: 采煤业

sentences.english: a lump of coal
sentences.chinese: 一块煤

sentences.english: Red hot coals glowed in the grate.
sentences.chinese: 炽热火红的煤块在炉栅里面发着光。

detailed_translations.english: a hard black mineral which is dug out of the ground and burnt to produce heat

name: cope
trans: vi.对付，应付，对抗，n.长袍，斗篷状物，vt.笼罩

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

name: alarm
trans: n.，惊恐，惊慌，忧虑，警报，警告，报警器，vt，.使...惊慌，警告装报警器

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

name: welcome
trans: vt.欢迎，adj.受欢迎的，n.欢迎，int.欢迎(客人来访或新成员的加入)

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

name: flood
trans: n.洪水，水灾，vt.，&，vi.灌溉，淹没，泛滥

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.english: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry
to cover a place with water, or to become covered with water

name: tap
trans: n.龙头，塞子，窃听，轻拍，轻敲，鞋掌，vi.轻拍，轻击，补鞋掌，选择，vt.装龙头，窃听，利用，开发

sentences.english: She felt a tap on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.english: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.chinese: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

detailed_translations.english: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention

name: conversation
trans: n.会话，谈话，非正式会谈

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.english: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

name: odour
trans: n.气味，香气，味道，=odor(美)

sentences.english: the faint odour of damp
sentences.chinese: 一丝潮湿的气味

detailed_translations.english: a smell, especially an unpleasant one

name: footstep
trans: n.脚步，脚步声，足迹

sentences.english: He heard someone’s footsteps in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 他听见门厅里有脚步声。

detailed_translations.english: the sound each step makes when someone is walking

name: calculation
trans: n.计算，计算结果

sentences.english: Cathy did a rough calculation.
sentences.chinese: 凯茜作了一个粗略的计算。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount

name: towards
trans: prep.向，朝，关于，adj.在即的，有希望的，=，toward

sentences.english: The money collected will be put towards repairing the church roof.
sentences.chinese: 募集到的钱款将用于修缮教堂屋顶。

detailed_translations.english: money put, saved, or given towards something is used to pay for it

name: love
trans: vt.爱，爱慕，热爱，喜欢，vi.爱，n.爱，恋爱，爱情，情人

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

name: harm
trans: n.伤害，损害，vt.伤害，损害

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.english: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.chinese: 损害环境的化学品

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event
to have a bad effect on something

name: marvelous
trans: adj.奇迹般的，了不起的，令人惊异的，不平常的

sentences.english: It is all the same God, and that God showed me that the universe in which we live is a beautiful and marvelous mystery that is connected together forever and for always.
sentences.chinese: 他们所谈的是同一个上帝，这位上帝向我展示了我们生活在其中的这个宇宙的美丽和奇妙的神秘，它们关联在一起，永永远远。

name: remember
trans: vt.记得，想起，记住

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

name: either
trans: pron.(两者)任何一个，adj.任一，两方的，adv.也，conj.或，也

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

name: calculate
trans: vt.计算，估计，考虑，推测，计划，vi.计算，预测，依赖

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

name: legal
trans: adj.法律的，合法的，法定的

sentences.english: What the company has done is perfectly legal.
sentences.chinese: 公司所做的这一切完全合法。

sentences.english: plans to make the carrying of identity cards a legal requirement
sentences.chinese: 使携带身份证成为法定要求的计划

sentences.english: He had twice the legal limit of alcohol in his bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.english: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal
sentences.chinese: 争取大麻合法化的压力团体

detailed_translations.english: if something is legal, you are allowed to do it or have to do it by law

name: stuff
trans: n.材料，原料，东西，素质，本质，废物，vt.装，填，塞，填满，塞满

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: basis
trans: n.基础，根据，主要成分

sentences.english: Their claim had no basis in fact (=  it was not true  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的说法没有事实根据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础， 根据； 原则
detailed_translations.english: the facts, ideas, or things from which something can be developed

name: sixth
trans: num.第六，六分之一，n.六分之一，六度音，adj.第六的

sentences.english: About one sixth of the children admitted to taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 大约六分之一的儿童承认吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
detailed_translations.english: one of six equal parts of something

detailed_translations.chinese: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
detailed_translations.english: coming after five other things in a series

name: apparent
trans: adj.表面上的，明显的

sentences.english: The difference in quality was immediately apparent .
sentences.chinese: 质量的差异显而易见。

sentences.english: He left suddenly, for no apparent reason .
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，他突然离开了。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

name: pudding
trans: n.布丁，血肠，(英)甜食

sentences.english: chocolate pudding
sentences.chinese: 巧克力布丁

detailed_translations.english: a hot sweet dish, made from cake, rice, bread etc with fruit, milk, or other sweet things added

name: knob
trans: n.门把，拉手，旋纽，瘤

sentences.english: He thought the door was locked, but he turned the knob and the door opened.
sentences.chinese: 他本以为门是锁住的，但是转了一下把手门就开了。

sentences.english: a brass door knob
sentences.chinese: 黄铜门把手

sentences.english: I adjusted the volume knob and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 我调节好音量旋钮，坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a round handle or thing that you turn to open a door, turn on a television etc

name: experience
trans: n.经验，感受，经历，vt.经历，体验

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

name: jungle
trans: n.丛林，密林，莽丛，adj.丛林的，蛮荒的

sentences.english: the Amazon jungle
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙丛林

detailed_translations.english: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together

name: judgement
trans: n.意见，审判，判断

sentences.english: He trusted in his judgement.
sentences.chinese: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.english: All action is based on judgement.
sentences.chinese: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.english: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.chinese: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

name: almost
trans: adv.，几乎，差不多，adj.，几乎

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

name: previous
trans: adj.先的，前的，在...之前，以前的，adv.在前

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

name: weak
trans: adj.弱的，软弱的，虚弱的，无力的，淡薄的，差的

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

name: reflection
trans: n.反射，映象，反映，折射，沉思，影响

sentences.english: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.english: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
sentences.chinese: …一束光线在镜面上的反射。

sentences.english: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
sentences.chinese: 成年期的压抑似乎是一个人童年经历的一种反映。

detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

name: large
trans: adj.大的，巨大的，广泛的，强烈的，普遍地，大量地

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.english: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.chinese: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: a large ovenproof pan
sentences.chinese: 一只耐热的大烤盘

sentences.english: large sums ofmoney
sentences.chinese: 大笔的钱

sentences.english: those who drink large amounts of coffee
sentences.chinese: 咖啡喝得很多的人

sentences.english: A large number of students have signed up for the course.
sentences.chinese: 很多学生报名读这门课程。

detailed_translations.english: big in size, amount, or number

name: okay
trans: (缩作OK)adv.，&，adj.<表示同意或允许>对，好，同意，vt.同意

sentences.english: We seemed to manage okay for the first year or so after David was born.
sentences.chinese: 戴维出生后的第一年左右，我们好像过得还可以。

sentences.english: ...a shooting range where it's OK to use weapons.
sentences.chinese: …一个可以使用武器的靶场。

sentences.english: Is it okay if I come by myself?
sentences.chinese: 我独自来行吗？

sentences.english: He gave the okay to issue a new press release.
sentences.chinese: 他做出批准发表一篇新的新闻稿。

detailed_translations.english: Okay is also an adverb
If you say that something is okay, you find it satisfactory or acceptable
Okay is also a noun

name: beloved
trans: adj.为...的爱的，心爱的，n.爱人

sentences.english: He never recovered from the death of his beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他一直没有走出失去爱女的阴影。

sentences.english: He’s always talking about his beloved computer!
sentences.chinese: 他老是在谈论他的宝贝电脑！

sentences.english: It was a gift from her beloved.
sentences.chinese: 那是她心爱的人送的礼物。

detailed_translations.english: loved very much by someone
someone who is loved very much

name: sparkle
trans: vi.发火花，闪耀，冒火花，vt.使闪耀，n.闪耀，火花

sentences.english: The sea sparkled in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下大海碧波闪耀。

sentences.english: The crystal chandelier sparkled.
sentences.chinese: 那水晶枝形吊灯闪闪发光。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发光，闪耀，闪烁；活跃，焕发
detailed_translations.english: to shine in small bright flashes

detailed_translations.chinese: 闪光， 闪耀， 闪烁； 活力， 生气
detailed_translations.english: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light

name: gray
trans: adj.灰色的，阴沉的，黯淡的，n.灰色，v.变灰色，[Gray]，格雷(男子名)

sentences.english: I like that little gray one. The kids like that one too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢那只灰色的小鸭子， 孩子们也喜欢那只。

sentences.english: Once again he found himself inside the apartment in the enormous gray house.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次发现自己在那所庞大的灰色的房子的房间里了。

sentences.english: If I live in the Pacific Ocean, I can be gray with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 如果我生活在太平洋，我的颜色很可能是带有黑点的灰色。

name: satisfaction
trans: n.满意，快事，乐事，赔偿，妥善处理，确信

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

name: lover
trans: n.爱好者，情人，情侣

sentences.english: He killed his wife’s lover.
sentences.chinese: 他杀了妻子的情人。

sentences.english: Nicola and I were lovers.
sentences.chinese: 我和尼古拉以前是情人。

sentences.english: a pair of young lovers
sentences.chinese: 一对年轻的情侣

sentences.english: music lovers
sentences.chinese: 音乐爱好者

detailed_translations.english: someone’s lover is the person they are having a sexual relationship with but who they are not married to

name: window
trans: n.窗子，窗户，窗口，橱窗，视窗

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

name: deal
trans: n.买卖，待遇，交易，协定，份量，vt.(dealt，dealt，[delt])处理应付，分配，给予

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

name: agent
trans: n.，代理人，代理商，特工人员，药剂

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

name: deaf
trans: adj.聋的，不愿听的

sentences.english: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.chinese: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.english: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.english: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.chinese: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.english: She was deaf to his pleas.
sentences.chinese: 她对他的恳求充耳不闻。

detailed_translations.english: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

name: seem
trans: vi.好像，似乎

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

name: handy
trans: adj.手边的，方便的，便于使用的

sentences.english: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.chinese: 这件小工具非常有用。

sentences.english: It’s very handy having a light above your desk.
sentences.chinese: 书桌上方有盏灯很有用。

sentences.english: Take your swimming trunks with you – they might come in handy (= be useful ).
sentences.chinese: 带上你的游泳裤，可能会派上用场的。

detailed_translations.english: useful

name: tell
trans: vt.讲述，吩咐，辨别，告诉，vi.讲述，告诉，产生效果，告发

sentences.english: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

name: classification
trans: n.分类，分级，分类法

sentences.english: the classification of wines according to quality
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒按品质的分类

sentences.english: There are five job classifications.
sentences.chinese: 有五种工作类别。

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to

name: refrigerator
trans: n.冰箱，冷藏库

sentences.english: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.english: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.english: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

name: bud
trans: n.芽，萌芽，蓓蕾，vi.发芽，萌芽，vt.使发芽

sentences.english: rose buds
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花苞

detailed_translations.english: a young tightly rolled-up flower or leaf before it opens
to produce buds

name: you
trans: pron.你，你们

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

name: thirty
trans: num.三十，三十个

sentences.english: In the thirties, air travel really began to take off.
sentences.chinese: 在30年代，乘飞机旅行迅速流行了起来。

detailed_translations.english: the number 30
the number 30

name: how
trans: adv.如何，怎么，怎样，多少，conj.如何，怎样，以...方式，n.方式

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: workshop
trans: n.车间，工场，创作室，研讨会，讲习班

sentences.english: a modestly equipped workshop.
sentences.chinese: 一个装备普通的车间。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

name: extreme
trans: adj.极度的，极端的，尽头的，严重的，末端的，n.极端，极限

sentences.english: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold
sentences.chinese: 严寒

sentences.english: He had extreme difficulty getting hold of the ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

detailed_translations.english: very great in degree
a situation, quality etc which is as great as it can possibly be – used especially when talking about two opposites

name: mind
trans: n.头脑，理智，记忆，思想，主意，心意，vt.留心，注意，介意，照顾vi.留心，关心

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

name: surroundings
trans: n.周围的事物，环境，名词surrounding的复数形式

sentences.english: I need to work in pleasant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

detailed_translations.english: the objects, buildings, natural things etc that are around a person or thing at a particular time

name: lovely
trans: adj.可爱的，令人愉快的，n.漂亮的女人，美好的东西

sentences.english: She had a lovely face.
sentences.chinese: 她有一张漂亮的脸蛋。

sentences.english: What a lovely house!
sentences.chinese: 多么漂亮的房子啊！

sentences.english: You look lovely in that dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那条连衣裙很漂亮。

sentences.english: He was a lovely little boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是个可爱的小男孩。

sentences.english: What a lovely day!
sentences.chinese: 多好的天气啊！

sentences.english: Thank you for a lovely evening.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你让我们度过了一个美好的夜晚。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful or attractive

name: against
trans: prep.，倚在，倚靠，逆，对着，反对，违背，防御，相比，相对

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

name: press
trans: vt.压，按，揿，，，促，逼迫，强迫服役，征用，n.新闻界，压力，强迫服役

sentences.english: Oxford University Press
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学出版社

sentences.english: We were able to watch the books rolling off the presses.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以看到书本从印刷机上源源不断地印出。

detailed_translations.english: a business that prints and publishes books

name: simplify
trans: vt.简化，使单纯

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

name: spirit
trans: n.精神，气魄，情绪，心灵，幽灵，精灵，(复)spirits:，精力，情绪烈酒，vt.使精神振作，偷偷带走

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: reward
trans: n.报答，报酬，赏金，vt.报答，给...报酬，奖赏

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: shift
trans: vt.替换，转移，变声，vi.改变，定责，更衣，n.转换，交换，变化，移动，接班者

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one
a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

name: bottom
trans: n.，底，底部，根基，臀部，船身，水底，服装下面的部分，低洼地，底色，尽头，adj.，底部的，vt.，给...装底，建立基础，到达底部，vi.到达底部，垫底，降到最低点

sentences.english: Can you hold the bottom of the ladder for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我扶住梯子底部好吗？

detailed_translations.english: the lowest part of something

name: equip
trans: vt.装备，配备，设，穿…

sentences.english: They try to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽量给他们的车辆配备各种小装置以应付任何可能的突发状况。

detailed_translations.english: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work

name: hobby
trans: n.业余爱好，癖好

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

name: lick
trans: vt.舔，舔吃，连续击打，击败，vi.用舌头舔，拍打，n.舔，少许，打

sentences.english: The dog jumped up and licked her face.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗跳起来舔她的脸。

detailed_translations.english: to move your tongue across the surface of something in order to eat it, wet it, clean it etc
when you move your tongue across the surface of something

name: hero
trans: n.男主角，英雄，勇士

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

name: button
trans: n.扣子，按钮，像纽扣的东西，未成熟的蘑菇，按钮，vt.扣紧，用纽扣装饰，钉纽扣，闭嘴，vi.扣上

sentences.english: small pearl buttons
sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.english: A button was missing from his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.english: She undid (=  unfastened  ) the buttons of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

detailed_translations.english: a small round flat object on your shirt, coat etc that you pass through a hole to fasten it
to fasten clothes with buttons, or to be fastened with buttons

name: Brazil
trans: n.巴西

sentences.english: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 巴西有很多剩余咖啡。

sentences.english: Today's football match is France versus Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 今天的足球赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.english: Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.chinese: 巴西出了许多闻名世界的足球运动员。

name: betray
trans: vt.误导，出卖，背叛，辜负，泄漏，vi.证明...错误

sentences.english: He felt that she had betrayed him.
sentences.chinese: 他感觉她背叛了自己。

sentences.english: She had betrayed her parents' trust .
sentences.chinese: 她辜负了父母对她的信任。

sentences.english: I would never betray a confidence (=  tell a secret that someone has trusted me with  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会泄露秘密。

detailed_translations.chinese: 背叛， 出卖； 失信于， 辜负； 泄露； 暴露， 显露
detailed_translations.english: to be disloyal to someone who trusts you, so that they are harmed or upset

name: hillside
trans: n.(小山)山腰，山坡

sentences.english: The airplane crashed on a hillside.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在山坡上坠毁。

sentences.english: They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.chinese: 他们正从山坡上采大理石。

sentences.english: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在长满草的山坡上吃午饭。

detailed_translations.english: the sloping side of a hill

name: separately
trans: adv.分离地，分别地，个别地，独立地

sentences.english: Cook each vegetable separately until just tender.
sentences.chinese: 把每样蔬菜单独烹煮，直到煮软就行了。

detailed_translations.english: If people or things are dealt with separately or do something separately, they are dealt with or do something at different times or places, rather than together

name: humble
trans: adj.谦逊的，地位低下的，卑下的，粗陋的，vt.使...卑下，贬低

sentences.english: a modest and humble man
sentences.chinese: 一个谦卑的男人

sentences.english: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的
detailed_translations.english: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

detailed_translations.chinese: 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
detailed_translations.english: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

name: able
trans: adj.，能干的，有能力的，出色的

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to be able to speak Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想学会讲日语。

sentences.english: one of my more able students
sentences.chinese: 我班上能力比较强的学生之一

detailed_translations.english: to have the skill, strength, knowledge etc needed to do something

name: outset
trans: n.开始，开端

sentences.english: It was clear from the outset that there were going to be problems.
sentences.chinese: 从一开始就很清楚会有问题出现的。

sentences.english: It’s better to get something in writing right at the outset.
sentences.chinese: 最好一开始就有个书面的东西。

detailed_translations.english: at or from the beginning of an event or process

name: characteristic
trans: adj.特有的，典型的，n.特性，特征，特色

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

name: tourist
trans: n.旅游者，观光者

sentences.english: Cambridge is always full of tourists in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.english: The Statue of Liberty is a major tourist attraction .
sentences.chinese: 自由女神像是主要的旅游景点。

sentences.english: What effect will this have on the local tourist industry ?
sentences.chinese: 这对当地的旅游业会有什么影响？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday

name: astronaut
trans: n.宇宙航行员，宇航员

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.english: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft

name: liter
trans: n.升，公升(容量单位)，=litre(英)

sentences.english: So this is moles per liter per second, right? It's disappearance of some concentration for time.
sentences.chinese: 所以这里的单位是摩尔每升每秒，对吗？这代表浓度随着时间的减少。

sentences.english: Containers must be placed and well-sealed in one transparent plastic bag with a press-seal, of a maximum capacity of one liter (quart).
sentences.chinese: 这些东西必须被密封放置在一个有冲压密封圈的，最大容量为一公升（一夸脱）的透明塑料袋中。

sentences.english: Inhabitants there sip large quantities of hot black tea - typically drinking more than a liter (1.8 pints) per day per person - but also have a low incidence of tobacco and alcohol use.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的居民饮用大量的热的黑茶，通常可以每个人每天喝超过一升（1.8品脱）的量，同时他们也会偶尔使用烟草和酒精。

name: private
trans: adj.私人的，私下的，隐蔽的，n.士兵，列兵

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

name: heavy
trans: adj.重的，大(量)的，充满的，激烈的，难消化的，费力的，沉闷的adv.密集地，n.悲剧角色

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

name: customer
trans: n.顾客，主顾，家伙

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

name: murderer
trans: n.杀人犯，凶手

sentences.english: a convicted murderer
sentences.chinese: 已定罪的谋杀犯

sentences.english: his brother’s murderer
sentences.chinese: 谋害他兄弟的凶手

detailed_translations.english: someone who murders another person

name: guarantee
trans: n.保证(书)，担保(书)，担保人，担保物，抵押品，vt.保证，担保

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

name: disk
trans: n.圆盘，唱片，磁盘，光盘，花盘，盘形物，[计算机]，磁盘，vt.用圆盘耙耙地

sentences.english: Red blood cells are roughly the shape of a disk.
sentences.chinese: 红细胞大致呈圆盘状。

sentences.english: The program takes up 2.5 megabytes of disk space and can be run on a standard personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序占用2.5 兆字节的磁盘空间，可以在标准个人电脑上运行。

detailed_translations.english: (<英> disc)a small flat piece of plastic or metal which is used for storing computer or electronic information

name: harmony
trans: n.调合，协调，和谐，和弦，和睦

sentences.english: the gorgeous vocal harmonies on ‘Mexicali Rose’
sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies
sentences.chinese: 三部和声

detailed_translations.english: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

name: glorious
trans: adj.光荣的，壮丽的，辉煌的

sentences.english: a truly glorious future
sentences.chinese: 无比美好的将来

sentences.english: a glorious victory
sentences.chinese: 光荣的胜利

sentences.english: glorious views of the coast
sentences.chinese: 沿海的迷人景色

detailed_translations.english: having or deserving great fame, praise, and honour

name: weep
trans: vi.哭泣，流泪，悲叹，渗出，n.哭泣，<俚>眼泪

sentences.english: James broke down and wept.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.english: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

detailed_translations.english: to cry, especially because you feel very sad

name: stomach
trans: n.胃，胃口，肚子，食欲，vt.忍受，容忍

sentences.english: I was so hungry my stomach hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我饿得胃都痛了。

sentences.english: His stomach was full of food.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃里塞满了食物。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your body where food begins to be  digested
to be able to accept something, especially something unpleasant

name: reed
trans: n.芦苇，芦杆，芦丛，芦笛，簧片，(Reed)里德(姓氏)

sentences.english: Reeds grew in clumps all along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 沿河岸长着一丛丛芦苇。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 芦苇；簧片；牧笛；不可依靠的人
detailed_translations.english: a type of tall plant like grass that grows in wet places

name: inventor
trans: n.发明者，发明家，创造者

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者

detailed_translations.english: someone who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things

name: volcano
trans: n.火山

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.chinese: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava is sometimes forced out

name: dark
trans: adj.暗的，黑色的，n.黑暗，暗处

sentences.english: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.english: the dark winter days
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.english: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.chinese: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.english: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.english: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.english: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

detailed_translations.english: if it is dark, there is little or no light

name: plough
trans: n.犁，耕地，vt.，&，vi.犁，耕，用犁耕田，耕犁

sentences.english: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
sentences.chinese: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

sentences.english: a ploughed field
sentences.chinese: 犁过的地

detailed_translations.english: to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted

name: stab
trans: vt.，&，vi.刺，戳，刺伤，n.刺，戳，刺痛，尝试，突然的一阵

sentences.english: He was stabbed to death in a fight.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次打斗中被捅死了。

name: knee
trans: n.膝，膝盖，膝关节，像膝盖的东西，护膝，屈膝鞠躬，vt.用膝盖顶

sentences.chinese: 露西的膝盖上缠着绷带。

sentences.english: a knee injury
sentences.chinese: 膝伤

detailed_translations.english: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
to hit someone with your knee

name: nationality
trans: n.国籍，民族，族

sentences.english: people of the same nationality
sentences.chinese: 同国籍的人

sentences.english: the different nationalities within the former USSR
sentences.chinese: 前苏联的各个民族

detailed_translations.english: the state of being legally a citizen of a particular country

name: tender
trans: adj.，嫩的，脆弱的，温柔的，亲切的，敏感的，未成熟的，痛的，，(船)易倾斜的，v.，提供，投标，(使)变柔软，n.，提出，投标，支付偿还，照管人，补给船，煤水车

sentences.english: Continue cooking until the meat is tender.
sentences.chinese: 把肉一直烧到松软为止。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嫩的；脆弱的；疼痛的，一触即痛的；温柔的

a formal statement of the price you would charge for doing a job or providing goods or services

name: desert
trans: n.沙漠，荒地，应得(的惩罚或奖励)，vt.离弃，擅离，遗弃，vi.擅离职守，adj.沙漠的，荒凉的

sentences.english: the Sahara Desert
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠

sentences.english: This area of the country is mostly desert.
sentences.chinese: 该国的这一地区大部分是沙漠。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land where it is always very dry, and there is a lot of sand

name: wing
trans: n.翼，翅膀，翅，(组织中的)派别，边锋，边房，vt.给...装上翼，飞过，空运，打伤...的翅膀，vi.飞行

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

name: reel
trans: n.卷轴，卷筒，线轴，vi.蹒跚地走，旋转，骚乱，退缩，摇晃，vt.卷卷...，轴上，旋转

sentences.english: Andy reeled away from the bar and knocked over his stool.
sentences.chinese: 安迪踉跄着离开吧台，把凳子都撞倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 摇摇晃晃地移动，蹒跚；眩晕，发昏

a round object onto which film, wire, a special string for fishing etc can be wound
to wind (cotton, thread, etc) onto a reel

name: magnificent
trans: adj.壮丽的，华丽的，宏伟的，极好的

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.chinese: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

name: committee
trans: n.委员会，全体委员

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

name: curl
trans: n.卷毛，螺旋，vi.卷曲，弄卷，弯曲

sentences.english: She has hair that refuses to curl.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发怎么也不卷。

sentences.english: Maria had curled her hair for the event.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚为这次活动卷了头发。

sentences.english: a little boy with beautiful blonde curls
sentences.chinese: 满头漂亮的金色鬈发的小男孩

sentences.english: Decorate the cake with chocolate curls.
sentences.chinese: 用巧克力圈装饰蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: to form a twisted or curved shape, or to make something do this
a piece of hair that hangs in a curved shape

name: telescope
trans: n.望远镜，v.缩短，压缩

sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

name: conclude
trans: vt.推断出，使结束，缔结，断定，得出结论，vi.结束，作出决定

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

name: language
trans: n.语言，语言课程

sentences.english: How many languages do you speak?
sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.english: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

detailed_translations.english: a system of communication by written or spoken words, which is used by the people of a particular country or area

name: wonderful
trans: adj.惊人的，极好的，精彩的

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

name: fade
trans: vi.褪色，逐渐消失，凋谢，vt.使褪色，n.淡入，淡出，adj.平凡的乏味的

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

name: actress
trans: n.，女演员

sentences.english: She's not only a great dramatic actress but she's also very funny.
sentences.chinese: 她不仅是一位伟大的女戏剧演员，而且也很幽默。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who performs in a play or film

name: farm
trans: n.农场，农庄，农田，饲养场，vt.收费，务农，vi.务农

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

name: feeling
trans: n.感情，感觉，知觉，意识，气氛，adj.有感情的，富于同情心的，含情脉脉的

sentences.chinese: 得知我们赢了，感觉真好。

sentences.english: He’s considerate of other people’s feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他很顾及他人的感情。

detailed_translations.english: an emotion that you feel, such as anger, sadness, or happiness

trans: n.尊敬，敬重，关系，方面，vt.尊敬，尊重，关于，涉及

sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills

name: huge
trans: adj.巨大的，庞大的，程度高的

sentences.chinese: 一条大狗

sentences.english: huge crowds
sentences.chinese: 大群大群的人

sentences.english: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

sentences.english: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.english: the huge scale of the problem

detailed_translations.english: extremely large in size, amount, or degree

trans: n.连续，系列，系列节目，丛书

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.chinese: 陪审团成员

sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定他无罪。

sentences.english: the right to trial by jury
sentences.chinese: 由陪审团进行审理的权利

trans: vt.忽视，忽略，疏忽，不顾，n.疏忽，忽略，怠慢

sentences.chinese: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.english: a neglected garden
sentences.chinese: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.english: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to look after someone or something properly

name: nervous
trans: adj.神经(质)的，易激动的，紧张的，焦虑的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

name: sound
trans: adj.，健康的，健全的，完好的，可靠的，合理的，adv.，酣畅地，n.声音，吵闹，海峡，鱼鳔，探针，v.，听起来，发出声音，探测深度，探询，vi.，响，发声

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

name: fasten
trans: vt.扎牢，扣住，拴紧，使固定，系，强加于，vi.固定，系紧，抓紧

sentences.chinese: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.english: Fasten your seat belt.
sentences.chinese: 请系好安全带。

name: possible
trans: adj.可能的，可能存在的

sentences.chinese: 有没有可能弄到比赛的门票？

sentences.chinese: 这些文件也许可以发送过去。

sentences.chinese: 计算机技术让很多人可以在家里工作。

sentences.english: I want to avoid the rush hour traffic if possible .
sentences.chinese: 如有可能我想避开交通高峰时间。

sentences.english: I walk or use public transport whenever possible .
sentences.chinese: 只要有可能我就步行或者乘坐公共交通工具。

sentences.english: We are doing everything possible to track down the killer.
sentences.chinese: 我们正竭尽全力追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.english: Our staff will help you in every way possible .
sentences.chinese: 我们的员工会尽力帮助你。

sentences.english: Even if it were technically possible , we do not have the money to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.chinese: 她决定尽可能离他远点。

name: analysis
trans: n.分析，分解，解析

sentences.chinese: 她接受精神分析治疗已经三年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分析， 分析报告； 分解， 解析

name: outstanding
trans: adj.突出的，杰出的，显著的，未支付的

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

name: dictation
trans: n.口授笔录，听写

sentences.english: There were no secretaries available to take dictation (= write down what someone is saying ).
sentences.chinese: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

sentences.english: I hate doing French dictations.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌做法语听写。

detailed_translations.english: when you say words for someone to write down

name: somebody
trans: pron.某人，有人，n.重要人物

sentences.english: There’s somebody waiting to see you.
sentences.chinese: 有人等着要见你。

sentences.english: Somebody’s car alarm kept me awake all night.
sentences.chinese: 不知谁的汽车警报器吵得我整晚都无法入睡。

sentences.english: ‘Who can we get to babysit?’ ‘I’ll call Suzie or somebody .’
sentences.chinese: “我们能请谁来看小孩呢？”“我会叫苏齐或别的什么人。”

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know, or do not say who the person is

trans: n.威胁，恐吓，凶兆，vt.威胁，恐吓
