sentences.chinese: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

sentences.english: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.chinese: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.english: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.english: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.chinese: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.english: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.english: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.chinese: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.english: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.english: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

name: previously
trans: adv.先前，预先，仓促地

sentences.english: Guyana's railways were previously owned by private companies.
sentences.chinese: 圭亚那的铁路先前为私营公司所拥有。

sentences.english: The contract was awarded to a previously unknown company.
sentences.chinese: 该合同给了一家先前不知名的公司。

detailed_translations.english: Previously means at some time before the period that you are talking about

name: demand
trans: vt.要求，需要，询问，n.要求，需求

sentences.english: Angry demonstrators demanded the resignation of two senior officials.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

sentences.english: ‘Where are you going?’ she demanded angrily.
sentences.chinese: “你要去哪里？” 她气愤地质问道。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something very firmly, especially because you think you have a right to do this
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services

name: insure
trans: vt.给...保险，确保，vi.买保险

sentences.english: Have you insured the contents of your home?
sentences.chinese: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

sentences.english: facilities to insure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to buy insurance so that you will receive money if something bad happens to you, your family, your possessions etc

name: likely
trans: adj.可能的，合适的，可信的，有前途的，有吸引力的，adv.很可能

sentences.english: Snow showers are likely tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天可能有阵雪。

sentences.english: the most likely cause of the problem
sentences.chinese: 造成这个问题最有可能的原因

sentences.english: It is more than likely (= almost certain ) the votes will have to be counted again.
sentences.chinese: 选票很有可能要重新点算。

sentences.english: It could have been an accident, but that was hardly likely (= not very likely ).
sentences.chinese: 这有可能是意外事故，但可能性不大。

sentences.english: I’d very likely have done the same thing in your situation.
sentences.chinese: 我要是处在你这种情况，也很有可能会那样做的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is likely will probably happen or is probably true
probably

name: elimination
trans: n.消灭，排除，除去，消除

sentences.english: If you need to remove an agent you will have to do it by a process of elimination.
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要删除代理，将必须通过消除进程的方式进行此工作。

sentences.english: I recommend that you be relentless in the elimination of the backlog of defects and feature enhancements.
sentences.chinese: 我建议你在消除积压的缺陷和不断膨胀的特征时毫不留情。

sentences.english: In all, the new president selected 150 individual programs for cuts or elimination.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之,新的总统150个人项目选择削减或者消除。

detailed_translations.english: the removal or destruction of something

name: certainty
trans: n.必然，肯定，确定，确实的事情

sentences.english: the certainty of being caught
sentences.chinese: 被抓的必然

detailed_translations.english: the fact that something is certain to happen

name: border
trans: n.边，边缘，边界，vt.作...之疆界，加边

sentences.english: countries that border the Mediterranean
sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.english: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

name: insist
trans: vi.坚持，强调，坚持要求，vi.坚决主张

sentences.english: Stay for supper – I insist!
sentences.chinese: 留下来吃晚餐——一定的！

detailed_translations.english: to demand that something should happen

name: decision
trans: n.决定，决心，果断，决策

sentences.english: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.english: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ).
sentences.chinese: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.english: the ability to act with speed and decision
sentences.chinese: 处事迅速果断的能力

detailed_translations.english: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought

name: interesting
trans: adj.有趣的，引人入胜的

sentences.english: That’s an interesting question.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个有趣的问题。

sentences.english: a really interesting TV programme
sentences.chinese: 十分有趣的电视节目

sentences.english: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.chinese: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.english: It’s interesting that no one remembers seeing the car.
sentences.chinese: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

detailed_translations.english: attracting your attention because it is special, exciting or unusual

name: diagram
trans: n.图解，图表，简图，vt.用图解法表示

sentences.english: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 这个图表可说明我的意思。

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.english: A table or diagram containing the name and address range of each peripheral addressable by the processor within the memory space.
sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.english: to show or represent something in a diagram

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

name: uneasy
trans: adj.心神不安的，忧虑的，不自在的，不稳定的，不舒服的

sentences.english: She eventually fell into an uneasy sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她终于睡着了，但睡得并不踏实。

sentences.english: Ninety percent of those questioned felt uneasy about nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 受访者中有90%的人对核能感到忧虑。

detailed_translations.english: worried or slightly afraid because you think that something bad might happen

name: sun
trans: n.太阳，日，阳光，中心人物，像太阳般的东西，v.晒太阳

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

name: maid
trans: n.女佣，女仆，侍女，少女

sentences.english: a kitchen maid
sentences.chinese: 厨房女佣人

detailed_translations.english: a female servant, especially in a large house or hotel

name: milk
trans: n.乳，乳状物，牛奶，vt.挤(奶)，产乳

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
sentences.chinese: 一瓶奶

sentences.english: Would you like some milk in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你茶里要加点奶吗？

sentences.english: a pint of semi-skimmed milk
sentences.chinese: 一品脱半脱脂奶

sentences.english: I helped to milk the cows.
sentences.chinese: 我帮忙挤牛奶。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

name: name
trans: n.名字，名称，姓名，名誉，vt.说出，命名，称呼，任命，adj.有名的著名的

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

name: debate
trans: n.，&vi.争论，辩论，商讨，vt.争论，思考

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

name: thoughtful
trans: adj.沉思的，体贴的

sentences.english: Paul is very thoughtful.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常体贴人。

sentences.english: a thoughtful look
sentences.chinese: 若有所思的神情

detailed_translations.english: always thinking of the things you can do to make people happy or comfortable

name: college
trans: n.学院，学校，社团，枢机主教团，大学

sentences.english: a teacher training college
sentences.chinese: 师范学院

sentences.english: Donna left school and went to art college.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.english: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.chinese: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

detailed_translations.english: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

name: elder
trans: adj.年龄较大的，年长的，n.长者，长辈

sentences.english: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.english: a meeting of the village elders
sentences.chinese: 村里长辈们的集会

detailed_translations.english: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old

name: noisy
trans: adj.嘈杂的，喧闹的，发出噪声的

sentences.english: The kids have been really noisy today.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们今天实在是吵。

sentences.english: a noisy engine
sentences.chinese: 噪声大的发动机

sentences.english: The bar was very noisy.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里非常嘈杂。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is noisy makes a lot of noise

name: come
trans: vi.来，来到，达到，出现，发生，进入，vt.接近，扮演

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

name: confusion
trans: n.混乱，骚乱，混淆，不确定状态

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

name: blossom
trans: n.花，开花，全盛期，vi.开花，成长

sentences.english: pale pink blossoms
sentences.chinese: 淡粉色的花朵

sentences.english: The cherry tree was covered in blossom.
sentences.chinese: 樱桃树花满枝头。

detailed_translations.english: a flower or the flowers on a tree or bush
if trees blossom, they produce flowers

name: springtime
trans: n.春季，春天，青春期，初期

sentences.english: Flowers bloom in springtime.
sentences.chinese: 花在春天开放。

sentences.english: At springtime this river always overruns.
sentences.chinese: 每到春天这条河总会泛滥。

sentences.english: Which is why, at a price, we still have Paris in springtime.
sentences.chinese: 这也是今天我们（付出代价后）在巴黎仍能享受春天的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the time of the year when it is spring

name: someone
trans: pron.某人，有人

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

name: diamond
trans: n.金钢石，钻石，菱形，像钻石的物质，纸牌的方块，棒球内场，vt.用钻石装饰，adj.60或75周年纪念的

sentences.english: a diamond engagement ring
sentences.chinese: 订婚钻戒

detailed_translations.chinese: 钻石，金刚石；菱形；方块牌
detailed_translations.english: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry

name: sunlight
trans: n.日光，阳光

sentences.english: The water sparkled in the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 水面在灿烂的阳光下闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: (= came in large amounts ) through the windows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光从窗户流泻进来。

sentences.english: a shaft of sunlight
sentences.chinese: 一束阳光

detailed_translations.english: natural light that comes from the sun

name: reflexion
trans: n.反射，映象，反映，反射波，折射，考虑，想法，=reflection

sentences.english: Can you see your reflexion in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.english: His speech was an accurate reflexion of the public mood.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 他的讲话是公众情绪的准确反映

sentences.english: ...the reflexion of a beam of light off a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句:  …一束光线在镜面上的反射。

detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

name: display
trans: vt.陈列，展览，显示，炫耀，vt.显示，表现，夸示

sentences.english: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.english: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement of things for people to look at or buy
to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

name: dirt
trans: n.尘，土，污物，污垢，泥土，污秽的言行，卑鄙的人，堕落，矿渣

sentences.english: You should have seen the dirt on that car!
sentences.chinese: 你没看见那车上沾了多少泥！

sentences.english: His face and hands were black with dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸和手黑乎乎的，全是泥。

sentences.english: Michael threw his handful of dirt onto the coffin.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔往棺材上撒了一把土。

detailed_translations.english: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

name: lace
trans: n.鞋带，系带，花边，饰带，缎带，v.结带子，饰以花边

sentences.english: a handkerchief trimmed with lace
sentences.chinese: 饰有蕾丝花边的手绢

sentences.english: lace curtains
sentences.chinese: 网眼窗帘

detailed_translations.chinese: 花边；鞋带；饰带；少量烈酒
detailed_translations.english: a fine cloth made with patterns of many very small holes

name: drum
trans: n.鼓，鼓声，鼓状物，圆桶，冰丘，vi.击鼓，作鼓声，引起兴趣，vt.召集入伍，逐出，(经过努力)推动...，连续击打

sentences.english: a big bass drum
sentences.chinese: 一面低音大鼓

sentences.english: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
sentences.chinese: 1,000人打着鼓扛着旗游行。

sentences.english: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.english: a brake drum
sentences.chinese: 制动鼓

sentences.english: a 5 gallon oil drum
sentences.chinese: 5加仑的油桶

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

name: goodbye
trans: int.再见，再会，n.说再见

sentences.english: Then I said goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 然后我说再见。

sentences.english: The boy waved goodbye to his grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 男孩向他的奶奶挥手再见。

sentences.english: If it ends great, it means both of you want more. If it ends otherwise, the next thing to do is to wave goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 如果结束得好，那么它意味着你们两个都想接触的时间更长；否则，接下来要做的事情就是挥手再见。

name: salesman
trans: n.售货员，推销员

sentences.english: ...an insurance salesman.
sentences.chinese: …一位男保险推销员。

detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to persuade people to buy his company’s products

name: steep
trans: adj.险峻的，陡峭的，(价格)过高的，n.陡坡，n.浸泡，浸泡液，v.浸泡，沉浸

sentences.english: The road became rocky and steep.
sentences.chinese: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。

sentences.english: a steep climb to the top
sentences.chinese: 到山顶的一段陡坡

sentences.english: steep cuts in benefits
sentences.chinese: 救济金的大幅度削减

detailed_translations.english: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

name: finish
trans: vt.完成，结束，获...第几名，vi.终结，完成，n.结束，完成，最后加工，结局，完美

sentences.english: You can’t go anywhere until you’ve finished your homework.
sentences.chinese: 没完成家庭作业前你哪儿也不能去。

sentences.english: Have you finished that book yet?
sentences.chinese: 那本书你看完了吗？

sentences.english: ‘How’s the decorating going?’ ‘We’ve nearly finished.’
sentences.chinese: “装修进行得怎么样了？”“差不多快完成了。”

sentences.english: The football season finishes in May.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛季在 5 月份结束。

sentences.english: a dramatic finish to the race
sentences.chinese: 赛跑的戏剧性结局

detailed_translations.english: to complete the last part of something that you are doing
the end or last part of something

name: colonel
trans: n.陆军上校，中校

sentences.english: Nothing remained of the colonel.
sentences.chinese: 上校身后毫无遗物。

sentences.english: The captain jumped several grades and now was a colonel.
sentences.chinese: 这名上尉一连跳过了好几级，现在是上校了。

sentences.english: What if they go on to behave as murderously as the colonel and his paid killers?
sentences.chinese: 如果他们像他们的是上校和他的杀手们一样继续表现为杀气腾腾的又该怎么办？

detailed_translations.english: a high rank in the army, Marines, or the US air force, or someone who has this rank

name: employ
trans: vi.雇用，使用，使忙于

sentences.english: The factory employs over 2,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.english: The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告探讨了课堂教学方法。

sentences.english: Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
sentences.chinese: 她的时间都花在搞园艺和做义工上。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone to work for you

name: undertake
trans: vt.从事，承担，保证，答应

sentences.english: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.chinese: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.english: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.chinese: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

name: manly
trans: adj.男子气概的，果断的，强壮的，适于男人的，adv.男子般地

sentences.english: a deep manly voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉雄浑的嗓音

detailed_translations.chinese: 男子气概的；强壮的；适于男人的
detailed_translations.english: having qualities that people expect and admire in a man, such as being brave and strong

name: cook
trans: vt.烹调，煮，编造，虚构，烧(菜)，vi.烧菜，发生，做好，n.厨师，烧菜

sentences.english: Where did you learn to cook?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学烹调的？

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.english: slices of cooked ham
sentences.chinese: 熟的火腿片

sentences.english: a cooked breakfast
sentences.chinese: 做好的早餐

detailed_translations.english: to prepare food for eating by using heat
to prepare food for eating by using heat

name: north
trans: n.北，北方，adj.北，北方的，adv.向北方

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

name: leak
trans: vi.漏，泄露，漏渗，n.漏洞

sentences.english: The roof is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶在漏水。

sentences.english: A tanker is leaking oil off the coast of Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰海岸附近有一艘油轮漏油。

sentences.english: 英语例句：The boat had sprung a leak (= a hole had appeared in it ).
sentences.chinese: 小船出现了漏洞。

detailed_translations.english: if a container, pipe, roof etc leaks, or if it leaks gas, liquid etc, there is a small hole or crack in it that lets gas or liquid flow through
a small hole that lets liquid or gas flow into or out of something

name: gum
trans: n.口香糖，树胶，橡皮(糖)，齿龈，粘性物质，牙床，vt.搞砸，用牙床嚼，以树胶粘合，vi.形成胶质，发粘

sentences.english: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums or causing bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 牙刷轻轻地刷去齿菌斑，没有伤及牙床或引起出血。

detailed_translations.english: your gums are the two areas of firm pink flesh at the top and bottom of your mouth, in which your teeth are fixed

name: silver
trans: n.银，银子，银器，adj.银色的，银的，vt.镀银，变成银白色

sentences.english: The silver spoon tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 银匙失去光泽了。

sentences.english: Her teeth were capped with silver.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿是包了银的。

sentences.english: The workers parted gold from silver in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 在车间里工人们把金子从银子中提炼出来。

name: probability
trans: n.可能性，概率，机率

sentences.english: You must decide whether, on the balance of probabilities , he committed the crime.
sentences.chinese: 你们一定要权衡正反两方面的可能性，然后再裁定他是否犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: how likely something is, sometimes calculated in a mathematical way

name: laboratory
trans: n.实验室，研究室，实验大楼

sentences.english: a research laboratory
sentences.chinese: 研究实验室

sentences.english: tests on laboratory animals
sentences.chinese: 在实验室动物身上做的试验

detailed_translations.english: a special room or building in which a scientist does tests or prepares substances

name: pronoun
trans: n.代名词

sentences.english: Here you should use plural pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 这里你应该用复数代词。

sentences.english: No chance! It was the best of the weak pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 没有机会！这真是弱者的最好代词。

sentences.english: Now if we could only figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们可以解决这个代词问题了。

detailed_translations.english: a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase, such as ‘he’ instead of ‘Peter’ or ‘the man’

name: hatred
trans: n.憎恶，憎恨，仇恨

sentences.english: A look of pure hatred flashed across her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上闪过十足的仇恨表情。

sentences.english: the old hatreds and prejudices that simmered below the surface
sentences.chinese: 长久以来憋在心中的仇恨与偏见

detailed_translations.english: an angry feeling of extreme dislike for someone or something

name: survive
trans: vt.幸免于，比...活得长，艰难度过，vi.活下来，活着，继续存在

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.chinese: 活下来，继续存在；幸免于
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

detailed_translations.chinese: 从中挺过来； 从…逃出； 比…活得长
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live normally in spite of many problems

name: dramatization
trans: n.编剧，改编成戏剧

name: chair
trans: n.椅子，主席，席位，讲座，要职，vt.上任，使担任(某事务)的主席主持

sentences.english: a kitchen chair
sentences.chinese: 厨房椅

sentences.english: They bought a new table and chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了一套新的桌椅。

sentences.english: One of the chair legs was broken.
sentences.chinese: 椅子有一条腿断了。

sentences.english: Address your questions to the chair, please.
sentences.chinese: 请向主席提出你的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, which has a back, a seat, and four legs

name: addition
trans: n.，加，加法，附加物，增加

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

name: unhappy
trans: adj.不幸福的，不快乐的

sentences.english: If you’re so unhappy, why don’t you change jobs?
sentences.chinese: 你要是那么不开心，为什么不换个工作呢？

sentences.english: Leslie had an unhappy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯利的童年很不幸。

sentences.english: an unhappy marriage
sentences.chinese: 不幸的婚姻

sentences.english: I was desperately unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 我非常不快乐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不快乐的；不幸福的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not happy

name: companion
trans: n.同伴，同事，共事者，伴侣，成对物品之一，(船的)甲板间扶梯(或扶梯的顶篷)，vt.，&，vi.陪伴

sentences.english: For ten years he had been her constant companion .
sentences.chinese: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.english: His dog became his closest companion .
sentences.chinese: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.english: a travelling companion
sentences.chinese: 旅伴

detailed_translations.english: someone you spend a lot of time with, especially a friend

name: widow
trans: n.寡妇，遗孀，vt.使丧偶

sentences.english: The sorrowful widow begged for mercy.
sentences.chinese: 伤心的寡妇乞怜。

sentences.english: Tony hobnobbed with an attractive widow when he lived in Metz.
sentences.chinese: 托尼在梅斯居住期间曾与一名漂亮的寡妇交往甚密。

sentences.english: "I tell you the truth," he said, "this poor widow has put in more than all the others.
sentences.chinese: “我实话告诉你”，耶稣说道，“这个贫穷的寡妇放入的比其他人的都多。

detailed_translations.english: a woman whose husband has died and who has not married again

name: scan
trans: vt.细看，浏览，扫描，详细调查，押韵，vi.押韵，n.扫描，押韵，细查

sentences.english: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.english: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.english: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.chinese: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.english: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.chinese: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.english: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.chinese: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing

name: race
trans: n.比，竞，竞争，人种，种族，民族v.，，跑，竞

sentences.english: The race is on to develop more environmentally friendly forms of energy.
sentences.chinese: 人们正在竞相开发更环保的能源形式。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

name: insult
trans: vt.，&，n.侮辱，凌辱，(对人身的)损害

sentences.english: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
sentences.chinese: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.english: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不来，希望安迪不要介意。

sentences.english: 200 for all that work? It’s an insult.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：干那么多工作才给200美元？这简直是侮辱。

detailed_translations.english: to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
a remark or action that is offensive or deliberately rude

name: save
trans: vt.救，解救，节省，储蓄，保存，vi.节省，储蓄，救球，prep.除...之外，conj.除...之外，只有，n.救援者，救球，节省

sentences.english: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.english: ways to save money on heating bills
sentences.chinese: 节省取暖费的种种办法

detailed_translations.english: to use less money, time, energy etc so that you do not waste any

name: sleep
trans: n.睡眠，睡觉，vi.，&，vt.睡

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

detailed_translations.english: to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

name: expensive
trans: adj.昂贵的，花钱多的，豪华的

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

name: insurance
trans: n.保险，保险费

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

name: daylight
trans: n.白昼，日光，黎明

sentences.english: The park is open to the public during daylight hours .
sentences.chinese: 公园白天对公众开放。

sentences.english: If possible, it’s better to work in natural daylight.
sentences.chinese: 如果条件允许的话，最好在自然日光下工作。

detailed_translations.english: the light produced by the sun during the day

name: handsome
trans: adj.英俊的，慷慨大方的，可观的，灵巧的，相当大的

sentences.english: an extremely handsome young man
sentences.chinese: 一位特别英俊的年轻人

sentences.english: They won a handsome victory in the elections.
sentences.chinese: 他们在选举中取得了重大的胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is handsome looks attractive

name: ignore
trans: vt.不顾，不理，忽视

sentences.english: The phone rang, but she ignored it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if you had not heard or seen someone or something

name: divorce
trans: n.离婚，离异，vi.离婚，与...办离婚

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

name: needle
trans: n.针，缝补，编织针，vt.用针缝，激怒，嘲弄，vi.缝纫

sentences.english: She carried hypodermic needles and syringes in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她包里带着皮下注射针和针筒。

sentences.english: Drug users are at risk when they share needles.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒者共用注射针很危险。

detailed_translations.english: a very thin, pointed steel tube at the end of a syringe, which is pushed into your skin to put a drug or medicine into your body or to take out blood

name: behalf
trans: n.利益，维护，支持

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

name: background
trans: n.背景，后景，经历，幕后，配音，vt.提供背景

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

name: strap
trans: n.带子，皮带，vt.(用带)捆扎，(用带)打

sentences.english: The strap of my bag is broken.
sentences.chinese: 我包上的带子断了。

sentences.english: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
sentences.chinese: 腰带上绑着手榴弹的士兵

detailed_translations.english: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something
to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps

name: indirect
trans: adj.间接的，不坦率的，迂回的，次要的，欺骗的

sentences.english: Losing weight is an indirect result of smoking cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟间接导致体重减轻。

sentences.english: The indirect effects of climate change may be profound.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化造成的间接影响可能是深远的。

sentences.english: George’s comments were an indirect way of blaming me.
sentences.chinese: 乔治的评论转弯抹角地指责了我。

detailed_translations.english: not directly caused by something

name: stability
trans: n.稳定，稳定性，巩固，居于修道院

sentences.english: a period of relative stability
sentences.chinese: 相对稳定的一段时期

detailed_translations.english: the condition of being steady and not changing

name: choice
trans: n.选择，挑选，抉择，adj.上等的，精选的

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

name: east
trans: n.东，东部，adv.在东方，向东方，adj.东方的

sentences.english: Which way is east?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是东？

sentences.english: housing problems in the east
sentences.chinese: 东部的住房问题

sentences.english: The drug is being used all the time out east.
sentences.chinese: 这药一直在东方使用。

detailed_translations.english: the direction from which the sun rises, and which is on the right if you are facing north
to or in the countries in Asia, especially China and Japan

name: blow
trans: vi.吹，吹动，吹响，打击，殴打，v.吹，风吹，擤（鼻子），【口】浪费（机会）

sentences.english: A cold breeze was blowing hard.
sentences.chinese: 寒风劲吹。

sentences.english: It was blowing from an easterly direction.
sentences.chinese: 这是从东面吹过来的。

sentences.english: Outside, the weather was blowing a gale.
sentences.chinese: 外面狂风大作。

sentences.english: Her hair was blowing in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发在微风中飘扬。

sentences.english: The whistle blew for half time.
sentences.chinese: 哨声响起，上半场结束。

detailed_translations.english: if the wind or a current of air blows, it moves

name: male
trans: a.男的，雄的，n.男子，雄性动物

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a man

name: representative
trans: adj.代表性的，代议制的，典型的，n.代表，众议员，典型

sentences.english: The latest incident is representative of a wider trend.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件代表了一个更大的趋势。

sentences.english: an elected representative of the people
sentences.chinese: 民选代表

detailed_translations.english: typical of a particular group or thing
someone who has been chosen to speak, vote, or make decisions for someone else

name: commercial
trans: adj.商业的，商品化的，n.商业广告

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

name: instead
trans: adv.代替，顶替，反而

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

sentences.english: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.chinese: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.english: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.chinese: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

name: rent
trans: n.租金，租，vi.出租，vt.，出租，租用

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

name: gently
trans: ad.有礼貌地，柔和地，轻轻地，温柔地

sentences.english: ‘You go back to bed now,’ he said gently.
sentences.chinese: “你回去睡觉吧。”他温柔地说道。

sentences.english: She kissed me gently on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 她温柔地亲吻我的脸颊。

sentences.english: Gently cook the peppers for 10-15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用文火将辣椒煮10到15分钟。

sentences.english: Rain pattered gently on the roof above.
sentences.chinese: 雨点轻轻拍打着上面的屋顶。

sentences.english: The road curved gently upwards.
sentences.chinese: 路缓缓地蜿蜒而上。

detailed_translations.english: in a gentle way

name: consider
trans: vt.认为，考虑，思考，关心

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

name: secure
trans: adj.，安心的，安全的，无虑的，牢靠的，稳妥的，vt.，固定，获得使...安全，vi.，(，海上工作人员，)，停止工作，(船)，抛锚，停泊

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change
to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

name: think
trans: vt.想，想要，认为，考虑，记起，n.想

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

name: skin
trans: n.皮，皮肤，兽皮，外皮，皮囊，v.剥皮，削皮，adj.色情的

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: heel
trans: n.脚后跟，踵，后跟，v.倾侧

sentences.english: black boots with high heels
sentences.chinese: 有高跟的黑靴子

detailed_translations.english: the curved back part of your foot
(of a vessel) to lean over; list

name: tyre
trans: n.轮胎，车胎，=tire(美)，Tyre：提尔(古代腓尼基的有名港口现属黎巴嫩)

sentences.english: He saw a dagger sticking in his car's tyre.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一把匕首插在他汽车的轮胎上。

detailed_translations.english: a thick rubber ring that fits around the wheel of a car, bicycle etc

name: necessity
trans: n.必要性，必然性，需要，必需品

sentences.english: I’m afraid it’s become a matter of economic necessity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这已成了一个经济需求的问题。

detailed_translations.english: when something is necessary

name: soda
trans: n.碳酸钠，纯碱，汽水，苏打

sentences.english: a Scotch and soda
sentences.chinese: 一杯加苏打水的苏格兰威士忌

detailed_translations.chinese: 碳酸钠， 纯碱； 汽水， 苏打水
detailed_translations.english: water that contains bubbles and is often added to alcoholic drinks

name: estimate
trans: vt.估计，估价，评价，n.估计，估价

sentences.english: Try to estimate how many steps it will take to get to a close object.
sentences.chinese: 估计一下需要多少步才能到达一个近距目标。

detailed_translations.english: to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly

detailed_translations.chinese: 估计； 评价； 看法
detailed_translations.english: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete

name: quickly
trans: adv.快，迅速

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

name: cable
trans: n.缆，索，电缆，海底电报，vt.打海底电报，把...拧成缆，用缆捆住，vi.打海底电报

sentences.english: The miners rode a conveyance attached to a cable made of braided steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们乘坐连着钢索的缆车。

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

sentences.english: She sent a cable to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她给母亲发了封电报。

detailed_translations.english: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc

name: attach
trans: vt.缚，系，贴，附加，使依恋

sentences.english: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴， 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

name: tense
trans: n.(动词)时态，时，adj.拉紧的，绷紧的，紧张的，v.使紧绷，拉紧

sentences.english: Is anything wrong? You look a little tense.
sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

name: ministry
trans: n.(政府的)部，(全体)牧师，牧师工作

sentences.english: the Ministry of Agriculture
sentences.chinese: 农业部

sentences.english: Converted in his early teens, he entered the ministry (= started working as a church leader ) in 1855.
sentences.chinese: 他十三四岁皈依基督教，1855年当上牧师。

sentences.english: the ministry of Jesus
sentences.chinese: 耶稣的传道工作

detailed_translations.chinese: （政府的）部；；（全体）牧师；牧师的职责
detailed_translations.english: a government department that is responsible for one of the areas of government work, such as education or health

name: economy
trans: n.经济，节约，节省，adj.经济型的

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.chinese: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.english: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.chinese: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which a country’s money and goods are produced and used, or a country considered in this way

name: city
trans: n.城市，都市

sentences.english: The nearest big city was St. Louis.
sentences.chinese: 最近的大城市是圣路易斯。

detailed_translations.english: a large important town

name: weigh
trans: vt.称...的重量，掂量，衡量，重达...，n.重量，道路

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

name: old
trans: a.老的，某年龄的，以前的，陈旧的，熟悉的，成熟的，...岁的，n.古时，某年龄

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.english: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is old has lived for a very long time

name: spacecraft
trans: n.航天器，宇宙飞船

sentences.english: the world's largest and most expensive unmanned spacecraft
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大、最贵的无人航天器

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that is able to travel in space

name: lodge
trans: vi.暂住，借宿，投宿，临时住宿，安顿，n.小屋，门房，支部

sentences.english: a building used to lodge prisoners of war
sentences.chinese: 一座关押战俘的建筑物

sentences.english: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.chinese: 子弹射入这个军士的腿部，击碎了他的大腿骨。

detailed_translations.english: to pay to live in a room in someone’s house
If an object lodges somewhere, it becomes stuck there

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡间小屋， 旅舍； 寄宿者， 投宿者
detailed_translations.english: a small house on the land of a large country house, usually at the main entrance gate

name: wife
trans: n.妻子，夫人

sentences.english: Have you met my wife?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的妻子吗？

sentences.english: a refuge for battered wives
sentences.chinese: 受虐待妻子庇护所

sentences.english: his second wife
sentences.chinese: 他的第二任妻子

detailed_translations.english: the woman that a man is married to

name: interior
trans: adj.内的，内地的，国内的，内部的，n.内部，内在

sentences.english: The interior walls are all painted white.
sentences.chinese: 室内墙壁都粉刷成了白色。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里很暗。

detailed_translations.english: inside or indoors
the inner part or inside of something

name: inspect
trans: vt.检查，审查，调查，检阅，vi.调查

sentences.english: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.english: Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.english: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

name: unique
trans: adj.唯一的，独一无二的，独特的，稀罕的

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

name: growth
trans: n.增长，增长量，生长，生长物

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

detailed_translations.english: an increase in amount, number, or size

name: lion
trans: n.狮子，勇猛的人

sentences.english: The wounded lion bellowed out.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

sentences.english: The lion bounded on the prey.
sentences.chinese: 那头狮子向猎物猛扑过去。

sentences.english: The savages darted spears at the lion.
sentences.chinese: 野蛮人们把矛掷向狮子。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

name: unlucky
trans: adj.不幸的，不吉的，倒霉的

sentences.english: Thierry Henry was desperately unlucky not to score when his shot hit the post.
sentences.chinese: 蒂埃里·亨利太不走运了，射门没进，球打中了门柱。

sentences.english: Some people think black cats are unlucky.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为黑猫不吉利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒霉的；不幸的；不吉利的
detailed_translations.english: having bad luck

name: group
trans: n.小组，群，团，团体，vt.，&，vi.聚合，成群，聚集，[计算机]，成组

sentences.english: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.
sentences.chinese: 他的身边围了一群仰慕者。

sentences.english: The photo shows four men grouped round a jeep.
sentences.chinese: 照片上是四个男人围着一辆吉普车。

detailed_translations.english: several people or things that are all together in the same place
to come together and form a group, or to arrange things or people together in a group

name: concerning
trans: prep.关于

sentences.english: calls from young children concerning lost pets
sentences.chinese: 小孩子打来的有关宠物走失的电话

sentences.english: the facts concerning Marr’s car crash
sentences.chinese: 有关马尔撞车事故的事实

detailed_translations.english: about or relating to

name: fairly
trans: adv.相当，公平地，公正地，合法地，适当地

sentences.english: The house had a fairly large garden.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.english: She speaks English fairly well.
sentences.chinese: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.english: I felt I hadn’t been treated fairly.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己没有受到公正对待。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little, but much less than very

name: specialize
trans: vi.成为...专家，专攻，特殊化，vt.专门研究，专攻，使...特殊化

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

name: angry
trans: adj.愤怒的，生气的，伤口红肿的

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

name: saint
trans: n.圣人，圣徒，基督教徒，vt.把...封为圣人

sentences.english: Saint Patrick
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克

sentences.english: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣人；圣徒；道德崇高的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy

name: yearly
trans: adj.每年的，adv.一年一度地，每年地

sentences.english: Salary levels are reviewed on a yearly basis.
sentences.chinese: 工资水平每年都要审查。

sentences.english: a total yearly income of $78,000
sentences.chinese: 7.8万美元的年总收入

sentences.english: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.chinese: 客户们通常提前付费，或按月，或按季度，或按年。

detailed_translations.english: happening or appearing every year or once a year
Yearly is also an adverb

name: safety
trans: n.安全，保险，安全打，vt.保护

sentences.english: You shouldn’t travel alone, for safety’s sake .
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，不要独自一人旅行。

sentences.english: For your own safety , please do not smoke inside the plane.
sentences.chinese: 为了您自身的安全，请不要在飞机上吸烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is safe from danger or harm

name: sightseeing
trans: n.观光，游览，动词sightsee的现在分词

sentences.english: She swam and sunbathed, went sightseeing and relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 她游泳，晒日光浴，观光，放松。

detailed_translations.english: when you visit famous or interesting places, especially as tourists

name: horror
trans: n.恐怖，战栗，憎恶，厌恶，adj.恐怖的，令人毛骨悚然的

sentences.english: People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 人们惊恐地看着飞机坠落到地面上。

sentences.english: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.
sentences.chinese: 想到被孤零零地留下，她就不寒而栗。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great shock, fear or disgust

name: cargo
trans: n.船货，货物

sentences.english: a cargo plane
sentences.chinese: 货机

detailed_translations.english: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane

name: address
trans: n.，地址，住址，致词，讲话，演说，谈吐，(处理问题的)技巧，vt.发表演说，写地址，称呼，对付，(，图书、文章等)讨论(某主题)

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

name: mask
trans: n.面具，伪装，口罩，掩饰，面膜，vt.掩饰，戴面具，化装，[计算机]掩码

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: tortoise
trans: n.龟，乌龟

sentences.english: I saw a big sea tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 我看见过一个大海龟。

sentences.english: Run like a tortoise.
sentences.chinese: 像乌龟一样慢慢跑。

sentences.english: Either way, both the hare and tortoise get what they deserve based on how they behave.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，野兔和乌龟得到什么都是基于它们的行为举止的。

detailed_translations.english: a slow-moving land animal that can pull its head and legs into the hard round shell that covers its body

name: could
trans: aux.v.(can的过去式)

sentences.english: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

detailed_translations.english: used as the past tense of ‘can’ to say what someone was able to do or was allowed to do in the past

name: trip
trans: vi.，绊，绊倒，失足，轻快地走，失误，结巴，旅行，vt.，绊倒，使跌倒，使犯错，使失败，起锚，竖帆，n.，旅行，摔倒，差错，轻快的步伐

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

name: fork
trans: n.餐叉，叉，叉状物，vt.，&，vi.叉起，耙，成叉状

sentences.english: Put the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool you use for picking up and eating food, with a handle and three or four points
to put food into your mouth or onto a plate using a fork

name: labour
trans: n.劳动，工作，劳工，Labour(英国)工党

sentences.english: The garage charges £30 an hour for labour.
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂收取每小时30英镑的人工费。

sentences.english: Many women do hard manual labour(= work with their hands ).
sentences.chinese: 许多妇女从事繁重的体力劳动。

sentences.english: Workers withdrew their labour (= protested by stopping work ) for twenty-four hours.
sentences.chinese: 工人罢工24小时。

sentences.english: a shortage of skilled labor
sentences.chinese: 熟练工人短缺

detailed_translations.english: work, especially physical work

name: bicycle
trans: n.自行车，脚踏车，v.骑自行车

sentences.english: Can James ride a bicycle yet?
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯会骑自行车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing its pedals with your feet

name: ocean
trans: n.海洋，洋，大量

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

name: react
trans: vi.起反应，起作用，有影响，反攻，vt.作出反应

sentences.english: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
sentences.chinese: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

sentences.english: She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.chinese: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.english: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

detailed_translations.english: to behave in a particular way or show a particular emotion because of something that has happened or been said

name: outer
trans: adj.外部的，外面的

sentences.english: His inner conflict is related to struggles in the outer world.
sentences.chinese: 他内心的矛盾和外部世界的争斗有关。

detailed_translations.english: relating to objects, activities etc that are part of the world, as opposed to your own thoughts and feelings

name: tremendous
trans: adj.极大的，非常的，巨大的，惊人的

sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a tremendous bang, and the whole station shook.
sentences.chinese: 突然一声巨响，整个车站都晃动了。

sentences.english: She was making a tremendous effort to appear calm.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力表现出平静的样子。

sentences.english: She praised her husband for the tremendous support he had given her.
sentences.chinese: 她称赞丈夫给了她巨大支持。

sentences.english: Sales have been tremendous so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年到目前为止，销售额十分惊人。

sentences.english: This plan could save us a tremendous amount of money.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划能给我们节省一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: very big, fast, powerful etc

name: magnetic
trans: adj.磁的，有吸引力的，，，眠术的

sentences.english: magnetic forces
sentences.chinese: 磁力

sentences.english: a magnetic personality
sentences.chinese: 富有魅力的个性

detailed_translations.english: concerning or produced by  magnetism

name: riddle
trans: n.谜，谜语，vt.解谜，出谜题，充满，打洞，筛选，vi.出谜题

sentences.english: See if you can solve this riddle .
sentences.chinese: 看看你能不能猜出这个谜语。

detailed_translations.english: to solve, explain, or interpret (a riddle or riddles)

detailed_translations.chinese: 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等
detailed_translations.english: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer

name: drift
trans: vi.漂流，漂泊，吹积，n.漂流，漂移，漂流物，观望，吹积物，趋势，vt.使漂流，把...吹积

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

sentences.english: Jenni spent the year drifting around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮这一年来一直在欧洲各地漂泊。

sentences.english: a drift towards longer working hours
sentences.chinese: 工作时间不知不觉的变长

sentences.english: the drift from the countryside to the cities
sentences.chinese: 大量人口从乡村往城市的流动

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air
a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

name: three
trans: num.三，三个，pron.，&，adj.三(个，只...)

sentences.english: They’ve won their last three games.
sentences.chinese: 他们赢了最近三场比赛。

sentences.english: We’d better go. It’s almost three (= three o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们该走了。快3点了。

sentences.english: My little sister’s only three (= three years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹只有3岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 3
the number 3

name: establish
trans: vt.建立，设立，确立，创办

sentences.english: He’d already begun to establish quite a reputation as a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 身为记者，他已经声名鹊起。

sentences.english: He had three years in which to establish himself as Prime Minister.
sentences.chinese: 他有三年时间来确立自己首相的地位。

detailed_translations.english: to make people accept that you can do something, or that you have a particular quality

name: outline
trans: n.轮廓，略图，大纲，概要，素描，vt.描画轮廓，描述要点

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

name: unpleasant
trans: adj.令人不快的，讨厌的

sentences.english: an unpleasant experience
sentences.chinese: 不愉快的经历

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant smell
sentences.chinese: 极其难闻的味道

name: on

name: fortune
trans: n.命运，运气，财产

sentences.english: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.english: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.english: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

detailed_translations.english: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

name: expression
trans: n.词句，措辞，表达，表示，表现，表情

sentences.english: Student leaders are demanding greater freedom of expression (= the right to say what you think without being punished ).
sentences.chinese: 学生领袖要求得到更多的言论自由。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词语； 表达， 表情
detailed_translations.english: something you say, write, or do that shows what you think or feel

name: correspondent
trans: n.通信者，通讯记者，通讯员，adj.与...一致的，相应的

sentences.english: The result was correspondent with my wishes.
sentences.chinese: 结果与我的愿望是一致的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通讯员，记者；异地代理商；代理银行
detailed_translations.english: someone who is employed by a newspaper or a television station etc to report news from a particular area or on a particular subject

name: bathroom
trans: n.浴室，盥洗室

sentences.english: The water shed from the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 水是从浴室中溢出来的。

sentences.english: We revamped our bathroom last month.
sentences.chinese: 我们在上个月装修了浴室。

sentences.english: My glasses steamed when I came into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我走进浴室时，眼镜上蒙上了一层水气。

detailed_translations.english: a room where there is a bath or  shower  , a  basin  , and sometimes a toilet

name: export
trans: vt.输出，出口，运走，n.出口，输出品，vi.传播，输出，adj.出口的

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

name: southeast
trans: n.东南，东南地区，adj.位于东南的，东南的，向东南的，来自东南的，adv.往东南，来自东南，在东南

sentences.english: the southeast quarter of the city
sentences.chinese: 该市的东南部

sentences.english: I know we have to go southeast, more or less.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我们大概得往东南方向走。

detailed_translations.english: a southeast wind comes from the southeast
the direction that is exactly between south and east
If you go southeast, you travel toward the southeast

name: culture
trans: n.文化，文明，教养，种植，vt.培养

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: volleyball
trans: n.排球，排球运动

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

name: careless
trans: adj.粗心的，漫不经心的，疏忽的，n.不关心的，粗心的，[反]attentive

sentences.english: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.chinese: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.english: a careless mistake
sentences.chinese: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.english: careless driving
sentences.chinese: 粗心驾驶

sentences.english: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.chinese: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.chinese: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

detailed_translations.english: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc

name: club
trans: n.俱乐部，夜总会，击棍，扑克牌中的梅花，vt.用棍棒打，集合，vi.集合，分担花费，泡夜总会

sentences.english: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.english: Shall we go to a club?
sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔职业体育的〕俱乐部；俱乐部；夜总会
detailed_translations.english: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team

name: suit
trans: n.起拆，诉讼，请求，套装，vt.适合，取悦，满足

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

name: canvas
trans: n.粗帆布，一块油画布，(帆布)画布，油画

sentences.english: a canvas bag
sentences.chinese: 帆布包

detailed_translations.english: strong cloth used to make bags, tents, shoes etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备

name: remain
trans: vi.剩下，余留，逗留，保持，依然，留下，n.遗迹，剩余物，残骸

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

name: planet
trans: n.行星

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

name: second
trans: num.第二，adj.二等的，第二的，另一个的，n.第二，秒，vt.支持

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

name: shear
trans: vt.剪，剪掉，剥夺，割，vi.剪，修剪，切割，剥夺，穿越，n.修剪，剪下的东西，羊的一岁

sentences.english: Though shorn of some of its powers, the party remains in control.
sentences.chinese: 虽然被削去了一些权力，该党仍然掌握着控制权。

sentences.english: Trim the shrubs with shears.
sentences.chinese: 用大剪刀修剪这些灌木。

detailed_translations.english: to cut the wool off a sheep
A pair of shears is a garden tool like a very large pair of scissors. Shears are used especially for cutting hedges.

name: differ
trans: vi.不同(意见)，相异，不一致

sentences.english: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

sentences.english: Experts have differing views on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上专家们意见不同。

detailed_translations.english: to be different from something in some way

name: convince
trans: vt.使确信，使信服，说服，使...相信

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

name: colleague
trans: n.同事，同僚

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

name: appliance
trans: n.用具，器具，器械，装置，应用

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

name: tale
trans: n.故事，传说，叙述，谎话，总计

sentences.english: a book of old Japanese folk tales
sentences.chinese: 日本古老民间故事书

sentences.english: a fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen
sentences.chinese: 安徒生的一则童话

sentences.english: a cautionary tale
sentences.chinese: 警示故事

sentences.english: tales of her life in post-war Berlin
sentences.chinese: 有关她在战后柏林生活的传闻

detailed_translations.english: a story about exciting imaginary events

name: alike
trans: adj.，同样的，相同的，相似的，adv.，一样，以同样的方式

sentences.english: My mother and I are alike in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 我和母亲在许多方面很相似。

detailed_translations.english: very similar
used to emphasize that you mean both the people, groups, or things that you have just mentioned

name: and
trans: conj.和，又，并，则，逻辑与

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.english: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.english: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.english: I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.chinese: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

detailed_translations.english: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way

name: consciousness
trans: n.意识，觉悟，知觉，自觉

sentences.english: The painful memories eventually faded from her consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 那些痛苦的回忆最终从她的意识中淡去了。

sentences.english: Hypnosis is an altered state of consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 催眠状态是一种被改变的意识状态。

sentences.english: research into human consciousness
sentences.chinese: 对人类意识的研究

detailed_translations.english: your mind and your thoughts

name: purple
trans: n.紫色，皇室，皇权，adj.紫的，帝王的，辞藻华丽的，v.变紫

sentences.english: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.chinese: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.english: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

detailed_translations.english: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

name: respectful
trans: adj.恭敬的，尊重的，有礼貌的，谦恭的

sentences.english: They listened in respectful silence.
sentences.chinese: 他们毕恭毕敬地静听。

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing respect

name: island
trans: n.岛，岛屿，孤立体，vt.建成岛屿，隔离

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

name: possibly
trans: adv.可能地，也许

sentences.english: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

sentences.english: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.chinese: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.english: ‘Will you be here tomorrow?’ ‘Possibly.’
sentences.chinese: “你明天到这儿来吗？”“也许吧。”

sentences.english: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’
sentences.chinese: “是谋杀吗？”“很可能是。”

detailed_translations.english: used when saying that something may be true or likely, although you are not completely certain

name: mostly
trans: adv.主要的，大部分，大概

sentences.english: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
sentences.chinese: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.english: There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.english: He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
sentences.chinese: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc

name: muscle
trans: n.肌肉，肌，体力，vt.用力挤，vi.用力进行

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: invade
trans: vt.入侵，侵略，侵害，侵袭，拥入

sentences.english: The Romans invaded Britain 2,000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 2,000年前古罗马人入侵了英国。

detailed_translations.english: to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it

name: fifty
trans: num.五十，五十个

sentences.english: Standards of living rose in the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 50年代生活水平提高了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 50

name: thread
trans: n.线，细丝，螺纹，头绪，线索，思路，vt.穿线于，穿过，遍布，vi.小心地通过，蜿蜒前进，滴下成丝状

sentences.english: I’m looking for a needle and thread.
sentences.chinese: 我在找针线。

sentences.english: hand-sewn with gold and silver thread
sentences.chinese: 用金线和银线手工缝制的

sentences.english: His mind wandered, and he lost the thread of what she was saying (= was no longer able to understand it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他走神了，跟不上她的思路。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin string of cotton, silk etc used to sew or weave cloth

name: without
trans: prep.无，没有，不，在外面，adv.在缺乏的情况下，在外面，conj.除非，n.外面，外部

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

name: broad
trans: adj.宽广的，阔的，广泛的，清楚无误的，明显的，粗俗的，adv.完全地，n.(复）河流的延伸

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.english: He was six feet tall, with broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

name: weaken
trans: vt.削弱，弄淡，vi.变弱，使...弱

sentences.english: Over the last two years the president’s position has weakened.
sentences.chinese: 过去两年来，总统的地位被削弱了。

sentences.english: Changes in policy have weakened the power of the trade unions.
sentences.chinese: 政策的变化削弱了工会的力量。

sentences.english: The absence of this witness has weakened the case against the accused.
sentences.chinese: 这名证人的缺席削弱了对被告的指控力度。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful
to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful

name: structural
trans: adj.结构的，构造的，建筑的，建筑用的

sentences.english: structural changes in the computer industry
sentences.chinese: 电脑行业的结构性改变

sentences.english: The earthquake caused minor structural damage.
sentences.chinese: 这次地震造成了轻微的结构破坏。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the structure of something

name: turbulent
trans: adj.骚动的，骚乱的，狂暴的，动荡的，汹涌的

sentences.english: the turbulent times of the French Revolution
sentences.chinese: 法国大革命的动荡时期

sentences.english: He has had a turbulent political career.
sentences.chinese: 他的政治生涯动荡不定。

detailed_translations.english: a turbulent situation or period of time is one in which there are a lot of sudden changes

name: inferior
trans: adj.下等的，劣等的，次等的，较低的，不如的

sentences.english: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.chinese: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.english: wine of inferior quality
sentences.chinese: 劣质葡萄酒

sentences.english: inferior goods
sentences.chinese: 质量低劣的商品

detailed_translations.english: not good, or not as good as someone or something else
someone who has a lower position or rank than you in an organization

name: sixty
trans: num.六十，六十个，n.六十，adj.六十的，六十个的

sentences.english: sixty years ago
sentences.chinese: 六十年前

detailed_translations.english: the number

name: chapter
trans: n.章，回，篇，牧师的例行会议，地方分会

sentences.english: Read Chapter 11 as your homework.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.english: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.chinese: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts into which a book is divided

name: chop
trans: vt.砍(价)，劈，切(细)，剁碎，vi.砍，n.厚肉片，排骨，砍

sentences.english: He went outside to chop some more wood for the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他出去再砍些木材来生火。

sentences.english: Can you chop up some carrots for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能帮我切一些胡萝卜吗？

sentences.english: Add two finely chopped onions and a clove of garlic.
sentences.chinese: 加上两个切碎的洋葱和一瓣大蒜。

detailed_translations.english: to cut something into smaller pieces
to cut something into smaller pieces

name: invention
trans: n.发明，发明物，虚构，虚构物，创造，捏造

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

name: postage
trans: n.邮费，邮资，邮资已付邮戳

sentences.english: How much is the postage for a postcard?
sentences.chinese: 寄一张明信片的邮资是多少？

detailed_translations.english: the money charged for sending a letter, package etc by post

name: column
trans: n.柱，支柱，圆柱，柱形物，专栏，[计算机]列

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

name: delight
trans: n.快乐，快乐，vt.使高兴，vi.给与乐趣

sentences.english: The kids were screaming with delight.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在高兴地尖叫。

sentences.english: He is delighting audiences with his wit and humour.
sentences.chinese: 他在用自己的智慧和幽默娱乐观众。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great pleasure and satisfaction
to give someone great satisfaction and enjoyment

name: eyesight
trans: n.视力，目力

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击

the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: convenient
trans: adj.便利的，近便的，方便的

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres

sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处

trans: vt.使惊恐，吓唬，惊恐

sentences.chinese: 别站得那么靠边！你要把我吓坏了。

sentences.chinese: 她被他眼中的怒火吓住了。

sentences.english: Computers used to frighten me, but not now.
sentences.chinese: 电脑过去让我感到害怕，但现在不了。

name: shy
trans: adj.易受惊的，害羞的，胆怯的，迟疑的，vi.惊退，畏缩，乱投，vt.乱投，n.投掷，惊避

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

if a horse shies, it makes a sudden movement away from something because it is frightened

name: bull
trans: adj.大型的，公牛的，雄性的，n.，公牛，雄的象，买空着，像牛的东西，斗牛犬，教宗训谕，法令，vi.，猛冲，vt.暴力，强制

sentences.english: a herd of cows with one bull
sentences.chinese: 一群母牛加一头公牛

sentences.english: a bull elephant

detailed_translations.chinese: 公牛；看好股市者；粗壮如牛的人；胡说八道；印玺

detailed_translations.chinese: 大型的；公牛似的；雄性的
detailed_translations.english: male; masculine

name: cloudy
trans: adj.多云的，云一般的

sentences.chinese: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.chinese: 明天多云，天气凉爽。

trans: n.缰绳，统驭，支配，机会，vi.驾驭，控制，vt.以缰绳控制，统制
