sentences.chinese: 当那匹牡马使劲挣扎，打着响鼻的时候，科德勒紧了缰绳。

trans: n.冬天，冬季，adj.冬天的，冬季生长的，vi.过冬，vt.对...进行过冬保护

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.

trans: n.离开，出发，起程，分歧

detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

trans: vt.有环连接，连接，联系，n.环，环节，联系，(链的)环，圈

sentences.chinese: 他与她挽臂同行。

each ring of a chain

name: restrict
trans: vt限制，限定，约束

sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.english: The cramped living conditions severely restricted the children’s freedom to play.

trans: n.蕨菜，闸，刹车，制动器，vt.，&，vi.制动，煞车，压榨

sentences.chinese: 车子涉水之后要检验一下刹车。

sentences.chinese: 我最终及时刹了车。

sentences.chinese: 莫伊拉猛踩刹车。

name: any
trans: adj.什么，一些，任何的adv.稍，一丁点，pron.任何

sentences.chinese: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.english: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.

trans: adj.拉丁的，拉丁人的，拉丁语系国家的，n.拉丁语，拉丁人

sentences.chinese: 他拉丁语的功底很扎实。

sentences.english: I must brush up on my Latin.
sentences.chinese: 我必须把拉丁语重温一下。

sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.chinese: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.chinese: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过程，进程；；工序；工艺流程

name: infinite
trans: adj.无限的，无穷的，无数的，n.无限

sentences.chinese: 宇宙是无限的。

sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.chinese: 此类公司如果想在现代社会中与别人竞争，就必须有所改变。

sentences.chinese: 他们是近代面临谋杀指控儿童中年龄最小的。

trans: n.运输，运送，客运，运输系统，运输工具

sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

sentences.chinese: 有谣传说他可能出任这个项目的主管。

sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

name: inner

sentences.english: an inner room

sentences.english: the inner ear
sentences.chinese: 内耳

sentences.english: Yoga gives me a sense of inner calm.
sentences.chinese: 练习瑜伽使我感到内心平和。

sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

sentences.chinese: 工程师们面临的主要难题是要确定该地区地下河的位置。

name: installation

sentences.chinese: 警报系统的安装和维护

sentences.english: The whole computer installation was nearly new.
sentences.chinese: 整套电脑设备几乎是全新的。

sentences.english: nuclear installations
sentences.chinese: 核设施

name: chairman
trans: n.主席，议长，会长

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

name: venture
trans: n.，&，vi.冒险，风险，投机，vt.敢于，尝试，谨慎地做，冒险一试

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

name: resolution
trans: n.坚决，坚定，决定，决心，决议，果断，刚毅，解决，解答，病理状态的减退，分辨率，清晰度

sentences.chinese: 然后，她突然很坚决地站了起来。

sentences.english: She made a resolution to visit her relatives more often.
sentences.chinese: 她决定要多走走亲戚。

name: screen
trans: n.屏，屏幕，银幕，屏风，vt.掩蔽，放映，检查，选拔，遮蔽

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: flame
trans: n.，火焰，火舌，鲜红色，光辉，恋人，怀念，辱骂信息，热情，vi.，焚烧，爆发，面红，发辱骂信息，vt.，用烟火发信号，用火对待，发辱骂信息

sentences.chinese: 火焰从大楼窗口冒出来。

sentences.english: They rushed past us with buckets of water and tried to douse the flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们提着一桶桶水跑过我们身边去灭火。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire, watching the flickering flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们围坐在篝火旁，看着跳动的火焰。

sentences.english: Flames quickly engulfed the building.
sentences.chinese: 火焰很快吞噬了大楼。

name: senior
trans: adj.年长的，地位较高的，高级的，资深的，n.年长者，上司，毕业班学生

A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale

trans: vt.记录，登记，注册，挂号，n.暂存器，记录，登记簿，(语)语域，通风调节设备

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: send
trans: vt.送，传，寄，派遣，发射，vi.放送，n.波浪的推力

sentences.english: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: [sent-sent] 送， 寄； 派遣， 打发； 发送； 发射
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

name: usual
trans: adj.通常的，平常的，惯常的，惯例的

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

detailed_translations.english: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations

name: sickness
trans: n.疾病

sentences.english: an insurance policy against long-term sickness and injury
sentences.chinese: 保长期患病和受伤的保险单

sentences.english: working days lost due to sickness
sentences.chinese: 因病损失的工作日

detailed_translations.english: the state of being ill

name: tropical
trans: adj.热带的，炎热的，热带植物的

sentences.english: the tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林

sentences.english: tropical fruit
sentences.chinese: 热带水果

detailed_translations.english: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world

name: nearly
trans: adv.差不多，几乎，密切地

sentences.english: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.chinese: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.english: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.english: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.chinese: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.english: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.chinese: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.english: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.english: He very nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 他差点送命。

detailed_translations.english: almost, but not quite or not completely

name: gap
trans: n.，缺口，间隔，差距，(意见、个性等的)差异，缝隙，漏洞，vt.，制造缺口，嘉普，(，财富500强公司之一，总部所在地美国，主要经营服装零售)

sentences.english: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

detailed_translations.english: a big difference between two situations, amounts, groups of people etc

name: lag
trans: vi.，走得慢，落后，vt.，落后，投掷，盖上桶盖，耽搁，n.，落后，滞后，落后的人，(两事件之间的)时间间隔，耽搁，桶盖，adj.，最后的

sentences.english: In this scenario, due to the lag time required to assimilate new resources, the relationship between required resources and estimated delivery timeframe may even turn negative.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，由于时间已经落后，需要吸收新的人力资源，需要的资源和预计的交付时间的关系甚至更加复杂。

sentences.english: But to many, at least as far as science is concerned, it is the countries that were doing well that are now doing better, whereas those at the bottom continue to lag significantly behind.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于许多人而言，至少在科学方面，正是那些在过去做的很好的国家现在正在做的更好，而那些位于底层的国家的科学继续落后。

sentences.english: One is that some countries still lag behind.
sentences.chinese: 一个原因是一些国家仍很落后。

name: puppet
trans: n.木偶，玩偶，傀儡

sentences.english: a 20-minute puppet show
sentences.chinese: 20分钟的木偶表演

sentences.english: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.chinese: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

sentences.english: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
sentences.chinese: 政府面临沦为军方傀儡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a model of a person or animal that you move by pulling wires or strings, or by putting your hand inside it

name: tag
trans: n.附加语，附属物，名称，谚语，标签，vt.附以签条，尾随，添饰，指责，连接，vi.紧随，尾随

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

name: edition
trans: n.版，版本，版次

sentences.english: a paperback edition
sentences.chinese: 平装本

sentences.english: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
sentences.chinese: 《嘉人》杂志的美国版

sentences.english: Martin was reading the early edition of the Evening News.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在看《新闻晚报》的早间版

sentences.english: The textbook was first published in 1858 and is now in its 39th edition.
sentences.chinese: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

detailed_translations.english: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in

name: true
trans: adj.真的，真实的，忠实的，adv.真实地，n.真相，精确，vt.使...平衡

sentences.english: No, honestly, it’s a true story .
sentences.chinese: 不，真的，这是一个真实的故事。

sentences.english: Students decide if statements are true or false .
sentences.chinese: 由学生来判断说法正确还是错误。

sentences.english: It’s generally true to say that fewer people are needed nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说现在需要的人员少了。

sentences.english: The results appear to hold true (= still be correct ) for other countries.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果在其他国家似乎同样正确。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts and not imagined or invented

name: beast
trans: n.兽，野兽，牲畜，凶残的人，令人厌憎的人

sentences.english: ...the threats our ancestors faced from wild beasts.
sentences.chinese: …我们祖辈所面临的来自野兽的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: an animal, especially a large or dangerous one

name: victorious
trans: adj.胜利的，得胜的

sentences.english: the victorious team
sentences.chinese: 得胜的球队

sentences.english: We were confident that the Allies would emerge victorious (= finally win ).
sentences.chinese: 我们确信盟军最终一定能获胜。

detailed_translations.english: having won a victory, or ending in a victory

name: meantime
trans: n.其时，其间，adv.当时，与此同时

sentences.english: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一部小说遭到六家出版商的拒绝。其间我又完成了一部戏剧。

sentences.english: The doctor will be here soon. In the meantime, try and relax.
sentences.chinese: 医生很快就来，现在尽量放松一下。

sentences.english: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
sentences.chinese: 我会尽快和他们联系。在此期间，不要告诉他们我回来了。

detailed_translations.english: in the period of time between two times or two events
英文释义: meanwhile

name: singer
trans: n.歌唱家，歌手，鸣禽，烧毛工，烧毛机，Singer：辛格(姓氏)

sentences.english: the lead singer (= main singer ) of Slade
sentences.chinese: 施莱德乐队的主唱

sentences.english: Tina Turner’s backing singers
sentences.chinese: 蒂纳·特纳的伴唱歌手

detailed_translations.english: someone who sings

name: worst
trans: adj.最坏的，最差的，最不利的，形容词bad或ill的最高级，adv.最坏地，最差，n.最坏的事物，vt.打败，胜过

sentences.english: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
sentences.chinese: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.english: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
sentences.chinese: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.english: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
sentences.chinese: 最糟可能会发生什么事？

sentences.english: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 援助物资正在送往受地震影响最严重的地区。

detailed_translations.english: worse than anything or anyone else
most badly

name: exhibition
trans: n.展览，陈列，展示，展览会

sentences.english: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.chinese: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.english: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.english: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.chinese: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

detailed_translations.english: a show of paintings, photographs, or other objects that people can go to see

name: shady
trans: adj.成荫的，阴凉的，可疑的

sentences.english: a shady street
sentences.chinese: 背阴的街道

sentences.english: It was nice and shady under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树下好阴凉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的
detailed_translations.english: protected from the sun or producing shade

name: swift
trans: adj.快的，反应快的，迅速的，n.雨燕，线轴，n.斯威夫特(人名)，adv.快速地

sentences.english: My letter received a swift reply.
sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.english: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done quickly and immediately

name: roof
trans: n.屋顶，车顶，顶，顶盖，vt.给...覆以屋顶，覆盖

sentences.english: They finally found the cat up on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 他们最后在屋顶上找到了那只猫。

sentences.english: a flat roof
sentences.chinese: 平顶

sentences.english: a pitched roof
sentences.chinese: 斜顶

detailed_translations.chinese: 屋顶；最高处，顶部；最高限度
detailed_translations.english: the structure that covers or forms the top of a building, vehicle, tent etc
to put a roof on a building

name: faith
trans: n.信任，信心，信仰

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

name: soil
trans: n.泥土，土壤，土地，污物，粪便，vt.弄脏，弄污，vi.变脏，vt.用青草饲料喂养

sentences.english: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

detailed_translations.english: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body
to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

name: haircut
trans: n.理发，发式

sentences.english: Do you like my new haircut?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢我的新发型吗？

detailed_translations.english: when you have a haircut, someone cuts your hair for you

name: she
trans: pron.(主格)她

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: melon
trans: n.瓜，甜瓜

sentences.english: ...some juicy slices of melon.
sentences.chinese: …几片多汁的甜瓜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西
detailed_translations.english: a large round fruit with sweet juicy flesh

name: rapidly
trans: adv.迅速地

sentences.english: The disease was spreading more rapidly than expected.
sentences.chinese: 疾病的蔓延比预期的要快。

detailed_translations.english: very quickly and in a very short time

name: steadily
trans: adv.稳定地，不变地，稳固地，坚定地

sentences.english: The bus climbed steadily up the road.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车稳定地沿公路向上爬。

name: excite
trans: vt.使激动，引起，刺激，激励

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

name: environment
trans: n.环境，外界，围绕

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.english: the government minister for the environment
sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

detailed_translations.english: the air, water, and land on Earth, which is affected by man’s activities

name: restless
trans: adj.不安定的，焦虑的，静不下来的，得不到休息的

sentences.english: After a few weeks in Marseille, I grew restless and decided to move on.
sentences.chinese: 在马赛住了几星期后，我开始待不住了，决定换个地方。

detailed_translations.english: unwilling to keep still or stay where you are, especially because you are nervous or bored

name: operation
trans: n.操作，手术，运算，行动，活动

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: April
trans: n.四月

sentences.english: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

sentences.english: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

detailed_translations.english: the fourth month of the year, between March and May

name: transport
trans: vt.运输，流放，为强烈的情绪所激动，n.运输、运输工具，(常用复数)强烈的情绪(狂喜或狂怒)

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another

name: appear
trans: vi.出现，来到，抵达，似乎，显得，出版

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

name: lock
trans: n.锁，刹车，水闸，牢牢紧握，一束，一缕，vt.锁上，锁住，抓牢，使固定，vi.锁(住)，纠结，过闸

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

name: bubble
trans: n.泡，泡沫，气泡，幻想，骗局，欢乐，vi.冒泡，沸腾，起泡，出现，洋溢，vt.使冒泡

sentences.english: When water boils, bubbles rise to the surface.
sentences.chinese: 水烧开时，水面会冒泡泡。

sentences.english: soap bubbles
sentences.chinese: 肥皂泡

sentences.english: She was blowing bubbles in her milk with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 她用吸管在牛奶里吹泡泡。

sentences.english: Heat the cheese until it bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 把奶酪加热到冒泡。

detailed_translations.english: a ball of air or gas in liquid
to produce bubbles

name: properly
trans: adv.适当地，彻底地，当然地

sentences.english: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
sentences.chinese: 刹车似乎不正常。

sentences.english: Then he’s not doing his job properly.
sentences.chinese: 那么他没把分内事做好。

sentences.english: Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
sentences.chinese: 家长应该教导子女在公共场合要有规有矩。

sentences.english: properly trained staff
sentences.chinese: 训练有素的员工

detailed_translations.english: correctly, or in a way that is considered right

name: synthetic
trans: adj.综合的，合成的，人造的，n.人工制品

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

name: regardless
trans: adv.不顾一切地，adj.不注意的，粗心的

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

name: digital
trans: adj.数字的，计数的，手指的，数码的，电子的

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

name: yet
trans: adv.还，已经，仍然，conj.而，然而，但是

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

name: pity
trans: n.怜悯，遗憾，遗憾的事，vt.同情，怜悯

sentences.english: It’s a great pity Joyce wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯没有受到邀请太遗憾了。

sentences.english: I like Charlie. Pity he had to marry that awful woman.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢查利，遗憾的是他得和那个糟糕的女人结婚。

sentences.english: A pity we can’t find the guy who did it.
sentences.chinese: 真遗憾我们找不到那个干了这件事的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are disappointed about something and you wish things could happen differently

detailed_translations.chinese: 对……表示怜悯；对……感到同情
detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry for someone because they are in a very bad situation

name: quotation
trans: n.引用，引文，引语，语录，引用，报价单，行情

sentences.english: The following quotation is taken from a nineteenth century travel diary.
sentences.chinese: 下文引自19世纪的一篇旅行日记。

sentences.english: a dictionary of quotations
sentences.chinese: 引语词典，语录汇编

sentences.english: a quotation for car insurance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险的报价单

detailed_translations.english: a sentence or phrase from a book, speech etc which you repeat in a speech or piece of writing because it is interesting or amusing

name: radius
trans: n.半径，桡骨，半径范围，辐射区

sentences.english: The shock of the explosion was felt over a radius of forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的剧烈震动在方圆40英里内都能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.english: an area that covers a particular distance in all directions from a central point

name: sometime
trans: adv.在某一时候，从前，改天，来日，adj.以前的，某一时间

sentences.english: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentences.chinese: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

sentences.english: Sir Richard Marsh, the sometime chairman of British Rail
sentences.chinese: 理查德•马什爵士，英国铁路公司前董事长

detailed_translations.english: at a time in the future or in the past, although you do not know exactly when
former

name: approval
trans: n.赞成，同意，批准，认可

sentences.english: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.english: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.chinese: 她指望格雷格同意。

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

name: nerve
trans: n.神经(生物)，勇敢，胆量，精神，勇气，叶脉，vt.鼓起勇气

sentences.english: a condition which affects the nerves in the back
sentences.chinese: 影响背部神经的疾病

sentences.english: She finally found the nerve to tell him she wanted a divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她终于鼓起勇气告诉他自己想离婚。

detailed_translations.english: nerves are parts inside your body which look like threads and carry messages between the brain and other parts of the body

name: create
trans: vt.创造，引起，产生

sentences.english: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

name: consideration
trans: n.考虑，思考，体贴，考虑因素，敬重，意见

sentences.english: proposals put forward for consideration
sentences.chinese: 提请考虑的建议

sentences.english: They’ve got no consideration for others.
sentences.chinese: 他们一点都不为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision

name: may
trans: v.aux.可能，可以，祝愿，n.(May)五月，青春

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

name: German
trans: adj.德国(人)的，德语的，日耳曼的，n.德国人，德语，日耳曼人

sentences.english: German history
sentences.chinese: 德国历史

detailed_translations.english: relating to Germany, its people, or its language
someone from Germany

name: flexible
trans: adj.易弯曲的，灵活的，柔韧的，可变通的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

name: opponent
trans: n.对手，敌手，对抗者，反对者，adj.敌对的，反对的

sentences.english: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.english: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.english: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

name: gravity
trans: n.重力，引力，严重性，严重，庄重，严肃

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

name: stay
trans: vi.停留，逗留，住，n.逗留，停留，支撑物，倚赖的人或事

sentences.english: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.english: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

detailed_translations.english: to remain in a place rather than leave
a limited time of living in a place

name: Portugal
trans: n.葡萄牙

sentences.english: Spain is bounded on the east by Portugal.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的东面与葡萄牙接壤。

sentences.english: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

sentences.english: ''Yes, he is only 33, but I think we should look at him just as a man on his own, a different manager - yes from Portugal, but a different individual, and just give him a chance to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 确实，他只有33岁，但是我认为他应该看到他自我的一面，是一名不同于别人（穆里尼奥）的教练——虽然也来自葡萄牙，但是拥有不同的风格。 只有认识到这一点他才可能成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 葡萄牙(欧洲西南部国家)

name: acquire
trans: vt.，占有，取得，获得，学到

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

name: tablet
trans: n.碑，匾，片状物，药片

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: backward
trans: adj.向后的，倒的，adv.倒，向后

sentences.english: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.chinese: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.english: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.chinese: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you do something backward, you do it in the opposite way to the usual way

name: interruption
trans: n.中断，打断，障碍物

sentences.english: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明是唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.english: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明是人类历史上唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.english: So, any interruption to one of the access path does not affect storage access from the host.
sentences.chinese: 因此，其中一条访问路径的中断不会影响从主机发起的存储访问。

name: breath
trans: n.气息，呼吸，气味，微风，迹象，精神，一种说话的声音

sentences.english: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.chinese: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

detailed_translations.english: the air that you take into your lungs and send out again

name: pipe
trans: n.管子，导管，烟斗，笛，vt.以管输送，装管道，吹奏，尖声说，拷边，vi.吹奏管乐，尖叫

sentences.english: a water pipe
sentences.chinese: 水管

sentences.english: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.chinese: 冻住的污水管

sentences.english: copper pipes
sentences.chinese: 铜管

sentences.english: A pipe had burst in the kitchen and flooded the floor.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

detailed_translations.english: a tube through which a liquid or gas flows
to make a musical sound, using a pipe

name: ahead
trans: adv.，在前，向前，提前，将来地，占优势

sentences.english: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.english: We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead .
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到前方拉斯维加斯的灯光。

sentences.english: Henry hurried on ahead.
sentences.chinese: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

sentences.english: The party was planned weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聚会提前几个星期就已筹划好了。

detailed_translations.english: further forward in space or time; in front

name: tomorrow
trans: adv.在明天，n.明天，将来

sentences.english: I’ll see you at tomorrow’s meeting.
sentences.chinese: 明天会上见。

detailed_translations.english: the day after today
on or during the day after today

name: square
trans: n.正方形，广场，街区，平方，adj.正方形的，正直的，公正的，结实的，断然的，v.使...成方形，调整，一致，收买，adv.成直角，直接的正方形地

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: infant
trans: n.婴儿，幼儿，adj.婴儿的，幼稚的，初期的

sentences.english: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的皮肤非常敏感。

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: a baby or very young child
intended for babies or very young children

name: sense
trans: n.感官，感觉，见识，侦测，理智，意义，vt.感觉，了解，检测

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

name: number
trans: n.数，数字，号码，数量，vi.总计，编号，vt.编号，把...算作

sentences.english: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

name: flesh
trans: n.肉，肌肉，肉体，人性，vt.用肉喂，赋予血肉，使长肉，vi.变胖

sentences.english: a freshwater fish with firm white flesh
sentences.chinese: 一种肉色雪白、肉质紧实的淡水鱼

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of the body of a person or animal that is between the skin and the bones

name: profession
trans: n.职业，专业，声明，信仰

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

name: density
trans: n.密集，稠密，密度，透明度

sentences.english: areas of high population density
sentences.chinese: 人口密度高的地区

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which an area is filled with people or things

name: instruct
trans: vt.教，指示，通知，命令，指导，[计算机]，指示

sentences.english: Eva went straight to the hotel, as instructed (= as she had been told ).
sentences.chinese: 伊娃按照指示径直去了宾馆。

sentences.english: Greater effort is needed to instruct children in road safety.
sentences.chinese: 在指导儿童注意道路安全方面需要更大的努力。

sentences.english: I was instructed that £20,000 had been paid into my account.
sentences.chinese: 我得到通知两万英镑已存入我的账户。

detailed_translations.english: to officially tell someone what to do

name: song
trans: n.歌唱，歌曲，歌词，(鸟等)鸣声

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

name: desirable
trans: adj.值得相望的，可取的，值得有的，令人满意的，有吸引力的，n.有吸引力的人

sentences.english: The ability to speak a foreign language is highly desirable .
sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

sentences.english: a desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 理想的社区

sentences.english: It is desirable that you should have some familiarity with computers.
sentences.chinese: 应该对电脑有所熟悉，这是很有益处的。

sentences.english: It is desirable to keep the cost as low as possible.
sentences.chinese: 把成本控制得越低越好。

detailed_translations.english: something that is desirable is worth having or doing

name: flu
trans: n.流行性感冒

sentences.english: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.english: She’s got the flu .
sentences.chinese: 她得了流感。

sentences.english: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
sentences.chinese: 我得了流感，去不了。

sentences.english: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.chinese: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

detailed_translations.english: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot

name: purely
trans: adv.纯粹地，完全地，清洁地，贞淑地

sentences.english: a decision made for purely political reasons
sentences.chinese: 纯粹出于政治原因而作出的决定

sentences.english: The building was closed purely on the grounds of safety.
sentences.chinese: 那座大楼被关闭完全是出于安全考虑。

sentences.english: It happened purely by chance .
sentences.chinese: 那件事纯属偶然。

sentences.english: I do it purely and simply for the money.
sentences.chinese: 我纯粹是为了钱才干的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纯粹地；仅仅，只不过；完全地；贞淑地；清洁地
detailed_translations.english: completely and only

name: publication
trans: n.公布，发表，出版，发行，出版物

sentences.english: The guide is being translated into several languages for publication near Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这本指南正被翻译成好几种语言，准备在圣诞节前后出版。

sentences.english: a delay in the publication of the exam results
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩的延期公布

detailed_translations.english: the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published

name: ridge
trans: n.脊，岭，山脉，垄

sentences.english: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

detailed_translations.english: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain

name: else
trans: adv.其它，另外，否则，adj.别的，其他的

sentences.english: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.chinese: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.english: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.english: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.english: Who else was at the party?
sentences.chinese: 还有谁参加了聚会？

sentences.english: ‘Two coffees, please.’ ‘Anything else?’ ‘No, thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.english: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.
sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

sentences.english: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

sentences.english: We had nothing else to do on those long trips.
sentences.chinese: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

name: century
trans: n.世纪，一百年，成百的东西

sentences.english: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.chinese: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

detailed_translations.english: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

name: council
trans: n.理事会，委员会，商议

sentences.english: the council for civil liberties
sentences.chinese: 公民自由委员会

sentences.english: the UN Security Council
sentences.chinese: 联合国安全理事会

detailed_translations.english: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

name: confess
trans: vt.供认，承认，坦白，告白，忏悔

sentences.english: Occasionally people confess to crimes they haven’t committed just to get attention.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔人们会承认自己并未犯过的罪行，那只是为了引人注意。

sentences.english: Torture was used and Fian confessed.
sentences.chinese: 酷刑用过之后菲安就招供了。

detailed_translations.english: to admit, especially to the police, that you have done something wrong or illegal

name: secret
trans: adj.秘密的，隐蔽的，难懂的，机密的，n.秘密，诀窍

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

name: egg
trans: n.蛋，鸡蛋，卵，(俚语)人

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.english: an ostrich egg
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.english: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.english: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

name: elastic
trans: n.橡皮圈，有松紧的东西，松紧带，adj.有弹性的，灵活的，可变的

sentences.english: a piece of elastic
sentences.chinese: 一根橡皮带

sentences.english: the horny elastic pad in a horse’s hoof
sentences.chinese: 马蹄上粗硬而有弹性的肉掌

detailed_translations.english: a type of rubber material that can stretch and then return to its usual length or size
a material that is elastic can stretch and then go back to its usual length or size

name: village
trans: n.乡村，村庄

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

name: hut
trans: n.小屋，棚屋

sentences.english: a wooden hut
sentences.chinese: 小木屋

detailed_translations.english: a small simple building with only one or two rooms

name: spend
trans: vt.用钱，花费，浪费，度过

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽
detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

name: delivery
trans: n.投递，交付，分娩

sentences.english: Most Indian restaurants offer free delivery.
sentences.chinese: 大多数印度餐馆提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: You can expect delivery in a week to ten days.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一周至十天内收到货物。

sentences.english: fresh milk deliveries
sentences.chinese: 新鲜牛奶递送

sentences.english: Mrs Howell had an easy delivery.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄尔太太的分娩很顺利。

detailed_translations.english: the act of bringing goods, letters etc to a particular person or place, or the things that are brought

name: torture
trans: n.拷问，折磨，痛苦，vt.拷打，拷问，使痛苦，曲解

sentences.english: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.chinese: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

sentences.english: The waiting must be torture for you.
sentences.chinese: 这样的等待对你来说肯定是一种煎熬。

sentences.english: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
sentences.chinese: 这个政权的政治异己可能会遭受酷刑。

detailed_translations.english: an act of deliberately hurting someone in order to force them to tell you something, to punish them, or to be cruel
to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel

name: work
trans: n.，工作，作品，职业，vi.，工作，创造，实现，做工作，起作用，操作正常运转，成功，产生影响，逐渐进行，处理，vt.，造成，产生，使运转，锻造，奋力达到，利用

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

name: ditch
trans: n.沟，沟渠，渠道，vt.坠入沟中，摆脱，飞机(在海上)迫降，vi.挖一条沟渠，飞机紧急降落

sentences.english: The government has ditched plans to privatise the prison.
sentences.chinese: 政府放弃了监狱私有化的计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…上掘沟；把…开入沟里；丢弃
detailed_translations.english: to stop having something because you no longer want it
a long narrow hole dug at the side of a field, road etc to hold or remove unwanted water

name: street
trans: n.街，街道，行车道，adj.街道的

sentences.english: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.english: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.english: a car parked on the other side of the street
sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

name: glory
trans: n.光荣，荣誉，壮丽，赞颂，荣誉的事，vi.为...而骄傲自豪，interj.用于表示惊叹

sentences.english: She dreamt of future glory as an Olympic champion.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想着将来能得到奥运冠军的荣誉。

sentences.english: Goran’s moment of glory came when he defeated Rafter.
sentences.chinese: 戈兰击败拉夫特，迎来了荣耀的一刻。

sentences.english: He began the season in a blaze of glory , scoring seven goals in as many games.
sentences.chinese: 这个赛季一开始他便光芒四射，七场比赛进了七个球。

detailed_translations.english: the importance, honour, and praise that people give someone they admire a lot

name: quart
trans: n.夸脱(=2品脱)

sentences.english: The guardian found a quarterly quart of quartz in the safeguard.
sentences.chinese: 监护人在安全装置内找到了四分之一夸脱石英。

sentences.english: The quarrelsome general quarreled about a quarter quart of oil in the headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 好争持的将军正在司令部为四分之一夸脱油而争持。

sentences.english: Use warm water and baking soda solution about a tablespoon (15ml) of baking soda to a quart (1 liter) of water. This both cleans and neutralizes odors. Rinse and wipe dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用温水和碳酸氢钠溶液，其配比为一大汤勺（15毫升）碳酸氢钠比一夸脱（1升）水。这会清洁并中和异味。用清水冲洗，擦干。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.

name: diligent
trans: adj.勤勉的，勤奋的，用功的

sentences.english: a diligent student
sentences.chinese: 勤勉的学生

detailed_translations.chinese: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is diligent works hard and is careful and thorough

name: rag
trans: n.破布，碎布，抹布，碎屑，石板瓦，散拍乐曲，vt.责骂，欺负，以散拍乐演奏

sentences.english: He was wiping his hands on an oily rag.
sentences.chinese: 他正用一块油腻腻的抹布擦手。

detailed_translations.english: A rag is a piece of old cloth which you can use to clean or wipe things
to laugh at someone or play tricks on them

name: practise
trans: vt.练习，实习，训练，实践(使...练习，养成...的习惯)

sentences.english: They moved the furniture back to practise their dance routine.
sentences.chinese: 他们把家具往后挪以便练习舞蹈动作。

sentences.english: It gives students the opportunity to practice their speaking skills.
sentences.chinese: 这给学生提供了锻炼口才的机会。

detailed_translations.english: to do an activity, often regularly, in order to improve your skill or to prepare for a test

name: drought
trans: n.旱灾，干旱

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

name: anything
trans: pron.任何事物，一切

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

name: library
trans: n.图书馆，藏书

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

sentences.english: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.chinese: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

name: convention
trans: n.习俗，惯例，公约，大会，协定，[计算机]，约定

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

name: inquire
trans: vt.打听，询问，调查，vi.询问，查究

sentences.english: ‘Why are you doing that?’ the boy inquired.
sentences.chinese: “你为什么这么做？”男孩问道。

sentences.english: Toby would have liked to inquire further (= ask more questions ).
sentences.chinese: 托比本想问更多的问题。

sentences.english: The investigation will inquire into the company’s financial dealings.
sentences.chinese: 此次调查将会涉及公司的财务往来。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone for information

name: consist
trans: vi.由...组成，存在，一致，在于，n.组成

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

name: leaf
trans: n.叶，叶子，树叶，页，活动桌板，花瓣，vt.翻页，vi.长叶子，翻页浏览

sentences.english: a flowering bush with large shiny leaves
sentences.chinese: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

detailed_translations.chinese: 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页
detailed_translations.english: one of the flat green parts of a plant that are joined to its stem or branches

name: spur
trans: n.刺激，刺激物，马刺，鞭策，支脉vt.刺激，鞭策，促进

sentences.english: The crowd’s reaction only acted as a spur.
sentences.chinese: 人群的反应不过起了刺激作用。

sentences.english: The band were spurred on by the success of their last two singles.
sentences.chinese: 乐队因最近两张单曲唱片的成功而深受鼓舞。

sentences.english: It was an article in the local newspaper which finally spurred him into action .
sentences.chinese: 是当地报纸上的一篇文章最终促使他行动起来。

detailed_translations.english: a fact or event that makes you try harder to do something
to encourage someone or make them want to do something

name: detection
trans: n.察觉，发觉，侦察，探测

sentences.english: ...the early detection of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: …乳腺癌的早期发现。

detailed_translations.english: when something is found that is not easy to see, hear etc, or the process of looking for it

name: fruit
trans: n.水果，果实，成果，vt.，&，vi.结果实

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜

sentences.english: a glass of fruit juice
sentences.chinese: 一杯果汁

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: removal
trans: n.移动，移居，迁移，除掉

sentences.english: the removal of rubbish
sentences.chinese: 移除垃圾

sentences.english: stain removal
sentences.chinese: 去污

detailed_translations.english: when something is taken away from, out of, or off the place where it is

name: flare
trans: vi.闪耀，闪光，vt.使闪亮，n.闪光，闪耀，[天]，耀斑

sentences.english: One possibility is that the blast was like an ultra-powerful solar flare.
sentences.chinese: 一种可能的原因是这种爆炸很像有超级能量的太阳耀斑。

sentences.english: Indeed, last month, we looked at evidence that the last flare up occurred only a few hundred years ago.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，上个月，我们在看最近一次，也就是几百年前的耀斑发生的有关证据。

sentences.english: Their diaphanous flare symbolizes at once grace and tragedy, innocence and despair, sadness and voluptuousness.
sentences.chinese: 它们半透明的闪光象征着优雅与悲剧，天真与绝望，悲伤与奢华。

name: indispensable
trans: adj.必不可少的，必需的

sentences.english: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经成为我们生活中的必需品。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is indispensable is so important or useful that it is impossible to manage without them

name: dishonour
trans: n.不光彩，丢脸的人，耻辱，拒付，vt.使丢脸，侮辱，拒付=dishonor

sentences.english: He dishonored the uniform and did not deserve to be a marine.
sentences.chinese: 他玷污了这身军服，不配当一名海军陆战队士兵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒付；使丢脸；拒绝承兑；不履行（诺言等）
detailed_translations.english: if a bank dishonours a cheque, it refuses to pay out money for it
loss of respect from other people, because you have behaved in a morally unacceptable way

name: punctual
trans: adj.严守时刻的，准时的，正点的

sentences.english: She’s always very punctual for appointments.
sentences.chinese: 她一向准时赴约。

sentences.english: the punctual payment of invoices
sentences.chinese: 准时结清费用清单

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or being done at exactly the time that has been arranged

name: charity
trans: n.施舍，慈善事业，慈善，慈善机关(团体)，仁慈，宽厚

sentences.english: Several charities sent aid to the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 有几家慈善机构已向洪灾灾民送去了救援物资。

detailed_translations.english: an organization that gives money, goods, or help to people who are poor, sick etc

name: sphere
trans: n.球，圆体，范围，领域，天体，vt.形成球体，包围，围绕

sentences.english: Because the earth spins, it is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

detailed_translations.english: a ball shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

name: million
trans: num.百万，n.许多，百万，(the，millions)群众，adj.百万的，无数的

sentences.english: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

name: afraid
trans: adj.，害怕的，担心的

sentences.english: There’s no need to be afraid.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要害怕。

sentences.english: He was afraid that the other kids would laugh at him.
sentences.chinese: 他担心其他孩子会嘲笑他。

detailed_translations.english: frightened because you think that you may get hurt or that something bad may happen

name: violet
trans: n.紫罗兰，紫色，adj.紫色的

sentences.english: She inhaled the violet perfume, saying “How sweet!”
sentences.chinese: 她一边闻紫罗兰的芳香， 一边说“好香啊！”

detailed_translations.english: a plant with small dark purple flowers, or sometimes white or yellow ones

name: forgive
trans: vt.，&，vi.原谅，饶恕，宽恕

sentences.english: He didn’t look the sort of man to forgive and forget (= forgive someone and no longer think about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去不是那种不记仇的人。

detailed_translations.english: to stop being angry with someone and stop blaming them, although they have done something wrong

name: attempt
trans: vt.尝试，试图，n.企图

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

name: tired
trans: adj.疲劳的，疲倦的，累的，厌倦的，装备以轮胎的，动词tire的过去式和过去分词形式

sentences.english: He looks tired out (= very tired ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看起来累坏了。

sentences.english: ‘No,’ Frank said in a tired voice.
sentences.chinese: “不。”弗兰克语带疲倦地说。

detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want to sleep or rest

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

name: handful
trans: n.一把，少数，一小撮，棘手之事，【非正式用语】，难以控制的人或费劲的事

sentences.english: The boy picked up a handful of stones and started throwing them at us.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩捡起一把石子，开始朝我们扔过来。

sentences.english: There were only a handful of people there.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：那里只有几个人。

detailed_translations.english: an amount that you can hold in your hand

name: telegram
trans: n.电报，vt.向...发电报

sentences.english: The president received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.chinese: 总裁收到了一份电报简报。

detailed_translations.english: a message sent by telegraph

name: once
trans: adv.一次，曾经，n.一次，conj.一旦

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

name: quit
trans: vt.离开，辞职，退出，停止

sentences.english: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.english: I quit school at 16.
sentences.chinese: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.english: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.chinese: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.english: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.chinese: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.english: I've quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 我戒了烟。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

name: aluminium
trans: n.铝

sentences.english: If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，我们可用铝代钢。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al

name: lantern
trans: n.提灯，灯笼，[建筑学]天窗，屋顶气窗

sentences.english: Colour the tiger lantern brown .
sentences.chinese: 把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。

sentences.english: Lantern owners write riddles on a piece of paper and post them on the lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.english: To cheer themselves as well as they could, they made an artificial morning with the lantern, some bread and butter, and their own conversation, the real morning being far from come.
sentences.chinese: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

detailed_translations.english: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

name: reliability
trans: n.可靠性

sentences.english: I can assure you of the reliability of the information.
sentences.chinese: 我可以向你保证这消息是可靠的。

sentences.english: How will that affect reliability and other factors?
sentences.chinese: 将如何影响可靠性和其他因素？

name: writer
trans: n.作者，作家，文学家

sentences.english: a science-fiction writer

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest

trans: n.嗅觉，气味，味道vt.嗅，闻，探出，发臭vi.闻，发臭

trans: n.运动，体育，运动会，vi.炫耀，戏弄，嬉戏，adj.运动的，户外穿戴的

trans: n.冠军，得胜者，拥护者，勇士，vt.保卫，拥护

sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

trans: vt.，&，vi.，&，n.增加，增强，提高

sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.english: an increase in spending

a rise in the amount, number or value of sth

trans: adj.不正确的，错误的

sentences.english: The information you gave us was incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 你给我们的信息不准确。

trans: adj.法国(人)的，法语的，n.法国人，法语，vt.剁肉，蔬菜切成长条

sentences.chinese: 上等的法国葡萄酒

people from France

trans: adj.脆的，易损坏的，易碎的

sentences.english: In systems such as this we also often find that there are either no tests around this configuration code, or the tests that do exist are brittle and/or not realistic.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的系统中，我们经常会发现对于这些配置代码没有进行测试，或者尽管存在测试，但它很脆弱且/或不切实际。

sentences.english: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.chinese: 但我们的屏幕都很脆弱，他们的却很柔软，而且价钱是我们的十分之一。

name: slight
trans: adj.细长的，轻微的，纤细的，脆弱的，vt.轻视，忽略，n.轻蔑

sentences.chinese: 少许的增加

sentences.chinese: 计划的略微变动

sentences.english: a slight pause

sentences.english: a slight problem
sentences.chinese: 小问题

trans: adj.不愿的，勉强的

trans: n.炉，灶，烘箱，烤炉

sentences.english: Press the mixture onto the bread and bake in a hot oven for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把混合料抹在面包上，然后在烤箱内高温烘烤10分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front

trans: n.梯子，阶梯，梯状物

sentences.chinese: 她爬上梯子。

sentences.chinese: 他从梯子上摔下来受了伤。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for climbing up to or down from high places. A ladder has two bars that are connected by rungs(= short bars that you use as steps ) .

name: puff
trans: n.(一)喷，(一)吹，一阵喷烟，粉扑，泡夫，vt.喷出，喘息，夸张，膨胀，vi.喷出，膨胀，骄傲，adj.吹嘘的

sentences.chinese: 蒸汽从烟囱里一股一股地喷出来。

sentences.chinese: 锅炉一股股地冒出浓浓的黑烟。

sentences.chinese: 别把烟朝我脸上喷。

detailed_translations.english: if smoke, steam etc puffs from somewhere, or if something puffs it, it comes out in little clouds

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉扑；泡芙；蓬松；一阵喷烟；肿块；吹嘘，宣传广告
detailed_translations.english: Puff is also a noun

sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?

sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.chinese: 在以上的管道线中，我们在开始时使用一些生成输出的命令，然后通过管道线的每个阶段导出输出。

管道；供应线，商品供应线
detailed_translations.english: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground, used for sending gas, oil etc over long distances

sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.chinese: 我希望你们两个别再吵了。

sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.chinese: 她需要忏悔罪过，请求宽恕。

sentences.chinese: 他知道自己犯下了可怕的罪行。

sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.chinese: 卡车司机

sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

sentences.chinese: 家庭责任已开始成为他的负担。

sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

sentences.chinese: 军方可能觉得无法在明年把政权移交给一位民选总统。

sentences.chinese: 政府雇员

name: medical
trans: adj.医学的，内科的，医疗的，药物的，需治疗的

sentences.english: medical research
sentences.chinese: 医学研究

sentences.english: medical staff
sentences.chinese: 医务人员

sentences.english: a medical student
sentences.chinese: 医科学生

sentences.english: a patient’s medical history
sentences.chinese: 患者的病史

sentences.english: medical or surgical treatment
sentences.chinese: 内科或外科疗法

detailed_translations.english: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

name: car
trans: n.汽车，小汽车，轿车，车厢，吊舱

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他还未到可以开车的年龄。

sentences.english: Coughlan was killed in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 科赫兰死于一场车祸。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers

name: mail
trans: n.邮件，邮政，vt.邮寄

sentences.chinese: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.english: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.english: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.chinese: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.english: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.chinese: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.english: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you

name: middle
trans: n.中部，中间，腰，中项，adj.中部的，中等的，中间的，中期的

sentences.chinese: 我们朝湖中央划去。

sentences.english: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：假期的中间一段他们是在佛罗里达州度过的。

sentences.english: Her boots were muddy and her hair was dripping.
sentences.chinese: 她的靴子沾满了泥，头发在滴水。

sentences.english: Water was dripping through the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 水正透过天花板滴下来。

sentences.chinese: 我把几个塑料桶放在地板上接滴下来的水。

sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

name: carriage

sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.english: a railway carriage
sentences.chinese: 铁路客车厢

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with wheels that is pulled by a horse, used in the past
