sentences.english: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.english: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.chinese: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

name: wheel
trans: n.轮，车轮，方向盘，周期，旋转，vi.旋转，转动，改变方向，vt.给...装轮子，用车运，转动

sentences.english: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
sentences.chinese: 我来开车好吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
detailed_translations.english: to push something that has wheels somewhere

name: house
trans: n.房屋，住宅，商号，全家人，议院，vt.提供住，安置，收容，vi.居住，躲避

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

name: ride
trans: n.，乘坐，乘车，骑马，搭便车，vi.骑，骑马，乘车，乘坐，经受住

sentences.english: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.english: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.english: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

detailed_translations.english: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

name: selection
trans: n.选择，挑选，精选物，挑选出来的人或事

sentences.english: The judges have made their final selection.
sentences.chinese: 评委已经作出最后的评选。

sentences.english: These drawings represent a selection from a larger exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 这些画作是从一个规模更大的展会上选出来的。

detailed_translations.english: the careful choice of a particular person or thing from a group of similar people or things

name: wallet
trans: n.钱包，皮夹子

sentences.english: He took a credit card out of his wallet.
sentences.chinese: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc

name: solve
trans: vt.解答，解释，解决

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

name: up-to-date
trans: adj.直到最近的，现代的，最新的

sentences.english: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.
sentences.chinese: …今日有关食品的最新消息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的
detailed_translations.english: modern or fashionable

name: gather
trans: vi.聚集，集合，渐增，vt.收集，使聚集，推断，鼓起，n.集合，聚集

sentences.english: You two know each other, I gather.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们俩认识。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true because of what you have seen or heard

name: dye
trans: vt.染，vi.染色，n.染料，染色

sentences.english: The women prepared, spun, and dyed the wool.
sentences.chinese: 妇女们将羊毛预备、纺线并染色。

sentences.english: hair dye
sentences.chinese: 染发剂

detailed_translations.english: to give something a different colour using a dye
a substance you use to change the colour of your clothes, hair etc

name: refresh
trans: vt.使清新，使...生气蓬勃，提起精神，恢复精神，vi.恢复精神

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.english: He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

name: victim
trans: n.牺牲者，受害者，牺牲

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

name: conversely
trans: adv.相反地

sentences.english: American consumers prefer white eggs; conversely, British buyers like brown eggs.
sentences.chinese: 美国的消费者喜欢白色的鸡蛋，而英国的消费者却相反，他们喜欢棕色的鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: used when one situation is the opposite of another

name: frank
trans: adj.坦白的，直率的，无误的，vt.免费邮寄，使自由出入，n.免费邮寄

sentences.english: To be perfectly frank, I think it’s a bad idea.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，我认为这个主意不好。

detailed_translations.english: honest and truthful

name: ensure
trans: vt.保证，保护，赋予

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to make certain that something will happen properly

name: mixture
trans: n.混合，混合物

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

name: beneath
trans: adv.在下方，prep.在...下方，在...之下

sentences.english: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.english: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.chinese: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.english: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.chinese: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

detailed_translations.english: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

name: plant
trans: n.植物，工厂，设施，设备，vt.栽种，种植，建立，设立

sentences.english: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.english: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

name: generate
trans: vt.发生，产生，引起，生殖，[计算机]，产生

sentences.english: a useful technique for generating new ideas
sentences.chinese: 能产生新创意的有用技术

sentences.english: The program would generate a lot of new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目将创造许多新的就业岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or cause something

name: satisfactory
trans: adj.令人满意的，良好的

sentences.english: His progress this term has been satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 他这学期的进步令人满意。

detailed_translations.english: good enough for a particular purpose

name: guide
trans: n.导游者，领路者，指南，路标，vt.给...导游，领路，指导，vi.作导游

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

name: wide
trans: adj.宽阔的，广泛的，adv.全部地，广大地

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

name: wound
trans: n.创伤，伤口，伤，vt.使受伤，使伤害

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

name: museum
trans: n.博物馆，展览馆

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

name: call
trans: n.呼叫，访问，打电话，请求，把…看作，vt.把...叫做，叫，喊，呼叫，访问，打电话，vi.(短暂的)拜访，呼叫

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

name: rock
trans: vt.摇，使动摇，使震惊，使动心，vi.摇，来回摇动，跳摇摆舞，n.岩石，巨石，石头，摇滚乐，篮球

sentences.english: She covered her face, rocking to and fro in her grief.
sentences.chinese: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.english: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 波浪使小船左摇右晃。

sentences.english: Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.english: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。

detailed_translations.english: to move gently backwards and forwards or from side to side, or to make something do this
a type of popular modern music with a strong loud beat, played using  guitar s  and drums

name: who
trans: pron.谁，...的人

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

name: yourself
trans: pron.你(们)自己，你(们)亲自

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

name: apology
trans: n.道歉，认错，谢罪，勉强的替代物

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

name: pine
trans: n.松树，松木，vi.消瘦，憔悴，渴望

sentences.english: I pine for the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望乡下的生活。

detailed_translations.english: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it
a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter

name: thought
trans: n.思想，思维，想法，观念，意向，动词think的过去式和过去分词

sentences.english: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.chinese: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.english: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.chinese: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think of, remember, or realize

detailed_translations.chinese: 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

name: carbon
trans: n.碳，灯芯，复写纸

sentences.english: I dread to think what the carbon footprint must be like of moving that coal but we have no choice.
sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

sentences.english: By removing whales, sharks and large fish, we ve reduced the amount of carbon stored in these populations.
sentences.chinese: 由于猎杀鲸鱼，鲨鱼和大型鱼类，我们也就减少了碳在这些物种群的储存量。

sentences.english: Across the world, forests and the soil beneath them absorb about a quarter of all carbon emissions.
sentences.chinese: 纵观全球，森林与它们脚下的土壤能吸收大约碳排放总量的四分之一。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists in a pure form as diamonds,  graphite  etc, or in an impure form as coal, petrol etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol C

name: reaction
trans: n.反应，反作用，反作用力，化学反应

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: traitor
trans: n.叛徒，卖国贼，出卖朋友者

sentences.english: ...rumours that there were traitors among us who were sending messages to the enemy.
sentences.chinese: …谣言说我们中有正给敌人送信的叛徒。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is not loyal to their country, friends, or beliefs

name: contrary
trans: adj.相反的，截然不同的，n.相反，反面，adv.相反(地)

sentences.english: Two contrary views emerged.
sentences.chinese: 出现了两种相反的观点。

sentences.english: The men shouted contrary orders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人大声喊叫的命令互相矛盾。

sentences.english: It wasn’t a good thing; on the contrary it was a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 那不是好事，恰恰相反，是个巨大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: contrary ideas, opinions, or actions are completely different and opposed to each other
used to add to a negative statement, to disagree with a negative statement by someone else, or to answer no to a question

name: multiple
trans: adj.复合的，并联的，许多，多种多样的

sentences.english: Baxter was rushed to the hospital with multiple stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯特因多处刺伤被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: Having multiple partners increases your risk of sexual diseases.
sentences.chinese: 性伴侣多会增加得性病的风险。

sentences.english: His new album includes multiple versions of the same songs.
sentences.chinese: 他的新专辑包括同一些歌曲的多种版本。

detailed_translations.english: many, or involving many things, people, events etc
a number that contains a smaller number an exact number of times

name: believe
trans: vt.相信，认为

sentences.english: You shouldn’t believe everything you read.
sentences.chinese: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

sentences.english: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.english: I don’t believe a word of it (=  I think it is completely untrue  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我一句话也不相信。

sentences.english: Did you honestly believe that I’d be stupid enough to do that?
sentences.chinese: 你真的认为我会傻到做那样的事情吗？。

detailed_translations.english: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth

name: reservior
trans: n.水库，蓄水池，积蓄，储藏，=，reservoir

name: request
trans: n.，&，vt.请求，要求

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.english: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

detailed_translations.english: a polite or formal demand for something
to ask for something in a polite or formal way

name: cathedral
trans: n.总教堂，大教堂

sentences.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.chinese: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.chinese: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

detailed_translations.english: the main church of a particular area under the control of a  bishop

name: retire
trans: vi.退下，引退，撤退，退休，就寝，n.退休，退职

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

name: coffee
trans: n.咖啡，咖啡茶

sentences.english: Do you want a cup of coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要来杯咖啡吗？

sentences.english: Do you like your coffee white (= with milk ) or black (= without milk ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡要加奶还是不加奶？

detailed_translations.english: a hot dark brown drink that has a slightly bitter taste

name: lot
trans: n.许多，大量，签，抽签，阄，小组，场地，命运，adv.很，非常，pron.大量，vt.分配，划分

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

sentences.english: ‘How many CDs have you got?’ ‘Lots.’
sentences.chinese: “你有多少张CD？”“多着呢。”

sentences.english: They drew lots for the right to go first.
sentences.chinese: 他们拈阄儿决定谁先走。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount or number
to choose sb/sth by lot

name: see
trans: vt.看见，遇见，看出，经历，明白，确保，视为，拜访，陪同，vi.注意想象，了解，调查，n.主教教区，主角权限

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

name: wise
trans: adj.有智慧的，聪明的，明智的，有见识的，n.方式，方法，vt.引导，vi.知道，发觉

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

name: rough

sentences.english: a fruitful source of information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息来源

detailed_translations.chinese: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
detailed_translations.english: producing good results

name: kingdom
trans: n.王国，领域，界

sentences.english: the United Kingdom
sentences.chinese: 联合王国

sentences.english: the animal/plant/mineral kingdom
sentences.chinese: 动物界/植物界/矿物界〔大自然三界〕

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

name: other
trans: adj.另外的，别的，其余的，pron.另一个人(或事)，n.其他人(或事)，adv.否则，不同地

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

name: live
trans: vi.居住，活，过着，adj.活的，生动的，精力充沛的，直播的

sentences.english: He lives just across the street from me.
sentences.chinese: 他就住在我街对面。

sentences.english: We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.english: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.chinese: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

sentences.english: As soon as I saw the place, I knew I didn’t want to live there.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到那地方，就觉得不想住在那儿。

sentences.english: Does Paul stilllive here?
sentences.chinese: 保罗还住在这儿吗？

sentences.english: We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们还在找住的地方。

sentences.english: They’ve finally found a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于找到了住的地方。

sentences.english: Most seventeen-year-olds still live at home(= live with their parents ).
sentences.chinese: 17 岁的孩子大都还住在家里。

sentences.english: I’m quite happy living alone.
sentences.chinese: 我一个人住很开心。

sentences.english: The house has 3,600 square feet of living space(= the areas of a house you live in ).
sentences.chinese: 这房子有3,600平方英尺的居住空间。

detailed_translations.english: if you live in a place, you have your home there
not dead or artificial

name: overcome
trans: vt.战胜，克服，(感情等)压倒，使受不了，vi.获胜，赢

sentences.english: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.english: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.english: Australia overcame the Netherlands 2-1.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something

name: provided
trans: conj.假如，若是，以...为条件，adj.预备好的，由...供给的

sentences.english: He can come with us, provided he pays for his own meals.
sentences.chinese: 只要他付自己的饭钱，就可以跟我们一起来。

name: response
trans: n.作答，回答，响应，反应

sentences.english: His immediate response was one of disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一反应是不相信。

sentences.english: Carl made no response , and carried on with his meal.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔没有回答，继续吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done as a reaction to something that has happened or been said

name: relatively
trans: adv.相对地，比较地

sentences.english: The system is relatively easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 这个系统使用起来相对容易。

sentences.english: E-commerce is a relatively recent phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 电子商务相对而言是新兴事物。

detailed_translations.english: something that is relatively small, easy etc is fairly small, easy etc compared to other things

name: unit
trans: n.单位，单元，部件，组件

sentences.english: The family is the basic social unit of modern society.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.english: control/display/filter etc unit
sentences.chinese: 控制/显示/过滤等装置

detailed_translations.english: a thing, person, or group that is regarded as one single whole part of something larger

name: frequently
trans: adv.时常，常常，经常地，频繁地

sentences.english: He was frequently drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他经常喝醉。

detailed_translations.english: very often or many times

name: method
trans: n.方法，办法，教学法，条理，类函数，类成员函数(计算机)

sentences.english: traditional teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 传统的教学法

sentences.english: I think we should try again using a different method.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们应该用不同的方法再试一次。

sentences.english: effective methods for the storage and retrieval of information
sentences.chinese: 信息存储和检索的有效方法

detailed_translations.english: a planned way of doing something, especially one that a lot of people know about and use

name: immigrant
trans: n.移民，侨民，adj.移民的

sentences.english: an illegal immigrant
sentences.chinese: 非法移民

sentences.english: a new wave of immigrants from the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 来自中东的一股新兴的移民浪潮

detailed_translations.english: someone who enters another country to live there permanently

name: input
trans: n.输入，投入的资金

sentences.english: to input text/data/figures
sentences.chinese: 把文本 / 数据 / 数字输入计算机

sentences.english: data input
sentences.chinese: 数据输入

detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer
the act of putting information into a computer; the information that you put in

name: crude
trans: adj.简陋的，天然的，未加工的，粗鲁的，n.原油

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: fold
trans: vt.折叠，合拢，包，交叉，拥抱，vi.翻倍，彻底失败，倒闭，n.褶，折层，折痕，羊栏，羊群

sentences.english: Fold the paper along the dotted line.
sentences.chinese: 沿虚线将纸折起来。

sentences.english: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
sentences.chinese: 对折的话就能放下了。

detailed_translations.english: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

name: unkind
trans: adj.不仁慈的，不和善的，无情的，不厚道的

sentences.english: A lot of unkind things were said.
sentences.chinese: 说了很多刻薄话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无情的；不仁慈的，不厚道的
detailed_translations.english: nasty, unpleasant, or cruel

name: challenge
trans: n.挑战，要求，需要，v.向...挑战

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

name: situation
trans: n.位置，处境，形势，局面，状况，职位

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

name: Thursday
trans: n.星期四

sentences.english: She was working Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 她星期四在工作。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Wednesday and Friday

name: raid
trans: n.袭击，突然搜查，劫掠，v.劫掠，攫取，突击搜捕，袭击

sentences.english: a bombing raid
sentences.chinese: 轰炸

sentences.english: an air raid warning siren
sentences.chinese: 空袭警报

detailed_translations.chinese: 袭击； 突入查抄， 突入搜捕； 劫掠
detailed_translations.english: a short attack on a place by soldiers, planes, or ships, intended to cause damage but not take control

name: loudly
trans: adv.大声地，高声地，花俏地

sentences.english: The audiences stamped loudly to express their grievances.
sentences.chinese: 听众大声地踏脚以表达他们的不满。

name: resemble
trans: vt.像，类似，相似

sentences.english: It’s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩和史蒂夫真是惊人地相像。

sentences.english: He grew up to resemble his father.
sentences.chinese: 他长大了，很像他父亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look like or be similar to someone or something

name: systematic(al)
trans: adj.有系统的，有条理的，有计划的，分类的，体系的

name: communism
trans: n.共产主义

sentences.english: ...the ultimate triumph of communism in the world.
sentences.chinese: …共产主义在全世界的最终胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a political system in which the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property

name: article
trans: n.文章，条款，物品，冠词，vt.定契约

sentences.english: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.
sentences.chinese: 该报社论称政府软弱。

sentences.english: newspaper articles
sentences.chinese: 报纸上的文章

sentences.english: household articles
sentences.chinese: 家居用品

sentences.english: Article 1 of the constitution guarantees freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

name: prize
trans: n.奖赏，奖金，奖品，珍品，战利品，vt.珍视，重视，adj.奖励的，杰出的

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc

good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

name: odd
trans: adj.奇数的，单只的，古怪的，剩余的

sentences.english: It was an odd thing to say.
sentences.chinese: 这话说得很奇怪。

sentences.english: an odd way to behave
sentences.chinese: 古怪的行为

sentences.english: They’re an odd couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们是古怪的一对。

sentences.english: There was something odd about him.
sentences.chinese: 他这人有些奇怪。

sentences.english: What she did was unforgivable, but the odd thing was he didn’t seem to mind.
sentences.chinese: 她的所作所为是不可原谅的，但奇怪的是他好像并不在意。

sentences.english: She was holding an extremely odd-looking weapon.
sentences.chinese: 她手持一件非常奇特的武器。

detailed_translations.english: different from what is normal or expected, especially in a way that you disapprove of or cannot understand

name: leg
trans: n.腿，腿部，支柱，裤脚管，vi.用脚走路

sentences.english: a young boy with skinny legs
sentences.chinese: 双腿干瘦的小男孩

sentences.english: She fell and broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔断了腿。

name: if
trans: conj.假如，如果，是否，即使，n.条件，设想

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

name: recover
trans: vt.重新获得，挽回，找回，vi.恢复，复原，补偿

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

name: honour
trans: n.光荣，尊敬，敬意，荣誉，荣幸，头衔，vt.尊敬，信守承诺，方形舞中鞠躬致敬

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

name: bulk
trans: n.物体，容积，大批，大部分，大多数，大块，大批，容积，体积，vi.变大，增加，vt.膨胀，出现，adj.大量的

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

name: England
trans: n.英格兰，英国

detailed_translations.english: a division of the United Kingdom

name: oar
trans: n.浆，橹，划手，v.划行

sentences.english: Cold worlds shake from the oar.
sentences.chinese: 冰冷的世界从桨上摇落。

sentences.english: The roaring oar hit the coarse keyboard on the cupboard aboard the boat.
sentences.chinese: 轰鸣的桨击中了船上碗柜上的粗糙键盘。

sentences.english: Suchen never understood what had driven her to grasp the oar at the last moment.
sentences.chinese: 苏晨从来没有想明白，是什么驱使她在最后一刻抓住了一条船桨。

detailed_translations.english: a long pole with a wide flat blade at one end, used for rowing a boat

name: physicist
trans: n.物理学家，<古>自然科学家

sentences.english: a nuclear physicist
sentences.chinese: 一位核物理学家

detailed_translations.english: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in physics

name: cross
trans: vt.穿过，划叉剔除，画横线于，vi.穿越，prep.穿过，n.十字架，十字架形物件，交叉，交叉路，adj.生气的，交叉的

sentences.english: The by-pass crosses Wilton Lane shortly after a roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 这条旁道绕过环岛后不久就和威尔顿巷相交。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
detailed_translations.english: an upright post of wood with another crossing it near the top, that people in the past were fastened to with nails and left to die on as a punishment
if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的
detailed_translations.english: angry or annoyed

name: succession
trans: n.连续，继任，继位，继承，继承权

sentences.english: If the prince dies, the succession passes to his son.
sentences.chinese: 王子如果去世，就由他的儿子继承。

detailed_translations.english: the act of taking over an official job or position, or the right to be the next to take it

name: light
trans: n.，光，光线，灯，光源，启发，众所周知的，通光口，眼光，adj.，轻的，不重要的，容易的，明亮的，淡色的，少量的，vi.，点燃，着火，变亮，下马，落下，碰巧发生，vt.，点燃，照亮，adv.，轻地，轻便的

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

name: Mediterranean
trans: n.地中海，adj.地中海(的)

sentences.english: You have the choice of night fishing in the Mediterranean, or windsurfing on a lake in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 你可选择在地中海夜间垂钓，或是在瑞士的湖上玩帆板。

sentences.english: a Mediterranean country
sentences.chinese: 地中海国家

detailed_translations.english: the Mediterranean Sea
relating to the Mediterranean Sea, or typical of the area of southern Europe around it

name: white
trans: adj.白色的，白种的，纯洁的，幸运的，n.白色，白种人

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

name: injury
trans: n.损害，伤害，受伤处

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

name: many
trans: adj.许多的，pron.许多人或物，n.许多人，许多

sentences.english: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of people or things
many people

name: during
trans: prep.在...期间

sentences.english: During the summer she worked as a lifeguard.
sentences.chinese: 夏天她当过救生员。

sentences.english: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
sentences.chinese: 他上半夜睡得很安稳。

sentences.english: Foxes remain hidden during the day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸白天一直躲藏着。

detailed_translations.english: from the beginning to the end of a period of time

name: act
trans: vi.，行动，表演，表现，充当，见效，vt.，表演，扮演，n.，行为，行动法案，（戏剧、歌剧等的）一幕

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: for
trans: prep.为，给，因为，关于，代表，支持，往，conj.因为

sentences.english: I’ve got a present for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有件礼物送给你。

sentences.english: Someone left a message for Vicky.
sentences.chinese: 有人给维基留了言。

sentences.english: an English course for foreign students
sentences.chinese: 为外国学生开的一门英语课程

sentences.english: WWhat did you do that for?
sentences.chinese: 你那样做是为了什么？

sentences.english: We could hardly see for the mist.
sentences.chinese: 由于雾气，我们几乎什么也看不见。

detailed_translations.english: used to say who is intended to get or use something, or where something is intended to be used

name: commerce
trans: n.商业，贸易，社交

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

name: unsuitable
trans: adj.不合适的，不适宜的

sentences.english: unsuitable housing
sentences.chinese: 不合适的住房

detailed_translations.chinese: 不适宜的, 不合适的
detailed_translations.english: not having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

name: negative
trans: adj.否定的，消极的，负的，n.底片，负数，否定，vt.否定

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

detailed_translations.chinese: 负片， 底片； 负数
detailed_translations.english: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

name: deck
trans: n.甲板，舱面，层面，桥面，楼层，vt.装饰

sentences.english: Eddie returned to the flight deck (= the part of an aircraft where the pilot sits ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃迪回到了驾驶舱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲板；公共汽车一层的车厢；纸牌
detailed_translations.english: one of the levels on a bus, plane etc
to decorate something with flowers, flags etc

name: scenery
trans: n.舞台布景，风景，布景，背景

sentences.english: The best part of the trip was the fantastic scenery.
sentences.chinese: 此次旅行最精彩之处就是那美妙绝伦的风景。

sentences.english: Instead of stagehands, the actors will move the scenery right in front of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 演员们将替代舞台工作人员，当着观众的面置换布景。

detailed_translations.english: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc

name: vine
trans: n.葡萄树，攀爬植物，藤，蔓

sentences.english: Every square metre of soil was used, mainly for olives, vines, and almonds.
sentences.chinese: 每一平方米的土壤都用上了，主要是种植橄榄、葡萄藤和杏树。

detailed_translations.chinese: 藤；葡萄树；藤本植物；攀缘植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that produces grapes

name: precision
trans: n.精确，精密，精密度，adj.以精准的执行著称的，经得起极精细测量的

sentences.english: precision engineering
sentences.chinese: 精密工程

sentences.english: precision bombing
sentences.chinese: 精确轰炸

detailed_translations.chinese: 精度，[数] 精密度；精确
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very exact or correct
made or done in a very exact way

name: cream
trans: n.奶油，乳，乳脂，奶油色，面霜，精华

sentences.english: fresh cream
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶油

sentences.english: strawberries and cream
sentences.chinese: 浇奶油的草莓

sentences.english: cream silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 乳白色的长筒丝袜

detailed_translations.english: a thick yellow-white liquid that rises to the top of milk

name: technique
trans: n.技术，技巧，技能

sentences.english: In mathematics, we use many techniques of problem-solving.
sentences.chinese: 在数学中，我们会使用多种方法解题。

sentences.english: He’s a great player, with brilliant technique.
sentences.chinese: 他是个伟大的球员，球技十分精湛。

detailed_translations.english: a special way of doing something

name: beggar
trans: n.乞丐，穷人，<非正式>人，家伙，vt.使贫穷，使不足，使不能

sentences.english: the beggars on the streets
sentences.chinese: 街头乞丐

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives by asking people for food and money
to make someone very poor

name: waggon
trans: n.四轮运货马车，敞篷货车，=wagon(美)

sentences.english: The ragged man drags a waggon of rag fragments.
sentences.chinese: 那个衣衫褴褛的人拉著一货车破布碎片.

sentences.english: They mounted in front of the waggon, and Abraham grew reflective.
sentences.chinese: 他们上了车，坐在马车的前面，亚伯拉罕开始沉思起来。

sentences.english: He was harnessed to the waggon of beehives in the place of Prince, and the load taken on towards Casterbridge.
sentences.chinese: 他把那匹小马套上拉蜂箱的马车，代替了王子的位置，往卡斯特桥方向驶去了。

name: waken
trans: vi.醒来，vt.弄醒，动词wake的过去分词

sentences.english: She gently wakened the sleeping child.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地唤醒睡梦中的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: to wake up, or to wake someone up
to wake up, or to wake someone up

name: ox
trans: n.牛，公牛，阉牛

sentences.english: We must lead an ox by the halter.
sentences.chinese: 牵牛要牵牛鼻子。

detailed_translations.english: a bull whose sex organs have been removed, often used for working on farms

name: pollute
trans: vt.弄脏，污染，沾污

sentences.english: beaches polluted by raw sewage
sentences.chinese: 受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.english: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

detailed_translations.english: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

name: boot
trans: n.，靴子，长统靴，(英)汽车行李箱，猛踢，锁扣，vt.，踢，穿靴子锁车，vi.，(计算机)，启动，在(通常为非法停放的汽车)车轮上装制动装置，利用，帮助

sentences.english: hiking boots
sentences.chinese: 远足靴

sentences.english: a pair of boots
sentences.chinese: 一双靴子

detailed_translations.english: a type of shoe that covers your whole foot and the lower part of your leg

name: school
trans: n.学校，学院，学派，鱼群，vt.教育，训练，磨炼，vi.喂食鱼群，游来游去

sentences.english: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

detailed_translations.english: a place where children are taught
to train or teach someone to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking

name: treat
trans: vt.对待，处理，治疗，请客，视为，n.款待，宴飨

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

name: most
trans: adj.最多的，大多数的，几乎全部的，adv.最，很，最多，极其，n.最多，最大，pron.大多数

sentences.english: Which class has the most children in it?
sentences.chinese: 哪个班级孩子最多？

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

detailed_translations.english: a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else
having the greatest amount of a particular quality

name: dew
trans: n.露，露水

sentences.english: The dew gathered on the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 露水在叶片上聚集。

detailed_translations.english: the small drops of water that form on outdoor surfaces during the night

name: feasible
trans: adj.可行的，可能的

sentences.english: a feasible solution
sentences.chinese: 可行的解决方法

detailed_translations.english: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work

name: landlady
trans: n.女房东，女地主

sentences.english: There was a note under the door from my landlady.
sentences.chinese: 门下有我女房东的一张便条。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone

name: ever
trans: adv.在任何时候，曾经，永远，究竟

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

name: relax
trans: vt.使松弛，放松，放宽(限制等)，vi.松弛，放松，松懈

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

name: index
trans: n.索引，指数，指标，指针，vt.编入索引中，指出，vi.编索引

sentences.english: ...the consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

detailed_translations.english: a standard by which the level of something can be judged or measured

name: everybody
trans: pron.每人，人人，各人

sentences.english: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认识汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: everyone

name: review
trans: vt.再检查，温习，检讨，评论，检阅，vi.写评论，n.复习，检讨，回顾，评审

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

name: creep
trans: vi.爬行，缓慢地行进，蔓延，n.爬，徐行，蠕动

sentences.english: He crept back up the stairs, trying to avoid the ones that creaked.
sentences.chinese: 他蹑手蹑脚地回楼上，尽量避开那些嘎吱作响的梯级。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
detailed_translations.english: if something such as an insect, small animal, or car creeps, it moves slowly and quietly

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者

name: experiment
trans: n.实验，试验，尝试，vi.做实验，尝试

sentences.english: The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

detailed_translations.english: to try using various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

name: sauce
trans: n.调味汁，酱汁，无理的话(或举动)，vt.给...调味，使...增加趣味，无理

sentences.english: spaghetti sauces
sentences.chinese: 意大利面酱

detailed_translations.english: a thick cooked liquid that is served with food to give it a particular taste

name: comprise
trans: vt.包含，包括，构成

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

name: lung
trans: n.肺脏，肺，呼吸器官

sentences.english: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会引起肺癌。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your body that you breathe with

name: officer
trans: n.官员，干事，军官，vt.提供官员，指挥

sentences.english: a former Cabinet officer
sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

name: revolutionary
trans: adj.革命的，n.革命者

sentences.english: The new cancer drug is a revolutionary breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 这种抗癌新药是一个革命性突破。

sentences.english: a revolutionary new drug
sentences.chinese: 一种革命性的新药

detailed_translations.english: completely new and different, especially in a way that leads to great improvements
someone who joins in or supports a political or social revolution

name: reality
trans: n.现实，真实，实际

sentences.english: the distinction between fantasy and reality
sentences.chinese: 幻想和现实之间的区别

sentences.english: TV is used as an escape from reality .
sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.english: The paperless office may one day become a reality .
sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

name: comfortable
trans: adj.舒适的，安慰的，充裕的

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc

name: connection
trans: n.连接，联系，关系，亲戚，连贯性

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

name: memory
trans: n.记忆，回忆，存储，内存

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: federal
trans: adj.联邦(制)的，联邦政府的，联盟的，同盟的，n.联邦主义者，同盟盟友

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

name: needless
trans: adj.不需要的，无用的

sentences.english: The report caused needless anxiety to women who have attended the clinic.
sentences.chinese: 那份报告让去那家诊所就诊过的妇女产生了不必要的忧虑。

sentences.english: We need to bring to an end these needless deaths.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须终止这些无谓的死亡。

sentences.english: Charles hates needless waste.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯痛恨不必要的浪费。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不需要的, 不必要的
detailed_translations.english: needless troubles, suffering, loss etc are unnecessary because they could easily have been avoided

name: underneath
trans: adv.在下面，在底下，n.下部，底部，prep.在...下面

sentences.english: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他下车往底下看了看。

sentences.english: It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.chinese: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.english: She was wearing a smart jacket with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了件时髦的夹克，里面是一件 T 恤衫。

sentences.english: Her blonde hair was hidden underneath a baseball cap.
sentences.chinese: 一顶棒球帽裹住了她的满头金发。

sentences.english: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.english: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下
detailed_translations.english: directly under another object or covered by it
Underneath is also an adverb
the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

name: step
trans: n.(脚)步，步骤，步伐，踏级，vi.走，vt.踏，以步测量

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: shallow
trans: adj.浅的，浅薄的，肤浅的，浅显易懂的，n.(pl.)浅滩，浅处，v.变浅

sentences.english: a shallow river
sentences.chinese: 浅河

sentences.english: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.chinese: 这湖很浅。

sentences.english: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.english: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom

name: compress
trans: vt.压紧，压缩，[计算机]，压缩

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.english: Isobel nodded, her lips compressed.
sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.english: The miners used rock drills and compressed air to drive through hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

detailed_translations.english: to press something or make it smaller so that it takes up less space, or to become smaller
a small thick piece of material that you put on part of someone’s body to stop blood flowing out or to make it less painful

name: finger
trans: n.手指，指针，指状物，vt.用手指触碰(演奏)，(用手)指，vi.触摸用手指演奏乐器

sentences.english: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.chinese: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.english: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手抓着吃。

detailed_translations.english: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb

name: depress
trans: vt.使沮丧，按下，降低，[计算机]，降低

sentences.english: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

trans: adv.仅仅，只不过

sentences.chinese: 他只是个孩子——你不要指望他能理解。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how small or unimportant something or someone is

trans: n.正午，中午

sentences.chinese: 我们中途在科尔切斯特停留吃了午饭。

sentences.english: the full heat of the midday sun

detailed_translations.english: the middle of the day, at or around 12 o’clock

trans: adv.为什么，conj.为什么，...的理由，int.咳，哎呀，n.理由，谜

sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

name: actor
trans: n.，男演员，演剧的人

sentences.chinese: 他父亲曾是粤剧团的一名演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who performs in a play or film

name: witness
trans: n.证据，目击者，证人，vt.目击，见证，出席，观察，经历，vi.为(宗教信仰)做见证，证明

sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

trans: n.交通，通行，(人或车等)交通流量，不正当生意(走私)，v.做生意(多指违法的)，游览

sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

name: soldier
trans: n.(陆军)士兵，军人，偷懒者，[动]兵蚁，vi.当兵

sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.english: an enemy soldier
sentences.chinese: 敌兵

detailed_translations.chinese: 军人；[昆] 兵蚁；懒汉；一片烤面包

detailed_translations.chinese: 当兵；磨洋工；坚持干；假称害病

sentences.chinese: 这些举措激起了右翼群体的强烈反对。

name: lamb

sentences.english: roast lamb
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉

detailed_translations.english: a young sheep

name: living-room
trans: n.起居室

trans: adj.每一的，每隔...的

sentences.chinese: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

detailed_translations.english: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people

trans: n.镭

sentences.chinese: 居里夫人发现了镭。

sentences.english: Madame Curie was the physicist with expertise in chemistry that, in 1898, discovered the radioactive substances of radium and polonium in Paris, France.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人是一位具有化学专门知识的物理学家。 1898年，她在法国巴黎发现了放射性物质的镭和钋。

name: loud

A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

trans: n.工厂，制造厂

sentences.english: factory workers

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

trans: pron.(，it的所有格)它的

sentences.chinese: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

sentences.chinese: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.chinese: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured

sentences.chinese: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

name: folk

sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定有些人宁愿自己不在这里。

trans: adj.相隔很远的，遥远的，冷淡的，偏僻的，远程的，(感情等)距离很大，n.远程操作

sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

detailed_translations.chinese: 遥远的， 偏僻的； 关系疏远的； 脱离的； 绝少的； 微乎其微的； 孤高的， 冷淡的
detailed_translations.english: far from towns or other places where people live

name: aid
trans: n.，帮助，救护，助手，辅助物，v.，援助，帮助，救护，abbr.=Agency，for，International，Development，国际开发署，[美

sentences.english: He was breathing only with the aid of a ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 他只有靠呼吸器呼吸。

sentences.english: first aid
sentences.chinese: 急救；急救护理

detailed_translations.english: help that you need to do a particular thing

name: activity
trans: n.，活动，活跃，活力，行动，vt.，表演，adj.，厉害

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

name: interaction
trans: n.相互作用，相互影响，互动交流，干扰

sentences.chinese: 但您只能在实现所有方法的情况下获得最大收益，因为它们的力量来自它们之间的交互。

name: durable

sentences.chinese: 木头是耐用材料。

detailed_translations.english: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot

name: wear

sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.

name: Germany
trans: n.德意志，德国

sentences.chinese: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.english: Bismarck ruled Germany by a strong hand.
sentences.chinese: 俾斯麦用铁腕手段统治德国。

sentences.english: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

sentences.chinese: 抖动绳索把绳圈展开。

sentences.chinese: 一圈金属线

name: shortly

sentences.chinese: 琼斯女士很快就会回来。

if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

trans: adj.酸的，酸腐的，刻薄的，脾气坏的，v.变酸，n.酸物

sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

name: thickness
trans: n.厚(度)，密(度)，一层，含混不清

sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.chinese: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

name: distinguish
trans: vt.区别，辨别，认别，特别关注vi.区别

sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

name: modify
trans: vt.更改，修改，修饰，调正，缓和，vi.修改

sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.chinese: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

detailed_translations.english: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

trans: adj.有责任的，尽责的，责任重大的，可靠的

trans: n.怀疑，疑心，猜疑

trans: n.开关，转换，鞭子，vt.转换，改变，交换，鞭打，n.(女用)假发

detailed_translations.english: an annoying or difficult situation

trans: n.数学

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic

sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.chinese: 他从事营销和产品开发。

sentences.chinese: 葆拉是备受呵护的中产阶级家庭的产物。

sentences.english: gold watch/chain/ring etc

detailed_translations.english: a valuable soft yellow metal that is used to make coins, jewellery etc. It is a chemical element: symbol Au

name: row

sentences.chinese: 家庭争吵

sentences.english: He had just had a row with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚和妻子吵了一架。

detailed_translations.english: a short angry argument, especially between people who know each other well

sentences.chinese: 滑雪者始终面临着受重伤的风险。

sentences.english: It was a risk, sending a letter to my house.
sentences.chinese: 将信寄到我家是冒险。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空的,中空的;；空洞的,无价值的

name: propose
trans: vt.提议计划，打算，向...提议，vi.求婚

sentences.english: the proposed budget cuts
sentences.chinese: 所提出的预算削减

name: grocery
trans: n.食品杂货店

sentences.chinese: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

detailed_translations.english: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

name: entitle

sentences.chinese: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

name: edge
trans: n.边缘，边，刀口，vt.给...加上边，缓慢横过，使逐渐丧失，vi.徐徐前进

sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

name: exaggerate

sentences.english: I couldn’t sleep for three days – I’m not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem better, larger, worse etc than it really is

name: prime
trans: adj.，首要的，最初的，最好的，典型的，n.，春，青春，壮年，全盛时期，n.，[数]质数，vt.，事先指点，在(金属、木材等上)打底漆，vi.变得首要

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active

name: generator
trans: n.发电机，发生器，发生者

sentences.english: an emergency generator
sentences.chinese: 应急发电机

sentences.english: The company has been a very good cash generator.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是台非常出色的赚钱机器。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that produces electricity

sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.chinese: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.english: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

name: horsepower
trans: n.马力(功率单位)

sentences.english: a two-hundred horsepower engine
sentences.chinese: 两百马力的发动机

sentences.english: the superior horsepower of a Volkswagen
sentences.chinese: 大众汽车的强劲动力

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the power of an engine, or the power of an engine measured like this

name: prevail
trans: vi.胜，优胜，获胜，流行，盛行，主导

sentences.english: 英文编辑：the economic conditions which prevail in England and Wales
sentences.chinese: 英格兰和威尔士普遍的经济状况

sentences.english: Justice will prevail.
sentences.chinese: 正义终将获胜。

detailed_translations.english: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time

name: visual
trans: adj.看的，看得见的,，视觉的，n.画面，图象

sentences.english: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to seeing

name: wool
trans: n.羊毛，毛线，绒线，毛织品

sentences.english: a wool overcoat
sentences.chinese: 羊毛大衣

sentences.english: a ball of wool
sentences.chinese: 一团毛线

detailed_translations.english: the soft thick hair that sheep and some goats have on their body

name: regret
trans: vt.懊悔，为...感到遗憾，后悔，惋惜，抱歉，n.懊悔，遗憾，后悔抱歉

sentences.english: We regret any inconvenience caused to our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry about sth you have done or about sth that you have not been able to do
sadness that you feel about something, especially because you wish it had not happened

name: occur
trans: vi.发生，出现，存在，想到

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.english: to happen

name: loft
trans: n.阁楼，顶楼

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just done aloft conversion(= changed the loft into bedrooms ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的邻居刚刚完成阁楼改建。

detailed_translations.english: a room or space under the roof of a building, usually used for storing things in

name: investment
trans: n.投资，投资额，投入

sentences.english: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

sentences.english: a huge investment of time and effort
sentences.chinese: 时间和精力的大量投入

detailed_translations.english: the use of money to get a profit or to make a business activity successful, or the money that is used

name: punish
trans: vt.罚，惩罚，处罚

sentences.english: Smacking is not an acceptable way of punishing a child.
sentences.chinese: 要惩罚孩子，不应该用打的方式。

sentences.english: He promised to punish severely any officials found guilty of electoral fraud.
sentences.chinese: 他承诺要严惩任何在选举中有欺诈行为的官员。

sentences.english: They deserve to be punished for putting passengers at risk.
sentences.chinese: 他们置乘客于危险之中，理应受到惩罚。

sentences.english: I felt I was being punished for what my mother had done.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己在为妈妈的所作所为接受惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone suffer because they have done something wrong or broken the law

name: demonstrate
trans: vt.说明，论证，证明，表露，示范，演示，vi.示威

sentences.english: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.english: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明， 论证； 表露
detailed_translations.english: to show or prove something clearly

name: cool
trans: adj.凉的，冷静的，冷色系的，adv.冷静地，n.凉快，vt.，&vi.(使)变凉，(使)冷静

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.english: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September
sentences.chinese: 九月较凉爽的天气

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

name: pupil
trans: n.学生，小学生，学徒，瞳孔

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: staff and pupils
sentences.chinese: 教职员工和学生

sentences.english: a star pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的小学生

sentences.english: a third-grade pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名三年级小学生

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being taught, especially a child

name: furious
trans: adj.狂怒的，狂暴的，猛烈的

sentences.english: She was absolutely furious .
sentences.chinese: 她怒不可遏。

sentences.english: There was a furious row over the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 关于这些提议的争论非常激烈。

detailed_translations.english: very angry

name: essential
trans: adj.必要的，重要的，本质的，n.要素，要点

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

name: battle
trans: n.战役，斗争，争论，vi.与...作战，与...斗争

sentences.english: the Battle of Trafalgar
sentences.chinese: 特拉法尔加战役

sentences.english: a pitched battle (=  a long and serious battle  ) between police and drug gangs
sentences.chinese: 警方和贩毒团伙之间的一场激战

detailed_translations.english: a fight between opposing armies, groups of ships, groups of people etc, especially one that is part of a larger war

name: progress
trans: n.前进，进展，进步，vi.促进，进步，进行

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

name: afterward
trans: adv.，后来，以后

sentences.english: Shortly afterward, police arrested four suspects.
sentences.chinese: 之后不久，警方逮捕了４名嫌疑犯。

detailed_translations.english: If you do something or if something happens afterward, you do it or it happens after a particular event or time that has already been mentioned

name: recently
trans: adv.最近，新近

sentences.english: He has recently been promoted to Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 他最近晋升为经理助理。

sentences.english: a recently published biography
sentences.chinese: 一部最近出版的传记

sentences.english: Jerry lived in Cairo until quite recently .
sentences.chinese: 直至不久之前杰里一直住在开罗。

sentences.english: More recently, he’s appeared in a number of British films.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他出演了多部英国电影。

detailed_translations.english: not long ago

name: sympathetic
trans: adj.同情的，和谐的，共鸣的，n.交感神经

sentences.english: a sympathetic friend
sentences.chinese: 一个有同情心的朋友

sentences.english: a sympathetic attitude
sentences.chinese: 一种同情的态度

sentences.english: We hope always to provide a friendly sympathetic ear (= someone willing to listen to someone else’s problems ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们希望总能做到友善地倾听。

detailed_translations.english: caring and feeling sorry about someone’s problems

name: hunt
trans: n.打猎，狩猎，搜寻，追捕，vt.追猎，狩猎，打猎，搜索

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

name: opera
trans: n.歌剧，挪威Opera软件公司的浏览器软件

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

name: successful
trans: adj.成功的，结果良好的，圆满的

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

name: under
trans: prep.在...下面，低于，在...内，在...控制下，adv.在...下，在昏迷中，adj.下面的，从属的，少于的

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

Under is also an adverb

trans: n.内服药，医学

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

name: attractive
trans: adj.有吸引力的，引起注意的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

name: command
trans: vt.命令，指挥，控制，支配，n.命令，指挥，控制，[计算机]DOS命令：引用辅助命令处理器

sentences.english: He commanded his men to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他命令手下撤退。

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

sentences.english: the power and finances commanded by the police
sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

name: which
trans: pron.哪一个，哪些，adj.哪一个，哪一些

sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

name: after
trans: adj，.以后的，adv.，以后，后来，conj.，在...以后，prep.，在...以后，次于

sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。
