name: namely
trans: adv.即，也就是

sentences.english: Three students were mentioned, namely John, Sarah and Sylvia.
sentences.chinese: 有三名学生被提到，即约翰、萨拉和西尔维娅。

detailed_translations.english: used when saying the names of the people or things you are referring to

name: girl
trans: n.女孩子，姑娘，女儿

sentences.english: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和女孩均可申请加入合唱团。

sentences.english: Girls! Please be quiet.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们！请安静。

sentences.english: a teenage girl
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的女孩

sentences.english: They have two girls and a boy.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

name: here
trans: adv.这里，向这里，adj.表示强调，n.这里

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

name: respectively
trans: adv.各自地，分别地

sentences.english: The cups and saucers cost £5 and £3 respectively.
sentences.chinese: 茶杯和茶碟的价钱分别为5英镑和3英镑。

detailed_translations.english: in the same order as the things you have just mentioned

name: another
trans: adj.再一个的，别的，另一的，不同的，pron.另一个

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

name: tobacco
trans: n.烟草，烟叶

sentences.english: ...Cuba's tobacco crop.
sentences.chinese: …古巴的烟草作物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烟草，烟叶；烟草制品；抽烟
detailed_translations.english: the dried brown leaves that are smoked in cigarettes, pipes etc

name: accommodate
trans: vt.，容纳，供应，供给，提供方便，使一致，和解，顾及，vi.，使自己适应

sentences.english: He bought a huge house to accommodate his library.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一座大房子来放他的藏书。

sentences.english: The ballroom can accommodate 400 people.
sentences.chinese: 那个舞厅可容纳400人。

detailed_translations.english: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them

name: nine
trans: num.九，九个

sentences.english: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.english: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我们9点开始营业。

sentences.english: Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.chinese: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 9

name: visible
trans: adj.可见的，看得见的，n.可见物

sentences.english: The comet is visible to the naked eye (= can be seen without using special equipment ).
sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.english: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下植物是否有患病的迹象。

detailed_translations.english: something that is visible can be seen

name: explosion
trans: n.爆炸，爆发，炸裂，激增

sentences.english: We heard a loud explosion.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到一声巨大的爆炸声。

sentences.english: It was an explosion of anger against the practices of the occupying forces.
sentences.chinese: 这是人们不满占领军行为而爆发的怒火。

detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately causing sth to explode

name: certificate
trans: n.证(明)书，证件，执照，vt.批准，认可，发证书给...

sentences.english: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
sentences.chinese: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

name: complicate
trans: vt.使复杂，使陷入，使错综，使起纠纷

sentences.english: I think that is because we unnecessarily complicate it.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是因为我们不必要地将生活复杂化了。

sentences.english: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
sentences.chinese: 如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。

sentences.english: The selection service is one of the more difficult services to implement correctly because it has some valuable features that complicate the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。

name: event
trans: n.事件，大事，事变，项目，活动

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

name: evil
trans: n.邪恶，罪恶，祸害，adj.邪恶的，坏的

sentences.english: She wanted to protect her children from the evils of the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.english: Poverty is one of the greatest social evils of our time.
sentences.chinese: 贫困是当代最大的社会弊端之一。

sentences.english: the evils of capitalism
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的种种祸害

sentences.english: There is too much evil in the world.
sentences.chinese: 世上的罪恶太多。

sentences.english: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions
sentences.chinese: 对数百万人之死负责的邪恶独裁者

detailed_translations.english: something that is very bad or harmful
someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people

name: political
trans: adj.政治的，政治上的，政党的，派系斗争的，有政治头脑的

sentences.english: a monarch without political power
sentences.chinese: 没有政治权力的君主

sentences.english: He was a political prisoner (= one who was put in prison because he was thought to be harmful to the state) .
sentences.chinese: 他曾是个政治犯。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the state, government or public affairs

name: suitable
trans: adj.合适的，适宜的，adv.<古>合适地，恰当地

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

name: automation
trans: n.自动，自动化

sentences.english: They phrase in new machinery for increased automation.
sentences.chinese: 他们逐步采用新机器以提高自动化程度。

sentences.english: This factory has phased in new machinery for increased automation.

detailed_translations.english: behaving towards someone in a way that shows you like them and are ready to talk to them or help them

sentences.chinese: 猪肉香肠

detailed_translations.english: a small tube of skin filled with a mixture of meat, spices etc, eaten hot or cold after it has been cooked

name: strength
trans: n.力，力量，力气，长处，强度

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

trans: n.网球，网球运动

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

name: camp
trans: n.野营，营地，兵营，露营，帐棚，训练营，做作，vt.，&，vi.露营，扎营，做作，adj.做作的

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

name: glass
trans: n.，玻璃，玻璃杯，玻璃器皿，窗户，(复)眼镜，透镜，vt.，用玻璃把…盖(或罩、围)住，给...装上玻璃，使成玻璃状，反映，反射，审视vi.，成为玻璃状，用光学仪器眺望

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

name: two
trans: num.二，两个

sentences.english: I’d like you to line up in twos, please.
sentences.chinese: 请你们两个一组排好队。

detailed_translations.english: in groups of two people or things
the number 2

name: disorder
trans: n.混乱，杂乱，骚乱，vt.扰乱

sentences.english: severe eating disorders such as bulimia and anorexia
sentences.chinese: 像贪食症和厌食症这类严重的进食障碍

detailed_translations.chinese: 混乱， 杂乱， 骚乱

name: circulate
trans: vt.使循环，使流通，vi.流通，循环，传播

sentences.english: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

detailed_translations.english: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
to move around within a system, or to make something do this

name: ultimate
trans: adj.最后的，最终的，终极的，根本的，极限的，n.终极，根本，精华

sentences.chinese: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

sentences.chinese: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.english: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .
sentences.chinese: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.english: arms sales to Iran
sentences.chinese: 对伊朗的军火销售

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售
detailed_translations.english: when you sell something

name: relationship
trans: n.关系，联系

sentences.english: I have quite a good relationship with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母关系很好。

sentences.english: the relationship between diet and health problems
sentences.chinese: 膳食与健康问题之间的联系

name: international
trans: adj.国际的，世界(性)的，n.国际组织

sentences.english: the response of the international community
sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.english: the UN and other international organizations
sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving more than one nation

name: rouse
trans: vt.唤醒，唤起，惊起，鼓舞，激起，n.觉醒，奋起

sentences.english: His banging roused the neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他重重的关门声把邻居都吵醒了。

detailed_translations.english: to wake someone who is sleeping deeply

name: double
trans: adj.两倍的，复制品，替身，双重角色的演员，反转，双的，双人房，adj.两倍的，双重的，骗人的，加量的，adv.两倍地，双人地，翻来覆去地，对折地，vt.使加倍，对折，握紧，做替身，vi.加倍，转身，兼任替代演出

sentences.english: a double sink
sentences.chinese: 双水槽

sentences.english: a double wardrobe
sentences.chinese: 双门衣柜

sentences.english: the great double doors of the cathedral
sentences.chinese: 大教堂宏伟的双开大门

sentences.english: Don’t park your car on double yellow lines.
sentences.chinese: 不可以在双黄线处停车。

sentences.english: The city was enclosed by walls of double thickness.
sentences.chinese: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of two parts that are similar or exactly the same

name: Christmas
trans: n.圣诞节

sentences.english: Are you going home for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.english: a Christmas present
sentences.chinese: 圣诞礼物

sentences.english: the Christmas holidays
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节假期

sentences.english: Merry Christmas and a happy New Year everyone!
sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

detailed_translations.english: the period of time around December 25th, the day when Christians celebrate the birth of Christ

name: health
trans: n.健康，健康状况，卫生，保健

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

name: bough
trans: n.大树枝

sentences.english: I rested my fishing rod against a pine bough.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的鱼竿靠在松树的一个大树枝上。

detailed_translations.english: a main branch on a tree

trans: n.路，道路，公路

sentences.chinese: 枫树路65号

trans: n.塑像，雕像，铸像

sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

trans: adj.百分度的，摄氏的

sentences.english: ...daytime temperatures of up to forty degrees centigrade.
sentences.chinese: …高达40摄氏度的日间气温。

sentences.english: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 底部的数字为建议性摄氏度水温。

detailed_translations.english: Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.

name: hot
trans: adj.热的，热情的，刺激的，辣的，性感的，adv.激动地，快速地，n.最高温度，滚烫的东西

sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

trans: adj.赤裸的，显露的，极少的，仅仅的，vt.使赤裸，露出

sentences.english: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.chinese: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.english: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.english: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.chinese: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

sentences.chinese: 有13人被游击队员就地处决。

sentences.chinese: 这项工作包括拟订和实施一个护理计划。

sentences.chinese: 最终的结果还未计算出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算；估算；用计算机计算
detailed_translations.english: to calculate a result, answer, sum etc

name: owner
trans: n.物主，所有人

sentences.chinese: 他现在拥有了一辆亮红色跑车，很是自豪。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns something

name: severely
trans: adv.严厉地，严格地，严重地(艰难地，紧凑地，纯朴地)

sentences.english: The town was severely damaged in the war.
sentences.chinese: 这座城镇在战争中遭到了严重破坏。

sentences.english: She’s now severely disabled.

sentences.english: All I recollect is a grey sky.
sentences.chinese: 我只记得一片灰色的天空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得

sentences.english: The children were all in tears .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们全都哭了。

sentences.english: She came home in floods of tears .
sentences.chinese: 她泪流满面地回到家里。

sentences.english: I could see that Sam was close to tears .
sentences.chinese: 我看到萨姆都快哭了。

sentences.english: Bridget suddenly burst into tears and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特突然大哭着跑了出去。

sentences.english: He was fighting back tears as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他一边说，一边拼命忍住泪水。

sentences.english: A lot of people were moved to tears by his story.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都被他的故事感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He kissed her cheek, a gesture that brought tears to her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他亲了亲她的脸，这个举动让她热泪盈眶。

sentences.english: I must admit I shed a few tears when the school closed.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，学校关闭时我掉过几滴眼泪。

sentences.english: I saw grown men reduced to tears that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天我看到成年男子都流下了眼泪。

sentences.english: ‘Please don’t talk like that,’ Ellen implored him, her eyes filling with tears .
sentences.chinese: “请别那么说。”埃伦恳求道，眼里噙满泪水。

sentences.english: By this time, tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我已泪流满面。

sentences.english: The tears he shed were tears of joy .
sentences.chinese: 他淌下的是喜悦的泪水。

name: tooth
trans: n.牙齿，齿状物，粗糙表面，嗜好，(复)teeth，[ti:θ]：有效手段

sentences.english: Sugar is bad for your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

name: beef
trans: n.牛肉，菜牛，v.抱怨，诉苦

sentences.english: roast beef
sentences.chinese: 烤牛肉

sentences.english: We have both dairy and beef cattle on the farm.
sentences.chinese: 我们农场里奶牛和菜牛都有。

detailed_translations.english: the meat from a cow
to complain a lot

name: thirteen
trans: num.十三，十三个

sentences.english: They’ve only sold thirteen tickets so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止他们仅仅售出13张票。

sentences.english: When it happened, I was thirteen (= 13 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 那事发生时，我13岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 13
the number 13

name: figure
trans: n.数字，外形，人物，图形，形状，外形，体型，v.演算，认为，领会到

sentences.english: Reform now figures high on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

detailed_translations.english: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字；人物；算术；体型，风姿；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形
detailed_translations.english: the activity of adding, multiplying etc numbers

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算； 认为， 猜想
detailed_translations.english: to form a particular opinion after thinking about a situation

name: frost
trans: n.冰冻，严寒，霜，冷漠，vt.，&，vi.覆着霜，冻结，结霜

sentences.english: the risk of frost damage to crops
sentences.chinese: 庄稼遭受霜冻灾害的危险

detailed_translations.english: very cold weather, when water freezes
to cover a cake with a mixture of powdery sugar and liquid

name: circuit
trans: n.电路，环行，一圈，巡行，巡回vt.，&，vi.巡回

sentences.english: We did a circuit of the old city.
sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

name: spectacle
trans: n.光景，景象，眼镜，值得看的东西

sentences.english: a multimedia dance and opera spectacle
sentences.chinese: 盛大的多媒体舞蹈戏剧表演

sentences.english: The trial was turned into a public spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 审判变成了一场公开的闹剧。

detailed_translations.english: a very impressive show or scene

name: spelling
trans: n.拼字，拼法，拼写法

sentences.english: Her spelling has improved.
sentences.chinese: 她的拼写进步了。

sentences.english: an essay full of spelling mistakes
sentences.chinese: 一篇满是拼写错误的文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼字， 拼法， 拼写法
detailed_translations.english: the act of spelling words correctly, or the ability to do this

name: borrow
trans: vt.借，借用，借入

sentences.english: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.english: They borrowed heavily (=  borrowed a lot of money  ) from the bank to start their new business.
sentences.chinese: 他们向银行贷了巨款来创办新公司。

detailed_translations.english: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later

name: restore
trans: vt.恢复，归还，修补，翻新

sentences.english: She was hoping that the Mediterranean climate would restore her to full health.
sentences.chinese: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.english: The National Guard was called in to restore order (= make people stop fighting and breaking the law ) when riots broke out.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.english: initiatives to restore peace in the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 恢复中东和平的倡议

sentences.english: a Victorian fireplace restored to its former glory
sentences.chinese: 恢复了昔日华美的维多利亚时代的壁炉

sentences.english: The treaty restored Okinawa to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 该条约将冲绳归还给了日本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something return to its former state or condition

name: pint
trans: n.品脱

sentences.english: Add two pints of water to the mixture.
sentences.chinese: 在混合物中加入两品脱的水。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring an amount of liquid, especially beer or milk. In Britain a pint is equal to 0.568 litres, and in the US it is equal to 0.473 litres.

name: utility
trans: n.效用，实用，实用品，公共设施，公用程序，adj.多效用的，多功能的

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: sister
trans: n.姐妹，姐，妹，护士长

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: fresh
trans: adj.新的，新鲜的，无经验的，淡(水)的，精神饱满的，纯洁无瑕的生动的，adv.最近地，n.涌流

sentences.english: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我来重新煮点咖啡。

sentences.english: The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.chinese: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.english: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.english: The beans are fresh from the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些豆子是刚从园子里摘来的。

detailed_translations.english: adding to or replacing something

name: preference
trans: n.偏爱，喜爱物，优先，优先权

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: junior
trans: adj.年少的，下级的，后进的，n.晚辈，年少者，地位较低者，大学三年级学生

sentences.english: She now lives with actor Denis Lawson, 10 years her junior.
sentences.chinese: 她现在和比她小10岁的演员丹尼斯·劳森同居。

detailed_translations.english: If you are someone's junior, you are younger than they are

name: with
trans: prep.和...一起，具有，用，随着，包括

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

name: mistress
trans: n.女主人，夫人，主妇，情妇

sentences.english: The Prince had shocked society by living openly with his mistress.
sentences.chinese: 王子和他的情妇公开同居，让社会大为震惊。

detailed_translations.english: a woman that a man has a sexual relationship with, even though he is married to someone else

name: nice
trans: adj.美好的，令人愉快的，漂亮的，善意的

sentences.english: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.english: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.chinese: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.english: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.chinese: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.english: What a nice surprise!
sentences.chinese: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.english: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

detailed_translations.english: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

name: thorn
trans: n.刺，棘，荆棘，蒺藜

sentences.english: a long, low hedge of thorns
sentences.chinese: 一长排矮矮的荆棘树篱

detailed_translations.english: a sharp point that grows on the stem of a plant such as a rose

name: silence
trans: n.沉默，寂静，vt.使沉默，使安静

sentences.english: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.chinese: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。

sentences.english: ‘Silence in court!’ roared the judge.
sentences.chinese: “法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.english: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 被告行使了沉默权。

sentences.english: She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.chinese: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

detailed_translations.english: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

name: era
trans: n.时代，年代，纪元

sentences.english: His death marked the end of an era.
sentences.chinese: 他的去世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.english: the Victorian era
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚时代

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

name: loop
trans: n.圈，环，环孔，弯曲部份，回路，vt.使...成环，以圈结，以环连结vi.形成环，环形地行动

sentences.english: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

detailed_translations.english: to fly a plane up and around in a circle so that the plane is  upside down  for a time
a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

name: discover
trans: vt.，&，vi.发现，暴露，显示

sentences.english: The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

name: piece
trans: n.碎片，块，片，篇，vt.拼合，修补，结合

sentences.english: Cut off a piece of wood 5 cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.english: His trousers were held up with a piece of string.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子靠一根细绳系着。

sentences.english: Would you like a small or a large piece?
sentences.chinese: 你想要一小块还是一大块？

sentences.english: Chop the potato into bite-sized pieces.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯切成小块。

sentences.english: The shower head just came to pieces (= broke into separate parts ) in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 花洒就在我手中裂开了。

sentences.english: to piece together a jigsaw
sentences.chinese: 拼合拼图

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that has been separated from the main part
to put all the separate parts of sth together to make a complete whole

name: unfortunate
trans: adj.不幸的，可取的，令人遗憾的，不成功的，n.不幸的人

sentences.english: When we entered the room, the teacher was yelling at some unfortunate student.
sentences.chinese: 我们进教室的时候，老师正在对着一个倒霉的学生吼叫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不幸的；令人遗憾的；不成功的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is unfortunate has something bad happen to them

name: haste
trans: n.急速，急忙，草率，v.匆忙，赶快，vi.赶紧，赶快

sentences.english: Spelling mistakes are often just the result of haste.
sentences.chinese: 拼写错误经常是由于匆忙而造成的。

sentences.english: And if haste is the accelerator pedal, multitasking is overdrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果匆忙是加速器的踏板，一心多用就是超速档。

sentences.english: My workmate gestured, clarifying his intentions of using a forged(faked) passport in haste.
sentences.chinese: 我的同事打着手势，匆忙地解释着他使用假护照的意图。

detailed_translations.chinese: 匆忙， 急速； 草率
detailed_translations.english: great speed in doing something, especially because you do not have enough time

name: startle
trans: vt.使大吃一惊，使...惊愕，n.吃惊，惊愕

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn’t mean to startle you.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我不是故意吓你一跳的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone suddenly surprised or slightly shocked

name: Polish
trans: adj.波兰的，波兰人的，波兰语的，n.波兰语

sentences.english: The Polish clergy use their influence to polonize the people.
sentences.chinese: 波兰的教士们运用他们的影响去使人民波兰化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良

detailed_translations.english: relating to Poland, its people, or its language

name: clerk
trans: n.店员，办事员，职员

sentences.english: a clerk in a commercial firm
sentences.chinese: 一家商行的文员

detailed_translations.chinese: 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记账员；<古>牧师，教士
detailed_translations.english: someone who keeps records or accounts in an office

detailed_translations.chinese: 当销售员，当店员；当职员
detailed_translations.english: to work as a clerk

name: African
trans: adj.，非洲的，非洲人的，n.非洲人

sentences.english: ...the African continent.
sentences.chinese: …非洲大陆。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Africa or its people
someone from Africa

name: surround
trans: vt.围，围绕，圈住，包围，环绕，n.环绕物

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

name: concentration
trans: n.集中，专心，专注，浓缩，浓度

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

name: gallery
trans: n.长廊，游廊，画廊，美术馆，顶层楼座，狭长的房间

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

detailed_translations.english: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art

name: throw
trans: vt.投，掷，抛，扔，n.投掷，抛

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

name: defend
trans: vt.，&，vi.防护，辩护，防卫，保卫，防守

sentences.english: She was always defending her husband in front of their daughter.
sentences.chinese: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.english: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该勇于为自己的观点进行解释和辩护。

detailed_translations.english: to use arguments to protect something or someone from criticism, or to prove that something is right

name: mental
trans: adj.智力的，精神的，脑力的，精神错乱的，传心术的，[解剖学]颏的

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

name: civilization
trans: n.文明，文化，开化

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

name: sweet
trans: adj.甜的，愉快的，可爱的n.糖，甜食，adv.甜蜜地

sentences.english: This tea is too sweet.
sentences.chinese: 这茶太甜了。

sentences.english: sweet juicy peaches
sentences.chinese: 味甜多汁的桃子

sentences.english: sweet wine
sentences.chinese: 甜葡萄酒

detailed_translations.chinese: 甜的；悦耳的；芳香的；亲切的
detailed_translations.english: containing or having a taste like sugar
a small piece of sweet food made of sugar or chocolate

name: sunset
trans: n.日落(时分)，衰落时期(尤指人的晚年)

sentences.english: a glorious sunset
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的日落景象

detailed_translations.english: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins

name: job
trans: n.，职业，工作，零活，职责，任务，vt.，投机买卖，营私舞弊，不公正地判罚，分包任务，vi.，工作，假公济私，做分销商或批发商，adj.，与工作有关的

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.english: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.english: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.english: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

name: assess
trans: vt.对(财产等)估价，估定，评定

sentences.english: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对估价； 评价， 评论
detailed_translations.english: to make a judgment about a person or situation after thinking carefully about it

name: lend
trans: vt.把...借给，贷(款)，给予，增添，vi.贷款

sentences.english: The hospital agreed to lend us a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 医院同意借给我们一把轮椅。

sentences.english: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.
sentences.chinese: 银行正在重新评估其贷款标准。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone borrow money or something that belongs to you for a short time

name: unconscious
trans: adj.不省人事的，失去知觉的

sentences.english: She was found alive but unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 她被找到时还活着，但已不省人事。

detailed_translations.english: unable to see, move, feel etc in the normal way because you are not conscious

name: great
trans: adj.大的，伟大的，大量的，很好的，美好的，重要的，adv.(口语)好极了

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

name: sick
trans: adj.有病的，恶心的，腻烦的，晕的，n.病人，呕吐物，vt.追逐，攻击，唆使

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

name: Marxism
trans: n.马克思主义

sentences.english: They openly revised Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 他们明目张胆地篡改马克思主义。

sentences.english: The proletariat must possess the truth of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 无产阶级必须掌握马克思主义的真理。

sentences.english: Both of them believed in Marxism and materialism.
sentences.chinese: 两人都信仰马克思主义和唯物主义。

detailed_translations.english: the system of political thinking invented by Karl Marx, which explains changes in history as the result of a struggle between social classes

detailed_translations.chinese: 马克思的；马克思主义的

name: science
trans: n.科学，科学研究

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

name: bond
trans: n.联结，联系，结合，公债，债券，粘结剂，粘合剂

sentences.english: My father put all his money into stock market bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

detailed_translations.english: an official document promising that a government or company will pay back money that it has borrowed, often with interest

name: pump
trans: n.，泵，抽水机，打气筒，心脏，抽水，轻软舞鞋，vt.，用抽机抽，抽水，打气，用泵输送，盘问，涌出，vi.，用泵抽水，快速上下(或内外)运动

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: feeble
trans: adj.虚弱的，微弱的，无力的

sentences.english: His voice sounded feeble and far away.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.english: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.chinese: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的； 无效的， 无益的
detailed_translations.english: extremely weak

name: extraordinary
trans: adj.非同寻常的，特别的，非凡的，特派的

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

name: chain
trans: n.链，链条，项圈，连锁，束缚，vt.用铁练锁住，束缚，囚禁

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: arrive
trans: vi.到达，来临，达到，成功

sentences.english: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.chinese: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.chinese: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.english: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.chinese: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

detailed_translations.english: to get to the place you are going to

name: season
trans: n.季，季节，时节，旺季，上演期，vt.加调味料调味，使...适用于vi.使...被调味

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

name: onion
trans: n.洋葱，洋葱头

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.english: red onions
sentences.chinese: 红皮洋葱

sentences.english: home-made onion soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的洋葱汤

sentences.chinese: 英国最大的港口城市

sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

name: trail
