sentences.english: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

detailed_translations.english: a large untidy pile of things
to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way

name: trade
trans: n.贸易，交易，买卖，职业，vi.交易，进行交易，做买卖，交换，adj.贸易的，商业的

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: extremely
trans: adv.极端，极其，非常

sentences.english: Earthquakes are extremely difficult to predict.
sentences.chinese: 地震非常难以预测。

sentences.english: I’m extremely sorry to have troubled you.
sentences.chinese: 给你添了麻烦，我十分抱歉。

detailed_translations.english: to a very great degree

name: base
trans: n.基础，底层，基地，（支持、收入、力量等的）基础，vt.以...作基础，adj.卑鄙的，不道德的

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

name: guess
trans: vt.，&vi.，&n.猜测，推测，猜想

sentences.english: I’d say he’s around 50, but I’m only guessing.
sentences.chinese: 我想他50岁左右，不过也只是猜测。

sentences.english: What star sign are you? No, let me guess.
sentences.chinese: 你是什么星座的？别说，让我来猜猜看。

sentences.english: I’d say she’s about 35, but that’s only a guess.
sentences.chinese: 我说她大约35岁，不过那只是猜测。

detailed_translations.english: to try to answer a question or form an opinion when you are not sure whether you will be correct
an attempt to answer a question or make a judgement when you are not sure whether you will be correct

name: bundle
trans: n.捆，包，束，包袱，一批，一大笔钱，vt.捆，匆匆送走，附赠，vi.匆忙

sentences.english: a small bundle containing mostly clothing
sentences.chinese: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服

sentences.english: He was bundled into a car and driven 50 miles to a police station.
sentences.chinese: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
detailed_translations.english: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way

name: empty
trans: a.空的，空洞的

sentences.english: an empty box
sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.chinese: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.english: The fuel tank’s almost empty.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

detailed_translations.english: having nothing inside

name: network
trans: n.网状物，网络，系统，广播网，vt.用网覆盖，联网，vi.加入网络

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

sentences.english: the network of blood vessels in the body
sentences.chinese: 人体内的血管网

detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

name: speak
trans: vi.说话，发言，vt.说，讲，演说

sentences.english: I was so shocked I couldn’t speak.
sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

detailed_translations.english: to use your voice to produce words

name: cut
trans: vt.，切，割，剪，减少，停止，修剪，vi.，切割，快速移动，[计算机]剪掉，n.，切口，割伤，降低，份额，删节，割下的一块肉

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

name: label
trans: n.标签，签条，标记，符号，商标，称谓，[计算机]标记，DOS命令，加上或修改磁盘标签，vt.，贴标签于，分类，把...称为

sentences.english: a luggage label
sentences.chinese: 行李标签

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper or another material that is attached to something and gives information about it
to attach a label onto something or write information on something

name: speciality
trans: n.专业，特长，擅长，特产

sentences.english: the region’s speciality cheese
sentences.chinese: 该地区的特色干酪

sentences.english: His speciality is international law.
sentences.chinese: 他的专业是国际法。

detailed_translations.chinese: (specialty) 特色食品; 特产；专业；专门研究；专长
detailed_translations.english: Someone's speciality is a particular type of work that they do most or do best, or a subject that they know a lot about

name: fix
trans: vt.，&，vi.使固定，决定，修理，准备，n.困境，(船只、飞机等的)定方位，贿赂

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

name: willing
trans: adj.愿意的，心甘情愿的

sentences.english: How much are they willing to pay?
sentences.chinese: 他们愿意付多少钱？

detailed_translations.english: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

name: graph
trans: n.(曲线)图，图表，vt.以(曲线)图表示

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

name: brisk
trans: adj.活泼的，活跃的，快的，清新的，敏锐的，凛冽的

sentences.english: a brisk walk
sentences.chinese: 轻快的行走

sentences.english: They set off at a brisk pace .
sentences.chinese: 他们踏着轻快的步伐上路了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻快的， 生气勃勃的； 兴隆的， 繁忙活跃的； 寒冷而清新的
detailed_translations.english: quick and full of energy

name: local
trans: adj.地方的，局部的，地方性的，当地的n.当地人

sentences.english: local hospital
sentences.chinese: 当地医院

sentences.english: local residents
sentences.chinese: 本地居民

sentences.english: a local infection
sentences.chinese: 局部感染

detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular area you live in, or the area you are talking about

name: yawn
trans: vi.打呵欠，n.呵欠

sentences.english: Alan stretched and yawned.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

sentences.english: Kay shook her head and stifled a yawn (= tried to stop yawning ).
sentences.chinese: 凯摇摇头，忍住呵欠。

detailed_translations.english: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
an act of yawning

name: string
trans: n.线，细绳，一串，字串，vt.串起，成串，收紧，悬挂，系，扎，vi.给...装弦，adj.线的

sentences.english: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: a ball of string
sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.english: I need a piece of string to tie this package.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

sentences.english: a string of pearls
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

name: than
trans: conj.(比较级)比，prep.比(用于两者之间的比较)

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

name: find
trans: vt.，&，vi.找到，发觉，找出，感觉到，认为，n.发现物

sentences.english: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.english: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.chinese: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.english: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

sentences.english: I have to find somewhere else to live.
sentences.chinese: 我得另找住处。

sentences.english: She had almost given up hope of finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 她差不多要放弃找个丈夫的希望了。

sentences.english: Her mother went to the shops, and on her return, Kathleen was nowhere to be found (= could not be found ) .
sentences.chinese: 妈妈去买东西，回来的时候凯思琳找不到了。

detailed_translations.english: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

name: axis
trans: n.轴，轴线，中心线，中枢

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on an axis between the north and south poles.
sentences.chinese: 地球绕着南北两极之间的地轴自转。

detailed_translations.english: the imaginary line around which a large round object, such as the Earth, turns

name: golf
trans: n.高尔夫球，v.打高尔夫球，vi.(打)高尔夫球

sentences.english: He plays golf on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 他星期天都去打高尔夫球。

sentences.english: a round of golf
sentences.chinese: 一场高尔夫球赛

detailed_translations.chinese: 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动
detailed_translations.english: a game in which the players hit a small white ball into holes in the ground with a set of golf clubs, using as few hits as possible

name: instinct
trans: n.本能，直觉，生性，天性，adj.充满的

sentences.english: Her instinct told her that something was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 直觉告诉她有些不对劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 本能； 直觉， 生性
detailed_translations.english: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way or a natural ability to know something, which is not learned

name: exclaim
trans: vi.呼喊，惊叫，大声叫

sentences.english: ‘No!’ she exclaimed in shock.
sentences.chinese: “不！”她惊呼道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited

name: all
trans: adj.，全部的，所有的，adv.，全部，非常，全然，所有，prep.，全部，pron.，全部，所有，n.，全部

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

name: casual
trans: adj.偶然的，随便的，非正式，漫不经心的

sentences.english: a casual manner
sentences.chinese: 漫不经心的态度

sentences.english: His eyes were angry, though he sounded casual.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他的语气满不在乎，但他的眼神充满怒气。

sentences.english: Marsha was quite casual about appearing on TV.
sentences.chinese: 玛莎对于上电视很无所谓。

sentences.english: a casual conversation
sentences.chinese: 随便的谈话

sentences.english: He made some casual remark (= one without thinking much about it ) about her holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他随口提到了她度假的事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 漫不经心的，随便的；偶然的
detailed_translations.english: relaxed and not worried, or seeming not to care about something

name: thus
trans: adv.如此，这样，因而，因此，从而

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

name: dare
trans: vt.，&，vi.，&，aux.v.敢，竟敢，敢于，勇于面对，n.敢，挑战

sentences.english: He wanted to ask her, but he didn’t dare.
sentences.chinese: 他想问她，但又不敢。

sentences.english: ‘I’ll tell Dad.’ ‘You wouldn’t dare!’
sentences.chinese: “我要告诉爸爸。” “谅你也不敢！”

sentences.english: How dare you accuse me of lying!
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢说我撒谎！

detailed_translations.english: to be brave enough to do something that is risky or that you are afraid to do – used especially in questions or negative sentences

name: fertilize
trans: v.施肥，使丰饶

sentences.english: The faeces contain nitrogen which fertilizes the soil.
sentences.chinese: 排泄物含有肥沃土壤的氮。

detailed_translations.english: To fertilize land means to improve its quality in order to make plants grow well on it, by spreading solid animal waste or a chemical mixture on it

name: list
trans: n.表，明细表，目录，名单，条纹，倾斜，列举，<古>意向，vt.列出列表，(使)倾斜，<古>使高兴，愿意，<古>听

sentences.english: Make a list of all the things you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 把你必须做的所有事情列一个清单。

sentences.english: The first person on my list is Mrs Gilling.
sentences.chinese: 我的名单上排在第一位的是吉林夫人。

sentences.english: The guidebook lists 1,000 hotels and restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 旅游手册上列有1,000家宾馆和餐厅。

detailed_translations.english: a set of names, numbers etc, usually written one below the other, for example so that you can remember or check them
to write a list, or mention things one after the other

name: burn
trans: vt.，&，vi.烧，燃烧，烧着，烧毁，灼伤，n.烧伤，灼伤

sentences.english: I burnt all his old letters.
sentences.chinese: 我把他以前的信全烧了。

sentences.english: Cars were burned and shops were looted during the rioting.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱期间，汽车被焚，商店遭抢劫。

sentences.english: The Grand Hotel had burnt to the ground .
sentences.chinese: 格兰德大酒店被大火夷为平地。

sentences.english: Make sure the iron isn’t too hot or you’ll burn the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 注意熨斗温度不能过高，免得烫坏布料。

sentences.english: He dropped his cigarette and burnt a hole in the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他的香烟掉下来，把地毯烫了一个洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 燃烧；烧毁，灼伤；激起…的愤怒
detailed_translations.english: to destroy or damage something with fire
an injury caused by fire, heat, the light of the sun, or acid

name: countryside
trans: n.乡下，农村

sentences.english: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.chinese: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
detailed_translations.english: land that is outside cities and towns

name: stable
trans: adj.稳定的，不变的，安定的，可靠的，n.厩，马厩，马棚，牛棚，一批人，vt.使(马)入厩，vi.入厩

sentences.english: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.chinese: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.english: Children like a stable environment.
sentences.chinese: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的
detailed_translations.english: steady and not likely to move or change
a building where horses are kept

name: safely
trans: adv.安全地，可靠地

sentences.english: Drive safely!
sentences.chinese: 安全行驶！

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume that she will pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以确信她会通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is safe

name: historical
trans: adj.历史的，有关历史的

sentences.english: places of historical interest
sentences.chinese: 历史名胜

sentences.english: It is important to look at the novel in its historical context .
sentences.chinese: 在历史背景下看待这部小说很重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the past

name: favourite
trans: adj.特别受喜爱的，特别喜爱的，n.特别喜爱的人(或物)

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.chinese: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.english: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.english: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.chinese: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

name: habit
trans: n.习惯，习性，隐，长袍，vt.穿衣

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

name: company
trans: n.公司，商号，同伴，客人，一群，连队，vt.陪伴，vi.联合

sentences.english: Which company do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.english: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.english: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.english: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

detailed_translations.english: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

name: quiet
trans: adj.寂静的，安静的，静止的，宁静的，adv.安静地，v.使...平静使...安心，n.安静，闲适，平静

sentences.english: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

name: endless
trans: adj.无止境的，没完没了的

sentences.english: an endless stream of visitors
sentences.chinese: 川流不息的游客

sentences.english: The possibilities are endless.
sentences.chinese: 有无限的可能性。

sentences.english: He’s been in a lot of trouble – drugs, guns, blackmail – the list is endless.
sentences.chinese: 他麻烦太多了——毒品、枪支、敲诈——说都说不完。

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount, size, or number

name: infect
trans: vt.传染，感染

sentences.english: People with the virus may feel perfectly well, but they can still infect others.
sentences.chinese: 带有这种病毒的人可能毫无症状，却仍可能传染他人。

sentences.english: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他们可能用中产阶级思想去影响别人。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone a disease

name: stem
trans: n.茎，(树)干，柄，船首，vi.起源，vt.抽去...的梗，给...装柄逆...而行，n.血统，[语]词干v.堵住，阻止，[体]内转

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: red
trans: adj.红色的，n.红色

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

name: discard
trans: vt.丢弃，抛弃，遗弃，vi.丢牌，n.丢牌，废牌

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.chinese: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
detailed_translations.english: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

name: compare
trans: vt.，&，vi.比较，对照，比作，比喻，n.比较，对照

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

name: wireless
trans: adj.不用电线的，无线的，n.无线电，收音机，v.用无线电发送(通讯)

sentences.english: ...the fast-growing wireless communication market.
sentences.chinese: …快速增长的无线通讯市场。

detailed_translations.english: Wireless technology uses radio waves rather than electricity and therefore does not require any wires
a radio

detailed_translations.chinese: 用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送
打无线电报；打无线电话

name: theory
trans: n.理论，原理，学说，意见

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: coward
trans: n.懦夫，胆怯者，adj.胆小的

sentences.english: Try it. Don’t be such a coward.
sentences.chinese: 试一下，别那么胆小。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is not at all brave

name: neutral
trans: adj.中立的，中性的，n.中立者，空挡的，素净色

sentences.english: I always tried to remain neutral when they started arguing.
sentences.chinese: 他们争论起来的时候我总是努力保持中立。

sentences.english: Clive decided to adopt a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 克莱夫决定采取中立立场。

sentences.english: The British government acted as a neutral observer during the talks.
sentences.chinese: 英国政府在会谈中扮演了中立观察员的角色。

sentences.english: the neutral language of an official news report
sentences.chinese: 官方新闻报道采用的中性语言

detailed_translations.english: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

name: nature
trans: n.大自然，自然界，自然状态，本性，性质，类型

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

name: barrel
trans: n.桶，圆筒，枪管，炮管，笔管，一桶的量，大量，汽油桶，vi.快速移动，vt.把...装桶

sentences.english: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

detailed_translations.english: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc

name: draft
trans: n.草稿，草图，汇票，徵兵，vt.起草，征兵，选秀，adj.酝酿中的

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

name: weary
trans: a.疲倦的，vt.使疲乏

sentences.english: She found Rachel in the kitchen, looking old and weary.
sentences.chinese: 她发现雷切尔在厨房里，看上去苍老而疲惫。

sentences.english: She sat down with a weary sigh.
sentences.chinese: 她疲倦地叹口气坐了下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦的；厌烦的；令人厌烦的
detailed_translations.english: very tired or bored, especially because you have been doing something for a long time
to become very tired, or make someone very tired

name: apply
trans: vt.应用，实施，使用，涂，使专心从事，vi.申请，有关联

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something
to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface

name: gracious
trans: adj.有礼貌的，仁慈的，亲切的，高尚的

sentences.english: Sibyl was the most gracious, helpful, and generous person to work with.
sentences.chinese: 西比尔非常和蔼，乐于助人，而且为人慷慨，和她共事最愉快。

sentences.english: a gracious apology
sentences.chinese: 落落大方的道歉

detailed_translations.chinese: 亲切的，和蔼的；优美的；雅致的，雍容华贵的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a polite, kind, and generous way, especially to people of a lower rank

name: uniform
trans: adj.一样的，一致的，统一的，n.制服，vt.穿制服，使统一

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

name: closely
trans: adv.紧密地，接近地，严密地

sentences.english: The successful applicant will be working closely with our international staff.
sentences.chinese: 被录用者将与我们的国际员工紧密合作。

sentences.english: lightning, followed closely by thunder
sentences.chinese: 闪电，紧跟着是雷鸣

sentences.english: We were so closely packed in the elevator I could hardly move.
sentences.chinese: 电梯里人挨着人，我几乎动弹不得。

detailed_translations.english: to a very great degree

name: violent
trans: adj.猛烈的，狂暴的，暴力的，极端的

sentences.english: the increase in violent crime
sentences.chinese: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.english: violent clashes between the police and demonstrators
sentences.chinese: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.english: 31 people have been injured in violent incidents throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.english: The riots ended in the violent deaths of three teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 动乱以三名少年的惨死而告终。

detailed_translations.english: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc

name: cabbage
trans: n.洋白菜，卷心菜，vt.偷窃

sentences.english: I like peas more than cabbage .
sentences.chinese: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.english: We have cabbage and mutton.
sentences.chinese: 我们有卷心菜和羊肉。

sentences.english: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves

name: add
trans: vt.，添加，附加，掺加，增加

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

name: free
trans: adj.自由的，空闲的，大方的，免费的，vt.释放，解放，adv.自由地免费地

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

name: neighbour
trans: n.邻居(邻近的东西，邻近值)，邻国，邻人，vt.邻接(相邻，接近)

sentences.english: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.chinese: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.english: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.chinese: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives next to you or near you

name: trousers
trans: n.裤子，长裤

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

name: bomb
trans: n.炸弹，高压罐，火山口喷出的熔岩，vt.轰炸，大败，长传，vi.失败

sentences.english: The bomb went off at 9.30 in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹在早上9点半爆炸。

sentences.english: Enemy planes dropped over 200 bombs during the raid.
sentences.chinese: 袭击中敌机投下了两百多枚炸弹。

sentences.english: He was killed in a bomb explosion.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次炸弹爆炸中身亡。

sentences.english: The town was heavily bombed in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 这座城镇在第二次世界大战中遭到猛烈轰炸。

detailed_translations.english: a weapon made of material that will explode
to attack a place by leaving a bomb there, or by dropping bombs on it from a plane

name: hamburger
trans: n.汉堡包，牛肉饼

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

name: outlook
trans: n.观点，看法，展望，前景，景色

sentences.english: Exercise will improve your looks and your outlook.
sentences.chinese: 运动将会改善你的外在形象和人生态度。

detailed_translations.english: your general attitude to life and the world

name: roar
trans: vi.吼叫，大声说出，喧闹，呼喊，vt.呼喊，使轰鸣，n.吼，咆哮，轰鸣，喧闹

sentences.english: We heard a lion roar.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到狮子在吼叫。

sentences.english: The engines roared.
sentences.chinese: 引擎轰鸣。

sentences.english: ‘Get out of my house!’ he roared.
sentences.chinese: “从我家里滚出去！”他吼道。

sentences.english: the roar of the crowd
sentences.chinese: 人群的喊叫声

detailed_translations.english: to make a deep, very loud noise
a deep, loud noise made by an animal such as a lion, or by someone’s voice

name: industrialize
trans: vt.(使)工业化，=industrialise(英)

sentences.english: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialize.
sentences.chinese: 能源消耗随着各国工业化而增加。

detailed_translations.english: When a country industrializes or is industrialized, it develops a lot of industries

name: scholar
trans: n.学者(尤指文学方面)，获奖学金的学生

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

name: her
trans: pron.(宾格)她，她的，adj.她的，abbr.=heraldry

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

name: plot
trans: n.小块土地，阴谋，情节，图，vt.密谋，绘图，计划，标示位置

sentences.english: a two-acre plot of land
sentences.chinese: 一块两英亩的土地

sentences.english: a vegetable plot
sentences.chinese: 一块菜地

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of land for building or growing things on
to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government

name: headline
trans: n.(pl.)新闻提要，大字标题

sentences.english: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

detailed_translations.chinese: 大标题；内容提要；栏外标题；头版头条新闻
detailed_translations.english: the title of a newspaper report, which is printed in large letters above the report

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…加标题；使成为注意中心；大力宣传
detailed_translations.english: to give a headline to an article or story

name: altitude
trans: n.高，高度，海拔，高处，高地

sentences.english: The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

name: high
trans: adj.高的，高级的，轻微变质的，高尚的，严重的，强的，adv.高，好，n.高地，天堂，高气压，高度，兴奋

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.english: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

name: moreover
trans: adv.再者，加之，此外，而且

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

name: cheap
trans: adj.廉价的，便宜的，劣质的，品质低的，虚伪的，adv.便宜地

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.english: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.chinese: 廉价商店

sentences.english: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.english: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

detailed_translations.english: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

name: smog
trans: n.烟雾

sentences.english: Cars cause pollution, both smog and acid rain.
sentences.chinese: 汽车引起污染，既有烟雾又有酸雨。

detailed_translations.english: dirty air that looks like a mixture of smoke and  fog  , caused by smoke from cars and factories in cities

name: fisherman
trans: n.渔民，渔夫，打鱼人，渔船

sentences.english: The Algarve is a paradise for fishermen whether river anglers or deep-sea fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

detailed_translations.english: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job

name: portable
trans: adj.轻便的，手提的，n.便携的东西

sentences.english: a portable radio
sentences.chinese: 便携式收音机

detailed_translations.english: able to be carried or moved easily

name: rise
trans: vi.起立，升起，上涨，起身n.上升，增加，小山，斜坡

sentences.english: The police seem unable to cope with the rising tide of (= large increase in ) car crime.
sentences.chinese: 面对日益增多的汽车罪案，警方似乎无能为力。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in number, amount, or value
an increase in number, amount, or value

name: rank
trans: n.排，横行，社会阶层，队列，排名，等级，军衔，阶级，adj.繁茂的恶臭的，讨厌的，vt.排列，归类于

sentences.english: There were several pairs of riding boots ranked neatly in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 门厅里整齐地摆放着几双马靴。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange objects in a line or row

detailed_translations.chinese: 军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列
detailed_translations.english: the position or level that someone holds in an organization, especially in the police or the army, navy etc
to have a particular position in a list of people or things that have been put in order of quality or importance

name: adventure
trans: n.，冒险，奇遇，惊险活动，vt.，冒险，尝试，vi.，大胆进行，冒险

sentences.english: a great adventure
sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: Ahab’s adventures at sea
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.english: an adventure story
sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

detailed_translations.english: an exciting experience in which dangerous or unusual things happen

name: upwards
trans: adv.趋向上升，以上，往上，向上地

sentences.english: Pointing upwards, he indicated a large nest high in the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他朝上指指，示意树上高处有个大鸟窝。

sentences.english: The path began to climb steeply upwards.
sentences.chinese: 小路开始陡然向上。

detailed_translations.english: moving or pointing towards a higher position

name: rule
trans: n.统治，规定，规则，习惯，惯例，标准，vi.统治，立法，vt.裁决，统治，画直线

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

name: cast
trans: n.演员阵容，投掷，vt.投，扔，抛，浇铸

sentences.english: the shade cast by low-hanging branches
sentences.chinese: 低垂的树枝投下的阴影

detailed_translations.english: to make light or a shadow appear somewhere

detailed_translations.chinese: 演员表， 全体演员； 石膏绷带； 铸型， 铸件； 投， 抛
detailed_translations.english: all the people who perform in a play, film etc

name: home
trans: n.家，家乡，住所，国内的，养老院，adj.家庭的，家(乡)的，adv.回家，在家，正确的方向，vt.，提供住处，vi.，回家，移向

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

name: nurse
trans: n.保姆，护士，奶妈，vt.看护，哺乳，vi.看护，照顾，栽培，当看护

sentences.english: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.english: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.english: He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured

name: bill
trans: n.，比尔(男名)，账单，钞票，招贴，票据，清单，议案，法案，广告鸟嘴，喙，vt.，开帐单，用海报宣传，把...列成表

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

name: prison
trans: n.监狱，监禁

sentences.english: He visits his dad in prison every week.
sentences.chinese: 他每周都去探望狱中的父亲。

sentences.english: Ricky has been out of prison for three years now.
sentences.chinese: 里基现已出狱三年。

sentences.english: They’ll probably put him in prison for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他们很可能会让他在监狱里待很长时间。

sentences.english: Helen was sent to prison for attacking a man with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 海伦因持刀袭击一名男子而被送入监狱。

sentences.english: The two men were arrested only a week after they were released from prison .
sentences.chinese: 那两名男子从监狱获释后仅仅一周就被捕了。

sentences.english: Three terrorists escaped from Brixton Prison .
sentences.chinese: 有三名恐怖分子从布里克斯顿监狱越狱了。

sentences.english: an increase in the number of women going to prison
sentences.chinese: 入狱女性人数的增多

sentences.english: Mr Gunn received a ten year prison sentence .
sentences.chinese: 冈恩先生获刑十年。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime, or while they are waiting to go to court for their  trial

name: stock
trans: n.，原料，库存品，存货，股本，股份，储备，树干，血统，家畜，adj.存货的，平凡的，惯用的，股票的，畜牧的，vt.，进货，采购，储存，供给，vi.，出新芽，进货

sentences.english: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

detailed_translations.english: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

detailed_translations.chinese: 原料，库存品；股本，公债；世系，血统；汤汁；家畜，牲畜
detailed_translations.english: a liquid made by boiling meat or bones and vegetables, which is used to make soups or to add  flavour  to other dishes

name: emerge
trans: vi.出现，涌现，冒出，(由某种状态)脱出，(事实)显现出来

sentences.english: The flowers emerge in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 花儿在春天开放。

sentences.english: After the elections opposition groups began to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 经过选举，反对派开始露头。

detailed_translations.english: to appear or come out from somewhere

name: nasty
trans: adj.龌龊的，淫猥的，令人作呕的，污秽的，低劣的，难懂的，危害的

sentences.english: a nasty temper
sentences.chinese: 坏脾气

sentences.english: the nasty things that were being written about her
sentences.chinese: 人们描述的那些关于她的坏事情

sentences.english: There’s a nasty streak in her character.
sentences.chinese: 她性格中有令人讨厌的一面。

sentences.english: Drivers often have a nasty habit of driving too close to cyclists.
sentences.chinese: 司机常有一个坏习惯，就是车开得离骑自行车的人太近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下流的；肮脏的；脾气不好的；险恶的
detailed_translations.english: nasty behaviour or remarks are extremely unkind and unpleasant

name: manage
trans: vt.管理，设法，对付，处理，维持，达成，经营，vi.管理，达成

sentences.english: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

name: rarely
trans: adv.很少，难得

sentences.english: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.chinese: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.english: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

name: solar
trans: adj.太阳的，太阳能的，日光的

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

name: depart
trans: vi.离开，起程，出发，死亡，脱轨，vt.离开

sentences.english: Flights by Air Europe depart Gatwick on Tuesdays.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世
detailed_translations.english: to leave, especially when you are starting a journey

name: order
trans: n.次序，整齐，勋章，阶级，决议，订单，命令，vt.命令，调整，定购

sentences.english: There seemed to be no logical order to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 这几部分似乎没有逻辑顺序。

sentences.english: Let’s have some order in here.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这里整理一下吧。

sentences.english: The court ordered his release from prison.
sentences.chinese: 法院下令放他出狱。

detailed_translations.english: the way that things or events are arranged in relation to each other, so that one thing is first, another thing is second etc
to tell someone that they must do something, especially using your official power or authority

name: foremost
trans: adj.最初的，第一流的，adv.在最前面

sentences.english: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.chinese: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.english: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，罗斯特罗波维奇一直被视为世界上首屈一指的大提琴家。

detailed_translations.english: in a leading position among a group of people or things

name: hatch
trans: vt.孵出，vi.(蛋)孵化，破壳，n.孵化，舱口

sentences.english: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

name: responsibility
trans: n.责任，责任心，可信度，职责

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

name: hurt
trans: vt.使受伤，使痛心，伤害，(使)疼痛，损害，vi.受疼痛，破坏，n.打击，创伤

sentences.english: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.chinese: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.english: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.chinese: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

detailed_translations.english: to injure yourself or someone else

name: expect
trans: vt.预料，预期，等待，盼望

sentences.english: He will be hard to beat. I fully expect (= am completely sure about ) that and I’m ready.
sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.english: ‘Who are you?’ he murmured, only half expecting (= thinking it was possible, but not likely ) her to answer.
sentences.chinese: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.english: to expect a visit/call/letter from sb
sentences.chinese: 等待某人的来访 / 电话 / 来信

detailed_translations.english: to think that something will happen because it seems likely or has been planned

name: pretend
trans: vt.假托，借口，vi.假装，伪称，adj.假装的，赝品的，模拟的

sentences.english: Let’s pretend we’re on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 我们假装自己是在月球上吧。

sentences.english: He’s not asleep – he’s just pretending.
sentences.chinese: 他并没睡着，不过是装睡而已。

sentences.english: To pretend ignorance of the situation would be irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 装作不知情是不负责任的做法。

sentences.english: I can’t marry her and to pretend otherwise would be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我不可以娶她，装作娶她无妨是不对的。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if something is true when in fact you know it is not, in order to deceive people or for fun
imaginary or not real - used especially by children

name: saddle
trans: n.鞍子，马鞍，车座，山脊，拖具，vt.装以马鞍，使负担，vi.装马鞍

sentences.english: It is no surprise that she could saddle the horses.
sentences.chinese: 她能给马备鞍并没有什么值得惊讶的。

sentences.english: Thee bike's frame, wheels, handlebars and saddle are all made of cardboard in this way, and then fitted together.
sentences.chinese: 自行车的车架、车轮、车把和车座都用以此方式制造的纸板制成，然后组装在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a leather seat that you sit on when you ride a horse
to put a saddle on a horse

name: administration
trans: n.，管理，行政，管理部门

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with experience in administration.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一个有管理经验的人。

sentences.english: The health service spends too much on administration.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务部门在行政方面花费太多。

detailed_translations.english: the activities that are involved in managing the work of a company or organization

name: teaching
trans: n.教学，教义，讲授，教导，adj.教学的，动词teach的现在分词

name: rival
trans: n.对手，同伴，竞争者，adj.竞争的，vt.与...相匹敌，比得上，vi.竞争

sentences.english: This gives the company a competitive advantage over its rivals.
sentences.chinese: 这使该公司与其对手相比具有一项竞争优势。

sentences.english: He finished 39 seconds ahead of his main rival .
sentences.chinese: 他比主要对手早39秒到达终点。

sentences.english: She was 2 minutes faster than her nearest rival .
sentences.chinese: 她比紧随其后的对手快两分钟。

sentences.english: a game against their old rivals , Manchester United
sentences.chinese: 和他们的老对手曼联队的比赛

sentences.english: They still remain bitter rivals (= hate each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们仍是死敌。

sentences.english: Their sales have now overtaken those of their arch-rival (= main or strongest rival ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的销售额现已超过了主要竞争对手。

detailed_translations.english: a person, group, or organization that you compete with in sport, business, a fight etc

name: gang
trans: n.一帮，一伙，队，群，帮，vt.，&，vi.结一组，联合在一起

sentences.english: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.chinese: 一些调查人员认为她是团伙的决策者。

sentences.english: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 语言天使举起了一伙人并把他们猛撞到三角形的一个角上。

detailed_translations.english: a group of criminals who work together

name: disable
trans: vt.使无能，使伤残，使...失去能力

sentences.english: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.chinese: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

detailed_translations.english: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life

name: kitchen
trans: n.厨房，灶间

sentences.english: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.english: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里做饭。

detailed_translations.english: the room where you prepare and cook food

name: angel
trans: n.天使，天使般的人，神差，(名)安琪儿

sentences.english: the angel Gabriel
sentences.chinese: 天使加百列

detailed_translations.english: a  spirit  who is God’s servant in heaven, and who is often shown as a person dressed in white with wings

name: drill
trans: n.钻头，钻孔机，钻子，播种机，操练，vi.钻孔，vt.训练，钻孔

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

name: basketball
trans: n.篮球，篮球运动

sentences.english: We love playing basketball.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.english: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

detailed_translations.english: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net

name: successfully
trans: advS.成功地

name: noun
trans: n.名词

sentences.english: An adjective must agree with  its noun in mumber and case.
sentences.chinese: 形容词在数和格方面必须符合其所修饰的名词。

sentences.english: In “the black cat” the adjective “black”modifies the noun “cat”.
sentences.chinese: 在“那只黑猫”中，形容词“黑的”修饰名词“猫”。

sentences.english: On the spines of books shelved in certain libraries and bookstores you will see OATES but this is a descriptive term, this is not a noun.
sentences.chinese: 在某些图书馆或书店里某些图书的书脊上，你会看见“欧茨”，但这里的“欧茨”不能作名词解，它是个描述性的词语。

detailed_translations.english: a word or group of words that represent a person (such as ‘Michael’, ‘teacher’ or ‘police officer’), a place (such as ‘France’ or ‘school’), a thing or activity (such as ‘coffee’ or ‘football’), or a quality or idea (such as ‘danger’ or ‘happiness’). Nouns can be used as the subject or object of a verb (as in ‘The teacher arrived’ or ‘We like the teacher’) or as the object of a preposition (as in ‘good at football’).

name: common
trans: adj.普通的，共同的，平常的，n.平民，普通，公地，公园

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

name: bear
trans: n.熊，粗鲁的人，vt.忍受，负荷，结果实，生子女

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.chinese: 母熊和它的熊崽们

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

name: grocer
trans: n.食品商，杂货商

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 厨师和杂货商为蛋价计较个没完。

sentences.english: He never overcharged when I went shopping in his grocer.
sentences.chinese: 我去他的杂货店买东西时他从不向我乱索价。

sentences.english: Just as our exchanges with the local grocer free us from backbreaking farm work, so do imports from around the world move us even more toward the very economic specialization that enriches us.
sentences.chinese: 就好像我们与当地的杂货店交易，我们就不用非常辛苦地从事农业劳动，来自全世界的进口品让我们更快地走向经济专业化，使我们富裕。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells food and other things used in the home

name: cord
trans: n.细绳，粗线，索，束缚，vt.用绳索绑

sentences.english: The robe was held at the waist by a cord.
sentences.chinese: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.english: He pulled explosives and some tangled cord from his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick string or thin rope

name: twelve
trans: num.十二，十二个

sentences.english: He received a twelve-month jail sentence.
sentences.chinese: 他获刑12个月。

sentences.english: Come at twelve (= 12 o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 12点来。

sentences.english: Their son Dylan is twelve (= 12 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的儿子迪伦12岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 12
the number 12

name: rejoice
trans: vi.使...欣喜，高兴

sentences.english: Today you may rejoice because of contacts, news or visits from friends who live in another city or country.
sentences.chinese: 今天您可能因为得到来自另一个城市或国家的朋友的联系、消息或拜访而感到高兴。

sentences.english: Why is it that we rejoice at a birth and grieve at a funeral? Is it because we are not the person concerned?
sentences.chinese: 我们为何在（人家）出生之时高兴而在殡殓之时又悲伤呢？是否因为我们不属于关人士才这样的？

name: thief
trans: n.窃贼，偷窃犯，小偷

sentences.english: Thieves broke into the offices and stole $150,000’s worth of computer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 小偷破门进入办公室，偷走了价值15万美元的电脑设备。

sentences.english: They were nothing but petty thieves (= thieves who steal small things ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们只不过是小毛贼。

detailed_translations.english: someone who steals things from another person or place

name: sorry
trans: adj.对不起的，抱歉的，难过的，遗憾的，int.对不起

sentences.english: She was very sorry about all the trouble she'd caused.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己造成的麻烦感到很内疚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗憾的；对不起的，抱歉的
detailed_translations.english: feeling ashamed or unhappy about something bad you have done

detailed_translations.chinese: 对不起，抱歉（表示委婉的拒绝等）

name: swallow
trans: n.燕子，吞咽，一次吞咽的量，vt.吞下，咽下，忍受，不流露感情收回，vi.咽口水，忍气吞声，吞下，咽下

sentences.english: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.english: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.chinese: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

name: starve
trans: vi.饿死，挨饿，受饿，vt.使饿死，使挨饿

sentences.english: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

detailed_translations.english: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat

name: reading
trans: n.读，阅读，读书，adj.阅读的

sentences.english: She loves reading.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢看书。

sentences.english: Reading is taught using a combination of several methods.
sentences.chinese: 综合运用多种方法进行阅读教学。

sentences.english: The book is quite difficult on first reading.
sentences.chinese: 这本书第一次阅读时很难懂。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or skill of understanding written words

name: world-wide
trans: adj.遍及全球的，世界范围的

sentences.english: Today, doctors are fearing a worldwide epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 如今，医生们在担心一次世界性的流行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遍及地球的， 世界范围的
detailed_translations.english: Worldwide is also an adjective

name: explosive
trans: n.炸药，adj.爆炸(性)的

sentences.english: ...one-hundred-and-fifty pounds of Semtex explosive.
sentences.chinese: …150磅的塞姆汀塑料炸药。

sentences.english: Because the gas is highly explosive, it needs to be kept in high-pressure containers.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种气体极易爆炸，因此需要保存在高压容器内。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause an explosion
able or likely to explode

name: refuse
trans: vt.拒绝，adj.无用的，n.废物，垃圾

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

name: deed
trans: n.行为，事迹，功绩，(尤指房产)契约，证书，vt.通过行为转化

sentences.english: After the morning’s good deeds he deserved a rest.
sentences.chinese: 上午做了好事之后，他理应休息一下。

sentences.english: She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed .
sentences.chinese: 她试图掐死自己的宝宝，她的情人帮着完成了这个罪恶的勾当。

detailed_translations.chinese: 行动；功绩；证书；[法] 契据
detailed_translations.english: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad

name: arbitrary
trans: adj.随心所欲的，专断的，任意的，专制的，武断的，霸道的

sentences.english: an arbitrary decision
sentences.chinese: 武断的决定

sentences.english: the arbitrary arrests of political opponents
sentences.chinese: 对政敌的任意逮捕

detailed_translations.english: decided or arranged without any reason or plan, often unfairly

name: center
trans: n.中心，中间，主角，中锋，重点，vi.居中，聚焦于...，vt.使集中放在中央

sentences.english: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，您会以中心为原点旋转一个正方形，但不填充这个正方形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆心， 正中； 中心

name: rotary
trans: adj.旋转的，转动的，n.旋转式机器，环形交叉路

sentences.english: the rotary movement of the helicopter blades
sentences.chinese: 直升机螺旋桨叶的转动

detailed_translations.english: turning in a circle around a fixed point, like a wheel

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转式机器；[动力] 转缸式发动机

name: assume
trans: vt.假定，设想，承担，呈现，(想当然的)认为

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.english: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.chinese: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

sentences.english: Whoever they appoint will assume responsibility for all financial matters.
sentences.chinese: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

sentences.english: These relationships assume great importance in times of crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof

name: bridge
trans: n.桥，桥梁，桥牌，鼻梁，vt.渡过，架桥

sentences.english: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.english: They recreate themselves with playing bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a structure built over a river, road etc that allows people or vehicles to cross from one side to the other

name: tuck
trans: vt.折短，卷起，塞，打摺，挤进，畅饮，vi.缝褶裥，缩拢，畅饮，n.缝摺，船尾突出部下方，食品，鼓声

sentences.english: You tuck your secret away in an unexpected place, like an MP3 or a photo file, to conceal the fact you even shared any information at all.
sentences.chinese: 你将你的秘密“卷起来”，放在一个意想不到的地方，比如MP3或照片文件，这样就掩盖了你曾经分享信息的事实。

detailed_translations.english: a pleat or fold in a part of a garment, usually stitched down so as to make it a better fit or as decoration

name: day
trans: n.(一)天，白昼，白天

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

name: popular
trans: adj.民众的，流行的，有销路的

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

name: travel
trans: vt.，&，vi.，&，n.旅行，传播，移动

sentences.english: Light travels faster than sound.
sentences.chinese: 光比声音传播得快。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行； 行进； 被传送， 被传播； 走过， 驶过
detailed_translations.english: to move at a particular speed or in a particular direction
the activity of travelling

name: war
trans: n.战争，冲突，斗争，竞争，vi.作战，斗争

sentences.english: the Vietnam War
sentences.chinese: 越南战争

sentences.english: He served as a pilot during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战时担任飞行员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
detailed_translations.english: when there is fighting between two or more countries or between opposing groups within a country, involving large numbers of soldiers and weapons

name: attract
trans: vt.吸引，引起，诱惑，有吸引力

sentences.english: I’m not usually attracted to blondes.
sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

name: output
trans: n.产量，输出量，输出，输出功率，输出端，vt.输出(信息等)

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

name: advanced
trans: adj.，先进的，高级的

sentences.english: advanced learners of English
sentences.chinese: 高级程度的英语学习者

sentences.english: advanced physics
sentences.chinese: 高等物理（学）

detailed_translations.english: studying or dealing with a school subject at a difficult level

name: Canadian
trans: adj.加拿大的，加拿大人的，n.加拿大人

sentences.english: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Canada or its people
someone from Canada

name: instrument
trans: n.仪器，工具，乐器，器械

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

name: steady
trans: adj.稳固的，稳定的，坚定的，vt.使稳定，使稳固，(变得)稳固，adv.平稳地，稳固地，n.固定的事物

sentences.english: It takes a steady hand to perform surgery.
sentences.chinese: 做手术手要稳。

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: firmly held in a particular position and not moving or shaking
to hold someone or something so they become more balanced or controlled, or to become more balanced or controlled

name: better
trans: adj.较好的，更好的，adv.更好地，v.使...更好，超越，n.更好的事物

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc

name: immediately
trans: adv.立即，直接地，conj.一...(就)

sentences.english: He retired immediately after the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.english: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
sentences.chinese: 灾害最直接受害者将获得援助。

detailed_translations.english: very soon before or after something

name: spiritual
trans: adj.精神的，心灵的，与上帝有关的，n.(尤指美国南部黑人的)圣歌

sentences.english: Painting helps fill a spiritual need for beauty.
sentences.chinese: 绘画可以满足对美的精神需求。

sentences.english: spiritual values
sentences.chinese: 精神价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神的， 心灵的； 宗教的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your spirit rather than to your body or mind

name: inward
trans: adj.里面的，内心的，向内的，亲密的，adv.向内，n.内部，内在

sentences.english: a feeling of inward satisfaction
sentences.chinese: 内心的满足感

sentences.english: inward panic
sentences.chinese: 内心的恐慌

sentences.english: He pushed open the front door, which swung inward with a groan.
sentences.chinese: 他推开前门，门呀的一声向里开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的

If something moves or faces inward, it moves or faces toward the inside or centre of something

trans: n.分发，分配，分布，散布

sentences.english: a distribution centre
sentences.chinese: 经销中心

detailed_translations.english: the act of sharing things among a large group of people in a planned way

name: fail
trans: vi.失败，失灵，不能，衰退，不及格，vt.辜负，缺少，未能做，n.不及格

sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

name: improve
trans: vt.使更好，改进，利用，(提高)价值，vi.改善，改进

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: rot
trans: vt.烂，腐坏，腐烂，腐蚀，败坏，n.腐烂，使...枯朽，衰弱

sentences.english: the smell of rot
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的气味

sentences.english: wood that is soft with rot
sentences.chinese: 腐烂变软的木头

detailed_translations.english: the natural process of decaying, or the part of something that has decayed
to decay by a gradual natural process, or to make something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了

name: mechanic
trans: n.技工，机械，机修工，adj.手工的

sentences.english: a garage mechanic
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂的技工

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

name: sheep
trans: n.羊，绵羊

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

name: conductor
trans: n.售票员，(乐队)指挥，导体

sentences.english: He showed his ticket to the conductor and got on.
sentences.chinese: 他向检票员出示了车票，然后上了车。

sentences.english: The conductor's eyes darted to Wilfred, then fixed on Michael again.
sentences.chinese: 乐队指挥飞快地扫了威尔弗雷德一眼，然后视线又落回到迈克尔身上。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to collect payments from passengers on a bus

name: behind
trans: adv.在后面，落后，迟地，adj.后面的，落后的，迟的，慢的，prep.在...后面，落后于，掩盖，基于，支持，n.屁股

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.english: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

name: primarily
trans: adv.首先，主要地

sentences.english: The advertisement is aimed primarily at children.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告的对象主要是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: mainly

name: staff
trans: n.工作人员，参谋，全体人员，同事，拐杖，杆，棒，五线谱，vt.配备员工

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: torrent
trans: n.奔流，激流，洪流，山洪adj.奔流的，汹涌的

sentences.english: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.chinese: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction

name: computer
trans: n.计算机，电脑

sentences.english: a huge global computer network
sentences.chinese: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.english: the latest computer software
sentences.chinese: 最新的计算机软件

detailed_translations.english: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information

name: dinner
trans: n.正餐，主餐，宴会，晚宴

sentences.english: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.english: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.english: What’s for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.english: the Club’s annual dinner
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的年度晚宴

detailed_translations.english: the main meal of the day, eaten in the middle of the day or the evening

name: view
trans: n.看，视力，风景，视野，见解，方法，检查

sentences.english: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.chinese: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

detailed_translations.english: to think about something or someone in a particular way

name: mean
trans: vt.，作...解释，意指，意谓，想要，意欲，n.，平均值，平均数，中部，adj.，低劣的，卑贱的，卑鄙的，自私的吝啬的，平均的，中等的

sentences.english: The red light means ‘Stop’.
sentences.chinese: 红灯表示“停”。

sentences.english: This light means you’re running low on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 这个灯亮说明汽油不多了。

detailed_translations.english: to have or represent a particular meaning

name: escape
trans: vt.，&，vi.逃跑，逃脱，避开，逸出，n.逃跑，逃亡，避难设备，adj.逃避的

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

name: vivid
trans: adj.鲜艳的，生动的，栩栩如生的

sentences.english: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
sentences.chinese: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.english: He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的脑海中清晰地留着她的形象。

detailed_translations.english: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real

name: costly
trans: adj.昂贵的，价值高的，代价高的

sentences.english: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

sentences.english: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 他的优柔寡断长久下去要付出巨大代价。

detailed_translations.english: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money

name: vary
trans: vt.改变，变化，使多样化

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

name: loyalty
trans: n.忠诚，忠心

sentences.english: Elizabeth understood her husband’s loyalty to his sister.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白理解丈夫对他姐姐的一片忠心。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc

name: invisible
trans: adj.看不见的，无形的，n.隐形人(或物品)

sentences.english: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is invisible cannot be seen

name: Brazilian

sentences.english: When did you first want to become a teacher?

sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

trans: n.伙伴，同事，配偶，助手，v.使...配对，交配，使...一致，结伴

sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system

sentences.chinese: 那个木匠想当律师， 但别人劝他安分守己地干他自己的老本行。

sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射性的， 有辐射能的

sentences.chinese: 这次碰撞发生于渡船试图停靠在斯塔滕岛时。

if a ship docks, or if the captain docks it, it sails into a dock so that it can unload

sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.chinese: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.chinese: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

sentences.chinese: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

sentences.chinese: 他拽出一块脏手帕，捏着一角向我挥动。

sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

trans: n.现金，现款，vt.兑现，付现款，adj.现金的

sentences.chinese: 在一次公寓盗窃案中现金被盗。

sentences.english: There are similar charges if you want to cash a cheque or withdraw money at a branch other than your own.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在其他银行兑现支票或支取现金，将会产生差不多的手续费。

name: invite

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

sentences.english: a space rocket

sentences.chinese: 利率飞涨。

sentences.chinese: 他们的主要出口商品是纺织品，尤其是丝绸和棉布。

sentences.chinese: 那只鹰收拢双翅做俯冲。

sentences.english: Maybe they could not hold on to the arrival of the spring, but the female eagle thought what if their father could bring back the food?
sentences.chinese: 它们或许已经挨不到春天的到来了。 雌鹰这样想，但如果它们的爸爸会把食物带来呢？

sentences.chinese: 她缺乏完成这项任务的能力，不过她认识到老鹰可以帮助她。

sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

sentences.chinese: 他是仍然健在的最伟大的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: The sun affects all living things (= people, animals, and plants ).
